1b1(rgyud): na drAd+d+hots+tshin b+hU tIN+Din/spya pa /oMswAhA/gsus sngags mgan
1b2(rgyud): 'di yin te/rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad rnam par dag par
1b3(rgyud): 'gyuraro//dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na mtshams med pa lnga yA bying bar 'gyuraro//lan cig bzlas
1b4(rgyud): brjod byas na lngas ngan pa dang /bkra mo shis pa rnams med par 'gyur//lus la 'chang ngam/glegs
2b1(rgyud): gang zhig snying rjes glanon te ri dgas dang /bya dang /me dang mi mA yin pa rnams kyang rung ste/'chi ba'i rna khung du brjod na de
2b2(rgyud): ngan song du 'gro bar myi 'gyur ro//yang na shi stau dus las 'das na shi 'phros pa'i ming nas smos te de'i phyir byams pa dang snying rjes
2b3(rgyud): ldan brgya'ame/stong nga mi 'bum brjod na de sems can dmyal byar skyes su zin kyang de'i mod la thor byar 'gyu ro//sa'i ma
2b4(rgyud): til lo ma/yungs kar ram/chu gang yang rung ba la bzlas brjod byos te/shi ba'i lus la gtor ram/khrus byas nas
2b5(rgyud): de'i 'og tu 'chad pa'am/yang na mtshud rten gyi rlung du bcug ste bzhag la/rigs sngags kyang bris nas mgo la btogs na
2b6(rgyud): de ngan song du skyes pa yang zhag bdun gyis gdon mi za bar thar te/bde 'gro mtho ris kyis 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur pa
3a1(rgyud): /'am/yang na rlung gi skyon lam gyi dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ro//gang zhigazla ban+d+ha 'ocha//rgyus sa
3a2(rgyud): la gtsang mar byas te/dus gsum du gos brdzi zhing kha zas mi za ba 'amau//yang na kha zas dkar bag bza' zhing /sku gau du dang
3a3(rgyud): mchod rten du gong gi ming dang ldan pas lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/de dran song nas thar tAM gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ri suM skyes
3a4(rgyud): nus sgrub pa po'i thad du 'ongs te mchod par byed cing lus kyang ston la/leg so zhes bya ba yang byin nus lan gsum bskor ba byas
3a5(rgyud): demi snang bar 'gyur ro//de'i ming bris la gzungs sngags bzlas brjod byed cing //mchod rten 'bum byas la//gdugs da
3a6(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod nas rgya mtsho chen po dang /yang na chu klung du bta na des sems can
3b1(rgyud): dmyal ba la sogs pa nas thar bar 'gyuraro//yang na de ltar mchod pa byas nas mjug tu lam gyi gzhi mdor mchod rten chen por byas te/gdugs dang /rgyal
3b2(rgyud): mtshon dang /ba dran la sogs pas legs par mchod la//'phags pa'i dge 'dun la yang mchod ston gsol nas yon yang phul te legs par mchod nas
3b3(rgyud): che ge mo zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur cig/'di kho nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig/ces kyang shes par byas na/de kho na bzhin
3b4(rgyud): du skyes nas lus kyang ston cing lag so zhes bya ba yang byin nas mi snang bar gyur to//mchi mos med pa lnga byed byed pa 'am/dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/
3b5(rgyud): 'phags pa la bskur pa btab pa yang rung ste 'chi khar rtsig pa la gzungs sngags 'di bris pa mthong na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par gyur na/'don
3b6(rgyud): pa dang bzlas brjod byas pa lta ci smos/de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid byin nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu tshur nga'i gan du shog ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur
3b7(rgyud): ro//'phags po las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so////rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya be
4a1(rgyud): //ut+ta ma ma hA tan+t+ra/bod skad du/'phags pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud chen po//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
4a2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig nu/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
4a3(rgyud): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rig pa bya ba phrag du mos bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
4a4(rgyud): der song ste phyin nas bar snang las babs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo ngos phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
4a5(rgyud): ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rig pa bye ba du mas yongasu bskor nas 'khor de nyid 'dug
4a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas /bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/de nas
4a7(rgyud): 'byung po'i bdag pa dbang ldan 'byung po bye ba phrag du mas bskor nas 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/bcom ldan 'ongs kyi zhabs dang phyag na rdo rje la
4b1(rgyud): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogasu gcig tu 'dug/de nas gdol pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa yang 'khor de nyid 'dus par gyur to//rgyal po chen po bzhi yang
4b2(rgyud): g.yog 'khor bye ba phyag du ma bskor te 'khor de nyid 'dus nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhangs la mgo bos phyaga'i'atsha la te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/de nas byang chub
4b3(rgyud): sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes bla gros phrag pa gcig tu bzer te pus mo g.yas pa'o lha nga sa la btsugs nas/bcom ldan 'das grwa lwa ba de log su thal mo sbyar po btud
4b4(rgyud): de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du bdag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'chad par gnang po mdza du gsol/
4b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lag na rdo rje khyed ni shin tu ma rungs pa/lag na rdo rje khyod ni shin tu brtsam
4b6(rgyud): pa med pa/shin tu gtum pa yin na/ji ltar sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsung sngags 'chang //lag ni rdo rje khyod ni dam tshig shes pa yin la/sems
4b7(rgyud): can gang dag dam tshig mi shes par brjod pa rnams ni rdo rjes mthar byed pa yin no//khyod ji ltar gsang sngags 'chang /gsal ba/bcom ldan 'das de de lta la
5a1(rgyud): mod kyi/bcom ldan 'das gang dag rig pa mchog 'di'i don 'don pa dang /'chang ba dang /mchod pa bgyid pa de dgra ni bdag gi dam tshig 'tshal ba lags/bdag gi
5a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa lags pas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol
5a3(rgyud): to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yi ge bzhi pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa las mang po rab tu sgrub pa/stobs dang pha rol gnon pa
5a4(rgyud): dpag tu ma mchis pa bstan pa thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po bshad par bgyi'o//kye kye lha yul dang /sa dang /chu la gnas pa'i 'byung
5a5(rgyud): ba'i tshogs rnams khyed yid rtse gcig tu gyis la nyon cig/rdo rjes mgo bkas par gyur ta re/de nas lag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa'i tshogs la bltas nas gsang sngags smras pa/
5a6(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/na mash+tsa NA badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ma hA shAkya saM bud+d+hA ya/birli/kiR+Shi/miR+Shi/hiR+Shi/bid+yA ta ta ma yartsi ni mi li swA hA/de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor/
5a7(rgyud): de 'dar yid yod nas thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la bskyab tu gsol/bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag la
5b1(rgyud): bsgrub tu gsol/de nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/ma 'jigs shig/rig pa'i rgyal po dran par
5b2(rgyud): gyis shig ces dbugs byungango //de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub
5b3(rgyud): sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'di lta bu'i gsang sngags kyi tshig dag 'chad pa ni ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni rig pa'i rgyal po gang na gnas der mchod par 'tshalo//
5b4(rgyud): su klog pa dang /mchod par bgyid pa dang /sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang de'i brtson pa bskyed par bgyi'o//bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/de de bzhin no//de nas
5b5(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po'i las ni 'di lags te/srad bu 'am/thal ba 'am/tshul lan cig brjod pas srung bar 'gyur ro//rig sngags bcad na mtshon rnon po la lan gnyis brjod
5b6(rgyud): de tsa ku sha bcad do//yang na sa dra'o//de ltar ni rigs sngags thams cad bcad par 'gyur ro//lan gsum brjod na rigs sdigs tshang bar 'gyur te/mar gyi dro zhag brgyad
5b7(rgyud): la 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la rigs sngags gang yi ge ma tshang ba 'am/dran pa nyams pa de lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de rig pa'i mchog gi snying po dang lhan
6a1(rgyud): \u0f7f/cog tu lan gsum badz+ro na N+DI lam du ston to//ts+tsha s+thU la sna bcad par gyur naHku shas byab bar bya ste rdzogs par 'gyuro//lag na rdo rje'i 'dun du lan pan
6a2(rgyud): brjod na dge ba dang mi dge ba ston par 'gyur ro//ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du sbyor ba bgyis na las rnamasu 'gyuraro//gdon tshar btsad na thalta bu 'am/chu'am/dur khrod kyi sol bas bsnun
6a3(rgyud): no//yang na gzugs bgyis te lcug mas gzhus na gtong bar 'gyur ro//yang na sa la gzugs bgyis te dur khrod kyi sol bas lag mthil la rdo rje bris te lag pas bkaSh+ThA na
6a4(rgyud): gtong bar 'gyur//skud pa la mdud pa bor ba rnams kyis rig sngags bcing ngo //mkha' 'gro ma rnams bcad par bgyi na yungs kar dag la lan bdun bdun bsngags te bstan na
6a5(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma thams cad ma rungs par 'gyur//dbab par bgyi na rna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o//yang na tsan dan dmar pos dkyil 'khor byugs la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bris te gu gul
6a6(rgyud): gyis bdug pa dang /me tog rnams kyis dbab bo//phyag rgya gzhig ni chu 'am/thal lhag gam/so phag gi dum bu rnams kyis so//dug las gasmon chu 'am/rme bya'i mdongs som/
6a7(rgyud): chudri'am/me long zhes so//mar gying zhig bcu bzhi nas lag rdo rdo rje'i mdun du dag gsum bsrung bar byas le brgyad stong badris brjod pagyi'o//de nas bcom ldan /
6b1(rgyud): ga na rdo rjes dam pa stsol bar 'gyur te/de'i 'og tu dgu gso ba lnga sogs pa dang /sa gzhan rnams cung brda'o//gal te mkha' 'gro ma rnams shin tu bcad par 'tshaldan/dranas
6b2(rgyud): lhag na rdo rje'i mdun pa bris kyi zagasams ldan bar+b+ha b+h+yod sbyin sreg bgyis nu lag na rdo rjes ji skad pa shid pa bzhin du tshe tsam thub par rig sngags thams cad marungs par 'gyuraro//sedang+ge rdzing /
6b3(rgyud): gri rdo rje bgyis te/rig sngags 'chang gi ming nas brjod la si la lan cig btsugs na bshig par 'gyur te/de phyin chad rig sngags 'chang de'i gsang sngags rnams mi 'jug gi/
6b4(rgyud): rig sngags bcad par bgyi 'tshal na/rig sngags 'chang gi gzugs bgyis pa bcad na bcad pa bgyis par 'gyuraro//rig sngags ba shig par bgyid 'tshal bas rig sngags de rigapa
6b5(rgyud): mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig brjod na rig sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur te las mi bgyid//rig pa 'gugs par 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsgreng ba
6b6(rgyud): bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod par bgyis te/rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na rig pa 'gugs te phyis rig pa sgrub bo//rig pa nyams
6b7(rgyud): par bgyis na bzlas brjod byas pa mchog ste/che ge mo'i rig pa la gnod pa mdzod cig ces bgyis na rig pa de las mi bgyid do//rig pa tshar bcad par bgyi no thal ba la gzugs bgyi
7a1(rgyud): ste/rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig brjod la rkang pa g.yon pas kyang phyis na rig pa smad pa dang nyams par 'gyur te las mi bgyid do//gal te rig sngags 'chang//
7a2(rgyud): gzhig par 'tshal na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig sngags 'chang gi ming nas brjod de mar me'i snying po me lce dang bcas pa bdun sbyin sreg bgyis na rig sngags 'chang ba bshig par
7a3(rgyud): 'gyur te/bsod nams kyang 'jig go/srog kyang 'jig go//rig sngags 'chang de'i tshe ji tsam par gsang sngags rnams mi 'grub bo//slar gso bar bgyi na ma la ta'i me tog mar
7a4(rgyud): las skyugs pa'i sbyin sreg bgyi ba lan nyi shu rtsa gcig la mdun du sbyin sreg bgyi na rig pa 'gru'o//las 'di dag ni ma bsgrubs kyang bgyid do//ci ste bgyid 'tshal na ri la 'jigs
7a5(rgyud): te kha zas 'o skyo 'thung zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog rang gi gzugasu mthong bar 'gyur te de la bu ci bya zhes gsung bar 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan
7a6(rgyud): 'das las thams cad mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bgyi'o//de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyuraro//de nas yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang
7a7(rgyud): yang 'gug go/grog mkhar gyi sa las sbrul bgyis te sngags kyis btab na klu thams cad mchi'o//dbang du yang 'gyur//gseg ma la lan bdun bsngags te mtshor bor na mtsho
7b1(rgyud): snyam par 'gyur//'bang chu chen por bor na 'bab chu chen po skam par 'gyu ro//gang du bor ba de rnam par 'gyuraro//bdag gi rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni gu nga'i rgyal po tha~Md da rag brjod tu cha tu
7b2(rgyud): brjod pa'o//gal te rig pa gzhan dag gi las mI 'tshal nA yang sbyor ba 'dris/rig pa thams cad sbyor bar bgyi'o//las thams cad bgyidado//las bgyi na rig pa'i rgyal
7b3(rgyud): lhan cig lan gsum brjod la 'ga' zhig ma mchis na/de'i 'go dum du zin thig le'i sgyu ma bzhin du 'gas par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe gsang ba pa rnams kyi gsang sngags grub pa
7b4(rgyud): de'i tshe/las thams cad du rig pa'i mchog bzlas brjod bgyi'o//mar g+hi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag cig bsrung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la ba smad spu mthun
7b5(rgyud): gyi mar sar blangs te/mar sar des seng ldeng gi mer lan brgyad spyong sbyin sreg bgyis na/rig pa'i mchog reg pa sgrub pa rnams la dam pa stsol bar 'gyuraro//gang gi tshe pha rol 'bras
7b6(rgyud): par bgyid 'tshal na bub ma las ldan brgya stong sbyin bsreg bya'o//sro bgro gis kyang 'phangs na 'bros par 'gyur ro//mar gyi nyin zhag cig bskung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du
7b7(rgyud): arga'i zhugs bus la rtswa dur de'i lo ma lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na ti na ra cig rnyed par 'gyuraro//mor gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i
8a1(rgyud): mdun du me tog ku mud dang /zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mar la skyugs pa khri me'i nang du sbyin sreg bgyis na dpal che bar 'gyur//rgya mtsho'i dbu ba dang /rgya spos dang /
8a2(rgyud): ldong ros rnams cha ma nyams te rma bya'i 'khris pa dang /ril bu sran ma tsam du ba gyis te lag na rdo rjes mdun du rig pa'i mchog lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis la sbrul gyis
8a3(rgyud): zin pa la chu las btang nas 'jog pos zin pa yang 'tsho'o//srin bus zin pa dang /bas baljags dang /'bras phreng bar gyur pa la chab bskol ba las btang ngo //sbrum ma bu ma
8a4(rgyud): phyin pa la ni mar las btang na bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro//byis pa gdon gyis zin na bdug pas bdugs pas gtong bar 'gyur ro//bud med kyis nad la ni dar ba las btango //
8a5(rgyud): phug tu 'jug na lus la bsku'o//sgrub pa na bdag la bdugs na log 'dren thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro//lag na rdo rje'i mdun du srad bu la rig pa'i mchog brgyad stong bzlas
8a6(rgyud): brjod bgyis te/lag pa la btags nas g.yul ngor zhugs na pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro//sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thal ba'am/thal ba gtsang mas kham phor bkang la
8a7(rgyud): rig pa mchog bzlas brjod bgyis na rkun po gang na 'dug pa der mchi'o//gang gis rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis pa de la dbang phyug chen po dang /dbang phyug
8b1(rgyud): tshon po'i tshogs dang /bgog dang log 'dren dang /mkha' 'gro ma dang /srin po dang /sha za dang /gnod sbyin dang /'byung po dang /grul bum dang /srul po dang /mdangs 'phrog pa dang /
8b2(rgyud): gdon rgyan ma dang /ma mo dang /lag na rdo rje'i phyag brnyan dang /gang gis kyang bklags mi snyed kyi lag na rdo rjes de'i mgo 'gom so//bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga 'am/phyogs
8b3(rgyud): gtsang mir mchod pa bgyis te/rtswa ku shi'i mdung rtse grisum pa thogs la yungs kAr zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mar bsregs pa sbyin blugs lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyi zhing
8b4(rgyud): nyin bdun dus gsum du gcer bus skra bshig la bgyis na nor stsol bar bgyid do//mar gyi nga zhag drug nas brnams te mtsho 'gram du mchis la mAr gyi ngo zhag brgyad pa'i bar
8b5(rgyud): du yungs kar dag las sbyin sreg lan brgya stong bgyis na nor dang gros rnams stsol bar 'gyur ro//'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog sgrub pa ni ri mo mkhan gso sbyong
8b6(rgyud): gzung bas ma god pa'i ris la sbyin dang ma dres pa'i tshun gyi rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bri bar bgyi'o//g.yas phyogasu lag na rdo rje stan nang tshangs can b+h+rUM steng
8b7(rgyud): na mchis par bri'o//lag na rdo rje'i 'og tu rig pa'i mchog bri'o//bcom ldan 'das ni gser gyi kha dog lta bu'o//lag na rdo rje ni sngo bsangs te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//
9a1(rgyud): de'i rgyal po yang b+h+yo byasangs te/rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan la stan byor bu'i stang na mchis par bri'o//myur b+h+yo ngo zhad skyo nal nyin zhag gcig babyung ba bsdus te//
9a2(rgyud): ci nus su mchod par bgyis la rgyal po'i blo gros kyis rig pa'i rgyal po dgug par dgyi'o//rdo rje'i khas nye reg bgyi'o//rdo rje'i lte bas spos dbul bar 'gyi'o//mi khaM las me tog
9a3(rgyud): dbul bar bsti'o//gdong dkar gyis srung bar bgyi'o//rdo rje ser mos khrus bgyi'o//nag mos khu ba bcing bar bgyi'o//gyen du lta ba'i gdong gis phyogs bcing bar bgyi'o//
9a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i seng ge'i khris 'dug par bgyi'o//rdo rje ldan mas bgegs gzhom par bgyi'o//shugs ldan mas slar gshegasu gsol lo//byis rig pa mchog gi ri mo'i gzugs
9a5(rgyud): kyi mdun du gu gul gyi ril bu brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dngos grub kyi mtshan mar bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur ro//zhag bdun na ti nar brgya rnyed par 'gyuraro//
9a6(rgyud): yang ni longs spyod stsol bar 'gyuraro//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du du ru ke'i 'bras bu las lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bgyis na gang 'dod pa de spyo bar 'gyur ro//
9a7(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mar dang gu gul gyi ril bu brgyad brgya'i sbyin sreg bgyis na sos par 'gyur ro//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyon zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te shing a shwat+tha'i
9b1(rgyud): lo 'dab kyi steng du ldong ros bzhag la ji srid kyis rnam gsum grub pa de srid du khrus brjod bgyi'o//dro bar gyur na rkang pas mchi'o//du ba 'phrul na mi snang ba dang /lo bdun stong du 'cha'o//ngar
9b2(rgyud): na bskal ba sbyini ste par 'gyur//rlung bzhin du lagan rdo rje'i gnas mtsho gang kha skyes rje 'dod pabya'o//Arban+du d+hAnas shi k+ShesaSh+NIHak+Sh+ma hU~Ms kyi ji ni ts+tshini hU~M ts+tsham+b+ha ya thA
9b3(rgyud): an kaSh+Te ad+d+hi pradz+wA le/nu d+hi ra a gau ta/ti nA udz+dza sa te Te hU~M yad rA rdzabA sho ba tI badz+ra kA rmo bas pa te/tsa~M s+t+wa~M gra gsong pa 'dod na laglen rdo rje'i mdun du seng ldeng gi thugs sa
9b4(rgyud): lha yungs ka ri dang ske rje'i 'bru las lan brgyad stod sbyin sreg bgyis na dbu 'tsho'o//gnod par sems par brdzis naM lag na rdo rje'i mdun du yi dwags kyi shing gi zhug su bus lA ti la nag
9b5(rgyud): bo la lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na gnod par soms par bgyis par 'gyuraro//mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhib gcig bsgreng ba gyes te legan rdo rje'i dang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong
9b6(rgyud): las gzung la de'i ming nas phyung ste bzlas brjod bgyis na 'bral du dkar mI 'gyuraro//mar m+b+hi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsgreng ba bgyis te rig pa mchog gi sngags kyis btab par
9b7(rgyud): 'chang gis rdo rje bkrus la rig sngags kyang lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bgyis ni gang gis ming nas rgyang ste 'a zlas brjod pa 'ipa de gdon gyis zin par mi 'gyur ro//rdo rje 'o mas bkrus la
10a1(rgyud): rig sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas pa bgyis na sos par 'gyur ro//yul 'khor gzhig par 'dod pas song ldeng gi rdo rje bgyis la yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gnyis la lag na
10a2(rgyud): rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgya stong bzlas brjod dgyis te/shul gyi bzhi mdor btsugs na yul 'khor 'jig par 'gyuraro//phyung nas bsngags na sngags 'kho zhing rtag par 'gyur ro//mar ngo
10a3(rgyud): zhag dgu la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig pa mchog gis ske tshe'i 'bru la lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na phung bar 'gyuraro//leg na rdo rje'i mdun du mar dang sres pa'i ske tshe'i 'bru
10a4(rgyud): las lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na brtas par 'gyur ro//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la ba smad spu mthun gyi 'o ma blangs te rig pa mchog gi bzlas brjod byas shing bsrungs la/de las
10a5(rgyud): mar sar blangs te thod pa'i nang du bzhag la thod pa de blangs te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhig gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la mngon mtshan gcig yod par song ste/'byung po thams
10a6(rgyud): cad pa'i gtor mar gyis la/thod pa de thogs te lus kyi lho phyogs su 'dug la ji tsam na 'bar ba de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas de 'thungs na ci 'dod pa'i gzugasu 'gyuraro//
10a7(rgyud): na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro//mi snang bar 'gyur//gzugs sna tshogs ston par 'gyuraro//lo lnga brgya 'tsho bar 'gyuraro//bdag rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog 'di ni rig pa thams
10b1(rgyud): phyug canA//'og rlung na gos kyi mapa' mar mdud padong do//gzhan srung na skyogatsug tu sgro mdu du nga ro//mu sngon khum pa ts+l-i la bcoM yan grags bzhir chu gtor do//sgrub lan
10b2(rgyud): yid kyis dkyil 'khor bgyis na tsangs par 'gyur//marnams brgyad na yung sa kar rgyas so//shing su na dzur zung dag gis so//sman srung na yid kyis reg da'i mchog sbyar bar
10b3(rgyud): bgyi'o//gzhan yang sgrub na mgod pa'i rus la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i rnon ci rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal por mtshig bri bar bgyi ste/mngog sto bsangs sham thabs ser mo//'gro pa ga yom
10b4(rgyud): nazhugs pa/g.yas pas dam pa sbyin pa bri bar bya'o//'og tu sgrub pa po lag na pog por thogs pa bri'o//zhag bdun zas su'o skyo byung ngo //tha mar zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te mA
10b5(rgyud): gyi ro zhag bcu bzhi la ci nus kyis mchod pa bgyis la sku tshogs las zhugs pa bgyis te/lag pa g.yas par thogs te ji srid du rang gi gzugs kyis mchi ba de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
10b6(rgyud): rdo rje bzhad mas slar gzhug ste/de tsi bya zhes smra smai 'gyur//des tshangs pa'am/khyab 'jug gam/dbang phyug chen po'im/che ge moM zhes bya ba zhags pas ba la khrid de ston
10b7(rgyud): cig ces brjod do//yang na rgyal po'am/gnod sbyin nam/srin po'am/sha za'am/gang dgug par 'dod na de dgug pa ste de dag thams cad phyag brnyan du 'gyur ro//gang
11a1(rgyud): /bde 'tshal tomachi'o//gang na mu god da'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung ngas sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyi rnams kyis rag ba'i rgyal po'i mchog bri bar bya ste/
11a2(rgyud): mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/stod g.yogs dar dkar/smad g.yogs ras/log pa bzhi pa/lag pa g.yon pa gcig na rdo rje/gcig na lcags kyu/g.yas
11a3(rgyud): pa gcig dam pa sbyin pa/gcig be con thogs par bri bar bgyi'o//'og tu sgrub pa po lag na pog phor thogs par bgyi'o//g.yas phyogasu rdo rje khu tshur mdog gsar lta bu rgyan
11a4(rgyud): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/lag pa gnyi ga na rdo rje thogs pa bri'o//g.yon logasu rdo rje blo gros bri bar bgyi ste/de yang mdog gser lta bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par
11a5(rgyud): bgyi'o//de nas rdo rje sgrub pa ni zla ba gcig slongs mo'i zas zos la tha mar lus sbyang bar bgyi ste/cho 'phrul gyi zla ba nya la zhag gsum bsrung ba bgyis la lcags sna gsum
11a6(rgyud): la bgyis pa'i rdo rje ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du shing a shAt+tha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag la sgrub ste/ji srid kyis 'bar ba de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//'bar nas blang bar
11a7(rgyud): dgyi ste/blangs ma thag tu lag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyuraro//nyi ma shar ba'i kha dog 'dra bar 'gyur/rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro//de nas lcags kyu bsgrubs na
11b1(rgyud): spyad par 'gyi ste/ku shwa rtsa ba med pa las lcags kyu bgyis la mar gyi dro zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum bsrung ba bgyis te ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la me tog
11b2(rgyud): gi steng du bzhag te/de'i steng du lag pa bzhag la ji srid kyis 'bar ba de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//'bar nas blang bar bgyi ste/blangs ma thag tu su ser ga mthong zhing tshangs pa'i gnas
11b3(rgyud): su mchi bar 'gyur ro//lag na lcags kyu thogs na sum cu rtsa gsum pas kyang zil gyis mnan par mi nus so//be con sgrung pa bshad par bgyi ste/l+ya Da sna gsum las be con
11b4(rgyud): sor bcu drug pa/dbyibs tho ba 'dra ba zur drug par bgyi'o//sngar spyad pa bgyis la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum bskyed pa bgyis te ri no'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgya
11b5(rgyud): cher bgyis la ras dkar po'i steng du bzhag ste ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas blangs ma thag tu lag ni rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur te/lag na rdo rje dang /stobs
11b6(rgyud): mnyam ste/lag na rdo rje'i gnas su mchi bar 'gyur ro//dngos grub rnam pa gsum la bskal par gnas par 'gyur//sgrub pa thams cad du do nya mo rnam kyis las thams cad bgyis
11b7(rgyud): to rig pa sna tshogs sbyar bar bgyi'o//de ltar gang rig pa'i rgyal po 'don pa dang /mchog pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa lags so//mnyes par bgyis pa la ga
12a1(rgyud): zod bzungs te khrag gis bkang ste mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyon zhag gcig bsrung ba 'gyis te//khang stong ngam/kun dga'i ra bar ji srid kyis bud med 'byung ba de srid du
12a2(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de la che ge mo zhes bya ba la gnod pa gyis shig par brjod na gnas par bgyid do//gnod pa bgyid du 'jug go//rings par bgyid do//rig pa'i rgyal po 'di
12a3(rgyud): 'gug pa 'dis bkug nas phyis rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis dgug par bgyi'o//na mo rat+na t+tA ya s+ya/na ma sh+tsar+N+Na badz+ra prA Ni s+ya/ma hU~M yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/tu ru tu ru/tsu nu tsu r+yA/ki ri ki ri/
12a4(rgyud): raMtra pra tsaN+DA ya Ta ya/A gats+tsha a gAts+tsha/ma ma ar+d+ha mi/pa ri pU ra ya/askr-i ti bid+yA d+ha rod ta ma oM he/s+t+waM A NA ya mi/ma me sarba en+da ma nor tha ba ri bA ra ko b+ha ba ma ma
12a5(rgyud): aR+tha sid d+hiSh+Tha da ma tsi raM ku ru s+t+wa~MhA/sti tshes brgyad laM sgrub par 'tshal na tshes bdun gyi phyi ma ring gu gul gyis bdugs la gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod do//sgrub pa ni
12a6(rgyud): rgyal ba'i blo gas kyis dgug gi/sgru pa thams cad dang /las thams cad du yang dgug pa 'dis dgugo/na ma~M rat+na tra ya s+ya/na ma sh+tsar+m+ma badz+ra pA Ni s+yA/ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa tiH/
12a7(rgyud): ngo lam ti/don te dzin d+ha r-i//A ba~M sha ya/da shi me te shAH/de banA ga lik+Sha ke d+heHkA nu sa seM ru she la rga laH/gr-i zlum pa ta/shrI ts+tsha dz+dzarmArmAs+t+wa~M/Ang+ku sa ti
12b1(rgyud): rgyal ba'i blo gros 'dis dgug par bgyi'o//de nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing bar bgyi'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma shwAN+Da badz+ra pA Na yo/ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta yau/ku ru ku ru/tsa ta tsa ta/
12b2(rgyud): ma la ma la/ser sngar/d+hISh+Tha/ma hA ba laM/sem sa man+ta m+WAr sit+ta/nam sh+tsad+d+ha badz+nyA na Ni/Ad+b+ha pa mai ti swAt+ma/rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dis gre gu'i b+hai rol bu gsu mo yungs kar gyi
12b3(rgyud): mar du skyugs la sbyin sreg bgyis na bcings par 'gyuraro//rig pa gang sgrub pa dang /pho nya mo yang rung ste/de 'di nyid kyis bcing bar bgyi'o//rdo rje ser mos bcing ba las dgrol bar
12b4(rgyud): bgyi'o//na mo rat+no tra yA ya/nA ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA NA ye/ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa tA ye/hu lu hu lu/gan+d+ha gan+d+he/ma hA ba la/swa b+hA ba nam pun na ma ga na ma ya ku ru ku ru/gats+tsha gats+tsha swAhA/
12b5(rgyud): chub khyor ba gsum gtAr me tog kyang dbul lo//de nas shugs ldan gyis slar gshegasu gsol lo//ni mo badz+ra pA NaM ye/pa Ta pa TA/gan+d+he gats+tsha/b+ha ga ba ti/ma hA yak+Sha d+hi te
12b6(rgyud): tsi ri li tsi ni li/hi ri li tsi ni li/hi ri le a bI ga naM ku ru swAhA/shugs ldan gyis slar gshegasu gsol ba'i sngags te/a ka ru'i bdug pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis
12b7(rgyud): pas so//na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/na ma ste b+ha ga ba ti/badz+ra muM khaM gau ri bag+h+nAM/ga re te ga ra te/ki ni ti ki ni ti swA hA/nye reg bya ba'i gsang sngags so//na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/dz+wa la badz+dza
13a1(rgyud): ngi hu ru hu ru/la hu la hu/prA ti br-ih+ma s+thA i mA gra dz+hak+ShI lo kI lA ya swA hA/sa? kyi gsang sngags//na ma badz+nyA dA Na s+ya/da had hA/pa tsa pa tsa/bo d+ha dzad+d+ha/ni wa
13a2(rgyud): ma hA gau ri tsi chu le/tsu tsu le/tsi tsi rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/srad pus srung bar bgyi'o//na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+yA/ke ta ka ta/ma ta ma ta/ra ra ra ra/badz+ra bi ga lA/ma ta da ra dra ra ni/ki ri Ni ki ra
13a3(rgyud): Ni/ki ri Ni ki ri swA hA/khrus bgyi ba'i gseng sdigaso//na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/na ma ste/b+ha ga ba ti/da sha ba ti sha ba ti/sa ha sra pa ti A gats+tsha/shI g+h+raM ki ri ki ri/shu kra bi d+ha baM d+ha
13a4(rgyud): swA hA/srad bu la lin bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te khu ba bcing ngo //na mau badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ut+ta ma rak+Sha/a d+ho rak+Sha/tsi tu ra di shaM rak+Sha/ma tha ma thi/trA sa ya trA sa ya/stam b+ha yA
13a5(rgyud): stam b+ha ya/ud d+h+r-i tA badz+ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/yungs ka ra la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te phyogs bcing ngo //na me badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/tad+ya thA/badz+ra badz+re Ni/badz+ra si
13a6(rgyud): ha ni/badz+ra pA Ni/pri ye badz+ra ba ra de bi ka ta/daMSh+Ta ka rA la ba ne/laM pro da ra bi ki ta/gau ra rU pa da ra sha na mardza ra bak+She madz+dza/mAM sa pri ye/e hi e hi b+ha ba ti byo gu ru pri dz+wa li ta ta ke
13b1(rgyud): shi i da ma nu sha sha rI ra/ma nu pra bi she/ka tA ka tA/pu ra pu ra/d+hu na d+hu na/pA tA pa ta/dAl+lA bal+lu/ha sa ha sa/A bi shre A bi she/s+pha ta s+phatA/kai tsi rA ya si/b+ha ga bA ti/ba hu rU be/ad d+hi/
13b2(rgyud): ka sri ga la he ru ka ra bid traM/oM Ta T+TA Ta Ta ha saM/oM ma se tu s+t+waM/br-i hi s+ya hr-i da ya~M/b+hi da hr-i daM/tsi lA tsa la/gu mu gu mu/ku ru ku ru/A bi sha A bi sha/badz+ra pA Ni/Adz+nyA pa ya~M ti swA hA/
13b3(rgyud): las thams cad durtswa ku she sbams pa la sngags kyis btab ste bdug par bgyi'o//na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/la la ha si ha sa/badz+re NaM ku ru ku ru/kam+ba kam+ba/tsa la tsa la/dza lpa dzalpa swA hA/
13b4(rgyud): gshegs nas gsung du gzhug go/na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/dU d+hu ma sa la ma sa la/d+hu ru me a ma le/badz+ra pA Ni yak+Sha d+hi pa ti ma tsa mai ka sh+tsed big+h+nAM ku ru swA hA/yungs kar ram/thal bas
13b5(rgyud): bgegs rab tu zhi bar bya'o//ci ste rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams kyi rig pa bcad par 'tshal na mar gyi ngo ches bco lnga la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du be ku la'i me tog dag las lan
13b6(rgyud): brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rig sngags bcad par 'gyuraro//ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis rig pa'i mchog bri bar
13b7(rgyud): bgyi ste/mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//sbyin sreg bgyi ba bza' zhing bri bar bgyi'o//mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te ri mo'i sku gzus/
14a1(rgyud): seMmadun du dus su mchod pa ba'is byung chung shing gi skye thugs dus to t+ta mU la'i me tog mar las spyugs pa bAd+mad+ma snod sbyin srog bgyis nu ri mo'i
14a2(rgyud): gzugs 'gul lo//me tog gi phreng ba yang 'gu lo//de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo me tog ces bgyi ba grub par 'gyur te/lha mo me tog gi las rnamasu 'gyur ro//rig sngags
14a3(rgyud): 'chang gi rig pa'i sgrub pa la bgegasu mi 'gyur//log 'dren gyis mi tshug so//dngos grub 'dis mtshan mo'i lha mo bzhi dngos grub tu 'gyur te/srod ni lha mo me tog gi'o//
14a4(rgyud): mjing ni lha mo phreng ba'i'o//nam gung ni lha mo ku mu da'i'o//tho rangs ni lha mo mdzes ma'i'o//rig sngags 'tshang ni rig pa sgrub na smod la log 'dren gnas su 'ong ste/de nas
14a5(rgyud): mtshan mo'i lha mo me tog gis log 'dren mthong nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i yid la bgyid do//lag na rdo rje yid la bgyis pas log 'dren rnams skrag cing nyams
14a6(rgyud): te nyam thag nas 'bros par 'gyur ro//lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun du 'dug cing dngos grub kyang myur du stsol bar bgyid do//'jing la gal te bgegs byung na
14a7(rgyud): mtshan ma'i lha mo phreng ba des lha chen po la bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje khyod la 'bod do zhes sgrog so//des de thos nas snying 'dar zhing myur ba myur bar mdun du 'dug ste/des na
14b1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chad de la dgogasu mi 'gyuraro//dngos grub kyang myur du 'grub bo//nam gung la kal te bgegs byung na mtshan mo'i lha mo ku mu da de yang /rgyal po chen pa bzhi la n+ya kya
14b2(rgyud): btsun pa kun dag lag na rdo rje khyod la 'bod do zhes sgrogaso//de dag gis tshig de thos nas snying 'dar zhing myur ba myur bar mdun du 'dug ste/de nas de la bgegasu mi 'gyur ro//
14b3(rgyud): rangs la gal te daglegs byung na mtshan mo'i lha myo mdzes ma yang log 'dren rnams la kyai kyai log 'dren sdang ba rnams drag po lag ni rdo rjes bka' stsal to zhes bsgo bar bgyi'o//de
14b4(rgyud): ngag gis de'i tshig thos nas phyogs bcur 'bros so//des na de la bgegasu mi 'gyur te bde bar las rnams 'grub par byed do//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam/bcu bzhi la bud med bu
14b5(rgyud): byung ba'i khye'u lte ba sor gnyis tsam bcad la gser gyi gyi ma bag gis bkris te mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad stong
14b6(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis na mi snang bar 'gyuraro//tshe yang nyis 'gyur du 'gyuraro//zhag bdun du phye thug btung ngo //phyis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum bsgreng ba bgyis te/
14b7(rgyud): zhi ba'i mtshan yod par song la mtshan gyi steng gi lho phyogs log su lag pa g.yas pa gzhag ste skra las bgyis pa'i skud pas bcing ngo //bcings nas ji srid kyis bcad do zhes
15a1(rgyud): 'byung ba de srid du bzlas brjod pakye/sgra lan gsum du byung na dngos grub du 'gyuraro//khu tshur bcangs te sgrub par bgyi'o//khu tshur bcangs na mi snang bar 'gyuraro//
15a2(rgyud): sgra lcang lo 'khyil bar 'gyu ro//lo bcu drug lon pa tsam du 'gyur ro//lo bdun brgya 'tsho bar 'gyu ro//dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams kyang phyag brnyan du 'gyuraro//tsis+t+wa~M
15a3(rgyud): dge bsad par 'tshal na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/spra tshil las gzugs bgyis la seng ldeng gi phur bu lngas gnad du btsugs te/dur khrod du
15a4(rgyud): mchis la dong brkos te dong der bcug la steng du zhugs pus la dug dang /khrag dang yungs kar bsres pa lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na ngu zhing tshig ste 'phral du 'gum mo//
15a5(rgyud): mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la ba ser me'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba blangs te/sa phyogs gtsang mar gzugs bgyis la ci nus kyis mchod de/zhag gcig bskung ba bgyis la shing bil
15a6(rgyud): lo ma bsregs shing zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mar la sprugs te brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dpral ba las 'od zer 'byung ngo //de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te gser dpag tu
15a7(rgyud): med pa skyel bar 'gyuraro//yang na nyin gcig bzhi ni du di na ra stsol bar 'gyur ro//gasreg ma la lan brgyad stong bzlas te dur khrod du bor na yi dwags thams cad glu len
15b1(rgyud): tsong gar byed par 'gyur//mar gyi dag badra bzhi nas lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa'i drung du zhag gsum babyung ba bgyis la shing kar bi ra'i me tog las ldan brgya stod sbyin sgrub bgyi'o//de nas /
15b2(rgyud): rabyera'i mu tog dpalas me tog cig blangs te klu'aM gnas bu zong la bzla gyi na klu dang klu mo rnams dbang du 'gyur te ci 'tshal ba rnams rnyed do//tshig bruM mig dang /gamar dang /
15b3(rgyud): mchod phyir thogs cadA ka ra bi ri ri me tog dang che no//gdon gnod sbyin mo 'dug pa der rnaM sa brjod pa kyi seM na gnod sbyin mo mchi ste chung mir 'gyuraro//yang na nor stsal byar bgyur
15b4(rgyud): ro//gal te mi mchin zhug gcig bskyang ba 'i stso te shing ma de de'i tshur ma dang /drug dang /khrag 'asres pa lan brgya stong sang ldeng gi zhugs la sbyin sreg pagyis ni dag cang
15b5(rgyud): mi sdug par 'gyur la mdze'o//gal te bla mo mi mtshan de la yang de nyid kyis sbyin sreg 'phyir//yer b+hi ngo ches bco lnga la 'ge gsum bsrung ba 'gyis te rgya mtshor 'bab 'i
15b6(rgyud): chu'i lugs su m+b+ha gang gi tog rgyud nga rje bye ra N+DIs na dus ma yin du ga/zhag 'dudu b+h+yo 'brangs la mar myo 'phrus de la nas gcig byung shu
15b7(rgyud): log na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa brgyas pa se las bgyis pa'i rdo rje nan ste/rdo'i dang sa shA \u0f7f lam bdun banas la de'i steng du ldong ras bzhan ste ji srid kyis
16a1(rgyud): dngos grub gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas brjod dkyi'o//'bar bar gyur na lo bdun stong du 'cha'o//lus mdzes par bgyis la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin//
16a2(rgyud): gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te lam gyi sum mdor mchod pa rgya cher dgyes la der 'dug ste ldong ros sran ma tsam zhig khar bcug la ji srid du kha'i nang du gas par gyur pa de srid du bzlas
16a3(rgyud): brjod dbyi'o//de nas dngos grub du 'gyur te thig le dgyis na mi snang bar 'gyu ro//lo lnga brgya thub par 'gyuraro//ci 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyuraro//nyi ma'i gung tshogs
16a4(rgyud): la bgyi'o//tshes grangs dang skar ma 'dam mi 'tshal/bsnyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal bar skyes pa'i ro ma rmas ma nyams pa blangs te/rdo rje sbyin mo'i sngags bzlas brjod dgyis
16a5(rgyud): la bak+ku'o//rdo rje lte bas spros stsol bar bgyi'o//rdo rje me khaM las me tog stsal bar bgyi'o//de nas de'i snying khar 'dug ste mi de tsam gyen du ma 'phags kyi bar du rig
16a6(rgyud): mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig bzlas brjod bgyi'o//sbyin du 'phags ma thag tu slar 'og tu lhung //lhung nas zung med brgya nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/de dag g.yog 'khor
16a7(rgyud): rnams la stsal bar bgyi'o//de dag kyang stobs mnyam par 'gyuraro//ci ste mo stsal na bdag bud med bcus bskor te ma la zhan te gar dga' ba der mchi'o//yang yid kyis
16b1(rgyud): bsams pa de bzhon pa las 'byung //lo brgyad khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//rig sngags 'chang du yang 'gyuraro//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam bcu bzhi la skyes pa shi ba'i ro bzhag pa'i
16b2(rgyud): phyogs kyi g.yas rol gyi thur shing khyer song la/phyi ma mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la de medung rtse gsum par bgyis la slongs mo ba'i zas bza' zhing rig sngags 'chang bzlas brjod bgyi'o//byi ma
16b3(rgyud): mor gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas zhag gsum bsnyung ba dgyis te dur khrod du song la mdung rtse gsum pa la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/mdung rtse gsum pa lag pa g.yas par thogs la/rig
16b4(rgyud): pa'i mchog lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na mdung rtse gsum pa las 'od zer 'byung ste de nas dngos grub du 'gyuraro//mtshan mo btsugs na rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i
16b5(rgyud): bud med dag 'byung //skyes pa ci la ma rab par chas pa dag kyang nye bar gnaso//gang bsams pa thams cad rnyed do//phyung na tha~Md med par 'gyuraro//'byung po rnams phyag bdun
16b6(rgyud): du 'gyur ro//cho ga gang la blangs pa'i cho ga de nyid la sgrub par bgyi'o//mar gyi ngo 'gu bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ci nus kyis mchod par gyis
16b7(rgyud): la de'i mdun du 'bras chan gyi lom bkang ste bzhag la 'a bras chan mi snang bar ma gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas dngos grub du 'gyur te phyis 'dras chan la 'pho bar
17a1(rgyud): bgyid do//rdzas kyang 'pho bar 'gyuraro//'bru'i rnam pa gzhan dag kyang 'pho bar 'gyur ro//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te seng ldeng la
17a2(rgyud): bgyis pa'i rdo rje la shing kun gyis bdugs la/rig pa'i mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig bzlas brjod bgyis na gang gi ming nas phyung ste bzlas brjod bgyis pa de brjed byed kyis zin par
17a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro//lce phog gis bdugs la lan brgya stong bzlas brjod pa kyis na gtong bar 'gyuraro//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad lu nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la a ran da'i shing gi
17a4(rgyud): zhugs bus la ba glang gi lpags pa la bsregs blugs lan brgyad stong ming nas brjod de sbyin sreg bgyis na ba glang rnams mchi'o//skyes pa'i ro ma smad ma nyams pa blangs te chu
17a5(rgyud): 'gram gyi phyogs gcig gam/skam sa gtsang mar pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang nyi ma'i gung tshigs li mi ro'i mgo shar phyogs su
17a6(rgyud): bstan te phyogs bzhir bsnyen bkur bgyid pa bzhi bzhag par bgyi'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang de'i snying khar ldong ros bcug ste dngos grub rnam gsum ma thob kyi bar
17a7(rgyud): du bzlas brjod bya'o//'bar bar gyur na lo stong thub bo//rkang pa la bskus na lo lnga brgya thub ste 'di ni dngos grub bo//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyan zhag gcig bsnyung ba
17b1(rgyud): bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du pa la sha'i shing gis zhugs bus la shing bil ba'i yam sreg shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /mar las skyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming nas brjod
17b2(rgyud): na phyugs chung rnyed do//gal te ma rnyed na phyugs phyung de mchi'o//dgra gang la nad kyis btab par bgyid 'tshal na ru rta btags la bdag gi lus l-i dril ba'i dri ma bsags te/
17b3(rgyud): mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du du ru ka'i shing gi zhugs bus la/dri ma des lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming nas brjod na mdze nad kyis 'debaso//lag na rdorje'i
17b4(rgyud): mdun du lce bog gi bdug pas bdugs la raM ga sngags kyang lan brgyad stong bzla brjod bgyis na gso ba bgyis par 'gyur ro//yar gyi do zhag gcig la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du
17b5(rgyud): zhugs la zas su chu skyo 'thung zhing zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na yul gru 'thob bo//bram ze dbang du brgya na yar gyi ngo tshas drug nas brgyad kyi bar du dus gsum du
17b6(rgyud): lAg na rdo rje'i mdun du sna ma'i me tog las ldan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la tha mar zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis na skyes pa 'am/bud med kyang rung ste/dbang du 'gyur//mar
17b7(rgyud): kyi re zhig brgyad la zhig gcig bsgrung ba bgyis te/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du zil ba'i shing gis thugs bris la srungs kor gyi 'bru mar dang 'asres pa'i til las la ni gan
18a1(rgyud): sbyin sreg dgye zhing ming nas brjod na dbang du 'gyuraro//bud med yugs sa mo dbang du bgyi na nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du
18a2(rgyud): arga'i shing gi zhugs bus te/arga'i me tog mar la skyugs pa lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming nas brjod na dbang du 'gyur ro//dus gsum du khrus bgyi zhing lag
18a3(rgyud): na rdo rje'i mdun du shing ma da na'i char ma las lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na zhog gsum gyis dbang du 'gyur ro//mi ngas 'byung bar 'tshal na mar byi shag brgyad la dur khrod du song la
18a4(rgyud): dur khrad kyi zhing gis zhugs bus la dug rlon pas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na mi ngas 'byung ngo //zhi bar bgyi ni mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba
18a5(rgyud): bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du shing tha mal pa'i zhugs bus ut+pa la dang /zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mar la bsnyugs pa brgyad stod sbyin sreg bgyis na zhi bar 'gyur ro//
18a6(rgyud): gzhan bskrad par 'tshal ni bya khwa'i bshog pa yungs kar gyi 'bru mar la bsgrags pa brgyad stong zhag bdun dus gsum du sbyin srog bgyi'o//'di ni bskrad pa'i mchog
18a7(rgyud): go/dbye ba bgyi na zhag bdun dus gsum du ba lang gi lci ba las brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbye ba bgyes par 'gyur ro//las gcig gis cho ga rgyas
18b1(rgyud): par sgrub par 'tshal bas mA mA ki thogs la/pad+ma'i rdzing du song ste mA ma ki la reg par pad+ma 'bum phul nu rig pa'i rgyal po mchog rang gi gzugs ston te dril bu ci bya zhes smra'o//des
18b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub stsal du stsol zhes brjod pa dang /de bzhin bya'o zhes brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro//de cho ga rgyas pa las 'byung ba'i las thams cad dngos
18b3(rgyud): grub tu 'gyuraro//gal te des las grub par ma gyur na de'i 'og tu las 'di bsgrubs na dngos grub kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro//yar gyi ngo nya nas bzung ste phyi ma'i nya'i bar du mi smra ba'i brtub
18b4(rgyud): zhugs kyi zas su'o skyo 'thung zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur te/de nas cho ga rgyas pa dang
18b5(rgyud): dngos grub du 'gyur ro//ras sngon po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/'og bskor bcings la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thal bas mgo bor srung bar
18b6(rgyud): bgyis ni gyad phur non cing gyad kyis tshur phyer mi non no//yid gzhungs par bgyi nu bra ma'i khu ba mar dang cha bsnams la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsnang ba bkris
18b7(rgyud): te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis pa 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro//yar gyi ngo tshas zhag gcig nas brtsams te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mar dang
19a1(rgyud): mA bsres pa las ldan bArgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod dkyis pa 'thungs shing zhag bdun bgyis na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur//yar gyi donya la nyon nag rga dran rlung
19a2(rgyud): ba bgyis twe lakAn rdo rje'i mdun du ang go ta'i me tog brgyad stong sbyin sgeg bgyis na nyi ma gsum pa la thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur//zhag bdun na lag na rdo rje'i khe nas 'od
19a3(rgyud): 'byung ste rig sngags 'chung la bskor ba byas nas skyon du 'gro bar 'gyur//rig sngags 'chang ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyuraro//lo sum stong thub par 'gyuraro//mar
19a4(rgyud): gyi ngo zhig bcu le lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sna ma'i me tog brgyad stong du la na gnas ston par 'gyuro//cho ga rgyas pa sgrib pa pos nyi dang /sha dang /til dang /srad chan gyi brag dang /
19a5(rgyud): lha bshos dang /kha 'udra dang /la phug dang /shing thog rnams bza' bar mi bgyi'o//gral te 'di dag kyang zos la las kyang bsgrubs na lag na rdo rje'i de nyid mthar byed cing ngas kyang
19a6(rgyud): dngos grub tu mi 'gyuraro//seng ge ni mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la grog mkhar rtse mo yod pa'i mdun nas sa blangs te/ba'i rnam lnga dang bskyes la sing ge'i gzugs bgyis te gso
19a7(rgyud): skyong bzung la/zla ba gcig zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing tha mar zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la sgrub bo//sngar pho nya mo rnams kyis las rnams bgyi'o//bsnyen
19b1(rgyud): bkur ba kyi sa pa rnams kyang srung byar bgyi'o//de nas lug na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod bgyis te/seng ge'i sgra 'byin gyi bar du bgyi'o//sed ge'i sgra thos nas lha ma yin gyi bu ma
19b2(rgyud): rnams 'byung //de dag la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o//gal te 'dod pa bskyed na seng ge ni ma mchis so//lha ma yin gyi bu rnams ni mchis te/lha ma yin rnams kyang yongs su spyad
19b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//gal te de dag la 'dod pa ma bskyed na seng sher 'gyur te/seng ge la zhon nas rig sngags 'chang gi bu mo brgyad cu 'thung ngo //rig stegs 'ching ba ni spyod yang
19b4(rgyud): g.yog 'khor du 'gyur ro//gang du 'dod pa der mchi'o//rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro//'khor lo la sogs pa'i spyod yul du mi 'gyur ro//gang
19b5(rgyud): gi tshe rdo rje dang /'khor lo dang /mdung rtse gsum pa dang /be con dang /zhugs pa dang /mdung thung dang /dbyug to rnams mchi ba de'i tshe/seng ge sgra 'byin de seng ge'i sgras mtshon pa
19b6(rgyud): thams cad dpag tshad brgyad khrir mchi'o//rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gang dag seng ge'i sgra thos pa de dag thams cad sa la lhung ngo //mtshon tshwa de dag thams cad kyang dbang du
19b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro//bskal par gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyuraro//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyan zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te ba'i lci ba sa lam srung ba blangs
20a1(rgyud): skams gtsang ma'i phyog su gnod sbyin gyi gzugs bgyis te/de la mye tog dmar po dang /gtor ma dmAr po sbyin no//ngo nya mo rnams kyis las thams
20a2(rgyud): bgyi'o//phyogs gcig tu gnod sbyin thams cad la mau khaM las me tog dkar po rnams stsol to//gzugs de'i mdun du arga'i shing gis zhugs bus la shing bil ba'i yam shing
20a3(rgyud): sreg cing zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mar lo bsgrags pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o//de nas gzugs 'gul zhing dngos grub tu 'gyur te nyin re ti nA ra re re dbul lo//dpon g.yog
20a4(rgyud): bdun gyi zas dbul lo//las 'di bsam par bgyis te gtsang mar bgyis la lan cig bzlas brjod bgyis te ba nag mo ma smad spu mthun gyi 'o ma blangs lnga bram ze'i bu mos bsrubs pa'i
20a5(rgyud): mar blangs te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te/mtshan cig yod pa 'am/lag na rdo rje'i khyim du song la shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma bdun blangs te de dag gi
20a6(rgyud): steng du gnod sbyin gyi gzugs mthe bong gyi cha tsam nig gyi ste/de nas 'gul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas so la ma reg par mid do//de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te
20a7(rgyud): de nyin ro ti nar re re 'bu'o//dpon g.yog bcu gnyis kyi zan dbul lo//'di ni dngom gru'o//rig sngags gang gzhan la byin pa'i rig slan de phyi dro bzlas brjod bgyis la/phyi de nyin
20b1(rgyud): hA wAn+d+ha/rma rta du sun rgyu tu rgyun na su
21a1(rgyud): med byar spyod de ni gnas ma yin ni ge skabs med de/rig pa'i'o rgyal du tshun gyi rog pa mchog gi madz+nyAn 'ang yin no//'di lta spyo sbyor na/rnyod bu rin pon+d+ha
21a2(rgyud): chen po'i rgyal po gtsug tor ldan zhes bya ba mthong ba tsam gyis nad thams cad med par 'gyur zhing gdon thams cad kyang 'bros par 'gyuraro//'byung po'i bdag po de bzhin du rig
21a3(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gang gis bzlas brjod byas pa de mtshon gyis mchi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur te/dug gis ma yin/chu yis ma yin/mes ma yin zhing de bar
21a4(rgyud): mdor 'chi bar mi 'gyuraro//ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur//nges par rdo rje'i rigasu skye bar 'gyur//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la lan
21a5(rgyud): gsum bskor ba byas te/spyan sngar 'dug nas mgo botud de/bcom ldan 'das lnga 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rig pa'i rgyal po lag na rdo rje 'di
21a6(rgyud): skad du rig pa'i rgyal po mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mtshungs pa med pa 'di bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad nas bzung ste bshado zhes gsung /ba
21a7(rgyud): bdag gi mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis mA ma ki de ltar rdzu 'phrul che yang rjesu dran te/rdo rje 'chang chen po 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi gsung rang
21b1(rgyud): rnams la snya ma ka bstan to//'khor 'dus pa der mtshams snang ba bsgos pa'i sems can+d+ra gcig cig ha cang yang mi ring ba zhog na mchis pa de 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas yid
21b2(rgyud): dga' bar gyur te rnam par bas nas rig rdzogs mang rnams kyi rgyal ba rje phreng ba nis gyi bar gyur to//shA ri'i bram rig phyogs pan de la ma//de nas bcom ldan pa
21b3(rgyud): la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/dwe dang shA ri'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de'i slad dum+b+ha mahe
21b4(rgyud): de ltar rdzu 'phrul che'o zhes bdag mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu don de rdo rje 'chang chen po la dris shig/de nas shA rI'i bus rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'di skad ces
21b5(rgyud): smras so//rig pa'i rgyal po mchog khyod ci'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mAr me mdzad nas bzung ste bdag gis rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di bshad ces de skad
21b6(rgyud): /rdo rje 'chang chen thos 'di zang nas smras so//shA ri'i b+ha de ji snyam du sems/ci de bzhin gshegs pa gcig yin nam/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gartson yin/
21b7(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtso ba yin nam/de bzhin gshegs ga rtse ma yin nan/shA ri'i bu bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya
22a1(rgyud): mas cad na shos rab pha rol tu phyin pa las byung la/na gshegs pa thams da rgyas nas rang po ral tu byon dpa byung //ro'i drung
22a2(rgyud): bshAn du bdag gistem+b+ha ga rgyal sbyin po mchog gi snong ba la byas la/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shrIs sgron masbyin de'i 'di bar gyi rgyal ba de'i mthus
22a3(rgyud): oM rgyu na la la rgyun ma shAg/de sru~M kA rba snang mi smra bar /de che com ldan 'das kyis d+hi ba'i dag pa nga sman b+ha/ snum pa/
22a4(rgyud): 'brang po'i bdag po gang gis de bzhin gshegs bya 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung dbu bcun gnyis kyi byem snyed la phyage byas pa blas gang gis rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i mchog lagan
22a5(rgyud): rdo rje la myed kyis phyag byas pa de ni de nyid las bsod nams mang du ba skyed do//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa dri ma med pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnas la gtu
22a6(rgyud): te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'dris ji srid cig nas rig po'i rgyal po chen po dang /rig
22a7(rgyud): rgyagapa ba /na dang de ni na kyi na sa gi nyid ni 'dis/gnas pani nazhes ni nga/
22b1(rgyud): ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rtogs pa dri ma med pa sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa
22b2(rgyud): pa gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu'i bye ma skyed 'das pa na gdul ka zhes bya ba'i bskal pa chen po byung ste/bskal pa chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
22b3(rgyud): ye shes sgron ma chen mo'i 'od zer zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rdo rje ldan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu gyur to//
22b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgron ma chen po'i 'od zer de ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu la mun pa mun nag rnam par sel ba rnam
22b5(rgyud): par snang byed ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'chad do//rdo rje 'chang gi rigs 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam dpag tu med pa nas 'dus pa 'jig rten
22b6(rgyud): gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i rdul phra rab rnyed la ting 'dzin dang /gzung kyi sngags pa dpag tu med pa bstan pa'i phyir 'dzum pa mdzad do//de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i khyu
22b7(rgyud): mchog tu gyur pa 'jig rten mtha' yas pa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa de stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzu
23a1(rgyud): nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i ltung sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan lngas kyi zhabs danyis la btugs nas yang langs te/rtogs yangs pa chen po rab
23a2(rgyud): 'byam gyi 'og gi phyogs nas phyag rgya chen po bsgyur bas rdo rje blangs te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam mtha' yas rgya mtsho rnam pa bcu yang dag par bskul
23a3(rgyud): nas de dag gis rgyal po bsgyings par bsgyur bas rgya mtsho chen po bsdu ba'i tshul gyi nga rgyal chen po des rdo rje gsor nas dus kyi tha ma 'jig pa'i me lta bu'i mig gi 'dzums
23a4(rgyud): pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog gi phyogs kyi phyag rgya bsgyur bas rdo rje de de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du bzhag ste/zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal
23a5(rgyud): nas/de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de zhus pa/de ci'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub songa' chen po'i 'khor 'dus pa la 'dzum pa bstan//
23a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo dang /smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sngon ma byung ba'i 'od zer kha dgra sna tshogs byung /bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du 'khor 'dis bsku
23a7(rgyud): nas bdage bcom ldan 'das la zhu zhing mchis na thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'di la thugs brtse ba'i
23b1(rgyud): slad du bka' stsal du gsol/rdo rje bsgyings pa chen po 'jig rten mtha' yas pa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po lag na rdo rjes de skad zhus pa dang /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
23b2(rgyud): mtshan dpal be'u chen po las mtho na kha chen po dang /bai DUr+ya lta bu 'od zer nor bu rin po che chen po skar mdog lta bu'i 'od dang ldan pa 'od zer chen po'i dkyil 'khor phyogs
23b3(rgyud): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam mtha' yas par cher snang ba'i 'od zer gyi me lce byung nas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor las lag pa g.yon pas rdo
23b4(rgyud): rje blangs pa las gsang ba'i bdag po lag nu rdo rje rig pa'i rgyal po chen po byung ngo //lcags kyu'i mtshan las ni lcags kyu/nyas ni 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma/dkra shis las ni lu gu
23b5(rgyud): rgyud/g.yung drung 'khyil pa mchog tu mdzes shing me 'bar ba lta bu las ni me kha la/bya ma bum las ni ser mo/gdugs las ni rgyal mtshan drag po/rdo rje las ni dga' ba ste/
23b6(rgyud): rgyal mo chen mo pho nya mo dang 'khor du bcas pa bdun po de dag byung ngo //de dag gri mdun du ma rungs pa khro bo'i gzugs stobs po che dang /khro bo ki li kI li dus kyi me'i rin po che lha
23b7(rgyud): bu rdo rje khu tshur las byung ngo //lag ngar las ni khu tshur ro//phrag pa 'bar zhing mdzes pa las ni rdo rje gnam lcags te/de ltar 'khor dang bcas pa'i pho nya mo bcu'o//de bzhin du
24a1(rgyud): drug cu phrag bzhir bsgo'o//rtogs pa dri ma med pa 'di ltar lag na rdo rje gA stsog 'khor dang 'anas shing po nya ma dang /'khor dang bcas pa byung nas dam tshig rnan
24a2(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgron mtshan po'i 'od zer las des de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gsol ba btab pa
24a3(rgyud): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/thog mar de bzhin gshegs pas sku dang /gsung dang /thugs kyis gsang ba
24a4(rgyud): bcu dang /gsang ba mtha' yas dkrigs phrag bye ba dang ldan pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bstan pa'i
24a5(rgyud): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor dam tshig can 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du bshad do//rtogs pa dri ma med pa de tshun chad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi shes
24a6(rgyud): sgron mkhyen pa'i 'od zer de la sogs pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dbu'i gam du 'dun pham par mdzad nas bsnyen pa kun tu bzung bar gyur to//rtogs pa dri ma medapa
24a7(rgyud): del bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sprin mtshan pa 'od zer de'i 'og tu bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa drug pa la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa
24b1(rgyud): /dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don gzigs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab la bdud cang mi smra ba zhes bya ba de byung ngo //rtogs pa dri ma/
24b2(rgyud): med pa lag na rdo rje des yang bdud pham par byas nas don gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad cu dang /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig las bdud pham par byas te
24b3(rgyud): bstan pa srung bar byas so//de tshun chad bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa drug lhag pa zhig 'das nas sangs rgyas gser du snang bas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba bskal pa bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad las
24b4(rgyud): bdud pham par byas te bstan pa kun tu bsrungs par gyur to//de'i 'og tu der stong snyed 'das nas lag na rdo rje 'di de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gsang ba 'dzin pa dang bstan pa srung bar
24b5(rgyud): gyur to//de bzhin du sbyar te tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can dang /rnam par gzigs dang /thams cad skyob dang /gser thub dang /de bzhin du log par dad sel dang /mi
24b6(rgyud): 'khrugs pa dang /'od srung la sogs pa dang /nga'i bstan pa la yang ma dul dang /de bzhin du gsang ba 'dzin cing bskul pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'di nyid du sangs rgyas kyi
24b7(rgyud): mdzad pa byed/bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed pa thams cad la de bzhin du mthar gyis thabs 'dis bstan pa la bya
25a1(rgyud): nga byas nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/rdo rje'i stsol gyis 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su
25a2(rgyud): 'gyuro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bka' stsal to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'byung po'i
25a3(rgyud): bdag po dbang ldan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rig pa mchog gi las stsal bar bgyi'o//ma god pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong brdung ngas
25a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dir stsal to//de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas rol du log na rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//lag na
25a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i g.yas rol du nI pho nya mo bcu gnyis te/rgyal ba'i blo gros mA dang /me kha la ni sngo bsang so//rdo rje'i gdong dang /rdo rje lte ba dang /gdong dkar mo dang /rdo rje ser mo dang /nag
25a6(rgyud): mo dang /gyen du lta ba'i gdong ni gser mdog go/rdo rje seng ge'i khri dang /rdo rje ldan ma dang /shugs ldan ma dang /rdo rje bzhad ma ni dmar mar bri bar bgyi ste/pho nya mo thams
25a7(rgyud): cad kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon rol tu dbang phyug chen po mdog dkar po ral pa can mtshan ma sgreng ba/dka' thub bzlog pa dang
25b1(rgyud): lhan cig bri bar bya'o//'byung po mdog dmar po mi sdug pa bzhi yang bri bar bya'o//phyis rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du khrus bgyi zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du brgyad brgya brgyad brgya bzlas/
25b2(rgyud): brjod bgyi zhingaHsu chu skyo datung bar bgyi'o//tha mar lus sbyang ba bgyi ste/de'i 'og tu zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis la/gnas bzhir bsnyen bkur bgyid pa bani bzhag go//pho nya mo
25b3(rgyud): rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o//ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar rtsa ku sha sbams pa'i steng du 'dug ste/mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la gtor ma yang shin tu rgya cher bgyi'o//lce pog
25b4(rgyud): gi bdug pas bdug/ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar arga'i shing gi zhugs bus la/me tog dkar po zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mar las skyugs pas me stag dag byung gi bar du sbyin sreg
25b5(rgyud): bgyi'o//de'i 'og+d+ha ut+pa la sngon po lta bu'i ral gri byung gi bar du lcags byas sbyin sreg bgyi'o//de blangs ma thag tu sgra lhung lor 'khyil bar 'gyur/lo bcu drug pa lta bur 'gyur/nyi ma
25b6(rgyud): 'char ba'i 'od ltar 'gyur/dpon g.yog drug nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyuraro//lo khri nyis stong thub par 'gyur/de bzhin du grogs rnams kyang dpag tshad stong du gyen du 'phags par 'gyu ro//
25b7(rgyud): de bzhin du 'og ma dbang phyug chen po'i ral gri sgrub par bgyi'o//gzhan yang ral gri sgrub pa ni zla ba gcig spangs mo'i zas za zhing /phyis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la ri mo'i gzugs kyi dadun
26a1(rgyud): dud+hASh+Ta ma rnams kyis las thams cad 'dzi//zhag gsumya byung ba kyis te ma brim rtag cang 'ban med nga blangs la/ral gri lhag pa g.yan na gas tu'
26a2(rgyud): gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de blangs pa tsam gyis na mkha' lnga 'ang go//lo bcu drug lon pa lta bur 'gyuraro//rig sngags 'chang stong gi bdag por 'gyuraro//lo khri nyis stong
26a3(rgyud): thub par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang 'khor lo sgrub pa bshad par bgyi'o//slongs mo'i zas bza' zhing phyis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te/lag na rje
26a4(rgyud): rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la/gtor ma dang lbu bshos kyang shin tu rgya cher sbyar cing pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o//lcags sna gsum la 'khor lo rtsibs
26a5(rgyud): bcu drug pa bgyis la/shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//'bar nas sa g.yo bar 'gyur//rig sngags 'chang thams cad
26a6(rgyud): skrag par 'gyur ro//des blangs pa tsam gyis sgra lcang lor 'khyil bar 'gyuraro//lo bcu drug lon pa lta bur 'gyuraro//mdog nyi ma shar ba bzhin du 'gyur//rig sngags la
26a7(rgyud): gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro//bud med brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dpon g.yog bcu drug 'gro bar 'gyuraro//rig sngags 'chang gzhan brgya yang 'byung ste bsnyen bskur
26b1(rgyud): bgyid par 'gyur//gang gi gnas che ga mo zhes bgyi bar nachi bar bsams pa de'i tshe 'khor lo drapag tshang tsam du me lho 'bar ba skyod 'byin cing 'gro ste/sngo ba ci yod pa phung bar 'gyur ro//
26b2(rgyud): lo brgyad khri thub bo//glang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe lha'i nang du skye'o//de nas rig pa'i rgyal po las kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bgyi ste/brtag pa bgyis la gnas ma nyams par shes rab
26b3(rgyud): can gyis dkyil 'khor bri/khru ni bcu gnyis sgo bzhi po//de bzhin du ni khru brgyad la//de la thog mar bri ba ni//rim pa gnyis pa dmar po ste//rim pa gsum pa nag po'o//dkyil
26b4(rgyud): gakhor de yi byang phyogs//sangs rgyas bcom ldan bri bar bgyi//de bzhin gshegs dang nye bAr ni//bcom ldan phyug na rdo rje ste//rdo rje thogs shing rig pas bskor//sgra rnams can
26b5(rgyud): tu drung bar bgyi//sgo bzhir sgo ba rnams bri'o//sher phyogasu ni drag po dang //gzhon nu dang ni ma mo bri//lho phyogasu ni khyab 'jug dang //nyi zla dang ni tshangs pa bri//nub phyogs su ni
26b6(rgyud): gshin rje dang //ka t+ya'i bu mo gtum mo bri//byang phyogasu ni lha mo dpal//de bzhin lha mo dbyangs can bri//lha rnams 'di dag thams cad ni//ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bri/
26b7(rgyud): bya ma bum mgul chings can gyis bskor zhing sgo skor yang ban//dkyis su btun shing sgra'i srang bu dang bachis pa gcig bzhag/byam bum gyi lho phyog su rdo rje khri'o//lha rnams /
27a1(rgyud): man dang rmya na /k+Sha smra//gnan da zung //ma ma namam//rgyun 'drug gi ni 'khor ya// Sh+Ta
27a2(rgyud): nI gar+b+ha/ma na ma pa hU~M gas so//man macan no//gnan ma ma lahA'aM//thugs ni sa nanas//ba
27a3(rgyud): yam sreg shing //lha bshos dri dang bdug pa dang //gtor ma btsal nas lha spyan dang //sbyin sdug 'di ni snang rtsi dang //med dang 'byas yos lan nA dang //de bzhin
27a4(rgyud): kA rnams kyis bgyi/lungs kar gyis ni rlung ba bgyi//gtsang ma'i gros ni bag bor bgyi//mchod pa dag ni rjer bgyis te//de yi 'og tu las tsam mo//'jig rten na
27a5(rgyud): d+ha'o//man 'tshig rnams kyis mnas bsgrug/dam tsug 'di ltar du snang ba de la 'gro dzin thams cad kyis grags mi rnyed cing las snang das grub tu 'awAr/na
27a6(rgyud): masmyig gsum lta nga kyil 'khor sngar mayi nas de'i phyog tu rig ts+tsha rgyub par gyu//swA hU~Mg gzhan du bskyed na de rdo rje rji kyis mamyur gyibyed par 'gyur /
27a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor cho ga rdzogs//rig pa mchog smrab pa 'di ni 'di tshogs te/gcig bras bu'i skyo drungs la phyis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhin sa nas
27b1(rgyud): gsum+b+ha bsgrung ba brgyas to ga s+hogatsang ma dag stsal/ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs phram byang chub kyi shing ngam/bcom ldan 'das lag na du
27b2(rgyud): yang ci nus su mcho do//pho nya rnams kyis dri dang /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /gtor ma sbyin no//de nas lcags kyi ral gri bgyis te/bud med rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/bud
27b3(rgyud): med bcus bskor ba nam 'ongs kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//'ongs nas g.yog 'khor 'bul lo//ral gri de g.yog 'khor la bzhag na bud med de chung mar 'gyuraro//gal te 'tshal
27b4(rgyud): na bud med de dag kyang chung mar 'gyuraro//gal te mi 'tshal na g.yog 'khor rnams la stsal to//g.yog 'khor rnams dang lhan cig na mkha' la mchi'o//'og tu yang dpag
27b5(rgyud): tshad stong du yang mchi'o//steng du yang de bzhi no//ral pri de thogs na 'khor los bsgyur ba ma gtogs par rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod ngo //lo khri thub bo//sgrub pa
27b6(rgyud): gzhan yang yod do//tshes grangs dang /skar ma bdam mi dgos so//bsrung ba bya mi dgos so//bud med de lags par bsku zhing me tog gis kyang mchod la pho nya mo rnams kyis
27b7(rgyud): kyang las bya'o//de'i 'og tu bud med de kha bub tu bzhag la bud de'i rgyab tu zhon te bud de 'gul zhing sgra 'byin yang 'jigs pa mi bya zhing /gyen du 'phag gi bar du rig pa'i rgyal po
28a1(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya'o//yang sa la lhung //lhung nas de las 'bab par bya'o//de nas bud med rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rnams mthong ngo //de'i nang
28a2(rgyud): nas bud med cig kha bub tu 'dug cing dbugs 'byin pa de'i rgyab tu zhon na na mkha' la 'phag cing mdog nyi ma shwa ra ba lta bur 'gyuraro//bud med kyi blo la ral gri 'dzam
28a3(rgyud): bu'i chu bo'i gser gyis brgyan cing mu tig dang rin po ches spras pa 'phyang //las 'di ni rgyal mtshan dang 'dra'o zhes smras nas bya'o//le lo can dang byas pa mi gzo ba rnams
28a4(rgyud): kyis las 'di mi bya'o//gang nus pa brtan zhing mthu stobs dang ldan pa rtsol bar nges par byas pas las 'di brtsam par bya ste/las 'dri sgrub pa pos rtag tu go cha sra ba
28a5(rgyud): dang /tshangs par spyod par bya zhing nya dang sha yongasu spang bar bya'o//rig sngags 'chang gis ldong ros sgrub pa'i tshe gal te ston na de dgug pa'i phyi re 'di brtsam par bya ste/
28a6(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang grub pa 'am/klu 'am/gnod sbyin nam/sha za 'am/grul bum yang rung ste/dbab po byas pa de la gang gis rdzas khyer ba des nga la slar byin cig dang
28a7(rgyud): phung bar mi bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o//mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te//zangs po che btsugs la 'bru mar blugs te bskol la rig pa'i
28b1(rgyud): rgyal po bzlas brjod byas na rig sngags 'tshong grub pa yang rung /gang yin pa de der 'ong zhing 'ongs nas kyang skur 'bul la do la ci yang mi bya'o//gal te mo 'dun phyis snyang pos yan
28b2(rgyud): l-ig dang ny-ing lagrin mos pazlas te bzhan//srung ba byas pa'i tshogs bya'o//gzhan du na mchis par 'gyur//gal te sbyang bas byas na grus pa rnams sa ma ngas par rgyu
28b3(rgyud): yan lag dang nyid lag bahU~Mbs pas 'ang zhing rjes stod sbyin par byed do//'di ska com ldan 'das stsa su brgyub du gas zhes s+ho//des gas b+hA byi 'dzum
28b4(rgyud): ma rgya las 'bramar thangasad+d+he/'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun de sbyang gis bsregs rgya sa lan spyod b+h+yon+da srog kyi sbyin sos shing bang du yang 'gyur ro//da ga drug bstsa
28b5(rgyud): bar 'dod na lag pa dang rgung pa snod du bcug la rlung g.yab kyis gi yongs te/gang du 'dod pa der rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod byas ni/dbyig drug byung ste nad med par
28b6(rgyud): 'gyuraro//mig ser gyi nad bsil bar 'dod na tshul lan bdun bsngags la skom du blud ni 'tsho'o//mig nad bsal bar 'dod na me tog rno bo ring po dag la lan bdun
28b7(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas te sngags kyis btab la snod du 'i drug ni 'tsho'o//de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog lag na rdo rje la logi 'dren gyis 'di skad ces smras so//bcom ldan 'das sems//
29a1(rgyud): can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du reg pa mchog 'di 'chad dam/bcom ldan 'das glang gis bdag la 'khyam zhing sems can rnams la yang glags rnyed
29a2(rgyud): par 'gyur bar bdag la mi gzigs sam/de nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes log 'dren la 'di skad ces smras//khyod nyon cig/gang dag dam tshig mi shes par nga'i rig
29a3(rgyud): ba'i cho ga rgyas par klog pa de dag khyer cig/gang dag gcig gi lhag ma gcig za ba dang /lha la phul ba'i dri dang /bdug pa dang /me tog la spyod pa de dag khyer cig/gang drag/
29a4(rgyud): nga'i dam tshig shes pa dang /cho ga rgyas pa las 'byung ba bzhin du spong bar byed pa dang /gang dag rig pa mchog rdo rje'i rig sngags dang bcas/gsang chen dang bcas par 'dzin
29a5(rgyud): pa de dag la glags ma tshol cig/chung ma gson cig/de skad thos pa dang /log 'dren de dag ca ce nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa la phyag bya ba'i
29a6(rgyud): bsang sngags smras pa/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/tad+ya thA/hU ru badz+ra pA Ni hu ru badz+ra pA Ni/two ta tha ya badz+ra pA Ni/s+pho Ta ya badz+ra pA Ni/
29a7(rgyud): da ha pa tsa ma tha badz+ra pa Ni swA hA/ri ma mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bri bar bya ste/pri yang ku ltar snga/
29b1(rgyud): bsang rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//de'i g.yog 'khor log 'dron bzhi bcu bro bar bya ste/kha dgra sna tshogs pa lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal babri bar bya'o//
29b2(rgyud): sna dkar la gcu bar bya'o//de'i 'og tu rig sngag 'chang gi mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas brtsams te/ba'i rnam lngas lus spyad ba byes la/dus gsum du khrus bya zhing ra mo'i sku gzugs kyi
29b3(rgyud): mdun du dus gsum du rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o//zla ba phyi ma mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/lag na rdo rje la mchod pa byas nas dri dang /me tog dang /
29b4(rgyud): bdug po bral te log 'dren rnams la yang dag bcos parab t+ya ka dang /mo ta ka da dang /bru bA le ka dang /rtsa ba dang shing tog gzhan dag kyang phul lo/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sna mya'i
29b5(rgyud): me tig zho dang /sbrang rdi dang /mar la spyugs pa brgyad skyong sbyin bsreg bya'o//'og dang ri ma'i sku gzugs 'gul zhing ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra bsgrag ste/de la yang 'jigs par mi bya'o//
29b6(rgyud): yang lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na de nas mi mi sdug pa zhig 'ongs te de la yang 'jigs par mi bya'o//rdo rje bzhad mas sgrar bcug nu de tsa zhes smra'o//ngas lagan rdo rje'i mdun du gang
29b7(rgyud): smras pa de dran par bgyis la de bzhin gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o//de bzhin du bya'o zhes smos nas mi snang bar 'gyur//de'i 'og tu rig sngags sgrub pa la log 'dren de dag dngos
30a1(rgyud): grub sbyin par 'gyur/nyin cig bzhin kar sha pa ni nyi shu sbyin par 'gyur/dbang du yang 'gyuraro//yid la gang ci bsams pa de thams cad byed par yang 'gyur//
30a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang brjod par bgyi'o//gang dag rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas par sgrub par bgyi ba dang mchod par bgyid pa de dag la ci yang mi bgyi'o//'dod pa thams
30a3(rgyud): cad za zhing sgrub pa de la dngos grub stsal to//gang dag bdag cag gis gsang sngags 'chang ba de dag la log 'dren nam/log 'dren gyi bu 'am/log 'dren gyi 'khor gang la la
30a4(rgyud): zhig glags lta ba 'am/gang glags rnam par tshol ba de'i mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas so//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mi snyan pa brjod par bgyi'o//sgrub pa'i dus na
30a5(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di nyid kyis me tog la lan bdun sngags kyis btab la stsal par bgyis na log 'dren thams cad dngos grub stsal to//sngags 'di nyid kyis gzhan la bgegs
30a6(rgyud): bgyid do//skar ma bdam mi 'tshal/bskang ba bgyi mi 'tshalo//lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mo na sran gre'u las bgyis pa'i snum kur phu pa la ka brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis la/'di
30a7(rgyud): skad du che ge mo zhes bya ba'i bgegs gyis shig ces brjod na de'i tshe log 'dren de dag dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pa'i yid kyis bgegs bgyid do//bsams na zhi bar 'gyuraro//
30b1(rgyud): ste lo//dren rnams mthong bar 'tshal na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyon zhag gtsug bsrung ba bgyis te/dur khrod du mchis la 'gal ba blangs te/dri dang /me tog dang /bdugs pas rgyun
30b2(rgyud): baM bgyis la dge pa pag tu ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis na dgung phyed kyi dus na log 'dren rnams ni che ste/de dag la rdo rje lte bas dri stsal par bgyi'o//me kha las me tog
30b3(rgyud): bar bgyi'o//rdo rje bzhad mas smrar stsal te/'di skad sems dang bar gyis shig ces brjod na log 'dren de dag rtse zhing dgod do//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rig pa mchog dran par
30b4(rgyud): bgyis na de dag mi 'gul te 'di skad du khyod sems dang bar gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o//de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas mi snang bar gyur to//de'i 'og tu rig pa la bgegs
30b5(rgyud): mi bgyid do//sngags 'di nyid kyis skyes pa dang /bud med dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la grog mkhar rtse'i mdun gyi dog sa blangs la gzugs bgyis te/lag na
30b6(rgyud): rdo rje'i mdun du thab khung bgyis la thab khung gi nang du dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci bas zhugs bus de zhugs kyi nang du gzugs stsal la de'i steng du lan tshe'i sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad
30b7(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis te dgung bdun du dus gsum na dbang du 'gyuraro//bgegs brgyad khri gtsug phud 'phyang ba zhes bgyi ba'i bgegs de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
31a1(rgyud): khams na bgegs bgyid pa lags te/de'i bar du sgrub par bgyi'o//sgrub pa'i dus na rig sngags 'chang gis grog mkhar gyi dog sa las gtsug phud 'chang gi
31a2(rgyud): sku gzugs bgyis la mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzhag ste/zho dang /'o mas bkrus la me tog dang bdug pas mchod/rig pa brgyad stong bzlas brjod
31a3(rgyud): bgyis na de nas yid dga' nas 'jig rten gyi 'phrul po ches dngos grub stsol to//dgos pa zhig grub na yang de la dngos grub stsol to//log 'dran gyi sgrub pa rdzogaso///
31a4(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi nor sgrub pa dang las byang bar bgyi bar 'tshal na ba lang gi lhas su mchis la mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te/zas su'o skyo 'tshal zhing 'bum bzlas brjod
31a5(rgyud): bgyis na rig pa'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i gdugs kyi gung la lce spyang mo sgra 'byin te/sgra lan lnga brgya 'byin to//de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te ti na ra stong rnyed cing las kyang byung bar 'gyuraro//
31a6(rgyud): ciste lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'tshal na pad+ma'i rdzing du mchis la yar gyi ngo zhag bdun nas brtsams te/zas su'o skyo 'thung zhing lan sum stong bzlas brjod
31a7(rgyud): bgyis na nyid kyis lag na rdo rje mthong ngo //maM kha la bzlas brjod bgyis pas me tog dbul lo//rdo rje bzhad mas smar stsal te/rig sngags 'chang gis 'di skad du bcom ldan
31b1(rgyud): 'das bdag yongasu bskyab du gsol zhes brjod do//de 'di skad du bu ci bya zhes brjod pa dang /de na bcom ldan 'das yid kyis gang bsams pa de thob par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod do//de bzhin
31b2(rgyud): du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur//de'i 'og tu yod la gad bas mos pa de thams cad 'grub bo//byis pa log 'dren gyis zin na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgya
31b3(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i spos chus bkrus na gtong ngo //gal te log 'dren gyi gnas sgrub par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo'i nya nas brtsams te/za su 'o skyo 'thung zhing rig
31b4(rgyud): pa bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas marara~M gyi ngo zhig brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bskung ba bgyis te mtshan gcig mchis la ci 'byor pas mchod de/me tog dkar po stong gis mtshan mA
31b5(rgyud): bsnun na mtshan brgyar 'gas te de nas log 'dren gyi las dngos grub tu 'gyur ro//log 'dren rnams ngag nyan par yang 'gyuraro//log 'dren rnams bsad do snyam du khros pa'i yid
31b6(rgyud): kyis bzlas brjod bgyis na log 'dren rnams 'gu mo//gang du bsgoms pa der thams cad bgyid//yar gyi chas brgyad nas brtsams la 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du nang par
31b7(rgyud): reg pa len brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjid 'gyi'o//gdugs kyi gling la yang de bzhin du 'gyi'o//phyem red lan brgyartsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te de ltar dgung bdun du bgyis na
32a1(rgyud): bdun pa'i gdugs la tin+da ra sbyin par bgyid do//ci nus kyi mchod par bgyi'o//zas su'o skyo 'thung bar bgyi'o//yar rgyang 'chos lnga nas brtsams te rgya mtshar
32a2(rgyud): 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la snga dro nas phyi dro'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyis no to na ra gcig rnyed do//tshes grangs dang skar ma bdam mi 'tshal/bsnyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal bar yungs kar
32a3(rgyud): 'bru stong las rdo rje bgyis te/kham phor du stsal la lo mas kha bcad de/rig pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o//ras zung gcig stsol gyi bar du bzhag go/de nas mtshe
32a4(rgyud): 'ur dor ro//tshes grangs dang skar ma bdam mi 'tshal/bsnyung ba bkyi mi 'tshal bar sked pa nub tsam gyi chab du zhugs la lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na ras zung gcig
32a5(rgyud): sgrol bar bgyid do//mar gyi ro zhab brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la/shing bil ba'i zhugs shing gis zhugs bus te sna
32a6(rgyud): mA'i me tog zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /mar la spyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na ti na ra stsol bar bgyi'o//yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gsum la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngang mchod pa
32a7(rgyud): bgyis te nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la la na brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na ras zung gcig rnyed do//de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
32b1(rgyud): ldan 'das 'dag la gsan du gsol/yon tan bsam chos mi khazla ba'i las brjod par dgyi'o//dgung gsum du bskyang ba bgyis la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la n+ya gro d+ha'i shing gcig pu mchis/
32b2(rgyud): par mchis la/dri dang /me tog dang /bdug pas rgyan par bgyi'o//pho nya mo rnams kyis thams cad bgyi'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ras yug ma god pas shing n+ya gro d+ha dkris la
32b3(rgyud): rtswa ku sha sbams pa'i steng du mchis shing /rig pa'i rgyal po brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na de nas shing n+ya gro d+ha las 'od zer cig byung ste/des rig sngags 'chang la bskor ba bgyis nas spyi bor
32b4(rgyud): nub par 'gyuraro//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ras la btags te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /lag na rdo rje la phyag bgyis la ras de de bzhin gshegs pa la phul na yid
32b5(rgyud): la bsams pa tsam gyis skye bo bdun gyis bskor te na mkha' la mchi'o//ci 'tshal ba gzugs can du 'gyur//dpag tshad sum stong du gyen du 'phag go//'og tu yang de bzhin no//
32b6(rgyud): bsams pa tsam gyis lha'i rigs thams cad 'gugs par 'gyuraro//sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa yang 'tshal bar 'gyuraro//sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
32b7(rgyud): dpa' rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyuraro//lo khri bdun stong thub par 'gyuraro//de'i bsams pa dang dgos pa thams cad 'byor par 'gyuraro//rig sngags 'chang grub pa
33a1(rgyud): dang /sa la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam pa'i spyod yul du mi 'gyur//gung gi tshen mkha' la gnas pa de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi spyod yul du mi 'gyur//
33a2(rgyud): dngos grub 'dis lha thams cad dang rig sngags 'chang thams cad mdun na gnas par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du lag na rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad dngos grub du 'gyur ro//'di sgrub
33a3(rgyud): pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi mtshams ma mchis pa lnga 'byang bar 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe 'bum pa de'i tshe lag na rdo rje'i gnas su mchi'o//yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad nas brtsams te
33a4(rgyud): lus sbyang ba bgyis pa la zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing rig pa bzlas brjod bgyi'o//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te/mtshan gcig mchis par
33a5(rgyud): mchi so la shams thabs ser po bgo zhing sgrub par bgyi'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gtor ma'i cho ga rgya cher bgyis la mtshan gyi steng du zhabs g.yon pa bzhag ste rig
33a6(rgyud): sngags brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na de nas mtshan las 'od zer cig byung ste/des rig sngags 'chang la bskor ba bgyis nas mgo bor nub par 'gyur te/des skra lcang lor
33a7(rgyud): 'khyil zhing gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog can gyi rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro///yid kyis gar 'chal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro//lo dgu stang thub par 'gyur ro//
33b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di yang stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpabu tu ma mchos shid dbyung po thams cad dang /gnod skyon thams cad dang /klu thams cad dang /log 'dren thams cad kyis mya
33b2(rgyud): tshugs pa 'geb te/rAg pa'i rigs rgyud thams cad kyi snying po mchog gi gasnad sngags bshad par 'gyi'o//rbar+thi d+hA /'di dang po nyi mo rnams rmyi las kyi khyad byar brjod par bgyi'o//
