33b3(rgyud): snying po'i las rnams nI ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bri bar bgyi'o//de'i g.yon rol du kun dga'
33b4(rgyud): bo dang /g.yas rol du lag na rdo rje rnga yob thogs pa bri bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das ni gser gyi mdog can no//kun dga' bo ni sngo bsangs so//lag na rdo rje yong snga
33b5(rgyud): bsnyungs te/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag ni pog por thogs par bri'o//de nas yur gyi ngo nas dgung gsum bsrung ba bgyis te/
33b6(rgyud): mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du lung thung gi shing gis zhugs dus la sgyu ma'i me tog mar la skyugs pa lan brgyud stong sbyin sreg bgyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpral ba
33b7(rgyud): las 'od zer 'byung ste/de nas dngos grub tu 'gyuraro//des yid kyis gang bsams pa de 'byor par 'gyur//'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dam/rig sngags 'chang nyid
34a1(rgyud): ni ma gtog so//gtor ma rgya cher stsal bar bgyi'o//ma bsgrubs kyang las rnams su 'gyur ba lags te/lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thal ba
34a2(rgyud): srad bu'am chus ni bkru bar bgyi'o//grogs srung na spyi bor mdud pa dor ro//lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis pas yul 'khor srung ngo //bsreg ma lA lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis
34a3(rgyud): pa chab tu stsal bas chu srin kum bi ra dang /chu srin bcing ngo //yul gas ni rims nad gso bar bgyi'o//chab bam ku shas ni dug las gso bar bgyi'o//bgegs dang log
34a4(rgyud): 'dren phung bar bgyi bar 'tshal bas sgrub pa'i dus na arga'i shing gis zhugs bus la ke tshe'i 'bru las lan brgya stong sbyin sreg dgyis na log 'dren rnams phung bar 'gyuraro//phyugs
34a5(rgyud): chung dbang du bgyis par 'tshal bas mda' thogs la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/phyugs chung gi lag nas bzung na dbang du 'gyur ro//chang ma
34a6(rgyud): rungs par bgyi bar 'tshal nA lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i bsreg ma khyim gyi sgor dor ro//chab la mi 'bying bar bgyis na shing shi l+ya ka'i 'bras bu la lan bdun bzlas
34a7(rgyud): brjod pagyis te stsal na chab mi 'bying ba bgyis par 'gyuraro//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du shing dril ba'i bud shing gi zhugs
34b1(rgyud): bu la bsregs blugs rgya sgyogs la lan stong du bsgyur sbyin sreg bgyis na nad rkang skems kyis 'debs par bgyid do//mar dang gu gul gyi bsregs blugs lan brgya stong sbyin sreg
34b2(rgyud): bgyis na zhi bar 'gyuro//yar gyi ngo nya nas brtsamos te gdugs kyi gung la gas ser pa bgos la/zangs kyi snod du zho dang 'bras chen stsal te gdong gtugs la bstan cing phyogs
34b3(rgyud): chung gi ming nas phyung ste ldan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na phyogs chung mchi'o//gal te mi mchi na phyugs chung de 'gum mo//gdugs bdun du bgyi'o//'bras can gyi gdugs
34b4(rgyud): la dbul lo//shing sha mi phur bu sor brgyad pa blangs te srad bus dkris te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lani brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la gru mi 'gul bar bgyi'o zhes bgyi ste/chab tu dor na
34b5(rgyud): gru mi 'gul ba bgyis par 'gyur ro//mar gyi ngo zhag bzhi la zhag gcig bskyang ba bgyis te mtshan gcig mchis pas mchis la/'byung po'i gtor ma stsal te lho phyogs kyi ngos la shu dag
34b6(rgyud): brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na ti nar gsum rnyed//shu dag la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te so phrag tu stsal na shags 'gyid pa'i tshe gzhan gyis lan me thebs par smra bar
34b7(rgyud): 'gyur//lag na rdo rje'i mdun du gi'u wang la lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la/des thig le bgyis na dpal che bar 'gyuraro//rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du lan thebs par sla
35a1(rgyud): duzung tha~Mng kra shing la thugs du snre la mon bran bre'u lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg pa kyi seMn dbang du 'gyur//brim pa'i bu mo dbang du tso dpar 'i tshol byas ma gyi zhe ga su
35a2(rgyud): zhon rdo rje sanan du pa'i ma na kyisang rgyun ga min ng+yas //ma kyisbyin par rgyu na ga rgyung
35a3(rgyud): ni spyan du slong gi zugs kar la lan man du ra/
35a4(rgyud): ts+tshan+yai thAm m+b+ha m+b+ha na n+tor d+h+ya ni te ts+tsha a grA ta \u0f7f5shAr TI mA pA da~M lA shA sa na oMSh+T+r-I k+Shi ts+tshab shai rU d+h+r-i swA~M na ASh+Ta har+tha hU~M na
35a5(rgyud): nga spyod dam ma tshun nas 'gagasus 'du ba 'byom te lagan rdo rje'i mdun du mchod ba'in gyis mdzad do/rig pa tsha zhes dri dang /me tin dang /du
35b1(rgyud): thams cad la phul la//de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis shing sa la ser po las sgrom bu bgyis te/sgrom bu dor lig bu mig stsal la dro bar gyur pa dang //du bar 'thul ba dang /
35b2(rgyud): 'bar ba'i bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o//dro bar gyur na dbang du 'gyu ro//du ba 'thul na mi snang bar 'gyur ro//'bar na na mkha' la mchi bar bgyi'o//mdog gdugs shar ba
35b3(rgyud): 'dra bar 'gyuro//lo bdun stong thub par 'gyuraro//lus zhig nas lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'gyur//mar kyi ngo zhig brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te dur khrod du
35b4(rgyud): mchis la skyes pa'i ro ma smad pa blangs te/rig pa mchog gi dri dang /me tog dang /bdug pas rgyan pa bgyis la mgo bo shar phyogasu bstan te/de nas rig sngags 'chang gcer bur
35b5(rgyud): byung la skra bshig ste/de'i snying khar mchis la mi ro'i khar mi'i thod pa yungs kar gyis bltam pa bzhag la yungs kar rnams mi snang gi bAr du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas dngos
35b6(rgyud): grub tu 'gyuraro//mi thod blangs la 'tshe'ur bor na de nas yid kyis bsams pa tsam gyis na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur te na mkha' la mchi'o//mi snang bar 'gyuraro//rgyal por bgyidado//
35b7(rgyud): bdag mi sdug par yang ston to//slar yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang /mdog gdugs shar ba lta bur yang ston to//bdag gis dang bsams pa de dag thams cad
36a1(rgyud): /'grub bo//rgyalo sbyong sgrub par 'gyur//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyim dag gcig bsrung ba gyus te/mgan rdo rje'i mdun du rig pa mchog gos la gan rdo rje la dro dang
36a2(rgyud): me tog dang bdug pa rnams dbulo//grong gi phug rnon gyi khar ldong ros stsal la dro bar gyur pa dang /du ba 'thul ba dang /'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//dro bar gyur pa
36a3(rgyud): thig le bgyis na chab kyi nang du dgung zla gcig mchis shing chab kyi nang na 'chag go/gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyuraro//du ba 'thul na ma snang bar 'gyur te/mi snang bar gyur na
36a4(rgyud): grub pa rnams kyi spyod yul du mi 'gyuraro//lo stong thub par 'gyur//'bar na namakha' la mchi bar 'gyur te/dpag ched stong tshun chad mthong zhing sgra yang thos so//l-i kha~M
36a5(rgyud): spyong thub par 'gyur ro//lag na rdo rje grub par 'gyur//chu la ldan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas gar bgyid du stsal te lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i du bsags
36a6(rgyud): tshig sbyar stsal to//yid kyis lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis dra'i me tog gis smrar sprul to//yar gyi do zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te/lag ni rdo rje'i mdun du
36a7(rgyud): pa la sha'i shing gis zhugs bus la ku mu da'i me tog zho dang sbrang rtsi dang /mar las skyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na yid kyis bsams pa de dag thams cad 'grub ste/rig
36b1(rgyud): sngags 'chang gi rgyal po nyid ni ma gtog so//marA ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te/zas su'o skyo 'tshal zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bil bya'i shing gis zhugs bus la zil ba
36b2(rgyud): yam sreg shing 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na rgyal po nyid stsol to//cho ga 'di nyid kyis rig sngags 'chang nyid kyang stsol to//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyen zhag gcig bsrung
36b3(rgyud): ba bgyis te/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du seng ldeng gi shing gis zhugs bus la ske tshe'i me tog le lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na las grub pa'i mchog tu 'gyuraro//mar gyi
36b4(rgyud): de zhag bcu bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arga'i shing gis zhugs bus la arga'i me tog las lan 'brum sbyin sreg bgyis na ti nA ra stang stsol lo//byang chub kyi shing gi
36b5(rgyud): 'og tu zas su chu baglog 'tshal zhing lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang brgyas bskor ba'i reg sngags 'chang du 'gyu ro//'dod pa thams cad longs spyod du
36b6(rgyud): 'gyur//lo dgu stong thub par 'gyur ro//gang rig pa'i rgyal po sgrub par 'tshal ba des mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas bzung ste/zas su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung
36b7(rgyud): duzhugs te/ku mu da'i me tog rgyas pa 'bum phul na de nas rig sngags 'chang la chu'i nang du klu reg par bgyid de de la 'jigs par mi bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i
37a1(rgyud): mchog 'grub par 'gyur te/de grub pas cho ga rgyas pa thams cad grub par 'gyur//rog pa'i'o mchog ka stong ba'i chog rgyas pa rdzogs//
37a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag ni rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das nye ba'i snying po 'di mchog tu mi bzad pa cho ga rgyas pa mang po rab tu sgrub pa bgyid pa/lha dang
37a3(rgyud): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'gal bar bgyi bu ma lags pa/'byung po thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis mi tshugs te/phyir zhing bshad par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'ad
37a4(rgyud): kyis lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shod cig gnod sbyin gyi dbang po sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis shod cig/de nas
37a5(rgyud): lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la rnam par bltos nas lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//kye kye lha'i tshogs rnams nyon cig/nye ba'i snying po 'di ni mchog
37a6(rgyud): tu mi bzad pa/de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'gal bar mdzad pa yin te/phyi phyir bshad kyis lha'i tshogs rnams de nyon cig/de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das
37a7(rgyud): zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas gsang sngags smras pa/na mo hA tra ya s+yai/nam sh+tsa d+ha ba pa~M NiH/ma hA ya hA so nA pa ti s+ya/nam shAN+Da pra ma ta nA ya sA t+ma/
37b1(rgyud): ti ri Ni swA hA/de nas gsang sngags smras pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//gzhal mang khang na gnas bya'i lha rnams kyang khas bu
37b2(rgyud): tu 'gyel nas skyabs med cing dpung gnyen med de 'dir yid yod nas gsang ba'i bdag po ci nus bdag cag srog dang bral bar mi 'gyur bar bdag cag la yongasu bskyab tu gsol zhes
37b3(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la skyabasu dong ngo //log 'dren rnams kyang 'gul ma nus nas yid kyis lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo//de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin
37b4(rgyud): gyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces smraso//grogs po khyed longs shig/nga'i dam tshig la yang gnas par gyis shig/de thos nas lha rnams rab tu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan

37b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin rnams phung bar bgyid pa/dri za rnams lhung bar bgyid pa/log 'dren rnams nges par brlag par bgyid pa/rdo rje'i rigs thams cad skrag par bgyid pa/tshangs pa dang /

38b3(rgyud): gnas pader mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la mchis la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la a ba marga'i yam sreg shing las lan brgya snying sbyin

40b7(rgyud): rnams kyi rings byung du 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams mi 'phrogs par spong bar dgyi'o//byang chub thams dpa' chen pa 'i rig/bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang gis leg

41a3(rgyud): bsod nams chung ba de'i stor grang snyam du bsams la rig sngags 'chang des sbyin sreg bgyi'o//yang na lag pa bkan te mnan no//gal te shin tu gnod pa bgyis na rig sngags

41b7(rgyud): ba la rgyob shig rgyob shig/bsregs shig bsregs shig/zung shig/myos par gyis shig/ma rungs par gyis shig ces bsgo ba thams cad la gnod par gyis shig/

43a2(rgyud): du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi gda' bar 'gyu ro//nag mo drag mo'i cho ga rdzog so///rgyal ba ldan ma'i las rnams lags te/lha thams cad dbug na len gsum

43b2(rgyud): brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na ti ra gcig stsol to//sgrub pa bgyi na ma gong pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gser gyi mdog can bri bar bgyi'o//de'i g.yon
43b3(rgyud): rol tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bgyi'o//de'i g.yas rol tu 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bri bar bgyi'o//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni 'dam bu 'da'
43b4(rgyud): rgyu'i kha dog ltar dkor ba'o//lag na rdo rje ni sngo bsangs te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//lag na rdo rje g.yas rol du ni rgyal ba ldan ma sngo bsangs la de yang rgyan thams cad kyis
43b5(rgyud): brgyan pa'o//de'i 'og rol tu ni sgrub pa po lag na pog phor thogs par bri'o//de nas zhag gsum bslang ba bgyis te/mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher

43b7(rgyud): de nas me thab nas ka ra bi ra'i me tog pad+ma'i tshad tsam du 'byung ngo //ka ri bai re'i pad+ma'i dbus nas ka ra bi ra 'dra ba'i ldong ros 'byung ste/rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyid bzhin du de blang
45a1(rgyud): bar bgyi'o//blangs pa tsam gyis gdugs shar ba'i mdog lta bu dang /skra lcang lo 'khyil ba dang /lho bcu drug lon pa'i lus lta bur 'gyur/lo brgyad khwa
45a2(rgyud): thub par 'gyur/na mkha' la mchi ba dang /mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang /kha zas ci rgyal ba rnams 'tshol bar 'gyuraro//rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags
45a3(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//bdag 'gum pa'i dus 'tshal bar 'gyuraro//gal te slad kyis kyang brtson 'grus bskyed na tshe de'i nyes 'gyur thub par 'gyur ro//yar gyi ngo zla ba nya la nyin

45a5(rgyud): khrod kyi gan su zhugs bus la dur khrod kyi thal bas sbyin sreg bgyis na bskrad par 'gyuraro//mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsrung bar bgyis te/lag na rje
45a6(rgyud): rje'i mdun du br-i yang ku'i shing gis zhugs bus la be bo ka ta'i yam sreg shong brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na nor stsol to//dpal che bar bgyi na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du til gyis
45a7(rgyud): lan brgya stong bzlas brjod dgyi'o//dbye bar bgyi na yar gyi ngo tshes lnga la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te lhag na rdo rje'i mdun du mon sran gre'u las lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis
45b1(rgyud): na dbye bar bgyis par 'gyur//tshes grangs dang skar ma padam mi 'tshal/bsnyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal to/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du gdugs bdun dus gsum du ba ru ra brgya rtswa brgyad sbyin sreg/
45b2(rgyud): bgyis na phyugs chung rnyed do//bud med dbang du bgyi na gdugs bdun dus gsum du mon sran gre'u las sbyin sreg bgyi'o//skyes pa dbang du bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lago na rdo rje'i
45b3(rgyud): mdun du nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la til las lan brgya stong bgyis na skyes pa dbang du 'gyuraro//rA dzA ma te ba shI ka ra mau shuk+ka pra ti pa d+ha maM b+he badz+ra pA Ne ra g+hA ta ar+tha a ste rag ni ma
45b4(rgyud): pabadz+rA l+ya shwe ta sa rA sha pa naM ASh+Ta sa ta sr-i dzu hu yang ya bad a sta mi ti ba sha/rgyal ba ldan pa'i cho ga rdzogaso///rdo rje lcags sgrog gi las rnams te rig sngags bcing
45b5(rgyud): na srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mdud pa dor ro//yungs kar gyis ni zhugs kyi ra bar 'gyuraro//chab kyis ni yul gru chen por 'gyuraro//thal bas ni rdo rje
45b6(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//bcing ba thams cad rdo rje lcags sgrog 'di nyid sbyar bar dgyi'o//gang dag bdag gi rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa la dam tshig mthong nas 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten
45b7(rgyud): las 'das pa'i rig sngags sgrub pa de dag la gang dag bgegs bgyid dam rdzas 'phrog pa de dag ni dam tshig ma 'tshal cing rigs la 'khu ba lags te/de dag ma rung bar bgyi ba
46a1(rgyud): slad du las 'di brtsam par bgyi'o//tsan dan dmar po las lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bgyis te mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo
46a2(rgyud): rje'i mdun du seng ldeng gi shing gis zhugs bus la/sha chen po bsregs blugs lan bdun sbyin sreg bgyis te/de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces lha 'am/gnod sbyin nam/grub pa 'am/
46a3(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ngam/log 'dren nam/log 'dren g.yog 'khor ram/grul bum mam/'byung po 'am/sha za 'am/gang gis bdag gi rdzas ji ltar khyer ba des slar byin cig ces brjod
46a4(rgyud): par bgyi'o//de skad thos nas gal te des stsal na ni cang mi bgyi'o//gal te ma stsal na yang 'di skad skrag par bgyi ste/gang gis bdag gi rdzas khyer ba des slar byin cig ces bgyi'o//
46a5(rgyud): ci ste ma stsal na lag na rdo rje'i rigs las phyi rol pa lag na rdo rje'i rigs la 'khu ba lags pas bya gag gi rtug pa blangs la yang lan gsum brjod par bgyi'o//de ltar bgyis
46a6(rgyud): kyang ma stsal na bya gag gi rtug pa lag na rdo rje la bdug cing rig sngags kyang lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas lag na rdo rje'i rigs la 'khu ba des kyi hud kyi hud ces
46a7(rgyud): mchil tshig cing se phyogs der ltung ngo //mig kyang 'jar ro//'gum par yang 'gyuraro//de'i rigs rabs chad par 'gyuraro//nor ni slar khugs par 'gyuraro//bsad par ni mi
46b1(rgyud): ts+tshi//gdan gyi las rnams kyang baHs+ya/sa ngon pa 'am mngon pa yang rung ste yod kyis dang byar brjod//d+yo'i drug pa'i phyi ma 'ang/swa n+do 'og gas/chab bas dug las gas par
46b2(rgyud): 'o//bdag gas ning 'angan du pa mchis padub rkyen dran supa pa d+hA Sh+T+r-IHbrgyad brgyas brjod bkyis la bad+ma ba bcing //nang kro te se ma mchis par ba kyi ni rlud du la ldan
46b3(rgyud): brgyad pa zlas brjod parjid la gdan nad kri t+ta m+me mchis pa der bcing byar brgya'o//myor gyi ngo zhig brgyad la nyis dug gcig bsgrung ba kyi ha~M/lagan rdo rje'i mdun du kyim pa gang gi
46b4(rgyud): zhugs brisA la bi la ba'i yam sreg shing khri ts+tshin sreg brnyes na longs spyod dag stsol lo//yar gyi do nya la nyin nag gcig bsnang ba bgyis te lcug na rdo rje mdun du a ba marga de yan+ma
46b5(rgyud): ga shing khri rig pa mchog dang sbyin cig sbyin srin brgyas na rdo rje l-I ni hU~M ga mthong zhing gang byungs par la//rdo rje sdigs sgron gatshig tugs//rdo rdzas
46b6(rgyud): la A rnams lags te/gdon bdus pa gting bar bag+h+nAn chub ces gyur//'dar bar btson mdzub la lan 'dun deshes brjod kyikyis te bstan ra//gdon rnam khyer
46b7(rgyud): na med kyis lan bdun pa zlas brjid kyir/ rjes par byang//rin pas sa sa pa la sa dgrol na rje ma'i sngag pa len dun brjod/mang nags zhin cem 'dzin
47a1(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur ro//bcing ba dgrol na lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis 'grol lo/rkang rdul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas thig le dgyis na gang ba sa
47a2(rgyud): pa de rnyed//mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gcig bskung ba bgyis te/n+ya gro da gcig pu mchis par mchis la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/n+ya pro da'i drung du mchis la/shre shA ta ka'i lo ma
47a3(rgyud): dag gi steng du rtsa dur ba'i lo ma bzhag ste/'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//'bar nas mgo bor bzhag na de me tog gi phreng bar 'gyuraro//des mgo la bcings na dpag tshad stong du
47a4(rgyud): gyen du 'phag go//lo khri nyis stong thub bo//zla ba spyad kis zin pa'i tshe zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ras dkar po bzhag la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis
47a5(rgyud): na blangs pa tsam gyis gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog can du 'gyur zhing lo nyi stong thub par 'gyuraro//rdo rje ser mo'i cho ga rdzogaso///shugs ldan ma'i las rnams lags
47a6(rgyud): te/gdon tshar bcad na dur khrod kyi sol bas gzugs bris la/lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i lcug mas gzhus na gdon gyis gtang ngo //sgra las bgyis pa'i srad bu gtun
47a7(rgyud): shing gis brdungs na gdon du zhing gtong ngo //gzegs ma las sbyin sreg bgyis na gdon gyi yan lag 'tshog par 'gyuraro//ba lang gi lci ba las gzugs bgyis la/lan bdun
47b1(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thur mas mig drung na 'ur bar 'gyur//lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i bsreg mas shing ljon pa la snun na 'pho bar 'gyur//da sha nam rtog gis 'gyi'o//dgrol na/
47b2(rgyud): yid kyis//'di dag la stsogs pa ni gdon rgyu las rnams lags//srung ba ni lan nyi shu n+ya gcig dadrus paspyod da kyis nga'i thil bas babyin//yul bru srung ba ni lan bdun dazlas brjod
47b3(rgyud): bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o//bskrad pa ni yungs kar gyis bgyi'o//nang par langs te shugs ldan ma'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/nad thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro//
47b4(rgyud): bud med dbang du bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te/dgung bdun dus gsum du lung thang gi shing gis zhugs bus la/til gyi bsreg rlugs lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin
47b5(rgyud): sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyu ro//rA dz+nyA na ba ma shi ka tu kA ma kr-iSh+Ta sra a b+ha mi ma a ho ra tro shau te na badz+ra pA Ni ra g+hu ta ti la ka sh+le raka ni pra dzI l+ya ru d+hi ra ak+ta naM ri dza ka naM aSh+Ta sa ha sraM dz+re hwA ya
47b6(rgyud): ba sho b+ha ba ti/rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu dogs gnyi ga'i sa drangs la za ma teg bgyis te zla ma tog der lig blo myig stsal laM za ma tog kyang mi thod kha sbyar gyi nang du stsal te/mer bye nga
47b7(rgyud): zhag brgyad nas dgung gsum bskung ba bgyis te mtshan gcig mchis par mchis la lho phyogasu mchis te mi thod thogs la 'bar gyi bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o//'bar nas blangs
48a1(rgyud): te rig pa mchog gis srung ba bgyis te lig bu mig gcig la btags te/lig bu mig de 'o ma dang lhan cig 'tshal na 'tshal ba tsam gyis sgra lcang lo 'khyil bar
48a2(rgyud): 'gyur/mngag ut+pa la'i kha dog lta bur 'gyur/mtshon gang dag 'phangs pa de dag phye mar lhags par 'gyur/lo drug khri thub par 'gyur/dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams grogs
48a3(rgyud): 'gyu ro//mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la me tog ut+pa la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la
48a4(rgyud): spyugs pa brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na rnyedado//'byung po thams cad dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhag gsum du bsnyung ba bgyis te/dur khrod du mchis la bri yang ku'i shing gis
48a5(rgyud): zhugs bus te mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na 'byung po thams cad mchi bar 'gyur te/de dag la phyag brnyan gyis shig ces brjod na gang dang gang du bskos pa de dag thams
48a6(rgyud): cad bgyid//yar gyi ngo tshes lnga la nyin zhig gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du a ti muk+ta ka'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad phul na longs spyod rnams stsol te/shugs
48a7(rgyud): ldan ma'i tshig rdzog so///rdo rje gdong gi las rnams lags te/lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i bum pas gdugs bdun khrus bgyis na sdig pa thams
48b1(rgyud): cad las bral bar 'gyur//byis pa gang dag gdon gyis zin te khrus dmyos na gtong bar 'gyur//gdon thos zin pa rnams la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i 'dug pas
48b2(rgyud): bdugs na gtong bar 'gyuraro//gang dag nam gru dang srul po dang gdon brnyan nas zin pa de dag tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la mdud pa bdun por te/lag pa la bcings nas gtong ngo //duH
48b3(rgyud): las gas na yalags pa kyi'o//srin d+ha tika byin pa dang /na ci pra ti dang /rkang shu d+hu ba la sa~M la~M la na nyi shu rtsa gcig ba zlas brjid dbyis te bsus na lan gsum gyi ma
48b4(rgyud): sos par 'gyur//phyug rgyu gzhig na chab kyis bgyid//dbyig du ga bsal bar bgyin rkang mig bkrus la snod du rtsal de de nas rtsa kuM shes bya bas na 'bying bar 'gyur//gdon ston la
48b5(rgyud): bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thal bas bgyi'o//nad ci yu ma mchis par bgyi na mtshan rnon pas sa shur gyis dras la yang rked du bcad na ci lu ma mchis par 'gyur//nad bri ha ma
48b6(rgyud): mchis par baN+DI ba yang de bzhin//'dzer ba ma mchis par bgyin sa la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas bkye'o//mar gyi ngo zhig bcu bzhi la nyin zhagu gcig bsrud ba bzhis
48b7(rgyud): te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod bci nus su bgyis la gi wang ras dkar ba'i snying du ban gi ste bar gyi bar bzlas brjod 'gyin//'bar nas blang bar bgyis te/blangs na sa thig
49a1(rgyud): bgyis na mi grada' bar 'gyur/'byung po thams cad kyis mi rmugs par 'gyur//zla ba gcig rmongs mi ban+de sa 'tshal zhing bla mar 'gu gsum babyung
49a2(rgyud): bgyis la mar gyi ngo nag bcu bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgya char bgyis te/shu dag chang par bcangs la sbrul du gyur gyi bar bzlas brjod bkye zhing /des mi 'jigs
49a3(rgyud): par bgyi'o//slar yang shu dag tu gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas bza' bar bgyi ste/'tshal ba tsam gyis gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog can du 'gyur zhing lo lnga
49a4(rgyud): stong thub par 'gyur ro//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la lha chen po gnas su mchis la nyin zhag gcig bskung ba bgyis la/lha chen pa gzhog g.yas par lig bu mige a shwat+tha'i lo
49a5(rgyud): ma'i steng du bzhag ste/du ba 'thul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas lig bu mig blangs te/lha'i skal ba bzhag la mig la bskus na mi gda' bar 'gyuraro//lo bdun
49a6(rgyud): stong thub par 'gyur//arga'i me tog dur khrod kyi mes bsregs nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis nas lha chen po'i gan su mchis la shing a shwad+tha'i
49a7(rgyud): lo ma'i steng du bzhag ste lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyuraro//lo lnga stong thub par 'gyuraro//zla ba gcig skyo 'chal zhing mar gyi ngo
49b1(rgyud): zhog bcu bzhol mo'i rus bzla gram lta bur bgyis la de nas rig sngags 'chang gi ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du lag na rdo rje'i gzugs dang /dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs
49b2(rgyud): bzhag la rig sngags 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das dang /lage na rdo rje dang dbang phyug chen po rgya cher mchod/rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas nyin zhag gcig
49b3(rgyud): bsnyung ba bgyis le zla gam blangs te ras dkar po'i steng du bzhag la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//'bar nas blangs te mgo bor bzhug na ci 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur/
49b4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje dang /dbang phyug chen po'i gzugasu yang bsgyur/yid kyis gang bsams pa de thams cad kyang 'gru'o//lo stong thub par 'gyuraro//'chi ba'i dus kyang 'tshalo//za su'o skye
49b5(rgyud): zab che zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sh+le shwe ta ka'i shing gis zhugs bus la/a pa marga'i lam sreg shing 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na rgyal po nyid 'thob bo//rdo rje gdong gi cho ga rdzog so//
49b6(rgyud): rdo rje lte ba'i las rnams lags te ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang mu 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/
49b7(rgyud): dar ram ras kyi sham thabs can bri bar bya'o//de ri ga yas rol tu rdo rje'i lte ba gser gyi mdog lta bu bri bar bgyis te/de yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bgyi'o//de nas rig
50a1(rgyud): /sngags 'chang zasu 'i skyo 'tshal bar bgyi'o//mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum bsrung ba po gyis te/ci nus kyi mchod pa bgyis la can dan dmar po mthog sa
50a2(rgyud): rdo rje bgyis te/rdo rje'i rkang par ldong ros bzhag la/byang chub kyi shing gi lo mas g.yogs te/dngos grub rnam gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//'bar bar gyur na bskal par
50a3(rgyud): gnas shing rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro//dpag tshad stong gyen du 'phags cing de'i mod la slar mtsho'o//gang gi tshe 'gum pa de'i lag na rdo rje'i rigs
50a4(rgyud): 'o//ci ste du ba 'phrul nas blangs te thig la baMgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur/lo bcu drug ston pa lta bu'i lus su 'gyur/lo 'dun stod thub par 'gyur//bri bar gyur
50a5(rgyud): nAs rlungs la thig ler bgyis na gang mthong ba d+ma dbang du 'gyur te/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa yang dbang du 'gyur ro//zla ba gcig zas chu grog 'tshal zhing ma
50a6(rgyud): gyi zhag brgyad nas zhag gsum bsrung ba bgyi s+yA te/ba lang gi lces sam kun dga' ra ba 'am/yang na gnas gtsang mar mchod pa rgyu tshur brtsi m+b+ha la/ldong rlos
50a7(rgyud): lo ma 'dun gyi steng du bzhag ste/gdol ba'i bu mo'i mo mtshan nam/'dzi bo la bgyis pa'i mi mtshan gyi stang du bzhag par bgyi zhing /gdol pa'i bu mo ral gri thogs pa bzhi phyog
50b1(rgyud): bzhir bzhag par dgyis la/de nas rig sngags 'chang gi dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//'bar bar gyur na gdugs shar ba 'dra ba'i mdog tu 'gyur/'di
50b2(rgyud): lcang lo 'khyil bar 'gyuraro//lo bcu drug lon pa lta bar 'gyur/'og tu dpag tshad stong du mchi bar 'gyur/steng du yang de bzhin mchi bar 'gyur/dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi thos shing
50b3(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur/lo khri nyis stong 'tsho bar 'gyur/nam mkha' la rlung gi shugs dang mtshungs par 'gyur/grub pa thams cad kyang 'dis dbang du 'gyur/tshes grangs dang skar ma bdam
50b4(rgyud): mi 'tshal/bsnyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal te/bud med kyi ro blangs la lig bu mig de'i mo mtshan gyi steng du bzhag ste/mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i
50b5(rgyud): mdun du mchod pa bgyis te/lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la/lig bu mig de blangs te mig la skus na mi gda' bar 'gyur/lo bdun stong thub par 'gyuraro//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad
50b6(rgyud): la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/gdol pa'i khyim nas zhugs blangs la seng ldeng gi shing gis zhugs bus te dug dang khrag dang bsres pa'i yungs kar gyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis
50b7(rgyud): na gang gi ming nas smos te/sbyin sreg bgyis pa de dbang du 'gyuraro//mar gyi ngo zhig bcu gnyis la mi rus kyi thur mas blangs te lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la dgra'i khyim sgor btsugs nas
51a1(rgyud): /daklung gsus rnaMs 'thos par 'gyur//rdo rje sno ga rdzog //slo sa rnams lags /nga dung rtson la 'dun smras nga gyur/
51a2(rgyud): 'i sradapas lag pal bcing bar //swam+b+ha g+hu srung na pan nyi ga ci gcig zlas brjod dkyis pa 'o//de ban kyi tsha pon ma ma 'am ma'i rnam sa kyis kyi'o//
51a3(rgyud): gdon la gnod pa bgyid na chub kyis bgyi'o//khyim mam lha khang ngam/kun dga' ra bar mchis la gang du bzlas brjod bgyis pa de nas 'byung po gdon thams cad 'bros par 'gyuraro//
51a4(rgyud): gdon char bcad na khrag gis gzugs bris la rkang pa mnan te lan brgya rje brgyad bzlas brjod brdzis na/gdon gyi rigs phung bar 'gyur//rig pa sgrub na thog ma nyid las 'di kyis
51a5(rgyud): te/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sh+le shr-I tA ka'i shing gis zhugs bus la kur ba'i me tog brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na lha des rig pa'i lha bzung nas khrid de mchi'o//khrid de mchis nas
51a6(rgyud): dngos grub du 'gyur//tsaM ste leg 'dren rnams kyi rigs sgrub par 'tshal na/log 'dren rnams kyi log 'dren gyi rigs ni bzhi mchis te/so gcig pa'i rigs dang /kam byo dza'i
51a7(rgyud): rigs dang /rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs dang /phung byed kyi rigs so//so gcig de'i rigs la gtsug phud 'phyang la sogs pa log 'dren brgyad khri mchis te/de dag ni stong
51b1(rgyud): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bgegs bgyid//kam po rdza'i rigs la ni dbang phyug chen po'i g.yog 'khor ba lang rna ba la sogs pa la bgegs drug khri mchis te/dbang
51b2(rgyud): phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa la bgegs bgyid cing rig pa yang 'joms par bgyid do//rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs la ni 'jig rten skyong ba'i g.yog 'khor mya ngan med la sogs pa log
51b3(rgyud): 'dren drug khri mchis te/de dag kyang dbang phyug chen po dang phur bu gsum pa'i cho ga rgyas pa la bgegs bgyidado//phung byed kyi rigs la ni lag na rdo rje'i g.yog 'khor murda ta ka la sogs pa'i
51b4(rgyud): log 'dren bye ba phrag 'bum mchis te/de dag ni rig pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad bgegs bgyid cing /rig pa yang 'joms par bgyid do//'di ni log 'dren de dag gi sgrub pa lags te/
51b5(rgyud): so gcig pa'i rigs kyi sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bus la ba lang gi mkhris pas sbags pa'i
51b6(rgyud): yungs kar la lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na/kyi hud kyi hud ces 'chi ba'i sgra grag cing grub par 'gyur te/grub nas kyang sgrub pa la bgegs mi bgyid de/bde bar sgrub tu mchis//
51b7(rgyud): skam po dza'i rigs kyi sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo zhag lnga la nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te/lag na rdo rje dang /dbang phyug chen po la mchod pa bgyis nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arga'i shing
52a1(rgyud): gos zhugs dus la man sran kA'u dang mar bsres pa la lan bAN+Da stong rnon srog na lag na gzugs 'gul to/de nas grub par 'gyur//grub nas sa
52a2(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po'i tshi ga rgyas par daklags pa tsam gyis reg pa thams cad 'grub bo//rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs kyis sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsnang
52a3(rgyud): bgyis te/na gcig sa N+DI bar mchis la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis la log 'dren rnams la yang gtor ma bgyi'o//de'i mdun du bkang ta'i thugs bus la khrag dang bskus pa
52a4(rgyud): yungs kar gyis lan brgya stong sbyin skyeg bgyis nA da'i 'og tu grib ma gda' zhing grub par 'gyur//rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs grub na log 'dren rnams dbang du 'gyur//gang da
52a5(rgyud): gyang du dgos pa de thams cad brjod do//phung byed kyi rigs kyi sgrub pa ni zla ba phyed zasu'o skyo 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te/lag na
52a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la zhugs mar gnyis bus te/gcig ni lag na rdo rje long bu'o//gcig ni murda ta ka la 'bul//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis srung ba bgyi
52a7(rgyud): la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du seng ldeng gi shing gis zhugs bus te na le sham dkar po dag gi khrag bsres pas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na/lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yos par
52b1(rgyud): mthe bong las 'od zer byung ste/de nas grub par 'gyur//phung byed kyi rigs sgrub na rig pa'i cho ga thams cad bde bar sgrub tu mchis te/bgogs ma mchis pa'o//log 'dren de dag kyang
52b2(rgyud): phyag brnyan du 'gyu ro//log 'dren rnams kyang rig sngags 'chang la gsang sngags stsol te/des lo stong thub par 'gyur ro//zasu 'o thug 'tshal zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan 'bum
52b3(rgyud): zlas brjod bgyis na me kha la grub par 'gyur te/gdugs gcig bzhi ne kar sha pa na brgya stong stsol to//rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na dgra las rgyal lo//mar gyi ngo zhag gcig
52b4(rgyud): bsgreng ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du pad+ma brgya stong phul na/rig pa'i rgyal po dam pa stsol bar 'gyur ro//me kha la'i cho ga rdzogasaso///gdon dkar mo'i las rnams lags
52b5(rgyud): tI ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas maM glid pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis lag ni rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/pho nya mo bcu gnyis kyis bskor babri bar
52b6(rgyud): ste kha dog ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bgyi'o//pho nya mo thams cad kyang chun thams cad kyis brgyan pa bre bar bgyi'o//tha mar re'i rtse mo rnams bri bar bgyi'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis
52b7(rgyud): yar gyi ngo tshes gcig nas brtsams te zasu chu sgrog 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo nag brgyad la thug gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bskyeng ba bgyis
53a1(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la 'byung po'i gtor mu yang bzang du bgyi'o//de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du byang chub
53a2(rgyud): kyi shing gri zhug bus la pad+ma zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la spyugs pa brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o//de nas ca tse'i sgra chen po grag par 'gyur te/de la mi 'jigs par bgyi'o//de nas gdong
53a3(rgyud): dkar mo gzugs mi sdug par bsgyur nas mchi ste/de la yang mi 'jigs par bgyi'o//rdo rje gzhang ma'i bzlas brjod bgyis la de la 'di skad ces lag na rdo rje'i gnang chen ma bcom
53a4(rgyud): ldan 'das ma khyod legs par byon tam zhes brjod par bgyi'o//de de skad thos nas dga' bar 'gyur te/des 'di skad du ci bya ba zhes brjod pa dang /bcom ldan 'das ma lo lnga
53a5(rgyud): stong thub par 'tshalo zhes brjod par bgyi ste/de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas dga' ba'i yid kyis ral gri stsol te/de nas mi gdang bar 'gyuraro//ral gri de blangs nas sgra lcang
53a6(rgyud): lor 'khyil bar 'gyur/gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog can du gyur/rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro//ma bsgrubs par las rnams 'grub par 'gyuraro//
53a7(rgyud): dbab par bgyi na gdon gyis zin pa'i rkang pa la rkang pas mnan te dbab par bgyi'o//'byung po dang sha za rnams dbab na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bgyi'o//
53b1(rgyud): dug las gso na yal gas bgyi'o//gdon bza' bar bgyin lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i me tog dmar pos bgyi'o//gdon 'khungs par bgyi na yid kyis bzlas brjod
53b2(rgyud): bgyis pas bgyi'o//dbye bar bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyud nas brtsams te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du gdugs bdun dus gsum du ba ru ra'i shing gis zhugs brus la/sbrul khog
53b3(rgyud): rjes pa'i bsregs blugs gsum sbyin sreg bgyi'o//ldong bar bgyi na dbang phyug chen po'i gnas mchis la ne'u le'i lces lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming nas phyung nas long
53b4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//lug ni rdo rje'i mdun du shu dag brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bgyis na snga mkho bzhin du 'gyuraro//gdong dkar mo'i cho ga rdzogs///rdo rje ser mo'i las rnams
53b5(rgyud): lags te yar gyi ngo ches brgyad nas brtsams te/dur khrod du zla ba drug bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyal po nyid stsol to//zla ba gsum bzlas brjod bgyis na/nyi tshe ba'i longs spyod
53b6(rgyud): rnams stsol to//zla ba gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na di na ra khri nyis stong stsol to//zas su ni spangs mo'i zas rnams bza' bar bgyi'o//dgra bskrad par 'tshal na byA nag kri'i 'dab
53b7(rgyud): ma blangs te/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la dgra'i khyim du bzhag ni dgra 'phral du bros so//gzhan nad kyis 'debs par 'tshal na mar gyi ngo dag brgyad
54a1(rgyud): la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du shing bcu'i rtse bos rdo rje la bdug par dargya zhing /rig pa yang lan+da brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na gang yid la bsams pa de nad kyis
54a2(rgyud): thebs par 'gyuro//lakun rdo rje'i mdun du ci ngag gis bdug cing rig pa yid lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na gsos pa bgyis par 'gyuraro//'byung po dang sha na rnams sa
54a3(rgyud): par bgyi na yid kyis bgyi'o//dbab pa'i me long gis bgyis te/me'i sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thal bas dag par phyis la khye'u dag bstan na bden pa brjod//gdon bskrad na yungs kar
54a4(rgyud): gtun du brdungs na ngu zhing gtong bar 'gyur ro//dur khrod kyi sol bas sa la gzugs bris la de'i lag pa 'amo mgul bar lag na rdo rje bris te mnan na gtong bar 'gyur ro//mar gyi ngo
54a5(rgyud): zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du yungs kar za ma tog tu stsal la bzlas brjod bgyis na des reg pa tsam gyis gdon du zhing gtong bar 'gyuraro//
54a6(rgyud): dgra bsad par 'tshal na dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs la gzugs bris te snying khar mnan la bzlas brjod bgyis na 'bral du dgra ma lags par 'gyuraro//chos grangs dang skur ma mi
54a7(rgyud): 'tshal bsnyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal te/dgra skam par bgyi na mar gyi do zhag brgyad la/shing med na las gzugs bgyis la seng ldeng gi phur bu snying khar btsugs te/rig pa gang
54b1(rgyud): lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis nA nang drag pos 'debs shing skam par yang 'gyuraro//phyung na sos par yang 'gyuraro//rdo rje ser mo'i cho ga rdzogaso///nug ser gyi las
54b2(rgyud): rnams lags te/yul gru srung mchab kyis bgyi'o//mtshams bcad na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i phur bus bgyi'o//sman srung na yid kyis bgyi'o//rkang gnyis
54b3(rgyud): pa dang rkang bzhi pa rnams dgar thal mos brdabs pas bgyi'o//rig sngags bcad na mtshon rnon pos sa la shub rer dras na rig sngags bcad par 'gyuraro//gdon dbab na yid kyis bgyi'o//
54b4(rgyud): gdon spon lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i me tog gis bgyi'o//yar gyi ngo tshas brgya de la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la rig pa lan
54b5(rgyud): brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur ro//grub nas la su gyur te/glang po che rengs par bgyi ba dang /rta rings par bgyi ba dang /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rengs par bgyi
54b6(rgyud): dang /gang yid la bsams pa de dag thams cad rengs par bgyid//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/nug mo'i mdun du arga'i shing gi zhugs bus la
54b7(rgyud): 'bras sa lu mar dang sres pas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na nag mo mchis par 'gyur te/de la pho nya mo'i gsang sngags kyis mchod yon phul na de khyod nyid la dam pa gang sbyin par
55a1(rgyud): d+ya zhes smra bar 'gyur//de la 'di skad du sa'i bdag por gyur pa stsol cig ces brjod par bAgyi'o//des 'di skad du yul gcig gi rgyal por gyur cig ces
55a2(rgyud): brjod na de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod par dgyi ste/slar btang ba'i gsang sngags kyis kyang slar btang zhing /me tog dkar pos kyang slar btang na de nas mi gda' bar 'gyu ro//
55a3(rgyud): lung thung gi shing drung na gtum mo kha sher phyogs bstan pa mchis pa de'i mdun du mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te du ba ma mchis pa'i bdag mar me'i snying
55a4(rgyud): brgya stong bor na di na ra steng stsol to//nag ser gyi tshig rdzog so///rdo rje bsted nge 'dzin pa'i las rnams legs te/mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba
55a5(rgyud): bgyis te/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du me tog dkar po brgya stong phul na mtshan mas btab pa stong stsol to//mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bskung ba bgyis te/lags
55a6(rgyud): na rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong nas bzung la gzugs 'gul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na yid kyis bsams pas rengs par bgyid de dud 'gro'i skye gan su mchi ba'i
55a7(rgyud): sems can de dag thams cad rengs par bgyid//yid kyis grol bar 'gyuraro//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyud ba bgyis te/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lag na
55b1(rgyud): rdo rje la mchod pa bgyis la shing sh+lo shwo ta ka'i phur bu blangs te/skud pa dmar pos dkris la de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ba la sha'i shing gos zhugs byas te/phur shul la dA
55b2(rgyud): zlos brjod 'gyis lnga de nas dum bu gsum du bcad de/dum bu rI ri la lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod bgyis la zhug su bor na nang par ti na ra sum stong stsal to//yar gyi dzaM tshas//
55b3(rgyud): brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/rgya mtshor 'beb pa'i chu klung du zhugs la pad+ma 'bum phul na rgyal po nyid stsol to//skyes pa dbang du bgyin mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la
55b4(rgyud): zhag gcig bskyang ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la ku mu da'i me tog zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar las skyugs pa brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na skyes
55b5(rgyud): pa dbang du 'gyur ro//bud med dbang du bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu gnyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dri mchog gi me tog brgya stong gis lag ni rdo rje la bsnun na bud med dbang du 'gyur//
55b6(rgyud): rdo rje bad+mod de 'dzin gyi chog rdzogs///rdo rje seng ge'i khri'i las rnams lags te/dbaban gdon gyis zin pa 'am ma zin pa yang ru /gri gul gyis debacog
55b7(rgyud): gladan bcings na yid kyis bgyi'o//gdon skrag par bgyin lan bdun bzlas brjod dkyis de'i thal mos brdab par bgyi'o//gdon 'bros par bgyi ni sel bas gzugs
56a1(rgyud): bris la lcug mas bsnun na gtong bar 'gyuraro//gdon skam na gu gul gyi bdug pas dgyi'o//gdon bza' bar bgyi na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i shas
56a2(rgyud): bgyi'o//gdon bcad na mtsho ni rnon pos rtswa ku sha bo cang na gdon bcad par 'gyuraro//dug skyon chab bam yal gas bgyi'o//byis pa gdon gyis zin pa rnams la yal gas byab par
56a3(rgyud): bgyi'o//chur mi 'bying bar bgyi na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nga'i yungs kar gyis bgyi'o//mtshon gyis mi tshugs par bgyi na yid kyis bgyi'o//mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la
56a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i mdun du tsan dan dmar pos gdong dmar bris te/de la gtor ma sna tshogs stsal cing grog mkhar gyi sa la mdung rtse gsum pa bgyis te lag pa g.yon na rdo rje thogs pa
56a5(rgyud): mdung rtse gsum pa'i steng du mchis te/lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na gteru mthong bar 'gyuraro//yar gyi ngo tshes lnga nas brtsams te rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la
56a6(rgyud): lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyure bar 'gyur/rig sngags lan dgu stong gi g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro//bskal par gnas par
56a7(rgyud): yang 'gyuraro//zla ba gcig zas su'o skye 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te/dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su mchis la glo g.yas logs su
56b1(rgyud): mchod pa bgyi swA tAM/phag rgod kyi mche ba lo gi wang gis bskus la ras dkar po'i stong du bzhag ste/rig pa bzlas brjod bgyis na/bgogs rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ste rig du 'i rgyal
56b2(rgyud): btsun par bgyi'o//de nas mche ba de 'bar bar 'gyur te/byar nas zung ba'aM phy-i //dz+dza su sa b+hag r+b+he mdudu hUM gsum par 'gyur te/rig sngags thams cad kyi tshul dus
56b3(rgyud): / na du g+sa ra 'gyur/'du myu / wA dz+nyA nA~M //de ldan ma'i la rnams pa nas te/
56b4(rgyud): khan gso sbyong gzung bsi mAM ged pa'i ras la sprin dang ra 'dris nga'i mtshon gyis 'jigs pa phyag na rdo rje mdage slo bsungs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o//de'i gams
56b5(rgyud): ro ng+tha rdo rje dang li ga bzed byung bri bar bgyi ste/ga ga yang gser gyi mngon nan rgyan thams cad kyis brten par bgyi'o//glu yon rol du rdo rje ldan ma rgyan byams myed kyis brgyan
56b6(rgyud): padz+ra'o//tha mar ri'i na mo rnams bri bar bachi'o//de nas rig sngags ching gi tshe sa gcig nas brtsams te zas su'o skyo 'tshal zhing zla ba nya'i bair du ba zlas brjod bgyi'o//danas
56b7(rgyud): zhag sum bsrung bar gyis te/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la bil ba'i shing gis zhugs bus la bi lo nga'i me tog ni dang sbrang rtsi dang ma la spyugs pa brgya snang sbyin
57a1(rgyud): phrag bzlas nu nas rdu d+hA'i 'bul nas grub par 'gyur te/nyin gcig bzhin do na ra wA lnga stsol to//de bzhin du dgod par bgyi'o//mAr gyung zhugs
57a2(rgyud): bzha la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du du ba ma mchis pa'i mdag ma a ka ru stong sbyin srog bAg+nis nA raM mo'i gzugs kyi me tog gi phreng ba 'gul
57a3(rgyud): nas grub par 'gyur te/grub nas yul gru stsol to//bud med dbang du bgyi na gdugs bdun dus gsum+bi du kau rA bi re'i shing gis zhugs bus la mar dang bsres pa'i yungs

57a5(rgyud): yugs sa mo dbang du 'gyuraro//skyes pa dbang du bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhig gcig bskyung ba bgyis te/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arga'i shing gi zhugs bus la
57a6(rgyud): ske tsha'i 'bru la lan brgyad sdong sbyin srog babyis na dbang du 'gyuraro//rdo rje ldan ma'i cho ga rdzogaso///rdo rje bzhad ma'i las rnams lags te/dbab na me tog
57a7(rgyud): dkar po dag gis bgyi'o//bcing na yid kyis bgyi'o//smrar stsal na len bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o//gang bgyid du sprul na gu gul gyis bdug
57b1(rgyud): bar bgyi'o//zas sprul na ka ra bi ra'i me tog la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyes par bgyi'o//brjod du sprul na lan bdun bzlas brjod pagyis pa'i yus kar gyis bsnun na 'das pa
57b2(rgyud): dang ma 'ongs pa brjod do//gdon dgong du sprul na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i me tog gtor to//bcing na chab kyis bgyi'o//brdeg na se gol gtogs pa bgyi'o//char bcang
57b3(rgyud): nAnaN+Da la lan bdun sngags kyis btab la mgo la bzhag na myos par 'gyur te gdon 'bros so//bcad na ba lang gi lci ba las gzugs bgyis la mtshon rnon pos bcad na bcad par 'gyur
57b4(rgyud): ro//gdon bsdigs pa dang rgyug tu gzhug na mdzub mos bsdigs par bgyi'o//gdon dkyil 'khor du gzhug na rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun na dkyil 'khor du gzhug/gdon 'bros
57b5(rgyud): par bgyen gdan gyi mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na gdon du zhing 'bros so//gdon spron yid kyis gar 'tshal ba der sbed do//dug dbab ni rtsi pog gis bdug pas
57b6(rgyud): bgyi'o//phur bu dbab na lung tang gi lo ma'i bdug pas bgyi'o//rims dbab nA ka ra bi ra'i me tog gi bdug pas bgyi'o//rims zhag bzhi pa dbab na mangs bgyi'o//srung ba
57b7(rgyud): bgyis na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i srad pus bgyi'o//chang ma rung bar bgyi na gseg ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis la khang steng su bor na chang ma rung por bgyis par 'gyuraro//
58a1(rgyud): gdon gyis btab par bgyi na yid kyis bgyi'o//skyes pa dang bud med dbang du bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te gdugs bdun dus gsum du phub ma las

58a3(rgyud): stong sbyin srog bgyis na dbye ba bgyis par 'gyuraro//ro langs sgrub par 'chal bas tshes grangs dang skar mi bdam mi 'tshal/bskung ba bgyi mi 'tshal bas bud med kyi ro langs la spos dang
58a4(rgyud): bdug pas mchod/mgo shar phyogasu bstan la/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rdo rje bzhad ma brjod par bgyis na bud med de dgod cing ldang bar 'gyur te de la nyal po bgyi'o//
58a5(rgyud): gal ta ma nus na rig sngags 'chang gis la gor du rig pa mchog dran par bgyi zhing snying po gnyis ka bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o//de nas bud med de
58a6(rgyud): dgod cing mchi ste de la brtsed par bgyi'o//de nas bud med de sbrum par gyur te/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rdo rje bzhad ma bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o//
58a7(rgyud): de nas de mi 'gul bar 'gyuraro//yang rig pa mchog gis yungs kar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o//de nas lto 'gas te bzhad ma bzlas brjod bgyis la mngal blang bar bgyi'o//mngal
58b1(rgyud): blongs nas kyang sangs kar gyis bskrun na dum thu ba rgyar 'gyur te blama'i nang du skal la ma thod gsum stong du mchis pa yongasu smon par 'gyur gyi bar du rdo rje band ma bzlas brjod bgyis la
58b2(rgyud): blabrangs te grogs rnams la stsal cing 'tshal na sgra lcang lo 'khyil par 'gyur/gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog tu 'gyur/lo bcu drug lon pa lta bur 'gyur/na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur/rig
58b3(rgyud): sngags 'chang thams cad bran du 'gyur/rdo rje'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/dpag tshad stong rgyan du 'phags par 'gyur/dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyis thos par 'gyur/lo brgyad khri
58b4(rgyud): thub par 'gyur/mtshon chas lus la mi tshugs par 'gyur/rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/bdag 'chi bar 'tshal bar 'gyur//lha'i sgrub pa ni zla ba gcig zas su chu grog 'tshal zhing de/
58b5(rgyud): 'og tu mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas zhag gsum bsnang ba bgyis te lage na rdo rje mching cing lha thams cad kyang mchod par bgyi'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ldong
58b6(rgyud): ros shing a shwad+tha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag ste dngos grub gsum 'byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//'bar bar gyur na na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyuraro//du ba 'thul na mi gda'
58b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur/lo lnga stong thub pa'i rig sngags 'chang nyid du 'gyur/lo lnga stong thub po'i rkang gis 'gro bar 'gyuraro//sa phyogs gang na gnod sbyin ma mchis pa der mar gyi ngo zhag
59a1(rgyud): brgyad nas zhag gdum bsnyung ba bgyis te/gnas dngon par mchis la dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bus la song ldeng gi yam srog shing khrag dang dug la blugs
59a2(rgyud): pa lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na gnod sbyin mi de mchi bar 'gyur te/mchis nas 'di skad du ci bya zhes mchi ba dang /des 'di skad du gang bsams pa de gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o//
59a3(rgyud): gal te btu ba na 'di skad du dpag tshad brgya nas bud med nga'i gan du khrid shog/grogs po brgyad cu la zan byin cig/nyin gcig bzhin ras zung brgyad dang /kAr sha ba na brgyad
59a4(rgyud): brgyad phul cig ces brjod dang de ltar bgyi'o zhes mchi bar 'gyur te/de'i 'og tu bud med khrid de mchi'o//yid kyis slar btang bar bgyi'o//rdo rje bzhad ma'i cho ga rdzog so//
59a5(rgyud): pho nya mo thams cad kyi las ni 'di lags te/rig pa mchog gi pho nya mo ni las thams cad du yang sbyar bar bgyi'o//las thams cad du yang rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig sbyar
59a6(rgyud): bar bgyi ste/sgrub pa ma lags pa'i rig pa yang sgrub par bgyid//srin bu ka ta'i dug gis gnod par gyur pa rnams la ni yi ge bri ba'i gzhi dang sdug ca dang smyug gu yang sngags lan bdun
59a7(rgyud): bdun gyis bsngags la gang 'dod pa bris te bskur na sos par 'gyuraro//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang
59b1(rgyud): gis rig pa thams cad dngango sa grub du 'gyur ba snol ba'i rlig pa'i lha thams cad kyi gsang ba brjod par bgyi'o//gal te rig sngags 'chang rig pa sgrub par 'tshal na rig pa'i lha de la 'dis//
59b2(rgyud): mgu bar bgyi'o//mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag cig bsrung ba bgyis te/rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi phogs gnyi ga'i sa blangs la lha'i gzugs bgyis te sbyin dang ma 'dres
59b3(rgyud): pa'i tshon gyis lha'i kha dog ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar bri bar bgyi'o//mar sbrang rtsis lho dgang bar bgyi'o//me tog pad+ma'i dbus su lha de bzhag par bgyi'o//pad+ma'i za ba ni a ga ru dang
59b4(rgyud): tsan dan gyi bslu bar bgyi'o//dus gsum du bdug pas kyang 'dug par bgyi ste/gu gul dang /du ru ka dang /gI phur dang /shing sha mi'i me tog dang /de rnams bsres pa'i
59b5(rgyud): bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o//gdugs gsum gyi bar du dgyi'o//de nas gzugs de 'o ma'i nang du stsal te zhig par ma gyur gyi bar du bzhag la zhig nas 'o ma rgya mtshor 'bab
59b6(rgyud): papa'i chab kyi nang du sgrol to//de nas sbyor ba 'dis lha de mgu bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba mthong ste myur du ngongos grub kyang stsol te/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rig pa'i rigs thams cad
59b7(rgyud): kyang gsang ba lags te/'dis lha thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'di ni bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du brjod do//bcom ldan
60a1(rgyud): 'das rig pa'i rgyal po bdag gis bshad pa 'du na rig sngags thams cad kyi rgyal po ste/rig pa thams cad sgrung du stsal ba/mchud pa ma mchis pa/mi mnyam
60a2(rgyud): pa dang mnyam pa/zla ma mchis pa logaso//'di ni bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du bshad//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad kyis thams cad dang
60a3(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa/grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs chen po lag na rdo rje mthong ngam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong
60a4(rgyud): lagaso//bde bar gshegs pa mthong lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la gang gis 'di ltar
60a5(rgyud): yid kyi phyag 'tshal na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag dgu la phyag byas par 'gyur ro//de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis
60a6(rgyud): la gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' khyod de bzhin gshegs pas bstod cing bkur te bsngags pa leg so legaso//brtson 'grus dang
60a7(rgyud): brtul ba chen po dang ldan pa legaso zhes bya ba smras so//de nas gzhon nu rdo rje sdes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs dang lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te/byang chub sems
60b1(rgyud): dpya' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smra so//yab bdag kyang rig pa mchog la dga' bas gang gis rig pa mchog sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang de la gnod sbyin thams cad dang /
60b2(rgyud): log 'dren thams cad dang /rig sngags 'chung thams cad dang /grub pa thams cad dang /klu thams cad dang /yoM dwags thams cad dang /bral bum thams cad bgegs brjid
60b3(rgyud): par mi 'gyur bar sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du gsang sngags stsal par bgyi'o//de nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes gzhan nu rdo rje sde la 'di skad ces smraso//
60b4(rgyud): bzhin bzang khyod sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa leg so//bzhin bzang khyod rig pa mchog gi don phyir gsang sngags spros shig de nas pas gnang bas gzhan nu
60b5(rgyud): rdo rje sde dga' mgu yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas log 'dren nges par gzhog pa'i gsang sngag sa smras pa/na mo bud+d+hA ya/na mo d+harmA ya
60b6(rgyud): na moHsa~M g+hA ya/na mash+tsad+hA badz+ra bA d+hA ye/me hA yak+Sha sa nA pa ta ye/na mo badz+ra se nA ya/ku ma ra rU pa d+hA ra Ni/a pA ti tA tA ya/ma hA be la pA rI kra mA ya/tsa l-i tsa la/ku la~M ku la/
60b7(rgyud): mtham tha/nA sha ya sa dze baN+Din/bi nA ya kan ban+d+ha ban+d+he/troT ya dz+wa Ta ra/ma rim ri/bits+tsha da~M r+the/yem mduSh+Ta/ts+tshin+da s+thA mya gan+ta dzam+b+ha mo he ya ni/sum+b+ha ya s+thAm+b+ha ya s+t+rait+ma/
61a1(rgyud): pa'i dus na grogs mkhar gyi sA las rdo rje bgyis te srung ba dgyi'o//srung ba'i dus na to la nag pos skyon srog brgya stong bgyis na bgogs thams cad bcom par
61a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro//sgrub pa'i dus na len bdun bzlas brjod dgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis mtshams bcad do//rkang rjes kyi sa 'am thal ba la lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis te/srung ba bgyi'o//
61a3(rgyud): sgrub pa'i dus na 'jim pa las rdo rje'i gzugs bgyis te/spos dang me tog dang bdug pas mchod la rig pa lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na sgrub pa'i byin gyis rlob par bgyid cing
61a4(rgyud): dngos grub du 'gyuraro//lha rnams dbab na gu phul gyi bdug pas bgyi'o//klu dkrug par bgyi na/rdo rje'i phyag rgya bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod lan brgyad brgya bgyis
61a5(rgyud): te/gang na klu gnas pa'i mtsho der bo rA na klu thams cad skrag par 'gyuraro//dri za rnams g.yos par bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/lhag na rdo
61a6(rgyud): rje'i mdun du dur khrod kyi sol bas dri za'i gzugs bris la/de'i lte bar sprin lag bzhag ste/rig pa lan brgya stong brjod na snying po brjod pas mchi bar 'gyur te/mchis nas
61a7(rgyud): bar snang las sman 'dor te/de 'tshal na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur/dri za thams cad kyang srung bar 'gyuraro//gnod sbyin rnams brlag par bgyi na phyogs gang na gnod sbyin
61b1(rgyud): nam gnod sbyin mo gnas pa'i phyogs der mchis la lcags phur sor bzhi pa blangs te/lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te btsugs na gnod sbyin 'gros par 'gyur//tso ste sgrub
61b2(rgyud): par 'tshal no ri mo mkhan gso sbyong gzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs gser gyi mdog can bri bar bgyi'o//de'i g.yon rol du lag na rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs rgyan
61b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi brgyun pa bri'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas rol du rdo rje sde gzhon nu'i gzugs 'dzin pa gser gyi mdog can lag pa g.yon pa na pad+me g.yas pas dam pa sbyin
61b4(rgyud): par bri'o//de'i 'og rol du sgrub pa po lag na pog phor thogs pa bri'o//de nas rig sngags 'chung gis zla ba phyed za su 'o skyo 'thung zhing rig pa bzlas brjod bgyi'o//de nas mar gyi de
61b5(rgyud): zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bskung ba bgyis te rgya cher mchod la gtor ma yang rgya cher bgyi'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sna ma'i me tog brgya stong gis de bzhin gshegs
61b6(rgyud): pa la phog par bgyi'o//dngos grub kyi mtshan mar ni mar me'i me lce gyen du mchi la spu zing zhes bgyid na dngos grub tu 'gyu ro//yid kyis gang bsams pa de stsol te reg sngags 'chang
61b7(rgyud): nyid dang 'dod pa dang ldan pa ni ma gtog so//las thams cad du yang sbyar bar bgyi ste/yid kyi las bgyi'o//rdo rje sde'i cho ga rdzog so///de nas mu ru de kas lag na
62a1(rgyud): rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras//yab bdag ni khyod kyi rig sngags kyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad la bgegs bgyid pa lags mod kyi glang dag rig pa mchog sgrub pa d+mo dag la/
62a2(rgyud): bdag slar bcing ba stsal bar bgyi'o//bdag bcings na reg sngags 'chang de la su yang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyuraro//bzhin bzang de de bzhin te bdag cag bcing ba smros shig/
62a3(rgyud): smros shig/de nas murta Ta ka sA lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/bdag bcing ba'i gsang sngags smras pa/na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/na ma shAN+Da badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/tad+ya thA/
62a4(rgyud): rje ru ru kha ri bi kha r-i/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/tsa la ya tsa la ya/badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/a kro d+ha b+ha sha d+haM/sma ra sma ra/dan+d+he ban+d+ha swA hA/lag na rdo rje dang murta Ta ka'i mdun du me tog dmar po dang
62a5(rgyud): bdug pas mchod la/de nas sgrub pa'i dus na srad pu dkar po la mdud pa gsum dor ro//su zhig rtag tu 'chang ba de la thams cad dngos grub du 'gyuraro//sgrub pa thams cad dang
62a6(rgyud): las thams cad du yang spra tshil las murta Ta ka'i gzugs bgyis te/lag pa g.yon na mdung rtse gsum pa thogs par bgyi'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tsan dan dmar
62a7(rgyud): po'i mdung rtse gsum pas snying khar btsugs pa de'i 'og tu rde'u nag pos bkang ste/dngos grub stsal gyi bar du bzhag par bgyi'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mdung rtse
62b1(rgyud): gsum pa phyung la 'oms bkrus te/rig pa yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la thams cad 'byi'o//gal te las de ltar ma bgyis na dngos grub tu mi 'gyur//mur+ha Ta ka
62b2(rgyud): sgrub pa lags te/ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs gser gyi kha dog can bri bar bgyi'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon rol du lag na rdo rje
62b3(rgyud): mdog sto bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas rol du ni 'phags pa kun dga' bo gser gyi mdog can lag na rnga yangab thogs pa bri'o//lag na
62b4(rgyud): rdorje'i 'og logs su mu Ta ka mdog dmar lA mig gsum pa 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa gad mo rta gang 'byin cing /lag pa g.yas pA kha 'gram du bzhag pa bri'o//de nas rig
62b5(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la de'i mdun du aM kar sha'i shing gis zhugs bus
62b6(rgyud): ti yungs kar dang /til nag mo dang /'bras yos dang /'di rnams mar dang bsres pa la lan brgya stong bgyis na ri mo'i gzugs kyi me tog gi phreng ba 'gul bar 'gyur te dngos grub
62b7(rgyud): tu 'gyu ro//dngos grub tu gyur na rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub tu 'gyuraro//las gzhan dag kyang bgyis te/sbrul gyis zin pa dbang na sra rtsi dog gi bdug pas bgyi'o//
63a1(rgyud): gdon bskrad na rkang rjes kyis lag mthil du mdung rtse gsum pa bris la bstan na gdon du zhing 'bros so//skyes pa dang bud med dbang du bgyi na mur+ha Ta ka la phyag brgya
63a2(rgyud): la gdugs gang yang rung ste sh+le shwes ta ka'i shing gis zhugs bus la/ba ru ra'i me tog brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyuraro//mo mtshan bcing bar 'tshal na dur khrod kyi thal
63a3(rgyud): ba dur khrod kyi ras kyis bcings la rig pa yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na mo mtshan bcings par 'gyuraro//dgrol na dbye'o//byis pa gdon rkem byed kyis zin pa rnams ni
63a4(rgyud): chab la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod dgyis te bkrus na sos par 'gyuro//'byung po dang /'dre dang /klu rnams bskrad na thal brdabs pas bgyi'o//Ar+ya mUrta Ta ka'i cho ga
63a5(rgyud): rdzog so///de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/dpus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom
63a6(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang lag na rdo rje la gsang sngags stsal bar bgyi'o//lag na rdo rje 'di ni khro bo'i gos dkar mo'i snying po
63a7(rgyud): bton pa tsam gyis 'grub pa ste 'di kho bos brjod par bgyi'o//'di gton pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad rengs par 'gyuraro//na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/b+ha ga ba te/oM b+ha
63b1(rgyud): yanA sha nI tAs ni/trA sa ya/b+h+r-i ku To ta ti bi ta ti swAhA/rig pa 'di bton pa tsam gyis bgogs thams cad bcom par 'gyur//bdag srung na thal ba la lan bdun bzlas brjed bgyis
63b2(rgyud): pas brtse'o//gzhan srung na spyi bo lan gsu ma 'i rjes brjod pa byis te/sku mdud par bgyi'o//sems can thams cad dngas par bgyin yid kyim 'gyi'o//dbang du ba gyin yar bye r+pa
63b3(rgyud): nyal zhag gcig bskyang ba bag+h+nAMs la 'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du byang chub kyi shing gi zhugs bus la til gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis ni dbang du 'gyur//ma
63b4(rgyud): rung bar bgyi 'tshal ni mi rus kyi phur bu blangs la lin brgya stong sngags kyis btab ste/dgra'i khyim du btsugs na dgra ma rung bar 'gyuraro//dgra 'gum na mar gyi ngo nag brgyad la du
63b5(rgyud): khyod kyi thal ba blangs te dur khrod kyi zhugs su lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na 'gum//bskum na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la chab lte ba nub tsam du zhugs la dgra'i sgrog bskams
63b6(rgyud): kyi bar du bzlas brjod bkye'o//mtshams bcad pa 'tshal na seng ldeng gi phur ba sor ba ni pablangs te phur bu re re la yang lan brgya \u0f7f brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la phyogs bzhir
63b7(rgyud): btsugs na mtshams bcad par 'gyuraro//yul 'khor bcing na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o//sems can rnams bskrad na lan bdun 'bras
64a1(rgyud): /brjod bgyis pa'i lhungs kar gyis bgyi'o//yog bu mig dang ldong rob sgrub na zla ba gcig zas su'ob+h+yo 'tshal zhing yang gyi rgyas brgyad na su nag gsum
64a2(rgyud): bsnyung ba bgyis te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du lig bu mig dang ldong ros bzhag pa dngos
64a3(rgyud): grub gsum byung gis bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//'bar na ni lo stong thub par 'gyur//rig sngags 'chang sbra lcang lo 'khyil pa can du 'gyuraro//du ba 'thul ne ni mi gda' bar
64a4(rgyud): 'gyur//lo dgu stong thub par 'gyuro//yul 'khor ma rung bar bgyid par 'tshal byas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bus la yungs kar dang /drug dang /
64a5(rgyud): khrag dang bsres la lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na yul 'khor ma rungs par 'gyur ro//mar gyis la nu brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na zhi bar 'gyuraro//dgra 'gum na ces grangs dang
64a6(rgyud): skar ma pad ma mi 'tshal te lung thang gi shing gis zhugs bus la shing arga'i lo ma brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na zhag gsum na 'gu mo//shags 'gyed na rig pa bzlas brjod bgyis
64a7(rgyud): la gdong byugs na rgyal bar 'gyuraro//khros pa'i mdun du bzlas brjod bgyis na dga' bar 'gyuraro//yugs sa mo dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal bas yar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la 'phags pa
64b1(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dkar po brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyid na dbang du 'gyur ro//dgra tshar bcad na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du du bya ma
64b2(rgyud): mchis pa'i 'dam mar rgya skyegs kyis lan brgya stong sbyin srog bgyi'o//bzlas brjod bgyis na gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyuraro//mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bcing ba
64b3(rgyud): yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o//chu srin kum bi ra'i kha bcing na gseg ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te chab tu bor na kha bcing bar 'gyur ro//seng ge dang /
64b4(rgyud): stag dang /ma he dang /glang po tshwa dang /rgyal po dang /chom rkun gyi nang du chud na bsam par bya'o//ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma gong ba'i ras la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya
64b5(rgyud): ste/g.yon rol du ni lag na rdo rje/g.yas rol du ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugo/de bzhin gshegs pa ni gser gyi mdog can du bri'o//lag na rdo rje ni lo bcu drug tsam
64b6(rgyud): lon pa'i gzugs 'dra la kha dog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bri'o//'phags pa sman ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi g.yas rol du ni lha mo bri/de yang 'dam bu 'da'
64b7(rgyud): rgyu ltar dkar ba'o//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyang de dang 'dra'o//lha mo ni pad+ma'i phreng bas rgyan par bri'o//de'i 'og rol du sgrub pa po bog phar thogs par bri'o//sgrub pa
65a1(rgyud): bau rna ba ga \u0f7fgA sho bar du zasu'o skyo 'tshal zhing yur gyi ngo chos brgyad la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis te/lha mo la 'od zer byung gi bar du bzas brjod bgyi'o//
65a2(rgyud): 'od zer de de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyuraro//de nas dngos grub du 'gyur te rgyal po nyid stsol to//yid kyi gang bsems pa de dag thams cad 'byor to//
65a3(rgyud): yar gyi do zla ba nya nas zhag gsum bsrung ba bgyis te rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la pad+ma 'bum bor na lha mo nyid mthong ngo //dum pa gang blangs pa de rnyed de rgyal po na
65a4(rgyud): dam/rig sngags 'chang nyid du 'gyur ro//tha mar zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyi'o//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi cho ga rdzog so///de na
65a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lag na rdo rje ngas kyang gang gis rdo rje'i rigs dang /cho ga rgyas pa chen po gzhan dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur
65a6(rgyud): ba'i gseng sngags cho ga rgyas pa 'dir sbyin par bgyi'o//de lta bas na cho ga rgya smra ba thams cad du 'di gcig pu sbyar bar dgyi'o//lag na rdo rje 'di dran pa tsam gyis
65a7(rgyud): rig pa'i lha thams cad mngon du 'gyur//na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/b+ha ga bad+d+haHoM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa lo tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi lo tsa na~M sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swAhA/lag na rdo rje spyan 'di na
65b1(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag bcus dgongs te/ngas kyang da ltar sems can rnams kyi don dang khro ba rnams dga' bar bya ba dang gdul
65b2(rgyud): dka' ba rnams 'dul ba'i phyir bshad do//ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pas ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i chen gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gser gyi mdog can
65b3(rgyud): chos ston pa bri bar bya'o//de'i g.yas rol du 'phags pa lag na rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa chos nyan par bri'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon rol du
65b4(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'dam bu 'da' rgyu ltar dkar ba skra'i thor tshugs dang /cod pan can stag lpags kyi sham thabs gyon pa laglan rnga yab thogs pa bri bar
65b5(rgyud): bya'o//de nas zla ba phyed zas su'i skye 'thung zhing rig pa bzlas brjod bya'o//nges mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig babyung ba bgyis te/ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pargya
65b6(rgyud): tshur byas la rig pra lanA brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i glo g.yas nas 'od zer byung ste lag na rdo rje la nub na grub par 'gyuraro//rgyal po nyid dam rig sngags 'chang
65b7(rgyud): nyid de dam pa gnyis sbyin par byed do//rgyal po nyid du gyur na rag sngags 'chang rnams kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro//rig sngags 'chang nyid du gyur na ni rig sngags 'chang drag

66a2(rgyud): pAr 'asgyur//slongs ma'i byas bza' nang de'i rdza m-ir ring bskyil dang bamang po'i mtshad rten gyi hU~M mi tog dkar po ni dang /nga ci dang /tshar las brgyugs pa 'dum sbyin 'a

66a4(rgyud): na des de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag bcul bsti snang byas pa dang /bla mar byas pa dang /rim gro byas pa dang /mchod pa rgyas par gyur//gang gi tshe shi ba de'i che bde bcan du sgru bar
66a5(rgyud): ra// gyi ga btsud la sbyin dag gdug d+hA ban+d+has/com ldan sa man ba sa mnan na kyor bas la blugs te/rig pa lan la/mau skyes

66a7(rgyud): ljong ros la lan brgyad brgya zlas brjid byas nas mig la bsdus na gang mthong ba dbang du 'chuH/rka rjes gyis blangs la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/bud me geng gi tshe
66b1(rgyud): bor gtor na de dbang du 'gyur ro//bdug gi mchil ma lan bdun bsngags te thig le byas na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro//gang gi ming nas brjod de yungs ka ra la lan brgyad brgya sbyin
66b2(rgyud): sreg byas pa de dbang du 'gyuraro//bud med dbang du byun te la nag po las lan brgyad brgya sbyin bsreg bya zhing ming nas kyang brjod na de dbang du 'gyuraro//kr-iSh+Na tsa tu ra da sh+ye na shwe ta/puSh+Ta na ma aSh+Ta
66b3(rgyud): sa ha sre Na/badz+ra pA Ni ra ha na ta pa pya/ra dza pa da ni ya sho ba ti/ldong ros kyis lag mthil du gzugs bris la ming nas brjod cing nyi ma la bltas te lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na dbang
66b4(rgyud): du 'gyuraro//dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs te rtsig ngos la gzugs bris la mo mtshan gyi steng du mdzub mo bzhag ste lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na dbang du 'gyuraro//spre tshil la gzugs
66b5(rgyud): byas te ldan pa g.yas par bzhag la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na dbang du 'gyur ro//gi wang dang /shu dag dang /dung gi lte ba dang /rgya spos rnams bsres te btags la rig pa lan
66b6(rgyud): brgya stong dezlas brjod byas te zas dang skom dang /bza' ba'i nang du btab na dbang du 'gyu ro//dur khrod kyi thal ba blangs la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te glang la

67a1(rgyud): te gA brgya rtsa brgyad mo mtshan du phog par byas na dbang du 'gyuraro//ba lang gi lcibs lam lhung ba blangs te zhi ba'i mtshan gcig byas la de'i mdun du rtsa ku sha las/
67a2(rgyud): mdung rtse gsum byas pas nyi ma gsum du yungs kar dang /zho dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i bsregs blugs lan bdun bdun sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyu ro//lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ldum
67a3(rgyud): bu be sha ka'i ya ma sreg shing brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyuraro//gzhon nu ma dbang du byin a rang ga ni me tog brgya stong gis lag na rdo rje la phog par byas na gzhon nu ma
67a4(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro//yugs sa mo dbang du byan lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mon sran gre'u sbyin bsreg bya zhing ming nas kyang brjod na dbang du 'gyu ro//thal ba la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/
67a5(rgyud): bud med la gtor na dbang du 'gyur ro//bud med kyi mdun du rig pa lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na dbang du 'gyur ro//shring bu sor bzhi pa blangs te g.yabs na 'ong zhing dbang du 'gyur

67a7(rgyud): gtsang mas dkal ba'i skud pa brkyang nas blangs te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du nyis khugs dang bzhi khugs byas pa bzhag la bzlas brjod byas te gcig la gcig 'khril na dgongs pa

67b2(rgyud): tha pad+ma'i steng du bzhag ste/'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o//'bar nas blang bar bya'o blangs pa tsam gyis nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog dang ldan par 'gyuraro//dgos pa thams cad yid kyi bsams

68a1(rgyud): grub pa thams cad kyis mthong bar 'gyuraro//yid kyis bsams pas kha zas 'byung bar 'gyur/lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur//de nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo
68a2(rgyud): rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du gsang sngags 'di lta bu gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar to zhes nas

68a4(rgyud): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das

69b1(rgyud): sum steng thub par 'gyur ba dang /gang gtam byas pa de dbang du 'gyur zhing dbang phyug chen po'i g.yog rnams kyis nyan gcig bzhin ta na ra bcu gnyis dang gos phrugs bcu gnyis sbyin par

71b3(rgyud): do zhag bcu bzhi la ni a 'dra'i shing gi phur bu sor brgyad pa blangs te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas nas zhing la btab na me tog med par 'gyuraro//chang ma rung
