72a1(rgyud): kyi khung bur btsugs na de ma thag tu dgra 'bros par 'gyur//rig pa mchog sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga rgyas pa la 'byung ba'i lha rnams la mchod pa
72a2(rgyud): byas la btsugs nas byung na yang rtag tu bcing bar bya'o//de bcings na cho ga rgyas par 'grub par 'gyur te/rig sngags dngos grub las su yang glags tshal bar mi 'gyuraro//
72a3(rgyud): gang la rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad rdzogs pa yod pa de thams cad la ni lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur te rig sngags kyang sbyin par byed do//de ma yin na
72a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i bya ba sgrub pa rnams glags tshol ba'i phyir 'khod do//cho ga rgyas pa sgrub pas cho ga rgyas pa las bshad pa bzhin du 'gal ba rnams bsrung bar bya ste nya dang /sha
72a5(rgyud): spang bar bya'o//rtag tu sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dpa' bar bya'o//gang dag nga'i rdo rje'i rigs la mchod pa byed cing dang bar byed pa dang /rig pa'i mchog
72a6(rgyud): 'don cing mchod pa de dag ni nga'i dam tshig shes pa yin no//de dag ni nga la shos cher dang ste de dag la nga zhi bar sems so//lha thams cad kyang zhi bar sems par
72a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro//gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul las phyi rol du gyur cing 'dod do cog za ba dang /dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang /bram zer mi 'dzin par cho ga rgyas
72b1(rgyud): tu rgyun du su rmu na na su rnams na sun du rgyu
73a1(rgyud): thab sbyor gyis bcom ldan 'das dang lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la gtugs nas gsang sngags bshad pa/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ma hA yak+Sha se nA/
73a2(rgyud): pa ta ye/na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/pra dzA li tA dip+ta doSh+To ta ka Ta b+hA yA b+hai ra bA ya/a si mu sa la/badz+ra ba ra shu pA shA hastA ya/tad+ya thA/oM hu lu hu lu/a mr-i ta kuN+DA li/kha kha kha kha khA nA khA nA
73a3(rgyud): khA nA khAnA/khA ra khA daM khA da khA da/khA he khI hi khyA hi khA hi triSh+Thi tiSh+Tha/ha na ha na/dA ha dA ha/pa tsa pa tsaM/gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/gardza gardza/tar+tha tardza/bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/b+haM ga bA~M/
73a4(rgyud): a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/mUrta na tA Da ya badz+re Na sarba big+h+nAM bi nA ya kaM ni bA ra ya ma hA ga Na pa ti[:]dzI bi tAM ta ka rA ya/hUM hUM phaT phaT/oM kro d+ha ga Na ye swA hA/bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags
73a5(rgyud): dang po'o//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na ma sh+tsar+N+Na badz+ra prA Na ye/ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/na mo ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha yaM/daMSh+To te ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/a si mu sa la pa ra shu bAM sha na ha s+thA ya/he he/
73a6(rgyud): pata pa ta/d+ha ba d+hA bi/kha khaM/khA hi khA hI/a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ha na ha na/gardza gardza/ga Na be ti/dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA yA swA hA/gsang sngags gnyis pa'o//
73a7(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra ya ya/na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta yo/na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/bi ma la ka na ka dz+ra pu sha na ya ga ga na/a mr-i ti sa~M b+ha bA ya/garta ma l+ya a nu le/
73b1(rgyud): pa nu prI yA ya/badz+ra pa Ni b+hI pA ya badz+nyA ba Ni tul+yA/b+hu ga ya da bAnA gA yak+Sha rAk+Sha s+ya p+pa marda nA ya/tro lokya/ga tsi rA ya/sha ta s+ya n+ya bi tra ka ra ya tA~M panan/gaN+Dot+ta mA ya a mr-i ta kur+N+Na ma/
73b2(rgyud): d+hihi daMSh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra ba b+hi bi tud dz+wa la s+phu la~M ka shrIn du le ru dze ti ta~M sa~M prad+d+hi/oM kha khaM khA ga/gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ban+d+ha ban+taM/ha na ha na/gardza gAr+b+ha/bai s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/d+ha ka d+hi ka~M/dz+wA lats+tsha
73b3(rgyud): la/pra dz+wA la pra dzA la/gra sa gra sa/sarba big+h+nAM bi nA ya kA nAn hr-i da ya~M spa ta gAn d+harba hr-i da yaM paM ta/rAk+Sha sau hr-i da ya s+thA ta sarba dz+wa ro hr-i da ya s+pha te/sarba tur+the ka hr-i da ya s+pha ta/sarba nA
73b4(rgyud): gA nA~M hr-i da ya~M sU ta/huM hUM s+tha ta/da ha da ha/pa tsa'i pa tsi/I bi sha a bi sha/i daM tsa~M me kAr+yaM ku ru badz+ra d+ha ri Ad+b+ha pa ya ti swA hA/gsang sngags gsum pa'o//na mo badz+ra kro d+hA yA/
73b5(rgyud): daMSh+TaM ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/tad+ya thA/hu lu hu lu/kha kha kha khi/khA hi khA hi/tISh+Tha tiSh+Tha/bin+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags bzhi pa'o//de nas 'di dag go steng
73b6(rgyud): pa don yod pa gang 'dod pa dang /bzlas brjod byas shing bsgrubasnyan bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad bton cing bzlas brjod bgyis pa dang /bsgrubs par gyur pa de bshad
73b7(rgyud): par 'tsha'o//de la 'di ni bdag gi snying po lagaso//oM i mr-i te hUM phaT/bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis gsang sngags rnams bshad ma thag tu
74a1(rgyud): sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//log 'dren rnams kyang skrag ste skyabs med cing rten med par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song ste/bcom
74a2(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol zhes de skad du smra zhing mgo bo thur du gtugaso//kyai kye log 'dren
74a3(rgyud): ma rungs pa rnams longs lo nga'i ngag nyon cig/rdo rje kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/kun tu rab tu 'bar bas khyed kyi spro bo bshags sa re/ngas ral pa ser po can rnams
74a4(rgyud): kyi gsang sngags kyis lha'i lo stong gi bar du log 'dren rnams bcom pa dang /'dubs pa dang /brdungs pa dang /gzir bo dang /bskams pa gang yin pa de dran par gyis
74a5(rgyud): shig/nga'i mthu dang /brtson 'grus dang /pha rol gnon pa chen po dran par gyis shig/gang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzin cing 'don pa dang /sgrub pa dang nges srung bar byed pa
74a6(rgyud): de la glags ma tshol cig/til sbrus pa 'am zas ngan pa za yang rung /sha za yang rung /grong gi chom rku ni spyod kyang rung ste/rig pa'i mchog la sogs pa rig pa thams
74a7(rgyud): cad sgrub pa la glags ma tshol cig/zan za ba'i tshe yang kham dang po la sngags kyis btab ste dbul bar bya'o//nyi ma shar ba'i tshe lan bdun brjod na de'i phyi bzhin du
74b1(rgyud): rtag tu 'brang //log 'dren rnams kyang glags mi tshol lo//nya dang /sha dang /til dang /sran chen dang /bon tshe yang rung /snum skur par+b+ba ta dang /la phug kyang rung ste thams cad
74b2(rgyud): zer zin kyang rig sngags 'dzin ni de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro//gang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa ni bza' ba ma yin pa ji zhing bya ba ma yin pa byed du zin kyang de la gang gis
74b3(rgyud): log 'dren rnams glegs tshol brtun de 'khod par mi 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags bde ba bstan par bya'o//rig sngags 'chang sgrub po na gang du log 'dren rnams kyis glags rnyed par
74b4(rgyud): mi 'gyur ba'i gnas kyang bstan par bya ste//nges par byas pa la ni glags tshel ba la brtun par mi 'gyur ro//nges par gnas pa la yang gnas nas gan su 'gro ba na gom pa re re
74b5(rgyud): la log 'dren rnams glags tshol ba'i phyir 'khod po yod do//log 'dren sa'i spyi phud ces bya ba gang dag sa brtol nas 'byung ba yang yod do//de la bgegs kyi mtshan ma
74b6(rgyud): yang bshad par bya ste/de dag ni gom pa re re 'dzin par byed do//de dag gis zin na bgeg su 'gyur te le lo skye bar 'gyur zhing brgyal ba dang /skyug pa dang /mgo 'khor bar
74b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro//log 'dre na de dag ni bsod nams kyang zad par byed de/log 'dren rnams kyis reg pa tsam gyis lha'i longs spyod steng gi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsags pa'i bsod
75a1(rgyud): nams kyi rdung po yang thal bAr rlog par byung cing rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pa'i bsod nams pad par byed de/de nas rog sngags rnams 'grub
75a2(rgyud): par mi 'gyur//de bas na rig sngags 'chang gis lus kyi lci yang las shes par bya ste/mer dang sri rtsi pog gis bdag nyid 'dug par bya'o//de nas log 'dren de dge
75a3(rgyud): gis gtong bar 'gyuraro//gang de'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa de la nI glags tshol bar brtun par mi 'gyur te/de bas na rig sngags 'chang gis rig pa'i mchog dran par byas na
75a4(rgyud): de mnyes par gyur pas 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis dngos grub myur du 'byin par byed de/log 'dren rnams kyi ma mthong bar grub par 'gyu ro//ldog 'dren sa'i spyi gud ces bya ba rnams
75a5(rgyud): kyi mtshan nyid rdzog so////log 'dren chu ltar g.yo ba zhes bya ba de dag ni mun gnas te rig sngags 'chang khrus byed pa na 'dzin par byed do//de dag gi mtshan ma
75a6(rgyud): 'byung ste sems 'khrug par byed de/'dod pa la wA re sems pa dang /zla bas gzir cing khwa zas la mngon par chags pa dang /'jigs pa'i sems skye bar 'gyu ro//de bas
75a7(rgyud): rna ga sngags rgya mi'i byor dran par bya sbyi dran papas rmyi lag 'dren rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rnyi rje rnams bskyed par TIm+b+ha/
75b1(rgyud): rig pa mchog dran par bya'o//de dran pa tsam gyis 'bras bu che bar 'gyur te rig sngags kyi lha de dag gis log 'dren rnams myos par mthong nas dga' ba'i sems kyi dngos grub
75b2(rgyud): myur du sbyin par byed//log 'dren chu ltar g.yo ba zhes bya ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs so////log 'dren rig sngags kyi lha'i mngag gzhug pa zhes bya ba rnams na
75b3(rgyud): mthu che bo ste/de dag ni rig sngags 'tshang rig sngags las ldang ba na 'dzin par byed do//zin par gyur na lus kyi tshul las rtogs par bya ste/lus tsha bar 'gyur/sdang
75b4(rgyud): bar gyur/sdig pa'i sems 'byung bar 'gyur//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis de dag phyir gzhil bar bya ste/gtsug phud la 'phyangs la bdug pa thams cad sbyin zhing /
75b5(rgyud): rig sngags len brgya stong bzlas brjod byas phyin chad log 'dren de dag glags tshol ba la brtun par mi 'gyur to/dga' bar gyur nas dngos grub kyang sbyin par byed//log
75b6(rgyud): 'dren 'di dag kyang rig sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi phyi bzhin 'brang zhing gnas pa yin no//rtag tu glags tshol ba yang yin te/su zhig sngags grub pa su zhig
75b7(rgyud): sngags 'don pa/su mchod pa byed pas de la bgegs kyang byed cing 'dun pa bzlog par byed/le lo yang 'jug par byed do//de bas na rig sngags 'chang gis nyi ma logasu
76a1(rgyud): kha bltas la rtag tu chu khyor grang gtor nas khro ba'i rig sngags kyang lan bdun brjod par bya ste/'di skad du bdag ming 'dri zhes bya ba'i rig sngags cho ga
76a2(rgyud): mo zhes bya ba sgrub kyis khyed yid dga' bar gyis shig ces kyang smros shig/dus thams cad du de skad smras nas des log 'dren rnams dga' zhing mgu la yid dga' bar gyur
76a3(rgyud): te/dngos grub sbyin par byed cing sems kyang dang bar 'gyuraro//grub pa'i tshe yang nang par nyi ma log su kha bltas la thal mo sbyar nas rig sngags brjod de/'di
76a4(rgyud): skad du bdag ming 'od zhes bgyi ba'i rig sngags che ge mo zhig grub kyis khyed yid dga' bar gyis shig ces kyang smros shig/de nas gtsug phud 'phyang la sogs pa log
76a5(rgyud): 'dren de dag de nyid du 'du bar 'gyur te/rig sngags 'chang gis khro bar byas la khyed ma 'gul cig ces smros shig/de nas log 'dren de dgra bcings shing gzir bar gyur te
76a6(rgyud): dngos grub myur du sbyin par byed do//log 'dren rnams dgrol ba ni yid kyis bya'o//log 'dren lha'i mngag gzhug ces bya ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid rdzogasaso////log
76a7(rgyud): 'dren 'jig rten mo tog ces bya ba rnams ni gang gis tshe rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub cing lha la me tog dbul ba na de'i tshe log 'dren de dag gis 'dzin par byed de/log 'dren de
76b1(rgyud): ngag nyid kyang me tog gi khongs su 'jug cing gnas//de bas na rig sngags 'chang gis thog ma nyid du me tog de dag rig sngags 'chang bzlas brjod byed bzhin du blang bar bya'o//blangs
76b2(rgyud): nas gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugs te/de nas lha la phul na lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyuraro//bdug pas ma bdugs par lha de dag la log 'dren rnams kyi gnod par 'gyur te
76b3(rgyud): 'grub par mi 'gyur//log 'dren 'jig rten me tog ces bya ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid rdzogaso///log 'dren zas su dri za ba zhes bya ba de dag ni rig sngags
76b4(rgyud): 'chang dri la reg pa na 'dzin par byed de/ci ste rig sngags 'chang gis dri dag lha la phul na lha de dag sems dang ba med cing rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur te/lag 'dren de rnams
76b5(rgyud): mthong bas 'phang bar 'gyur zhing /rig sngags 'chang la 'grub par mi 'gyur ro//de bas ni rig sngags 'chang gis thog ma nyid du khro bo'i bzlas brjod byed bzhin du dri blang bar
76b6(rgyud): bya'o//des na log 'drin de dag 'byor te rmas par yang 'gyuraro//de nas lha de dag dris tshim par byas pas dga' ba'i sems kyis dngos grub stsol to//log 'drin zasu dri
76b7(rgyud): za ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid rdzogaso///log 'dren nag po zhes bya ba rnams ni bdug pa nyid las 'byung ste//gang gi tshe rig sngags 'chang lha la bdug pa
77a1(rgyud): 'dus dran tshe 'dzin par byed do//log 'dunathos ston pa'i mnan sprin dran pa nyams pa dang /rig sngags gtong bar 'gyur to/bdug pa mang/
77a2(rgyud): lho 'phang bar 'gyur zhing dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur//de bas ni rnyog sngags 'chang gis thog ma nyid du lag pa g.yon pas mer blangs la kham por gyi nang nas bdug pa phrul
77a3(rgyud): nAd byin chad lagre 'dren rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur//bdug pa des kyang lha thams cad rnam par bya'o//lha des kyang dngos grub myur du sbyin par byed do//nag pa dang /
77a4(rgyud): dr-izla bo na mtshan nyid gcig go//nig pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid rdzogas+ho//srog 'dren gtsug du du gcig pa zhes bya ba rnams ni mthu che zhing brtson 'grus che ba ste/
77a5(rgyud): ga 'dren ngas kyang mar ma'i ma nyid las 'byung ste/da bas na rig sngags 'chang gis log ma nyid du 'di ltar bya ste/ras dkar ba las sbed po b+h+yas te mA mi ga
77a6(rgyud): sbar nas rig sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du kha thur du bstan te bzhag la rig sngags kyang lan brgyad brgya brjod na log 'dren thams cad kha thur du bltas te 'khod par
77a7(rgyud): 'gyuro//rig sngags kyang bde thug tu 'grub par 'gyur//sgrub pa thams cad la yang thog ma nyid du las de dag bya'o//lag 'dren gtsug pud gcig pa zhes bya ba rnams kyi
77b1(rgyud): mtshan nyid rdzogs///bcom ldan 'das gang du lag 'dun rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /gang du rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi dngos grub 'grub brur 'gyur ba'i lkog 'dren
77b2(rgyud): rnams kyi gnas bye dag gis byA sha lagaso//bcom ldan 'das lag 'dren thams tsang+ga b+h+rU~M swA bu mthar thug par bgyi b+ha'i las 'di yang ba shang par gyi'o//sgrub pa'i ra
77b3(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis rdo rje khro bo dkyil 'khor bskyang nul gyis byugs la/kar bi ra'i shing gis mas+pha r-i la/ra bai ra'i me tog bdag gi khrag gi nang du bstsags pa'i bsregs
77b4(rgyud): blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig gis sbyin bsreg bya ste/las be byas nas log 'dren thams cad bcing ngo zhes brjod na bcings par 'gyuraro//log 'dun thams cad kyi mthar thug
77b5(rgyud): bair gyis shig ces brjod na lag 'dren thams cad 'chi bar 'juro//bcings pa las bkrol na yang yid kyis bya'o//las gzhin dag kyang 'byung ste/bsrung bar byan lan bdun
77b6(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas pa'i chus mgo bor blugaso//mtshams bca na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod b+has pa?'i seng ldeng gi myur bus byur//gdon dpab na ha h+yaM zhes bya ba dang /su
77b7(rgyud): gul gyi bdug pas bya'o//dug las gso bar bya na se gal 'am ya logs bya'o//gdon 'bros par bya ne me tog dkar po la lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ba 'am gu gus
78a1(rgyud): kyis bdug pa/bya'o//dgra bskrad par 'dod pas ni mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad lta zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/rdo rje khra ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyang nul
78a2(rgyud): gyis byugs nas pri yang ku'i shing gi me sbar te phub ma'i sbyin sreg lan brgya stong byas na zhag bdun gyis 'bros par 'gyuraro//dgra bsad par 'dod na dur khrod du song la
78a3(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyang nul gyis byugs pa'i dbus su sa las gzugs byas pa de'i khar dur khrod kyi shing gis me sbar te/yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg lan brgya
78a4(rgyud): stong byas na de ma thag tu dgra 'chi bar 'gyuraro//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ka ra bi ka'i me tog dus gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad zhag bdun gyi bar du
78a5(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas na khrag 'dzag par 'gyur ro//'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa byas te ka ra bi ra'i me tog dkar po stong rtsa brgyad phul nA zhi bar 'gyuraro//de
78a6(rgyud): nos skyes pa dang bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na ma da na las gzugs byas te ma da ne'i tsher ma bdun gyis gnad rnams su btab la tsha ba gsum gyis snying khar bkang nas zangs
78a7(rgyud): kyi thur pas kyang rkang par btsugs la spyi bor phyung ste/zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod byed bzhin du seng ldeng gi me la sreg cing dus gcig kyang len brgya
78b1(rgyud): brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i mjug tu zhag gcig bskung ba byas la mchod pa rgya cher byas te lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na skyes pa dang /bud med dbang du 'gyur ro//mar gyi ngo zhag
78b2(rgyud): bzhi la zhig gcig bsnyung ba byas te/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bil ba'i shing gis me sbyar la/bi kang ka ta'i yam sreg shing yungs mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa brgya stong gis sbyin
78b3(rgyud): sreg byas na ti na ra re ri thob par 'gyuraro//yugs sa mo dbyang du bya bar 'dod na yar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te zhag gsum gyi bar du dus gsum du zar ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad
78b4(rgyud): kyis lag na rdo la bstun na dbang du 'gyu ro//bu mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na zhag gsum bskung ba byas te yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gsum la 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs byas te 'di'i khar 'bras kyi sbyin
78b5(rgyud): sreg lanA brgya stong byas na bu mo dbang du 'gyur ro//de nas mdzub mo sgrub par 'dod na zhag gsum bskyang ba byas te/mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la dur khrod du song nas bo
78b6(rgyud): lang gi lci ba sa la mau lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskyang nul gyis byugs te/dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mi'i thod pa ma chag ma nyams pa bzhag la tsan dan dmar po'i dri chus
78b7(rgyud): gtor nas me tog dmar pos mchod la/de nas sgrub pa pos mdzub mos g.yabs nas gang gi tshe thod pa 'gul na de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur te/gang la mdzub mos
79a1(rgyud): bsdigs pa de dbang du 'gyur//de nas gtor du byung bar 'dod na mo'i skyon srog go zab tu lhags bzhag pa rlangs pa las rdo rje byas la rdo rjeng
79a2(rgyud): nag gi skud pas dkris ti mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rdo rje la lan brgya bzlas brjod byas na de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur//
79a3(rgyud): bsgrubs nas kyang gter gang na yod pa der bzhag pa rdo rje gter de blangs te 'byung byar 'gyur ro//de nas khro bo bzlas brjod byed bzhin du blang bar bya'o//de
79a4(rgyud): med ni rdo rje nyid 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de nas gsheng byed bslang 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsrung ba byas te ldog na rdo rje'i mdun du dur khrod kyi shing gi
79a5(rgyud): me sbar la/ba lang gi shas sbyin bsreg byas pa dang ji tsamya na me'i thab nas gshed byad 'byung bar 'gyur te/gang la yid kyis bsams pa de bsgrub par 'gyuraro//
79a6(rgyud): mi nang 'byung bar 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhog bcu bzhi la dur khrod du song ste dur khrod kyi shing ge mau sbar la/sgron mor byung zhing sgra bshig ste til dang bsres pa'i yungs klur
79a7(rgyud): gyis brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na mi nad 'byung bar 'gyuraro//'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du pad+ma'i sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro//mi mang
79b1(rgyud): po gzhig par 'dod na chos grangs dang rgyu slar yang bdam myi 'tshal/bskyang ba yang bya me dgos par khro bo nyid mchog tu brtsam par bya ste/dur khrod du song la dur khrod kyi shing gis
79b2(rgyud): me sbyar la sgren mor byung zhing sgru ba shig ste/nim pa'i lo mas bsregs pa'i dur khrod kyi thal ba'i sbyin sreg lan brgya stong byas na mi mang po 'jig par 'gyur ro//zhi bar 'dod na snan
79b3(rgyud): me tog blo dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mar gyi nang du bsgrags pas lan brgyad borgya sbyin sreg byas no zhi bar 'gyur ro//rdo rje khra bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi cho ga rdzogaso//
79b4(rgyud): de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po chungs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi thab sbyor gang gis log 'dren rnams kyi gsang ba'i
79b5(rgyud): gnas 'di dag bshad pa ni/brtson 'grus dang mthu dang /pha rol gnod pa che lags so//bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la rig sngags rnams kyi
79b6(rgyud): dngos grub rnams kyi slad du gang gis reg sngags rnams grub pa dang /gang gis mi 'grub pa yongs su zhu bar 'tshal lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
79b7(rgyud): tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te//tshangs pa chen po gang khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te/dngos grub 'grub pa
80a1(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang /grub par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin gshogs pa la yongs su zhu bar byed pa legs so legs so//tshangs pa chen
80a2(rgyud): snod la rig sngags rnams kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /'grub par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu ba shad par bya ste/'jug par bya ba ma yin pa la 'jug pa gang
80a3(rgyud): yin pa dang /tshangs pa chen po 'joms pa dang /rig sngags la smad pa gang yin pa de la ni rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro//mi bzang ba'i las byung ba
80a4(rgyud): sdig pa'i dang tshulangs su dz+nyAn d+ha rab ban+de/rlig stegs gcod das byung rgyas pa byas pa ga yin pa de la yang rig sdug pa 'grub bar myi 'gyur
80a5(rgyud): ro//tshangs pa byang chub kyi sems yongs su 'dzin pas ni yid kyis kyang lha gzhan la phyag mi bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das du ni de lagaso bka' stsal
80a6(rgyud): pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang byang chub kyi sems yongs su 'dzin pas lha gzhan la phyag byas na byang chub kyi sems yongasu rin bsnyen pa'i phyir de la lha de ma dang bai
80a7(rgyud): phyir te/de'i phyir des kyang rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/dud 'gror skyes pa rnams la 'jug par byed pa gang yin pa dang /sbrul 'dzin
80b1(rgyud): pa dang khas rtswa gcod par byed pa gang yin pa de la yang rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro//pad+ma dang khyu mchog la rkang pas rog par byed pa de la yang rig sdug
80b2(rgyud): 'grub par mi 'gyuro//tshangs pa gong gis rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ba ngas mdor bstan pa yin no//de nas mi mjed kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
80b3(rgyud): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de ltar sems can dag bde blag tu 'grub par bgyi ba'i gnas rnams ston pa thugs rje che ba lags
80b4(rgyud): so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//tshangs pa gang dag la rig sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyogs
80b5(rgyud): dga' tsam zhig khyod la bstan par bya ste/sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la dga' ba gang yin pa dag dang /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan
80b6(rgyud): pa gang yin pa dag dang /pha la gus pa dang /ma la gus pa grang yin pa dang /rig sngags la mchod pa byed cing rig sngags la bkur sti byed pa gang yin pa dang /gsang
80b7(rgyud): sngags 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa dang /'byung po'i zas ngan pa dang /til smras pa mi za ba dang /sems can thams cad legs par lta ba gang yin pa de la ni rig sngag 'grub
81a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te//
81a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang lag na rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa gang gis rig sngags 'chang rnams srung ba'i gsang sngags
81a3(rgyud): dbul bar 'tshal lo//bka' stsal pa tshangs pa chen po gang khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir bsams pa shod cig shod cig/khyod la de bzhin
81a4(rgyud): gshegs pas gnang ngo //de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lag na rdo rje la gsang sngags phul ba/na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pa Ni s+yai//ma hA yak+kha
81a5(rgyud): se nA pa ti s+ya/tad+ya thA/na mash+tsaN+Da bkli Ni/a ti ni tsa a se b+hi sha ya/mi med tsa mye ngan \u0f7f/a ha ra swA hA//bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di dran pa tsam
81a6(rgyud): gyis log 'dren rnams las thar par 'gyur ro//'di dag gi las rnams 'byung ste/srung ba ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byed pa'i skud pas bya'o//mtshams bcang
81a7(rgyud): pa dang /dug bcing ba ni lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i chus bya'o//dug las gso ba ni yal gas bya'o//rgya gzhom pa ni chus bya'o//dbab pa ni gu
81b1(rgyud): gul gyis bdugs pa 'am chus bya'o//gdon bcing ba dang /gdon spyod pa ni mthe bos bya'o//gdon 'khor du gzhug pa ni mdzub ma la bzlas brjod byas te bsdigs par bya'o//
81b2(rgyud): skyes pa dang bud med dbang du bya na yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te/zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad kyi lag na rdo rje le bsnun na dbang
81b3(rgyud): du 'gyur ro//bum pa la lan brgyad brgyar sngags te/bdag nyid khrus byas na log 'dren thams cad kyis gtong bar 'gyur ro//rig sngags sgrub pa'i tshe bgegs zhi bar//
81b4(rgyud): bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i thal ba gtsang mas bya'o//gzhan la bgegs 'byung bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gang gis nub mo'i rig sngags sgrub pa de nyid kyi
81b5(rgyud): nub mo lag na rdo rje'i mdun du be kaM ka ta'i yam sreg shing brgyad brgyas sbyin sreg byas na/pha rol bgegs 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'phags pa lag na rdo rje 'i mdun du rig
81b6(rgyud): sngags lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na rmi lam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur ro//gzhig par 'dod na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum
81b7(rgyud): du lnga la phul ba'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o//rims kyis 'debs par bya na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad na zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du a
82a1(rgyud): shwat+tha'i shIng gi me sbyar nas yungs kAraR+Sha khrag gis bsgos pas lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de mya thag tu rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro//
82a2(rgyud): dbye bar bya na zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du phub ma'i sbyin sreg brgya rtse brgyad bya'o//gdon gzhi ga par 'dod na gdon gyi mdun du til dang thal ba'i sbyin sreg brgya
82a3(rgyud): rtsa brgyad byas na gdon gyi rigs 'jig par 'gyur ro//gdon mdongs par bya na/zhim thig le'i lo ma sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na mdongs par 'gyur ro//
82a4(rgyud): yungs kar khyor gang btags te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na slor shegs 'gyed pa la lan thebs par 'gyur ri//nor 'dod
82a5(rgyud): pa na yar gyi ngo zla ba nya la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ni ma pa'i shing gi me sbyar nas til gyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na ti na ra re re
82a6(rgyud): /thob par 'gyur ro//de nas mdzub mo sgrub par 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te khang stong ngam/dben pa'i phyogasu bud med kyi me mtshan du mdzub mo
82a7(rgyud): btsugs te rig sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur te/de nas gang la mdzub mos bsdigs pa dbong du 'gyur ro//gos 'dod na yang yar gyi
82b1(rgyud): ngochos brgyad la zhag gcig bsrung ba byas te lte ba nub tsam du chu'i nang du zhugs la ka ru bi ra ka'i me tog brgyad brgya phul na gos phrugs re ro thob par 'gyur ro//klu mchod pa/
82b2(rgyud): tshwachos lnga la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/grog mkhar gyi steng du song la der 'dug nas rig sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/de nas sbrul mthong ba de la chu ge mo zhi
82b3(rgyud): gi thang du song la zo shig zhi sa smros shig/phyir gso na yid kyis bya ste/gcig pus gso nus kyi gzhan sus kyang gso mi nus so//tshangs po'i cho ga rdzogs so///
82b4(rgyud): de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis ba com ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nus/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis
82b5(rgyud): kyang reg pa'i mchog sgrub pa la dngos grub stsal bar 'tshal te/bgegs gzhil ba'i gsang sngags kyang bshad par 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
82b6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu dag sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir khyed kyis shod cig/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das dang /lag na rdo rje'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal
82b7(rgyud): nas tshig 'thun par gsang sngags bshad pa/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mash+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/tad+ya thA/u grA ye swAh+ma/a ti u grA yo swA hA/
83a1(rgyud): u gra bi yA ya swA hA/a ti u gra bi yA ya swAhA/u pra kre d+hA nA ya swA hA/a ti u gra kro d+ha nA ya swA hA/tsaN+Da ro Sha NA ya swA hA/ro ShA pra mA nA ya
83a2(rgyud): swA hA/pra ha ra Na badz+ra pra ha ra Ni swA hA/aT Te maT Te ma ti ni he sai swA hA/be tsam ldan 'das dran pa tsa mi gyes gdon thams cad 'byir bar 'gyur ro//yi dwags
83a3(rgyud): thams cad dang /sha za thams cad dang /grul bum thams cad dang /'byung po thams cad dang /gnod sbyin thatha~Md 'byer bar byed de 'gum par yang 'gyur ro//de nas
83a4(rgyud): rig sngags 'di'i las rnams 'byung ste/dbab par bya na ni zhim thig le'i lo mas bya'o//gdon thams cad mnye bar bya na gos bsreg par bya'o//gdon gyis zin pa
83a5(rgyud): la ni len bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i gtun shing gos bsdigs par bya'o//gdon 'bros par bya na dur khrod kyi sol ba la gzugs byas te/mtshon rnon pos bcad
83a6(rgyud): na gdon cho nges 'debs shing 'bros par 'gyur ro//gdon gyi mdun du lan tshwa dang /ska nas sbyin sreg lan brgyad brgya byas na gdon gyi lus pas 'debs par 'gyur ro//
83a7(rgyud): ba lang gi lci ba las gdon gyi gzugs byas te/lcags kyi thur mas mig tu btsu gos ni long bar 'gyur ro//gdon gyi mdun du phub ma'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad
83b1(rgyud): byas na gdon gyi rigs brlag par 'gyur ro//gdon gyi mdun du nA lde sham gyi bsregs blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin srog byas na gdon khrag skyug par 'gyur ro//byis pa/
83b2(rgyud): gdon gyis zin pa la ni bdugs pas gtong bar 'gyur ro//ci ste mI gtong na sgra btubs pa dang /lug ru dang /sgog skyo dang /sbrul gyi lde tshogs pa rjes pa rnams kyi
83b3(rgyud): bdug pas bdugs na da ma thig tu gtong bar 'gyuraro//byis pa gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bzlas brjod byas pa'i tshon sna lnga'i skud pas kyang gtong bar 'gyur ro//bdag
83b4(rgyud): srung na lan gsum bzlas brjod byas pa'i thal bas bya'o//pha rol srung na lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i bskud pas bya'o//mtshams bcad na lan gsum bzlas
83b5(rgyud): brjod byas pa'i gseg mas bya'o//sbrul bskrad na lon gsum bzlas brjod byas pa'i chu dang thal bas brdabs par bya'o//mche ba can thams cad kha bcing bar bye ba dang /
83b6(rgyud): smad btsong bar bya ba ni yid kyiso bya'o//gte re ba cing na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i seng ldeng gi phu ro bu s+ya la btab na gter bcings par 'gyur ro//chang ma
83b7(rgyud): rung bar bya na til gyi bsregs blugaso lan bdun sbyin bsreg bya'o//nya bskrad na nim pa'i lo ma la lan bdun bsngags te/mtsho'i nang du bor na nya 'bros par 'gyur ro//dud
84a1(rgyud): 'gror skyes pa rnams la nad dag zhi bar 'dod par bya na lag na rdo rje'i gzugs 'o mas bslus la bzlas brjod kyang stong rtsa brgyad byas nA zhi bar 'gyur ro//
84a2(rgyud): dus ma yin par char 'bab par 'dod na yang yar gyi ngo tshes lnga la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/lte ba nub tsam du chu'i nang du zhugs nas pad+ma'i sbyin sreg khri phul na
84a3(rgyud): dus ma yin par char pa 'bab par 'gyur ro//zhi bar 'dod ni yar gyi ngo tshes bergyud la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du byang chub kyi shing gi bud
84a4(rgyud): shing gis me sbar nas ut+pa la'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas nA zhi bar 'gyur ro//dug gzhom par 'dod ni rtswa ku shas bya'o//dug bsal na khu tshur gyis bya'o//
84a5(rgyud): gdon zar gzhug na lon bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i a pa ra tsi ta'i me tog gis bya'o//g.yul 'gyed na a pa ra tsi ta'i me tog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
84a6(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas te mgo la btags na gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro//grang gi tshe rig sngags 'chang reg sngags 'grub par 'dod na zhag gsum bsrung ba byas
84a7(rgyud): la nang par bumo pa sar pa bzhi blangs te chus bkang nas rig sngags 'chang gi phye ma red na le sham dkar po lani nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/bum pa de
84b1(rgyud): dngag gi nang du blugs na bum pa de dag 'phag cing ldud par 'gyur na rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags 'grub par shes par bya'o//de ste mi 'grub na ni 'phrag par mi bya'o//rig
84b2(rgyud): sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pa na zhag gcig pa snyung bar byas la sa las gzugs byas pa bkod de me'i phyog su kha dog dmar po bzhag par bya'o//gshin rje'i phyogasu ni kha
84b3(rgyud): dgra ser po chu lha'i phyogs su sngo bsangs so//rlung gi phyogasu ni nag po ste 'di dag so so'i gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dgod par bya'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pa
84b4(rgyud): na ci ste bgegs kyi gzugs dge 'byung bar 'gyur te/dngos grub phal sgrub na gshin rje'i phyogs nas yi dgras mo nAg mau zhes bya ba de bgegs byed de/sdug gi gzugasu
84b5(rgyud): ston pa dang /wa'i gzugasu 'tshe bar byed do//de lta bu la sogs pa bge gas byed pa dang /rig sngags 'chang gis gshin rje'i phyogs la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i
84b6(rgyud): yungs kar gyis bsnun na bgegs rnams med par 'gyur ro//gshin rje'i rgyal po'i g.yog yi dwags ku mu da zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba yi dwags sum khri'i bdag po zhig
84b7(rgyud): yod de/ku mu da de yang rig sngags 'chang de dngos grub chen po sgrub pa na bgegs byed de ku mu da'i bgegs 'byung ba yang la la ni yi dwags kyi tshul/la la ni srin po'i
85a1(rgyud): gzugs/lA la ni khyi'i mgo can/la la ni rnga mo'i mgo can/la la ni bong bu'i mgo can gyi yi dwags te/de dag 'ong ba'i cha yang ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra
85a2(rgyud): cing skar mda' rgya dag kha nas 'byin par byed do//de la rig sngags 'chang gis gshin rje'i phyogs kyi gzugs/la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i thal bas bsnun ni dri ma theg
85a3(rgyud): tu bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur ro//rgyal po de'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba sgo dpon mo sna chad ma zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu tsho ba zhig yod de sna chang ma de ni gegs
85a4(rgyud): chen po byed pa yin no//de yang des gsang sngags kyis bzlog par mi nus te/de 'od dang skar mnga' ltung bar ston tsong spyugs pa yang len te/sna chad ma des dkyil 'khor
85a5(rgyud): gyi mtshams seng ldeng gi phur bus btab pa ni mo mtshan gyis 'byin par byed de/dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams thal ba sa bcad pa ni bus pas med par byed do//dkyil
85a6(rgyud): 'khor gyi mtshams chus bcad pa ni mchil mas med par byed do//yid kyis dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bcad pa ni gcin gyis 'bral bar byed do//de lta bu'i tshul
85a7(rgyud): dag gis dkyil 'khor 'jig par byed pa dang /de la rig sngags 'chang gis myur du sna chad ma'i ming nas smos te sring mo sna tshad ma khyod 'ongs pa leg so legs so zhes
85b1(rgyud): byasra nas/lan bdun bsngags pa'i skyong ljang gri phur bu sbyor bzhi par gshin rje'i phyogs kyi snying khar gdab bo//de nas sna tshad ma des ngu 'bod kyi sgra phyung nas med par 'gyur te
85b2(rgyud): rig sngags kyang 'i grub par 'gyur ro//gshin rje'i phyogs kyi cho ga rdzogs so///rig sngags 'ching rig sngags sgrub pa ni ts+yai hU~M mi'i phyogs nas bgegs
85b3(rgyud): kyi gzugs dag 'byung ste/dngos grub phal sgrub pa nA me'i phyogs kyi rgyal po'i g.yog mo srin mo rtsed mo can zhes bya ba yod de/de ni gegs byed pa yin no//srin mo rtsed
85b4(rgyud): mo can de yang bya'i gzugs su ston par byed cing nga ro mi snyan pa yang 'byin par byed do//de la rig sngags 'chang gis mi'i phyogs kyi gzugs lan bdun sngags kyis
85b5(rgyud): bsngags pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun na med par 'gyur ro//dngos grub chen po sgrub pa na rgyal po de'i g.yog srin mo mi sdug pa zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul cha ba srin po sum khri'i
85b6(rgyud): bdag po zhig yod de/mi sdug pa de yang rig sngags 'chang la gegros byed pa yin te/mi sdug pa de 'ong ba dang /mi sdug pa de'i rnam pa'i srin po dag dang /la la khyi mgo
85b7(rgyud): can dag dang /la la glang po che'i mgo can dag dang /la la seng ge'i mgo can lta bu'i bgegs kyi rnam pa dag tu snang te/la la ni brag 'phen par byed/la la ni 'byung
86a1(rgyud): po'i 'khrul 'khor ston cing 'jigs pa'i sgra dag kyang 'byin te skar mda' nga rgya dag kyang kha nas 'byin par byed do//de la rig sngags 'chang gris
86a2(rgyud): me'i phyogs kyi gzugs la lan bdun bsngags pa'i thal bas bsnun ni bgegs rnams med par 'gyur ro//rgyal po de'i g.yog srin po so kur zhes bya ba mthu che zhing
86a3(rgyud): brtson 'grus che ba zhig yod de so dkur de yang rig sngags 'ching de la nam gung gi thun la gegs byed do//de yang gsang sngags kyis bzlog par mi nus te/de 'od
86a4(rgyud): dang du 'dod kyi sgra chen po ni 'byin/ri rnams ni g.yo/ri dwags rnams ni gar byed/wa rnams ni /glang po che rnams ni skad 'byin te/de'i rig sngags 'chang gi
86a5(rgyud): me'i phyogs kyi bgegs yin par shes par bya'o//so dkar de yang bus pa'i gzugs kyis sgra 'byin zhing 'ong ngo //yang na lha'i gzugs kyis 'ongs te/des kyang
86a6(rgyud): bltas pa tsam gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jig par byed do//de la rig sngags 'chang gis myur du lan bdun bsngags pa'i seng ldeng gi phur bu sor bzhi pas me'i
86a7(rgyud): phyogs kyi gzugs la btab ste/'di skad du so dkar btsom mo zhes kyang smras na/ngu 'bod kyi sgra chen po phyung nas med par 'gyur te/gsang sngags kyang 'grub
86b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro//me'i phyogs m+b+ha rgyo ga rdzogs so///ga sngangs 'chang ga sngags sgrung dra tsab+ha rlung ga/phyogs nas srong la bgogs hU~M gzugs dag 'byung na
86b2(rgyud): dos grub phral sgrub pa ni rlung gi phyogs kyi rgyal po'i g.yog mo sa de ma~M zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de ming ga gis byed de/mor mi gsod cing lbu ba shos zla bas 'gagres byar byed //
86b3(rgyud): de'i phyi d+h+r-i gAnI la b+h+r-i byA ban+tirlu gi phyogs kyi gzugs la lan bdun bsngags pa'i yungs kare gyi bskrun ni bgegs rnams med par 'gyur ro//dngas grub chen po smra
86b4(rgyud): rArlu gi phyogs kyi rgyal ba'i g.yog gnod d+hIn rdzu 'phrul chen po drug khri'i bdag po zhig yod do chu bI mi gcig pa zhes bya ba de yang rig sdigs 'ching de la mjing gi rgyun pa
86b5(rgyud): glegs byed do//chub ma gcig pa de yang 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can yin te/ched 'ga' ni lnga'i gzugs/ched 'ga' ni stag gi gzugs/ched 'ga' ni khyu mchog
86b6(rgyud): klo gzugs/gzugs sna tshogs su bdag nyid ston par byed ci //tshe de 'ag ni d+ha hA zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing skar mdang brgya ga ltung bar byed//gnam yang ma byar/
86b7(rgyud): byed do//de la rig sngags 'chang gis rlung gi phyogs kyi gdugs pa lan bdu rdzogs pa'i thal ba'i bad+mo na bgegs rnams me de'i ri 'byu re//rgyal ba'i sgo dpon ma
87a1(rgyud): lcags kyu dkar mo can zhes bya ba mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che la gegs byed pa chen mo zhig yod de de yang gsang sngags kyis bzlog par mi nus te/de'i
87a2(rgyud): nam gung gi thun la 'ong ngo //de 'ong ba dang dus ma yin pa'i char 'bab cing 'brug kyang dri r-i ri sgrogs/gnam yang 'grum par byed de/lcags kyu dkar mo can dro yang mdog
87a3(rgyud): dkar zhing gzugs kyi lus bstan pas kyang /dkyil 'khor 'jig par byed do//de la rig sngags 'chang gis myur du len bdun bsngags te seng ldeng gi phur bu sor ba
87a4(rgyud): pas rlung gi phyogs kyi gzugs la btab ste/lcags kyu dkar mo can bcom mo zhes kyang smras na ngu 'bod kyi sgra chen po phyung nas med par 'gyur te/gsang sngags kyang
87a5(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro//rlung gi phyogs kyi cho ga rdzogs so///rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pa na chu lha'i phyogs nas bgegs rnams 'byung ste/
87a6(rgyud): dngos grub phal pa sgrub na chu lha'i rgyal po'i g.yog mo klu mo rgyal ba mo zhes bya ba zhig yod de rgyal ba mo ngo yang srod la gragaso byed do//thog tu 'ong la khog skam 'dor
87a7(rgyud): bar byed cing pha gu 'phen par byed do//de la rig sngags 'chang gis chu'i phyogs kyi gzugs la lan bdun bsngags pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun na med par 'gyur ro//
87b1(rgyud): rgyal po de'i ga yog klu ma sau brtogs ces bya bya mthu che zhid rngu dngul skyo ba klu sum khri'i bdag pa zhog yod do/sau brtsegs do yang reg sngags 'chang do la/'jod gA thum
87b2(rgyud): lo bgegs byed sna tshogs rnam pa mang po byung ngo //sa~M brtseg sde do dur khrod du skyes pa thams cad kyi rgyu lug me dag tu sdung zhing kun tu rgyu dang gre cer bu lta bu'i dgegs
87b3(rgyud): lugs dag tu snang ste/de yang ngu 'bod kyi sgra chen po 'byin cing sker meda'i don kyang 'byin par byed do//de la rig stegs 'chang gis chu lha'i phyogs kyi gzugs la lan
87b4(rgyud): bdun bsngags pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun ni med par 'gyur ro//chu lce'i phyogs kyi rgyal po rmi tsan ma yig ser ma zhes bya ba mthu che gling rdzu 'phrul che ba gags chen
87b5(rgyud): po da pa klu cig yod de de yang gsang sdigs kyis bzlog par mi nus twa~M/rig sngags 'chang de rig sngags sgrub pa na nam gung gi thun la gags byed de des kyang sku phyung bas
87b6(rgyud): dkyi la khor rnams cide 'jig par byed cing mI gzugs kyis gags byed la snye mda' stong deg snang ba byed //de la rig sngags 'chang giso myu du ldan 'dun ba snaH
87b7(rgyud): pa'i seng ldeng gi phur bu song bzhi paso chu lha'i phyogs kyi gzugs la bto cing 'di skad du rig ser ma 'dug sheg ma 'dug shig ces smras na'i'adug shig ces
88a1(rgyud): thos nas bdag ni rma phab bo snyam ste/du 'brod kyi sgra chen po phyung nas med par 'gyur te/rig sngabs kyi dngos grub kyang grub par 'gyur ro//chu lha'i
88a2(rgyud): cho ga rdzogs so////de bas 'jam pa'i las 'dri bshad de/rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pa ni lan bdun bsngags pa'i seng ldeng gi phur bu sor
88a3(rgyud): batshon sna lnga'i skud pas bkris pa/bgegs thams cad kyi gnas su rkang pa g.yon byas gnani bgegs thams cad bcom pa dang /rlangs par byas par 'gyur ro//
88a4(rgyud): zhag gsum bsnyung ba byas te mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam zhag bcu bzhi la dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su song ste/'byung po'i gtor ma yang byin la rig sngags lan brgyud
88a5(rgyud): brgya bzlas pa rjod byas na bgegs kyi las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/bsams pas bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur ro//'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi tshe
88a6(rgyud): ga rdzogs so////de nas 'jig rten phan 'dod pa//thub pa kun dang lha chen gyis//lag na rdo rje'i mdun du byed //lhan cig tu ni 'dus par 'gyur//nyi ma bzhin
88a7(rgyud): du gzi 'bar zhing //bka' thub rnal 'byor ldan pa yi//thub pa rab mchog ldan pa kun//nyi mo bye ba byas nasa'i kho //thub pa dag ni thams cad dang //bde bying lha cho ga
88b1(rgyud): lha rnams kyis//lag na rdo rje sems dpa' che//'byung po kun dbang rje la zhus//'jig rten pongos grub byed pa yi//bgrogs rnams dag ni ga la 'byung /de drag gi chog thos
88b2(rgyud): nas//lag na rdo rje grags pa che//dga' bar gyur nas dris pa de//rgyas par yang ni rab bshad de//bgrogs rnams ji ltar 'byung 'gyur ba//thub pa dag ni kun gyis nyon/
88b3(rgyud): lha rnams la yang lha min rnams//'thab pa'i phyir ni ldang ba ltar//sems can rnams la bgegs bya'i phyir//de bzhin gshegs rnams 'byung bar 'gyur//ji ltar lha yi
88b4(rgyud): lha min rnams//g.yul du lan brgyar bcom pa dang //brgya byin gyis ni g.yul bcom ltar//de bzhin gshegs rnams bcom par gyur//de tshe lha kun dgar gyur nas/
88b5(rgyud): 'jig rten grags pa de dag ni//thams cad stobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing //de dag nga rgyal dregs pas brgyas//'jig rten don dang lha rnams kyis//brtson 'grus dang ni m+b+haH
88b6(rgyud): daskyed phyir//byed ni nga rgya mtsho chen po ni//gshed byed dngade ni dbyung bar brtsams//thob pa de dag rmongs pa ste//phan pa byas na stobs kyis rgyags//nga rgyal 'dis ni 'dzin
88b7(rgyud): na//ring por ma thogs the tshom med//de nas drang sring lhur ba cas rnams//tsa'i sgra ni reb 'dzin cing //rtsom pa tshon bskad cig tu//'jig rten du ni grags par
89a1(rgyud): 'gyur//de nas lha rnams thug par bcas//khro ba ru ni gyur pa na//lhar bcas drang srong de dag la//lha chen gyis ni tshig smras pa//tshangs bcas lha rnams//
89a2(rgyud): khyed kyis mthus//brtsam pa dag ni ma byed cig/rdo rje 'chang ba dpal ldan 'di//gnod sbyin tshegs kun bdag po ste//gnod sbyin bde bdag zhi ba po//sems can kun
89a3(rgyud): la phan par dga'//ma rungs 'di dag bairlag byed pa//tsam zhing tshar gcod nus pa yod//de nas lha yi mchog rnams kyis//lag na rdo rje dpal ldan mchog/sbyor/
89a4(rgyud): bshes shing sbyor gnas nas//dpung chen dag ni rab sprul pa//rgyal po'i blo gros rdo rje'i gdong //rdo rje'i lte ba gdong dkar ma//rdo rje mig ser 'og phag can//rdo rje nag mo
89a5(rgyud): phopo nya chu//dpong phyug chen mo gnam do ma//drag mo rdo rje seng ge'i khri//shugs ldan ma dang rdo rje can//de bzhin bzhad ma rdo rje can//gtum mo rang gi thugs dang ni//
89a6(rgyud): nye ba'i snying po las kun byed//'byung po srin po po nya ma//rnam pa sna tshogs ming grags pa//ma rungs gdon rnams bzlog pa dang //bgegs rnams brlag phyir sprul par
89a7(rgyud): gyur//de nas dpung de dgar gyur nas//dpal gyis su ni 'khyud pa bzhin//lag na rdo rjer pho nyid//kun nas bskor cing 'khod par gyur//de nas rab 'bar mi bzang
89b1(rgyud): cing //'byung po thams cad brlag byed cing //lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje de//phyogs brgyad dag tu 'bros par 'gyur//de nas stobs chen brtson chen mo//pho nya myo dag song bar byur //
89b2(rgyud): de nas skrag nas gdon de dag/thams cad brdungs te sems ster cing //rdo rje nag mos 'jigs gzir bas//bskyabs kyang rnyed par ma gyur te//rdo rje sgrogs kyis 'phamo byas
89b3(rgyud): shing //rdo rje can gyi yul du bcom//de nas de dag yid kyis su//de bzhin gshegs la skyabasu song //dkon mo cho gsum gyis mdzes byas shing //thams cad dge l-i nges
89b4(rgyud): bar gyur//de nas me ni 'dra ba de//rdo rje lta bu'i mtshon thogs pa//zhi nas rdo rje la sogs tshogs//yid ma zhi la yang smras pa//kye kye tshogs rnams zhi bar gyis//skal
89b5(rgyud): ba che rnams ldog par gyis//gdon kun dge la nges byas shing //zhi bar gyur gyis ma gzhom shig/lag na rdo rje ltas bsten pa'i//thung ngu yang ni khrid par gyis//mi bzad
89b6(rgyud): tshogs kyis de mnyan nas//gdon rnams de dag thams cad ni//rnal 'byor bstan chos mthus btul nas//lag nu rdo rje'i thad du khrid//bcom ldan rdo rje ldan pa des//mthong nas
89b7(rgyud): ci ste gson 'dod na//rig pa'i mchig la phyag byos la//phyag rgya mthong nas bstan la mnos//gnas nas mi rnams thong shig ces//gdon rnams la ni bgad de smras/
90a1(rgyud): da spyad smras nas gdan de dag/kun gyis de tshwa bstan smras pa//khyod kyi las 'di mchog yin te//gzhan gyis mi thub drag cing dang//mnga' bdag khyod kyis bka'/
90a2(rgyud): stsal pa//de bzhin du ni bgyi bar 'tshal//sangs rgyas la ni skyabs su mchi//chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te//zhi la ma rungs 'dul ba po//khyod la rtag tu skyabasu mchi//
90a3(rgyud): sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir//stobs chen gyis ni skyes pa legs//bdag cag gi ni 'tsho ba yi//thabs kyi phyir yang bka' stsol cig/de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
90a4(rgyud): bgad nas tshogs la smras pa ni//khyod kyis blang bar bya ba dong //mi blang ba yang bstan par bya//gang dag rtag tu brdzun smra dang //drin du mi bzo gtsang sbyar med//byang chub sems
90a5(rgyud): ni rab nyams pa//skye bo de dag rtag tu long //nya dang sha sogs za ba dang //mi bya ba dag byed pa gang //rkang pas phyag rgya rdzi byed pa//skye bo de dag blang bar bgyi//ci ste
90a6(rgyud): gson par 'dod na no//gang dag bden pa'i tshig sgra dang //drin du gzo zhing nges par gnas//srog gi phyir yang byang chub sems//gtong bar mi byed rab bsdams dang //rtag tu
90a7(rgyud): nga la dad pa dang //de bzhin rigs mchog rigs la gnas//gang rnams kyi ni khyim dag tu//rig rgyal dam pa rtag mchod dang //nga rig pa yi rgyal po mchog/sgrub pa
90b1(rgyud): drang ni bzlas brjod byed//de dag la ni zhi bar gyis//yi ge bzhi pa ces bya yi//rdo rje don yod chen po des//gdon gang de la dang mi 'dzin//de yi spyi bo 'goms par byed//rtag tu nga dang
90b2(rgyud): rigs mchog la//de bzhin dad pa lhur byed dang //dam tshig shes pa gang yin de//khyed kyis rtag tu mchod pa gyis//lag na rdo rje'i tshig 'di dag/thob nas kyang ni log 'dren
90b3(rgyud): rnams//dga' zhing ca co'i sgra 'byin nas//skad cig gIs ni mi snang 'gyur//rig pa mchog gi rgyud phyi ma las log 'dren 'byung po rdzogaso////las 'di ni dam par
90b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang /drag cing don yong la gzhan gyis me thub cing dge ba yin te/dngos grub sgrub pa'i tshe drod pa med pa'i 'dag ma la rig sngags kyi rgyal pos til nag po'i sbyin sreg
90b5(rgyud): lan brgyad brgya byas na bgegs thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//las 'di dag ni mchog yin te//'jig rten rnams kyi dngos grub phyir//rig mchog mgo bor bzhago na ni///
90b6(rgyud): spyan rnams dngos grub ston par 'gyur//sangs rgyas yul dang chos spyan la//gang zhig phyag 'tshal de la ni//bcom ldan gsungs pa'i las la sogs//lag na rdo rje bshad
90b7(rgyud): po yi//cho ga 'di dang rdo rje'i rigs//de dag thams cad 'grub 'gyur te//yul yang yid la bzhag nas ni//dngos grub mchog ni sgrub par bya//las 'di dag kyang byas nas ni
91a1(rgyud): dwangs grub mchog 'gyur shes par bya//gang gis nyin mo yang rung ste//zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dri dang /me tog dang /bdug pa
91a2(rgyud): phul nas ba ser mo'i lci ba sA la ma lhung bas lha mo'i gzugs byas te/lag pa bayas par rdo rje thogs par bya/de'i 'og log su sgrub pa po snyim pa zed cing 'dug par bya'o//
91a3(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yid la bsams te/reg sngags brjod nas ci ste gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur na de ma thag tu las 'grub cing /rig sngags kyang bde zlog/
91a4(rgyud): tu 'grub ste bgegs thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ro//yang na sgrub pa po'i lag tu rdo rje byin na sa'i bdag por 'gyur ro//yang nA bcom ldan 'das
91a5(rgyud): ma las 'od zer 'byung ste/'od zer des phog par gyur na ni rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur zhing glang po che'i stobs dang ldan la skra lcang lo 'khyil ba dang /nyi ma shwar ba'i kha
91a6(rgyud): dog can du 'gyur zhing lag tu ral gri 'ong bar 'gyur te/de thogs na rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi song la sgyu 'phrul dag kyang byed par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe gnyid
91a7(rgyud): kyis log pa de na ral gri de dpag tshad gcig tsam nas 'gal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du kun nas 'khor bar byed ci ngo sad pa na shugasu 'gro ste/tshe lo khri bzhi stong thub
91b1(rgyud): cing nam mchi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro//las de byas te dngos grub kyi mchog bsgrubs na cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub sbyin par byed do/mas bu la bya ba bzhin no//dngos
91b2(rgyud): grub sgrub pa'i phyir dbang phyug chen po sgrub pa'i mdor bstan te/de la ni 'di ni cho ga rgyas pa 'i dngos grub mchog sgrub pa bstan pa ste/lag na rdo rje'i mdun du byang chub kyi shing gi
91b3(rgyud): mi sbar la yungs dmar dang sbyar bas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na khru do'am khru gsum tsam du dud pa'i khri zhing 'byung ste/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags kyi rigs
91b4(rgyud): 'grub pa dang /cho ga rgyas por 'grub par shes par bya ste/de nas las brtsam par bya'o//yid la bsams te phur bu gsum pas bshad pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang /lag na rdo rjes bshad
91b5(rgyud): pa bsgrub par bya'o//rna bar bshibs te bzlas brjod byas na dngos grub kyi mchog ston par 'gyur te/nub kar lag na rdo rje la mchod pa byas la lag na rdo rje'i rna ba g.yas par rig
91b6(rgyud): sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas ci ste rmi lam du bram ze mthong na las 'grub par 'gyur ro//'dreg mkhan mthong na ni 'grub par mi 'gyur te/de la blta zhing
91b7(rgyud): les bsgrub par bya'o//ri mo'i gzugs gang gis mthong ba des ni rdo rje'i rigs mthong ba yin no//rdo rje'i rigs mthong na las 'byang bar 'gyur
92a1(rgyud): ro/|las byang na dngos grub kyi mchog thob par 'gyur te/ras ma nyams pa la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pa tshon rtsi sbyin med pas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzug
92a2(rgyud): gser gyi kha dog can chos ston pa'i tshul du 'drir gzhug go/de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas logasu lha mo gser gyi kha dog can chos nyan pa bri'o//de'i 'og lo ga su lig
92a3(rgyud): nardo rje mdog sngo bsangs la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa chos nyan par b+hi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon log su dbang phyug chen po 'dam bu mdara' rgyu'i mdog can thor
92a4(rgyud): tshugs dang cod pan thogs par bri/de'i g.yon log su phur bu gsum pa'i ma/ma tang gi cha lugs can chos nyan pa'i tshul de'i 'og log su dbang phyug chen po 'dam bu mda'
92a5(rgyud): rgyu'i kha dog can/thor tshugs 'chang ba'i mgo la zla ba'i mtshan ma yod la mig gsum dang ldan par bri'o//de'i drung du ma tang gi rgyal po phur pa gsum pa mdog sto bsangs
92a6(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa/ma tang gi cha lugasu bri'o//de'i log su 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi kha dog tha dad pa dang /rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa chos nyan pa'i tshul du b+hI/
92a7(rgyud): log na rdo rje'i log su rdo rje sde dang gtsug nas byung ce zhing 'dug par bri ste/rdo rje sde ni gser gyi mdog can la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan por bya'o//gtsug nas byung gi
92b1(rgyud): mdog dmar la mig gsum yod pa glang po che'i lpags pa'i slad g.yogs can klu'i rgyal po nor rgyus kyi so ral kar thogs la rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya'o//khyad par du
92b2(rgyud): rdorje sde'i drung du rdo rje khro ba 'bar le log 'dren rnams 'joms shing 'thor bar dri/rig pa'i mchog 'ad dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can cig mthong ba tsam gyis de shes pa tsam
92b3(rgyud): du gsel ba lag nA rdo rje'i kha nas byung bar bri'o//gzugs de mthong na sngon gyi sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/log 'dren rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs so//gang
92b4(rgyud): ri mo'i gzugs 'di sgrub pa des ni dngos grub kyi mchog nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro//sgrub par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gis zhag gsum bsnyung ba byas te zla ba nya la ri
92b5(rgyud): mo'i gzugs mchod pa rgyas par byas na gsang sngags snga ma dag gis las rnams bya'o//'o mas bkang ba'i snod bzhi dang /zhos bkang ba bzhi dang /de bzhin du ltung ba dang /
92b6(rgyud): sbyar thug gi bkang ba bzhi bzhi dbul zhing 'byung po'i gtor ma yang sbyin no//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dngos grub kyi mtshan ma byung gi bar du nam phyed kyi dus su me tog dri
92b7(rgyud): zhim po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod lan re re sbyor zhing bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yum la bsnun na ri mo'i gzugs 'gul ba dang /me tog gi phreng ba g.yo ba dang /
93a1(rgyud): l+h+wa sa lus 'od nor byung bar 'gyur te ro ma'i gzungs 'bul na nI dadab pa'i las nga shi ba dang /rgyas pa'i cho ga 'grub par 'gyur ro//me drug phreng ngas/
93a2(rgyud): g.yongs na ni dbab pa'i rig sngags kyi tshig 'grub par 'gyur ro//'od zer byung na ni tshig rgyas pa'i dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur te/sgrub par gyur na rdo rje'i rigs thams
93a3(rgyud): cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//'phags pa spyan rab gzigs dbang phyug gis dpal chen ma'i reg sngags kyi cho ga rgyus la lhag ma dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro//ci ste dbang
93a4(rgyud): phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa sgrub par 'o na rig sngags 'chang nges me tog dmar po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod lan ro ra dang sbyar te/dbang phyug chen po la bsnun ni de'i yang
93a5(rgyud): dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro//ci ste phur bu gsum po'i tshig rgyas par sgrub par 'did na rig sngags
93a6(rgyud): 'chang ris me tog nag pa stong rje brgyad bzlas brjod la na ra dang sbyar to/phur bu gsum pa'i ro mo la bsnun na de yang dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/phur
93a7(rgyud): gsum pa pa byas pa'i mthong gi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro//sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir//cho ga 'di ni bdag gis bshad//khyed rnams
93b1(rgyud): yo na dga' bzhin pas//dngos grub dam pa smyon par byos//gang sangs rgyas kyi yum dran pa tsam gyos 'ong bar mi pyod na dngos grub kyang sbyin par mo byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa
93b2(rgyud): skyed bas pa med/ rjes sto ng+ge bkas pad gyu//gang tsho gA rgyas pa de la bya bde la ga dan thams cid dang /mig 'dren thams cad nga /she rjeng byung gyu
93b3(rgyud): nga sgeg par 'gyur ro//gang zhig cho ga dis mtshad ba//de la lha mchog rnams kyis mchod//gang zhig ngas drub mchod pa la//dzA yis chog lnga mched bya//gang zhig chags
93b4(rgyud): mchod dang //thams cad rdzogs pad ma byu ba//du la lazhin dzan+d+ha mos//bshad pa bzhin drungs par 'gag/gang zhig tsug 'di 'chang ba//seMs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis
93b5(rgyud): brlabs//laka na rdo rje dpal ldan pa//de yi lus kyi spyi bor gnas//yi ge bzhi pa zhes bya ba//rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i cho ga rdzogaso////de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na
93b6(rgyud): rdorje bla gas drug pa gcig tu gaper nas dbus ma g.yas pa'i ldangs la btsugs te/bcom ldan las gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
93b7(rgyud): gsol te//skye bo phyi ma rnams dang /sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi skad du rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang /lha thams cad kyi cho ga phyi ma rgyas par bshad par 'tshal na
94a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis gan ngaro mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rdo rje 'dzin
94a2(rgyud): rigasngags kyi rgyal po'i las phyi ma rnams shod cig/de nas bcom ldan 'dres lag na rdo rjes rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po la bsams nas las phyi ma rnams bshad/
94a3(rgyud): de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog gi las 'byung ste/dgon pa 'am/ri'i rtse mo 'am/dben pa'i phyogs su bskyed nul bya ste/thab dbyibs gru bzhir byas la lha bshos
94a4(rgyud): su zho dbul bar bya'o//g.yog byed pa rnams la zho glung do//yang na ngos kun tu khru bcu pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyang nul gyis byugs te der mau sbar la shar phyogasu kha bltas
94a5(rgyud): te 'dug nas be kang ka ta'i yam sreg shing srid du khru gang sboms chad par 'khyud pa/'phan med pa stong rtswa brgya do zho dang /sbrab rtsi dang mar gyi nang du bsnyugs te dus gsum
94a6(rgyud): du sbyin bsreg bya'o//zas su phyo dang 'o ma'i 'dig gu'am/slongs mo'i zas bza' zhing las byas te/mi smra bar bdug cing dus gsum du khrus bya'o//khang pa'i shar phyogs kyi

100b2(rgyud): y-i dwagyes rdzu 'phrul chen po'i bu mo 'byung bar 'gyur te/de dag dang ljon cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de tsha lo sum brgya thub bo//de lo me tog gi rigs rnams ni me
100b3(rgyud): tog gi ming gos dgug par bya'o//dri'i rigs rnams kyi ni dri'i ming rnams kyis dgug par bya'o//yi dwags kyi rigs rnams ni yi dwags kyi ming gis dgug par bya'o//de bkug na/
