100b5(rgyud): phyi ma mtha' dge chub par byed pa la ni rig sngags kyi lha thams cad dang /rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje yang phye bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur te/lha thams cad kyang sems
100b6(rgyud): rangs par 'gyur la dngos grub kyang bde blag tu 'grub par 'gyuraro//cho ga rgyas pa rgyud phyi ma dang bcas pa lag na rdo rje dang /lha chen pos glang bshad pa 'di ni bcom ldan
100b7(rgyud): 'das kyis bstod cing bsngags te/de la lha thams cad sems dka' nas dngos grub spyon par byed do//rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po rig pa mchog gi tshi ga rgyas pa'i
101a1(rgyud): skyong po brgyan pa bcom ldan 'das ma mchog la drag tu bskul ba byed pa gang yin pa de'i snying po chen po rig pa mchog gi snying po la drag tu bskul bar byed
101a2(rgyud): pa yang ngas bshad zin to//rig sngags mchig la drag shul can pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de dag la drag shul bskul bar byed pa de nyid kyi snying po yang ngas bshad zin
101a3(rgyud): te/'di ni dngos grub gnyis ka sbyin par byed pa yin pas na/des ni lha rnams kyang de bzhin du yid bskyod par byed do//nye ba'i snying po bshad pa na lha'i tshogs 'khod pa gang /
101a4(rgyud): yin pa de dag skrag cing 'jigs par 'gyur te/de dag bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la mgo bos phyag 'tshalo nas 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes lha
101a5(rgyud): dge la bka' stsal pa/lha dag rig sngags bshad par byas te re shig khyed la snying po mchog gi los rnams nyon cig/de nas snying po'i las rnams 'byung ste srung ba ni
101a6(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i thal bas bya'o//mtsham bcad pa ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i phur bus bya'o//skud pa ni skyes bya'o//kum bi ra kha bcing bar bya ba ni
101a7(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i gseg mas bya'o//las thams cad dang sgrub pa thams cad la yang rig sngags kyi rgyal po snying po sbyar bar bya'o//sgrub pa'i tshe bgegs
101b1(rgyud): bsal du ni ma sbar la/yungs kar bdag gi khrug gis bsgos pas lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na bgegs thams cad tshoms par 'gyur ro//bgegs thaMd rengs par bya na tsam pa/
101b2(rgyud): ka'i sa bon la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas bya'o//ro langs rnyings pararo bya na lan gsum bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyis bya'o//raM langs sgrub po thams cad
101b3(rgyud): dang /bgegs rengs par bya ba thams cad la ni snying pos bya'o//bdag dang grogs rnams bsrung ba ni bcom ldan 'das mas bya'o//mtshams bcad pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal pos
101b4(rgyud): bya ste/rtsa ba'i las rnams la yang sbyar ro//phyi ma'i las rnams ni bcom ldan 'das ma yum gyis bya'o//rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po'i las rnams sgrub pa ni snying pos phyi ma
101b5(rgyud): las gzhan rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang /bcom ldan 'das mas bya'o//rig sngags kyi rgyal po la ni bcom ldan 'das ma yum gyis bya'o//nye ba'i snying po la ni snying
101b6(rgyud): po'am yum 'am/rlig sngags kyi rgyal pos bya'o//pho nye'i gsang sngags rgyud phyi ma dang bcas pa thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das mas sbyar bar bya'o//nor 'dod na mar gying
101b7(rgyud): zhab brgyad la zhag gcig bsrung ba byos te/log na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgyas par byas la sba ba'i shing gis me sbar nas 'bras dmar rdo la rdo rje byas te/mar gyi nang du
102a1(rgyud): bsnyugs pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dngos grub kyi mtshan mar me tog phreng ba 'gul bar 'gyur ro//grub nas kyang ti na ra lnga brgya 'am yang na yul
102a2(rgyud): sbyin par byed do//skyes pa dbang du bya na mar gyi ngo zhig brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/lha chen po'i gnas su song ste/gzugs kyi g.yas log su urga'i shing gis
102a3(rgyud): mo sbar nas zhag gsum gyi bar du seng ldeng gi yam sreg shing skud pas dkris pa stong rtsi brgyad rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na skyes pa dbang du 'gyuraro//mi'i gtso bo dbang du bya
102a4(rgyud): bar 'dod na yar gyi ngo ches brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/grog mkhar gyi phung po gcig 'dug par song nas de'i steng du me tog dang dri dang /bdug pa phul la de'i
102a5(rgyud): 'og tu a shwat+tha'i shing gis me sbar te yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg lan stong sbyin sreg byas na mi'i gtso bo dbang du 'gyur ro//bud med dbang du bye bar 'dod na zhag gsum gyi
102a6(rgyud): bar du dud pa med pa'i mngag ma la 'bras dang phub ma bsros pas sbyin sreg lon brgya rtsa brgyad byas na dbang du 'gyuraro//yugs sa mo dbang du bya na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du yang
102a7(rgyud): gyi ngo tshes brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te pa le sha'i shing ge me sbar nas ske tshe dang /lan tshwa lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na yugs sa mo dbang du 'gyur ro//
102b1(rgyud): spyan la ma gtogs par gang gsang sngags thams cad la snying gzing bar byed pa dang /gdung bar byed pa dang /rig sngags kyi rgyal po gdung bar byed pa'i snying po dang bcas par sbyar bar
102b2(rgyud): bya'o//de ltar sbar na bde blag du 'grub par 'gyur ro//zla ba gcig gri bar du slongs mo'i zos bza' zhing snying po bzlas brjod byas pa la de'i 'og tu mar gyi zhag brgyad la skyes/
102b3(rgyud): po'i ro ma nyams pa blangs te snying pos gtor ma sbyin zhing de'i lag du lig bu mig bzhag la de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod bya ste yi dgas kyi rig sngags 'chang
102b4(rgyud): gris lag tu lig bu mig 'bul bar 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o//de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/des mig gnyis bskus na gang la reg pa de gser du 'gyur ro//nye ba'i
102b5(rgyud): snying po thogs pa med cing stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa'i phyi ma'i las rnams 'byung ste/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags thams cad kyi
102b6(rgyud): yum gsungs pa gang dran par byas nA rig sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba yin pa dang /rig sngags thams cad kyi nye ba'i snying po dam pa 'jug par byed pa ngas bshad
102b7(rgyud): pa gang yin pa'i spyan dang /nye bo'i snying po dran par byas na rig sngags sgrub par dka' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par byed cing rig sngags rnams las gang dang gang la sbyar ba de la
103a1(rgyud): myur du byed par 'gyur ro//rig sngags gang las thams cad la las mi byed pa de la rig sngags 'chang gi yum dang nye ba'i snying po ldan pas lag na rdo rje
103a2(rgyud): 'am lha chen po'i mdun du sna ma'i me tog mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa brgya stong gis las thams cad bde blag tu dngos grub sbyin par byed do//rig sngags yid la bsams te
103a3(rgyud): grog mkhar gyi sa las gzugs byas la dri dang me tog dang /bdug pas rgyan nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzhag ste yum dang nye ba'i snying por ldan pas sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya
103a4(rgyud): bsnun na rmi lam du ston te de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro//rmi lam nyid du rig sngags 'grub pa 'am yang na mi 'grub pa yin pa'i rig sngags thams cad ston par byed de/
103a5(rgyud): de ltar rtogs nas rig sngags bde blag tu bsgrub par bya'i gzhan du ma yin no//yer gyi ngo tshes brgyad nas brtsams te rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi nang du zhugs la
103a6(rgyud): slongs mo'i zas za zhing len 'bum bzlas pa rjod byas na yul sbyin par 'gyur ro//yar gyi ngo tshe sa brgyad nas nya'i bar du zas 'o ma dang phye'i 'dag gu za zhing reg sngags
103a7(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na gzhan gyi yul 'khor la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro//de nas zas su chu dang phye'i 'dag gu za zhing bzlas brjod byas na dmog gi dpung 'joms par byed do//
103b1(rgyud): mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te 'phags po lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yas pa'i the bong bzung nas nye ba'i snying po bzlas brjod byas na ci tsam na lag na rdo rje'i rkang
103b2(rgyud): pa'i mthe bong las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur te/'od zer des kyang rig sngags 'chang g.yas phyogs su bskur nas lag ni rdo rje'i spyi bor mo snang bar 'gyur ro//de nas 'grub
103b3(rgyud): par 'gyur te rgyal po sbyin par byed cing che lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro//slongs mo'i zas za zhing rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi nang du zhugs te nye ba'i snying po spyan dang bcas par
103b4(rgyud): lan 'bum bzlas brjod do byas la de nas rig sngags 'chang gis chu'i nang du yungs kar gyi sbyin blugs lan brgya stong byas na bar snang la ral gri mthong bar 'gyur te de blang bar
103b5(rgyud): bya'o//ci ste snang bar mi byed na ni rig sngags 'chung gis rig pa mchog bzlas brjod byas ni snang bar 'gyur te 'gro dpag can gyi rig sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du blang
103b6(rgyud): bar bya'o//de blangs pas skra lcang lor 'khyil cing lo bcu drug lon pa'i she tshugs can du 'gyur te/dpag tshad nyes stong gyen du 'phags pa dang /rig sngogs 'chang thod
103b7(rgyud): kyis mi sod pa dang /tshe lo nyis stong thub por 'gyur ro//gter 'byung bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gnas gang na gter yod par song la tshes grangs dang rgyu skar yang bdam
104a1(rgyud): mi dgos/bsnyung ba yang bya mi dgos par bil ba'i me'i nang du yungs kar dang /pad+ma'i lo ma sregs pa la nye ba'i snying po lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na bAt+ta
104a2(rgyud): bIg+hu ng+ges rmi lam du ston par byed do//de nas rig pa sna chog gi bgegs rnams kyi sbyin sreg byas nis blang bar bya'o//dga' byed gding gis gnas srung ba bya'o//1
104a3(rgyud): bas ni mar mye thar bair b+he ste/be le shrI rI ar+g+ha'i shing blta gyis dkris lce/zlas ri ma'i mor gyis mying me sbyor ba bit+te glid na yod pa de brtul te/ chog tshig po 'gyu
104a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//yang na srin phyis ana'i shing bal gyis dkris la rdo rje khro bo'i sngags dang ldan pas srog chags gau ta'i rmil gyis mur me sbyar ro//mtshan ma ni de nyid dang
104a5(rgyud): 'dra'o//nag pa la'i una'i shing bal gyis pa lkogs twa pad+ma'i rgyu sa pas dkris lce mI 'i tshil gyis sbyad te bzung ngo //mtshan moni de nyid dang 'dra ste snying ba chen po zhes
104a6(rgyud): nam sa rnam pa sna tsho gas mabyung nas n+na 'i rnye pa'i m+b+ha rnaMms bshang ba yin na// pa'i snying ba snrubs ldan pa//gang de ni snying rjes med pa dang //
104a7(rgyud): chung ngung dag ni/pa ril byin pa rdzogs phyi'i phyir//gtar gyi dzA y-i khyad par dag/ nagis su ni ba shad par bya//bcom ldan lagan rdo rje yis//de nas tshig ni 'di ni /
104b1(rgyud): /sa//gta sh+lo gang ngag rgyang sna pa yis//gsang sngags kyis ni sbyor ba dang //tshogs ni ngas bzhug pa//ma rnams chog med pa dang //stobs dang mthu ni med pa yis//rtag tu tshams
104b2(rgyud): par mi 'gyur te//gang gis mi rnams bde blag tu//longs par spyad par 'gyur ba dang //pha rol phyin pa'ang rdzogs byed dang //ji ltar nor rnams rab bzhag pa//de dag bdag gis
104b3(rgyud): bshad par bya//bcom ldan lag na rdo rje yis//de skad du ni tshig kyang smras//gter gyi sgo ni rab bshad pa//sa mthar rgya mtsho thug pa yi//sa yi 'og gnas gang yin pa/
104b4(rgyud): bdag gis su ni rab bshad kyis//lha rnams kyis ni mnyan par gyis//de dag gis ni kha dog mtshan//gsang sngags gang gis gzhom pa dang //cho ga ji bzhin las rnams dang //
104b5(rgyud): bde blag tu ni thob pa yi//sbyar sman bdag gis bshad par bya//de dag gi ni mtshan ma yang //so so ru ni bshad par bya//gru gsum du ni zla ga mA dang //zlum po dang ni zur bani
104b6(rgyud): dang //pad+ma chu shing lo ma dang //de bzhin gzhan ma bsil yob 'dra//gter gyi sgo ni brgyad bshad pa//de dag kha dog legs par nyon//deng pa'i mdog 'dra gter sgo yod//
104b7(rgyud): ka ra bi ra'i mdog 'dra dang //'dam bu chu gsher 'dra ba dang //rgya skyegs khu ba'i kha dog 'dra//ljang ku'i mdog can gter sgo yod//ba bla'i mdog dang dra ba dang /gi'u wang gi ni
105a1(rgyud): kha dog 'dra//de bzhin 'bring ga rA dang mtshungs//kha dog bshad pa 'di dag gis//gter sgo rnams kyi bgegs gsal bzhin//steng dang sa 'og gnas
105a2(rgyud): pa yi//bgegs rnams gang gis brlag 'gyur ba'i//sbyin sreg las ni cho ga rnams//rab tu bshad kyis mnyan par gyis//gter sgo gsang sngags gang gis bgod//
105a3(rgyud): dA dag rim pa bshad par bya//na mo badz+ra pA Na ye/na mo ruM drA ya/na mo ma hA bi d+ya rA dzA yA/bi ru dri Ne swA hA/ra ra nA ra swA hA/oM ga nA ya swA hI/bi ru pi Ni swA hA/
105a4(rgyud): te b+ha ri swA hA/mu ka ti ni swA hA/bi muM tai ni swA hA/pre ta hi swA hA/bi dA ra Ni swA hA/haurga kho swA hA/ga gI ne swA hA/bi hA ra Ni swA hA/aM gi ri Ni swA hA/bi ri ge Ne
105a5(rgyud): swA hA/mr-i hA ba ra te swA hA/ri NaM pa Ni swA hA/ka ri pi re bi ka ra swA hU~M/bi rU pI swA hA/ma ri pa swA hA/badz+nyA ni swA hA/gar+N+Na ni swA hA/marma Ni swA hA//ku ni pa ti na swA hA/
105a6(rgyud): sa la dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bskyang nul du byugs la ku shi'i stan pa ting le shar phyogasu khaM bltas te 'dug nas gtsang sgra dang /tshangs par spyod pa dang /dbang po
105a7(rgyud): dul bar bya ste/zas su chu gro go 'thung zhing las brtsams la cho ga 'dis lha thams cad bkod nas khur ba bkra shis ldan dang /pan tse dang /tsa no dan dri zhim po dag phyogs
105b1(rgyud): dang mtshams kyi lha rnams la dbul zhing zho dang dmar dag spangs te/sngags snga mas shra mya'i yam srab shing mArar+ya gyi nang du myags pa brgya stong sbyin bsreg bya'o//bgrogs thaMd
105b2(rgyud): phung bar byed pa'i gcod byed ces bya ba'i rig sngags bstan par bya ste/nu mo badz+nyA pa Ni s+ya/ku ti ku ti/tsi ti tsi ti/mai ta me ti/ri Ni ri Ne/mo ti nau pra mo ti ni swA hA/
105b3(rgyud): sngags 'dres yungs karA la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te phyogs bzhir gtor ni srung ba byas par 'gyur ro//nu mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/a mu ra a ma ra/ma ri ka ti ni tI na ti la
105b4(rgyud): ti swA hA/rig sngags 'dis yungs kar la bzlas badz+rad byas to/mgo bor gtor na bai gegs rnams 'tsha bar mi byed do//na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ku ta ku ti//tu ti tu ti/hA ra ha/
105b5(rgyud): ra swA hA/rig sngags 'di chu la bzlas brjod byas pa'i sar bzhag na me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //gter sgo kun kyi bgegs rnams ni rnam pa brgyad du rab bshad do/mi ro
105b6(rgyud): ngag ni mi'u thung dang /'jigs par byed pa skad cig pa//glang po che dang ma he dang /rab tu 'jigs pa'i srin po dang //stag dang bya dang spyil po tsam//bgegs rnams brgyad po
105b7(rgyud): rab bshad de/de dag phung bar bya ba'i phyir//rig sngags 'di ni sbyar bar bya//na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/a ri ba ri/ti ri mi ri/tsi ri mi ri/par pa ni ra Ni/ki ri ki r-i/
106a1(rgyud): ka li ka li/mi ri mi ri/shI ri shi ri/nA sha nI nA sha ni/sto b+ha ni staM b+ha ni/mo ha ni swA hA/reg sngags 'di dang /rig sngags kyi rgyal pos yungs kar la
106a2(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas te/phyogs bzhir gtor na bgegs thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro//na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo b+ha ga ba te pra hA yA/khe ri bi bi ki ri/na ri ba na ri/mo
106a3(rgyud): ha ni ha ri ha ri pro ShA Ni swA hA/rig sngags 'di chu la bzlas brjod byas te/phyogs bzhir gtor ni bgegs thams cad bcom zhing mi snang bar 'gyur ro//na mo badz+ra pA Ni
106a4(rgyud): s+yan mo mi ri mi ri/ts+tshin dI tsan dI/man+t+ri swA hA/gsang sngags 'di tshu la bzlas brjod byas te phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnamasu gtor na phyogs btsir bar
106a5(rgyud): byas par 'gyur te/khA yi gzugs ni mi snang 'gyur/'phur zhing che la gsum du snang //spyil po tsam zhes bya ba ni//phyogs rnams kun tu zhi bar 'gyur//gter gyi
106a6(rgyud): sgra yi rim ni//thod pa rab 'dra rtogs par bya//de ni phur bu zer snang ba//'ja' khugs 'dra po'i 'o dang bcas//phur buM de ni dpal gzugs ldan//de la lag pas reg
106a7(rgyud): mi bya//lus ni sbyar sman bskus nas kyang //de nas phur bu dbyung bar bya//gang gis sa la de lhung ba'i//na mkha'i bub ma shu dag yung //nim pa'i lo ma ldong ros dang //
106b1(rgyud): sgrog skye nas dang shing kun rnams//mi khrag gis ni sbyar ba yi//byug pas de la bsdu bar bya//de nas sa la lhung bar 'gyur//de ltar ma byas nas mi 'gyur//shri rI sha yi me tog dang //
106b2(rgyud): dedri yi rtse ba shun phrags dang //ru rta rgyu spos 'bri ha ti//yungs kar 'di rnams cha mnyam po//rAgacin dag dang brtag par bya//lus la bskus pa'i sbyar sman 'di//khrag 'joms pa
106b3(rgyud): yi mchog yin no//ru rta dang ni rgya spos dang //leg bu mig dang ldong ros bcas//sbal pa'i tshil dang ldan byas te//dud pa'i mig rtsi rab sbyar ba//'di ni mig rtsi'i rgyal po ste//
106b4(rgyud): gter gyi sgo rnams gcod pa yin//nya ri kun da'i shun phrags blang //sin du ba ra'i gi'u wang bcas//bring ge'i dud pas rab tu bdugs//'di ni sbyar sman mchog yin te//sbyar
106b5(rgyud): sman gyis ni lus bskus nas//de nas phur bu dbyung bar bya//ci ste snang bar mi byed na//khra yi 'khrul 'khor rengs byed cing //bgegs kun phung bar byed pa yi//ri drag so 'di ni//
106b6(rgyud): de yis sbyar//ka ruM prA ku ruM ga/dI byaM/rU pi Na/kan+de tu ma ba ka gaM tra/saM b+ha be bing du lu ni/kuM mi ni/hI hI ni/hA hA hU nI/ki ri ki ri/kA la ka ra NaM/ma hA bi d+yA
106b7(rgyud): ha ra ha ro ha ra ha ra ha raM/tsa la tsa li tsa laM/ra ra ra/thaM tha tha/sha she sha stam+b+ha ya nA shai ya nA sha yaM/ha ri hi raM/gi rnaM gr-i ni/hun+da hun dgri na mu ya/ha na prah+ma Ni/pa te ni/
107a1(rgyud): mo ha ni/bau tsi ri/ma ba na/tha ra tha ra/mi ti mi ti/sai ti si ti/mi ri mi ri/bi ri bai ri/hi ri hi ri/do mya ni de mya ni/bi tra ba ti/pa ta nau/pa ta nI/ha ha ha ni
107a2(rgyud): swAhA/phur bu 'byin pa na mdog gsum du btsal te/chu dang yungs kar gyis bsnun na/khra de rengs par mi 'gyur ro//yang nA rgyung ring por lhung bar 'gyur te/rig sngags
107a3(rgyud): 'dis ni bgegs thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro//na mo badz+ra pA Na ya/na mo ru drA ya/na mo brah+ma ya/ga ra shi ri shi re ri/siM si ri ri/mi ri/ba ba pa swA hA/rig sngags
107a4(rgyud): 'di 'am yang na gos dkar can gyis gtsug phud bcing bar bya'o//deng gis nor rnams blangs bya ba'i//gru gsum 'joms pa 'di yin te//kho ra khor yug spyad byes la//rab
107a5(rgyud): tu bsgrims te brtag par bya//de yi mtshams kyi dbus dag tu//ri mo gru gsum gnag pa yod//ci ste de ltar mi snang na//de nas 'o mar gtor bar byo//a pa ma rga'i
107a6(rgyud): thal smen gyis//mkhas pa dag gis rab gtor zhing //dung gi phye mas phyi bar bya//kho ra khor yug gtor bya zhing //gtor dang byi dor byas nas kyang //tsi ste mtshan ma mthong
107a7(rgyud): 'gyur na//sbyar sman gyis ni bskus na yang //lcags kyi khar bso brdab byas na//chags par 'gyur te gzhan du min//zla gam ngag gi dbus dag na//bkra shes ldan
107b1(rgyud): pa'i gzugs kyang snang //ci ste de ltar mi snang na//thal ba'i sman 'di sbyar bar bya//e 'dre bye'u rug lo ma rnams//mnyam par gzhag pas btsir nas ni//ba gcin dag dang lhan cig sbyar/
107b2(rgyud): bskol nas gtor ba byas nas ni/bkra shis ldan pa der snang ste//'di la blo ldan the tsom med//sbyar sman gyis ni bskus nas kyang //lcags kyi khar bas brdab par bya//des na
107b3(rgyud): sa la de ltang ste//rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med//bzlum po gzhom pa'i cho ga yis//sbyar bar bya ba rab bshad do//khi ra khor yug sbyangs nas ni//rab tu bsgrims te brtag par bya//
107b4(rgyud): pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i mdog 'dra ba//sbrul mgo gdengs ka'i ri mo snang //ci ste de dag mi snang na//thal ba'i sman 'di sbyar bar bya//ka li sho yi sa bon dang //bcod rnams dang ni ba gtson
107b5(rgyud): gyis//sbyar nas kun tu blugs par bya//de nas mtshan ma snang 'gyur tAM//sbyar sman gyis ni lus bskus nas//lcags kyi khar ba brdab par bya//des na des ni 'jig 'gyur te//
107b6(rgyud): rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med//gra bzhi po yi ri mo yang //gru bzhi yin te bshad par bya//ci ste de ni mi snang na//thal ba'i sman ni sbyar bar bya//sU ha sha ra'i yal ga blangs//
107b7(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pas btsir byas la//ba gcin gyis ni sbyar nas kyang //mkhas pa y-is ni blugs par byi//blugs nas mtshan mo snang 'gyur te//de la sman gyis bskus byas
108a1(rgyud): shing //lcabs kyi khang bas brdab byas na//chag par 'gyur te gzhan du min//pad+ma yi ni dbus su yang //snying po dag ni sdung ba yod//sman rnams kyis na
108a2(rgyud): lus bskus nas//rdo ba yis ni brdab bya zhing //de ni snying po gzhom par bya//de na yod par the tsho mi med//ji ltar bdag bris bzhug pa bzhin//lhag par yang mi blang bar bya//
108a3(rgyud): chu shing lo ma'i dbye bas 'dra ba//sbyar ba'i thabs ni mnyan par bya//de ni mtshan ma snang ba ni//gi'u wang thig le 'dra ba yi//ri mo gnyis ni sum yang rung //yang na bzhi 'am/
108a4(rgyud): lnga yod do//mtshan ma 'di dag snang bar 'gyur//ci ste mtshan mo me snang na//thal ba'i sman 'di sbyar bar bya//a shwat+tha dang pa ta pa'i//lo ma a pa marga rnams//ra ya
108a5(rgyud): gcen gyis sbyar nas su//kho ra khor yug blugs par bya//blugs mi thag tu snang 'gyur te//sbyor sman gyis ni bskus nas kyang //lcags kyi khar bar brdab byas na//
108a6(rgyud): chags par gyur te gzhan du min/bsil yib dag dang 'dra ba ni//yu bar bcas par snang bar 'gyur//bshor gyis legs par sbyang byas la//de yis mtshan ma brtag
108a7(rgyud): par bya//ci ste don mi snang ni//thal ba'i sman 'di sbyar bar bya//in+d+ra shing gi la ma dang //nir rgun dag gi lo ma dag/rta yi gi con gyis sbyar nas kyang //kho ra khor
108b1(rgyud): yug blugs nas ni//de nas mtshan ma snang ba der//sbyar sman gyis ni bskus nas kyang //lcags kyi khar bar brdab byas na//chag par 'gyur te gzhan du min//chu shing lo ma 'dra ba
108b2(rgyud): las//ru sbal rgyab dang 'dra ba dang //rdo rje ci ste rang 'ongs pa//de ni gzhom du med pa yin//gter gyi sgo ni thams cad la//phur bu rnam pa bzhi yid do//dbang po gshin rje
108b3(rgyud): lus ngan dang //khyab 'jug phur bu bzhi pa'o//gter gyi sgro ni thams cad du//rig sngags 'dis gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/gshin rje la ni bsreg bya rnams so//khyab 'jug
108b4(rgyud): la ni 'bras can sna tshogs pa'o//ku be ra lA ni sbyar thug go/dpal ldan la ni 'bras kyi 'o thug sbyin par bya'o//na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/nan+te su nAn+te/go bin+te/ri tiM ri ti
108b5(rgyud): mri ti mi ta/mo ri ti swA hA/sngags 'dis ci 'dod pa'i gtor ma thams cad byin la/de nas los brtsamo par bya'o//gzhor gyi sngags no 'di yin te//ni mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/
108b6(rgyud): ti shi ya bi te sha ya/na mo ma hA ShI yA ya swA hA/sngags 'dri dag gis chu la bzlas brjod byas te/gsang gtor bya ste de nas las bya'o//de lA pra tAr sgo gcog pa'i mchog/
108b7(rgyud): rdo rje rnams dang gzhan yang gang //khri yi rigs rnams gcog pa yi//sbyar sman rnams kyang bshad par bya//ka na ka ya~M rtsa ba dang //a sha na ga ti gi bang dang //spu yi rtsa ba
109a1(rgyud): 'di dag rnams//arga dar pa shun drags dang //ral bu snyan+da tsam byas nus kyang //grib ma dag tu bsgom par bya//gtor sgo thams cad gtsog pa 'di
109a2(rgyud): 'byung po'i mchog ces bya ba yin//'bam po dang ni gcod rnams dang //gi bang ldong ros bcas pa dang //ka ra ba ra'i rtsa ba dang //arga dkar po'i shun brags dang /
109a3(rgyud): sho ni kA yi shun brags dang //'di dag cha ni bsnyams byas la//bA gcin dag dang brtag par bya//gter sgo thams cad gcog pa yi//sbyar sman dag gi dam pa ste//
109a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rjes bshad pa yin//Ag+ni man+ta'i lo maM dang //e ran+ta yi rtsa ba dang //sU ha ga shi ri sgo skya rnams//ba gcin dag dang brtag par bya//gi ter sge gcog pa'i
109a5(rgyud): sbyar sman 'di//rdo rje zhes ni bya ba yi ni//kaM ra bi ra'i rtse ba dang //chu shing sa bon sgyur pa dang //yung dang nAg tA ma la dang //ga ri kar ni dkar po rnams//bi gcin dag
109a6(rgyud): drang brtag par bya//sbyar sman gya ni rgyal po 'di//gter sgo gcog pa'i mchog yin no//bi dr-i dzA h+ya mo ra ti//de bzhin ram nye'u yungs kar rnams//pa gcin gyis
109a7(rgyud): ni legs sbyar ba//gau tar sgo gcog pa'i dam pa yin//baM lung gi ni me tog dang //shal la ka yi snying po dang //'bam po s+t+ri ha k+Shi ri dang //gi'u wang dag dang ldan
109b1(rgyud): par ni//ragacin dag dang brtag byas pa//rdo rje 'joms pa'i mchog yin no//kro sha ta ka'i sa bon dang //kro bI ra yi 'bras bu dang //du ru ka yi lo ma rnams//bA gcan dag dang
109b2(rgyud): brtag byas la//zhag grangs bzhi bcu dgur bzhag pa//rdo rje 'joms pa'i dam pa yin//pa ri dze ti'i rtsa ba dang //su bA ra sna deng ta ka dang /spen pa yi ni lo ma dang /
109b3(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang ni shing kra dang //gi'u wang dag dang sbyar ba ni//gter sgo gcog pa'i dam pa yin//sbyar sman dam pa 'di dag nI//rdo rje 'joms pa yin par bshad//gser
109b4(rgyud): rnams blang bar 'dod pa yi//lag pa bsku pa dA las nyon//ru rta dang ni rgya spos dang //a li ta dang mo ra to//lag pa bsku ba'i mchog yin te/rdo rje 'bar byed 'jigs pa yin//
109b5(rgyud): zhezham thig le yi sa bon dang //nAg ta me le'i 'bras bu rnams//pa gcin dag dang sbyar ba ni//bde bar byed pa'i lag skud yin//pad+ma'i rtsa ba rgya spos dang //sa ra gshi dang /
109b6(rgyud): spu rnams ni//ra li gcin dang legs sbyar ba'i//bde bar byed pa'i lag skud yin//ko gan+da 'dzi yi sa bon dang /ka ri ni ka ra'i me ta gi dang //pr-i yang ka dang rgya spos dang /
109b7(rgyud): su ra bi dang can dan dkar/gi'u wang dag dang ldan pa ni/bde bar byed pa'i lag skud yin//sgo glegs lag pas reg pa na//mtshams nas kyang ni 'bye bar 'gyur//
110a1(rgyud): / sa //ga sngags don sgyu ra //rmu d+hAr+m+ma d+hA N+Da Sh+Tha//glu thugs las tshul lan dadun du rdzun
110a2(rgyud): sgra glegs kyi ngos la gtar na 'ongs par 'gyur te/bde b+hag tu zung bdo 'gyur ro//gI ti gyo so rnams thams ca ste//rig sngags 'di ni sbyar bar //rangs
110a3(rgyud): byed mongs byed dge ba ste//bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms byed pa//tshangasanyid kyi byas pa ste//rmongs byed yo them pa'i phyir//ri rab brtul nas byung ba ste//
110a4(rgyud): d+hiD+hA lpA mo rnams dang nI//mi 'am tsIs ni rab tu mched//'jamaso par byed cing sgrog byed po//lha yi gzugs ldan blo gros che//rig sngags 'di ni bAshad bA Sh+Ta/
110a5(rgyud): mr-i k+Shil+le/bi gA le k+ki h+NaHb+hI ma~M gi/ha na ha~M na/shU le na bi ra ya 'dziN/kau li ka~M k+ShAn/s+thAs+t+wa~M ya ru dwi Ni/den ha na ha naM shaMk+te na/kai ri ki d+hI/tsau r-iHra/
110a6(rgyud): m+b+hi R+Shin+ti ri/na rA ti na r+yA ti/thaM ra tha ra/tha thaM/rar/ba tA yang tama?/staMm+b+ha ya s+yAm+b+ha yA/pai ta ya baM tA ma/gar+dz+dza gardzi/mardza madz+ra/tar+Na tar+dz+dza/kI ki ni/
110a7(rgyud): kaMka ni/duts+tshad+d+hi dUn+nad+hI/kuk+ka daMSh+Ta kA rA mAn na/kan ni de bya \u0f7fsa me drA/dad+ya braSh+Ta//kata ka he//dngag has+t+wa~M/na
110b1(rgyud): ru dra yA nAM ny+dza shA no/ya dA kr-I dA se/gr-i pA ga gr-i pA/ga glau bA/yur bA ra Ni/an+na kA ro swa yau ka sha kau ma ku Ta/tsan+d+ro ka/shraR+Sho/de ba gAn d+harma/yak+Sha bing+ga/da rau a tso to/
110b2(rgyud): s+yA pU dze te/dr-i dA dr-i bA/the thi/ma ba ba s+pha rnam pa/ha haM pa/sha kAM pa/tsi twe/ha nu ha na/stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ma hA bi d+yA tsa turmu khro dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hAM/rig sngags
110b3(rgyud): 'dis yungs kar dang /chu dang thal ba rnams las gang yang rung ba gcig blangs te/rig sngags bzlas ni brjod byas la phyogs bzhir gtor na be gegs thams cad rengs
110b4(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing //dgra yang bcom par 'gyur ro//de nyid kyis bsad pa dang /gnyid leg tu gzhug pa dang /mun par bya ba dang /grar dang glu dang rol mo la sogs pa byed du
110b5(rgyud): gzhug pa dang /gzhan yang sems can mi snang ba gang yin pa dag dang /snang ba gang yin pa dag dang /bgegs dang log 'dren gang yin pa dang /ci ste rgyal po'i pho brang ngam//
110b6(rgyud): dur khrod kyi gnod pa byung ngam/sbrul gyis bcings pa'ang rung /gzhan yang sems can gnod par byed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'joms par byed cing rmongs par
110b7(rgyud): byed pa yin ne zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis de skad bshad do//gser len pa na rdo rje lag na thogs shing rig sngags kyi mchog 'dis sbyin bsreg legs par bya'o//
111a1(rgyud): /nam d+hA rmAHb+h+ya/ngo ba~M t+tA ya m+b+hat+ma/trIk+to sakA la d+hA ma s+t+wa~MH/kro ba~MSh+TA nA ya/pa n+d+ha As+thAHAR+that+ma/nAn d+hU pa tA ya sU/shA yA y+YA rmAHswA
111a2(rgyud): li bi gra re tA ya swA hA/ba hu yak+saM ya swA hA/ya sne hA/ga NA ya swA hA/ga Na pi ta ye swA hA/ka ma rU pa yaM swA hA/kaM li ni swA hA/pyaM g+hA ya swA hAM/byA g+hA d+hi pa tA yaM swA hAM/
111a3(rgyud): rAk+ShA sI ya swA hA/rak+Sha sA b+hi pi ta se sI hA/kha T+Ti ya swA hA/khaD+hA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ru drA ya swA hA/ya mA ya swA hA/ba ru NA ye sA hA/ku bai rA ya sAM hAM/pri thi bya swA tA/
111a4(rgyud): mA tI bya swA hA/brah+ma ye swA hA/gang gsang sngags 'di dag gis sha ma'i yi sreg shing brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byis na bgegs thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro zhes
111a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis bshad de/de yang 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'joms pa'i nye ba'i snying po dang ldan pas sbyin bsreg bya'o//yang na nye ba'i snying po
111a6(rgyud): gcig pus bya'o//dri ltar ma byas na brlag par bya'o//de nas dbang ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das stobs po che pha rol gnon pa
111a7(rgyud): mi rnams la phan pa'i phyir nyon par 'tshal ba de badrag la gsungs shig/khyu rnams bshad pa du zhig mchis//brtson 'grus methu b+h+yo bris ji tsam lags//bdun /
111b1(rgyud): the tsom de dag gsungs//ji bzhin du ni gsungs pa'i rigs//rdo rje 'dzin tshon mnga' bdag gis//dbang ldan gyi ni cho ga thos nas//dadang ldan gzi brjid chen po pa//tshangs pas/
111b2(rgyud): bshad pa'i khra de nyid//sngon ni sa 'di stong dag na//rtag tu gter rnams mang po yod//gter de dag ni srung ba'i phyir//tshangs pa nyid kyis khra rnams yod//khwa yi rnam
111b3(rgyud): pa brgyad bshad pa//brtson 'grus che zhing stobs po che//lag na rdo rje bka' mchog gis//de dag gang gis brgyar 'gyes dang //gtor ma sngags rnams ji bzhin pa//
111b4(rgyud): de dag bdag gis bshad par bya//gnag dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar//mgrin pa 'thon kar grags pa dang //kr-i pi na dza ra mig dmar dang //mdab br-i kra dang ni shel mig
111b5(rgyud): can/de la nag po gshin rje lhar 'dzin pa yin no//dkar po ni tshangs pa lhar 'dzin pa yin no//de bzhin du mgrin pa 'thon ka ni smin drug gi bu lhar 'dzin pa yin no//ka pi na
111b6(rgyud): dza ra ni khyab 'jug lhar 'dzin pa yin no//mig dmar ni ku be ra lhar 'dzin pa yin no//de bzhin du mdab bkra ni dbang po lhar 'dzin pa yin no//shel mig can ni sa'i lha
111b7(rgyud): lhar 'dzin pa yin no//khra de dag gi kha dog mtshan//rtags rnams bdag gis bshad pa yin//de dag gi ni mdog dang dbyibs//rims bzhin du ni bshad par bya//
112a1(rgyud): nag po yin gzugs gang dang //mthu stabs gang yon rab gsha //kha dog rab tu gnag pa dang //bong tshad che zhing 'jigs par byed//dpag rgyud gci/
112a2(rgyud): na gnas bzhin phra//dril bu'i skad 'dra 'byin par byed//gtor ma 'dod phyir yang dang yang //de bzhin rgyun tu skad kyang 'byin//gang gis zhi bar 'gyur ba yi/
112a3(rgyud): zas rnams kyang ni bshad par bya//shrI bces de bzhin brdos pa rnams//bya rje la ni sbyin par bya//myur du sdigs kyang sbyor bya zhing //gtor mA yang ni sbyin par bya//
112a4(rgyud): na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/kr-iSh+Na k+Sha ya~M/kr-iSh+Na dwI pa ta ye swA hA/gtor ma la yang sngags 'dis bsngags la do nas sbyin par bya'o//dkar po yi ni gzugs gang dang /
112a5(rgyud): mthu stobs gang yin rab baMshad de//nr-i mkha'i la dge bskor byas nas//de ni chu skyar mdag 'dra yi//mdab ma'i shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur//rgyun tu kho ra khor
112a6(rgyud): yug nas//mdab ma'i bsheg sgra chen po yis//'brug sgra chen po 'byin par byed//gnas rnams ni lan cig 'am//lan+da gnyis lan gsum bskor bar byed//
112a7(rgyud): gdon rnams lan gsum tshang ze'i bar//de srid du ni gtor ma sbyin//sna ba 'bras yos mar dag gis//gtor ma rnams ni sbyin par bya//sngags la na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya
112b1(rgyud): sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya pa pa ta ye/shaM pA d+hi pa ta yo swA hA/dmar po yi ni gzugs gang dang //mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad do//bzhad bzhin du ni skad 'byin zhing //zab mo'i
112b2(rgyud): sgra ni rab tu sgrags//lan lnga'i bar du skad 'byin zhing /da na myur du 'ong bar byed//ji srid lan lnga skad 'byin pa//de srid du ni gtor ma spyan//dri da mar dang ni me tog dmar//
112b3(rgyud): pu la li ka sbyin par bya//bza' ba dang nI la tu dang //til kye khu ba sbyin par bya//sngags la/na mo badz+ro pA Ni s+yarak+te rak+ta/kle rAk+tA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/mgrin pa thon ka'i
112b4(rgyud): gzugs gang dang //mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad de//sder mos kyang ni brang bar byed//de ni khwa ltar skad 'byon cing //lan bdun bar du skad 'byin te//de ni myur du 'ong bar
112b5(rgyud): 'gyur//gtor ma myur du sbyin par bya//sngags kyang legs par dran par bya//len tshA med pa'i shwa sbyin cing //yam bsreg shing yang sbyin par bya//gtor ma'i las ni 'di dag
112b6(rgyud): gIs//de ni myur du lhung Tar 'gyur//sngags la/na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/nI l-i ga sho/nAM la to dza/nI l-I d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/kiM pan dzaM ri'o gzugs gang dang //mthu stobs gang
112b7(rgyud): yin rab bshad de//srin bya bzhin du yang dang yang //skad po che ni 'byin par byed//myur ba myur bar skad 'byin cing //de bzhin sgra yang lan gsum 'byin//nye ba dag tu 'ong
113a1(rgyud): 'gyur//de tshe zas kyang sbyin par bya//gsang sngags kyis ni bya ba yin//khrag gis su nI bkang ba yi//sngon sum dag kyang sbyin par byeng //de bzhin nya
113a2(rgyud): dang sha rjen sbyin//sngags la/na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+yo/ka ra li/ba ka ra li/ka ra lA d+hi pa te ye swA hA/mig dmar gyi ni gzugs gang dang //mthu stongs gang yin ra
113a3(rgyud): bshad de//rta bzhin du ni skad 'byin cing //kha ra ba'i sgra lhur tsher tshar po//de bzhin sgra tsher sgrogs par byed//me lce 'bar ba kha nas 'byin//the tsom med cing
113a4(rgyud): myu du ni//de la gte ri ma sbyin por bya//de bzhin rdo rjen pa dang //chang gis bkang ze'i snod kyang byin//sngags la ni mo badz+ra pA NI s+yA/rok+ShA na tA rak+ta ni ba/rak+Sha
113a5(rgyud): pa ta ye swA hA/'dab bkra yi ni gzugs gang dang //mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad de//'brug sgra bzhin du skad 'byin cing //de yang de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur//rang gi lus
113a6(rgyud): las de bzhin 'dag//glog gi rgyud 'drar snang bar 'gyur//rnga mo lhur ni brtul zhing 'ong //ngur pa bzhin du yang dang yang //lan brgyad du ni skad 'byin cing //de ni myur
113a7(rgyud): du'ang bar 'gyur//de la gtor ma sbyin bya zhing //gsang sngags kyang ni bya ba yin//bu ra zho dang sbyar ba yi//zas kyang rab tu sbyin par bya//sngags lo//na mo badz+ra ni s+ya/
113b1(rgyud): tsitra ts+yai tA klo//pi tsa tI d+hU pA ta ye swA hA/shel mig can gyi gzugs gang dang //mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad do//na mkha' dag ni khebs par byed//de ni dal nas dong bar byed//
113b2(rgyud): glang po che ltar skad 'byin cing //'deb mas rlung ni g.yo bar byed//'drab ma dA ni rlung gis su//grang bar yang ni byed par 'gyur//skad ni lan gnyis 'byin byed cing //de ni khong
113b3(rgyud): kyis 'ong bar 'gyur//de la gtor ma sbyin bya zhing //gsang sngags kyar ni bya ba yin//de bzhin mar deng sbyar bya yi//nas kyi zos kyang sbyin par bya//ba yi mor dang de bzhin sha
113b4(rgyud): bu raM chang gis bkang bar sbyin//sngagaso la/na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ke ka rak+Sha ka kar dri ti/kaM ka rA d+hi pa to yai swAhA/khra 'di dag nr-i bdag gis su//mtshon bcas che gar ldan par
113b5(rgyud): bshad//gang zhig khra ni nog po yi//sngags las brten te las brtsom pa//de la 'jigs pa ci yang rung //cung zad kyang ni 'byung mi 'gyur//de la sbrang rtsi 'o ma sbyar//de
113b6(rgyud): las 'gal bar las bya ba//gang yin de ni bdag nyid brlag/bdag nyid chen po khra 'di dag/mchod pa byas na ldog 'gyur te//lage na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin//khra tha~Md kyi
113b7(rgyud): gsang sngags ni lhag por spyan dang rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang sbyar bar bya'o//khra gzhom pa'i rig sngags tshongs pas smras pa/ngas bshad zin te/de dang sbyar zhing las bya'o//
114a1(rgyud): ngas kyang khru thams cad phung bar bya ba'i phyir gtum po mi bzang ba'i rig sngags gang thos pas brag la thog thog 'bab pa bzhin du dum bu brgyar 'gro bar
114a2(rgyud): 'gyur bar bshad par bya'o//na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ma hU~M tsan+ta tsan+d+ra tsin+ta na ma na tsa ma ne/stem+b+ha ni/dzam+b+ha ni/mo ha ni/hi hi ga ka re ye swA hA/khyA thams cad bzlog pa la
114a3(rgyud): yungs kar gyis bya'o//de nas rdo rje 'byar byed gzhom par 'dod na rdo rje 'byar byed la blta nyes la/rdo rje khro bo nyid bsngags te blang bar bya'o//sman 'di dag kyang gtor
114a4(rgyud): bar bya ste/rgya srin gyi khu ba dang /sru sru'i rtsa ba dang /'om bu bsregs pa'i khu ba dang /so ma dang /so ma ta ba dang /so mA dza ti dang /'di rnams bsres pa'i chus
114a5(rgyud): gtor la nyi ma'i 'od kyis gdung bar bya'i//gang na nyi ma med pa der nor bu me shel bstan par bya'o//de nas bcos ma'i rdo rje 'byar byed gzhig par 'dod na/swa ri ka'i
114a6(rgyud): thal ba dang /gze ma dang /kan+ti ga dang /ab yug dang /kun+ti ka'i thal ba dang /'di rnams bsros pas bshig na des 'jig par 'gyur ro//de nas bcos ma'i rdo rje 'byar
114a7(rgyud): byed bya bar 'dod na lhang tsher srang gnyis dang /so ma ra tsa'i sa bon srang gcig dang /be bla srang phyed dang /mon sran gre'u'i phye ma srang gnyis dang /phye ma zho gnyis dang /
114b1(rgyud): tag g+sanyis dang /k+Shatu dzi nag dang /kA la k+Sha tA banan gnyis dang /'donams ltar rdzob tu stu /rgya man ba sar bya'o//ljang ra yang brtag par byA s+t+wa~M/kA tsa pa la/
114b2(rgyud): bslegasu pa'i rlung nga/'am thung /oMr+g+haM zlag+sa bags pa'i chu da hrI r+m+ma sgyu 'i snod kyi dang dz+nyAn gag bar du 'ag / dang /
114b3(rgyud): mu dro'i mam data ba na de nas rdo rje 'byung byed de dag dang bar 'gyur te/suM glai sa sam/rtsig ngas sa mi gang 'd-i ba la gtum pa'i phyir gyis bsdus na rdo rje 'byung byed /
114b4(rgyud): oM sho ka'i me tok+Sha 'dra ba mar d+mor gyur ro//las thams cad la ya ba'i snying ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro//gter blo 'dri dgungs po sha dang /krI tI rnams khyod ni yid
114b5(rgyud): mngan pa'i rgyags deg dag sa/sa par rtags par 'gyur d+he ny-i// dzaH pa//bdun bdag gis du blang pa /nga khrid khyA gnas ga
114b6(rgyud): la zla yi gling 'drug/da da sa da// smyo N+DI san par// da ma Sh+Ti b+hUr+b+hu d+hA/med de//de drin dung ldan pa //shing b+h+rUM gnas
114b7(rgyud): ma na//pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba dang //pad+ma chen ze'i dri zhim yod//zab su mi 'greng gnyis tsam yod//nong ni drug zhwa rje steng yid//de ni srin deng ldan pa yin//shing med pa'i
115a1(rgyud): gnas dgun//sa la tha la'i 'bru 'dra ba//ta lA'i dri dang ldan pa yod//zabs su mi 'brang gnyis tsam na//'bum las lhag pa'i nor yod de//da ni gnang
115a2(rgyud): sbyin ldan pa yin//shing med pa yi gnas dag na//sA la ta la'i shing 'dre ba//gcig pu dri zhim ldan pa yod//zab su mi 'greng gsum tsam na//nor rnams bye ba snyed
115a3(rgyud): yid de//de na rnam thos bu yang gnas//shing med pa yi gnas rnams na//sa la ta yi mig 'dra ba//dkar zhing dri zhim ldan pa yod//zab su mi 'greng gsum tsa mau na//nor
115a4(rgyud): rnams bzhi khri drug stong yod//de dag na ni dbang ldan yod//shing med pa yi gnas rnams na//ci ste se la'i khri 'dra ba//rkang pa bzhi la ldan pa ste//ke ta ka ti dri can yod/
115a5(rgyud): ngan bye ba snyed yod do//de ni klu dang ldan pa yin//mtshan rtags chen po 'di dag ni//bshad zin gzhan yang nga le nyon//dbyar zhing skam la rtsub pa dang //rgun shing bsing
115a6(rgyud): mar gyur pa dang //mdza' bo de bzhin byi la sbrul//lhan cig gcig tu gnas pa dang //de bzhin sbrul dang ne'u le gnyis//khung gcig ni ni lhan cig gnas//gang na go da
115a7(rgyud): dkar po dang //byi ba dkar po lhan cig gan sa//gang na wa ni nyal ba dang //ci ste sa phyogs dro bi dang //khye ni rtag tu grong bor nas//dgon pa'i phyogs gcig gang na
115b1(rgyud): 1la//shing ni thur du mi 'khrung ba//ci ste thur du khrung 'gyur dang //'o ma mdo las 'o ma 'byung //mu tu'i rta ni gdugs 'dra dang //rgyal mtshan 'dab ma 'dra ba dang //shing rnams
115b2(rgyud): gang dag bum pa 'dra//rtswa las rtsa 'byung yal ga 'phyang //rtsub cing kha rnga 'dra ba dang //'dab ma skam zhing lo ma snum//dus ma yin par me tog 'byung //rtag tu 'bras bu
115b3(rgyud): chags pa dang //tsher ma med las tsher ma 'byung //tsher ma can las tsher ma med//rtse gcig shing rigs gang yin pa//ci ste kha drag gyur pa dang //shing drung grog mkhar
115b4(rgyud): phung chen yod//dus ma yin par me tog 'byung //shing drung gang na gzugs yod la//rtag tu 'bras bu mchod pa dang //mchod pa med cing gzi brjid ldan//shing drung gi ni phyogs
115b5(rgyud): gcig na//bde byed mtshan ni snum byed yod//shing drung gi ni phyogs gcig na//ci ste rdo leb yod pa dang //grong gi phyogs gcig ma mo yis//gnas yod ma chad pa med pa
115b6(rgyud): dang khron pa'i phyogs gcig sangs rgyas bzhugs//ci ste khron pa'i phyogs gcig ni//bde byed mtshan mAM stegros bur bcas//rtag tu snum pa gnas pa dang /
115b7(rgyud): khron pa yi ni phyogs gcig na//rdo leb ming dang ldan pa yod//zhing gi phyogs gcig klu rnams kyi//mchod cing stegs bur bcas pa dang //rtag tu snum dang ldan pa
116a1(rgyud): yod//zhing gi dbus ni gang drug na//rdo yi phung po chen po yod//de na khung gi sgo yang yod//zhing dag gi ni dbus rnams na//rdo leb zur gsum yod pa dang //
116a2(rgyud): rdzing bu dag gi 'gram dag na//ma mo rnams ni gnas yod pa//mchod pa med cing gzi byin ldan//mchod du zin kyang gzi med na//nges par de na nor yod do//grong gi
116a3(rgyud): phyogs gcig slar song nas//ra dang rmig pas rko bar byed//khang pa brtsegs pa'i kha dog nas//bya rog thur du lta bzhin du//rtag tu skad kyang 'byin par byed//rdzing
116a4(rgyud): bu yi ni 'gram dag na//ci ste gnod sbyin gzugs yod dang //chu klung 'gram na sangs rgyas gzugs//dbang phyug che dang lhan cig granas//grong dang grong gi phyogs
116a5(rgyud): gcig na//sa 'bigs zhes bya rdo le ba yod//grong rnams kyi ni dbus dag na//stegs bu med pa'i mchod shing yong //klu yi mchod shing stegs bu dang //lha ni tsog na ni
116a6(rgyud): gnas pa yod//de dag gri ni lho phyogs na//grog mkhar phung po chen po yod//grong ngam yang na dgon pa na//ma mo'i gnas ni mchod pa med//sangs rgyas gzugs dang
116a7(rgyud): nyi ma'i gzugs//ci ste de dag g.yon phyogs na//gang la nyi ma'i gzugs yod la//klu dag dang ni lhan cig gnas//zhing dbus rdo phung chen po yod//grog mkhar dang
116b1(rgyud): yang ldan cig gnas//swa ban dag kyang dud par 'thul//rta yang gnyis par 'gyur ba ste/rtag tu yang ni gzi byin ldan//chu yang shin tu snyam par 'gyur//chu ngogs pa gu pung
116b2(rgyud): chen yod//sa dag kyang ni bye ma 'dra//khang pa brtsegs pa'i phyogs gcig na//rtag tu dud pa 'dra bar 'thul//gleng ngam yang na dgon pa 'am//zhing ngam yang ni khyim dge na//
116b3(rgyud): khra dang phug ron lhan cig tu//gang nA shin tu 'dza' bar 'gyur//glang ngam tsha 'am bkres pA 'am//skom pa yis ni gzir bzhin du//de ltar dus ni thams cad du//phyogs gcig/
116b4(rgyud): tu ni dga' bar 'dzin/zhing ngag gi ni dbus dag tu//rdo leb ming dang ldan pa yod//shing rnams gang la ba lang rdzi//bru bas gzir zhing skom pas gzir//rtag tu 'dzeg
116b5(rgyud): cing rtse ba dang //sdug bsngal de bzhin rab bder 'dzin//dus kun tu ni be lang rdzi//gang du de bzhin rtse byed cing //grang zhing grang ba med par 'dzin//de bzhin du ni skyo ba mang /
116b6(rgyud): pad+ma'i sdong bu gcig pa la/pad+ma la ni pad+ma skyes//de bzhin ut+pa la ku mu //tswi sti kha dog ngan por 'gyur//dri yang zhim por mo 'gyur
116b7(rgyud): bar/'dab ma dag kyang 'khums pa dang //gang la 'bras bu mo chag po//de la pad+ma ku mu daM//ba gtsan dang ni rtagacin dang //rdo thal rnams dang lhan cig sbyar//de dang
117a1(rgyud): dus mad+mo da //rgyun mas la zlog b+h+yas m+b+ha//gan gtan doganas ga//rgyags dang ldan sa dang//sat+tan gyur po na 'gyu
117a2(rgyud): rten tu sa phyogs gang dag nu//chu ni khyer gang tsam yid la//sau gzhi de yang dro ba dang //khang pa brtsegs po gang drug la//rdo thul sngon por 'dug pa dang //byi ru lci bur mngon
117a3(rgyud): drimangon //bar bar du ni gnas pa dang //yang na rab tu mdog sngo zhing //phug rlon mdog ltar 'dug kyang rung //de bzhin ro ni kha ba dang //glang ni gzugs ni mdog snum
117a4(rgyud): zhing //bkrus kyang shing dri snyam pa yod//de bzhin dri dang me tog phreng //dri ni snying por ldan pa ste//yan lag 'bru mar bsdus pA la//mi yi lce yis bldag rgyas
117a5(rgyud): myur dum di 'gyur ba dang //gang na rdo rje'i gzugs yod pa//thu dwa yangad ni lta bar byed//phyogs gcig na ni lha gzhan gyi//shing dam yang na rdo gzugs yod//mgo
117a6(rgyud): gas ci ste snang //rdzing bu 'gram gyi gnas drag na//nor l-I yai nAM Ta yi gzugs//rlob phyogs phyogs pa de 'dug bzhin//shar phyogs logs su lta ba dang /
117a7(rgyud): rdzing bu'i 'bri mi nam mo gnas//nub phyogs phyengs pa de 'jug pa ni'o//shar phyogs le gsuM lta bo dang /khron pa'i phyogs gcig sangs rgyas gzugs//ri skye bu
117b1(rgyud): khyod gnas dag na//sangs rgyas gzugs 'dra snang ba dang //chu mod phyogs na sbrul gzugs dang //gang na mo ro mgo mod 'dra//rdo 'am yang na shing la byas//lam gyi ba
117b2(rgyud): snod gang dag nA//hrI ste dbang po'i gzugs snang zhing //sgra chen la ni zhen bzhin du//bum pa mgo la thogs nas kyang //thur dri lta ba yod pa dang //mig rnams yongs kyi
117b3(rgyud): mi gnas pa'i//shing med pa yi gnas dag ni//ma myo dag kyang gnas 'gyur la//mtshan ni thur du lta ba dang //shing gi tshal ni gang dag na//ci ste glang chen gzugs
117b4(rgyud): yod dang //grong nas kyang ni rgyung ring ba//gang na bag gi gzugs yod pa//rdo 'am yang na shing las byas//shing gi tshal gyi dbus dag dang //shing mtshams par la
117b5(rgyud): sogs pa na//dbang phyug gnig zugs yod de//de n+ti d+hag tu thur du wA//dz+nyAn de'i phyogs gcig gnod sbyin gnas//gzugs brnyan stegs byung bcas pa skye//gang na
117b6(rgyud): klu dang gnod sbyin dang //yang na gtum po 'am bad+ma byin gyi//sha tshugasu 'brel shing rigs thogs//gab+da ni glang gi gzugs yod dang //gling gi gzugs ni shing las byas//
117b7(rgyud): yang nas las byas pa yod//shing gi tshul gyi phyi rol ni//gang na klu yi rdo gzugs yod//lam gyi bzhi mdo gang dag ni//klu ni de ci ba buM gnas pa la//shing rnams
118a1(rgyud): kyis kyang bskor ba ste//mi rnams med de'i sa phyogs bzung //chu med pa yi dgon pa na//klu yi mchod shing kha brag ba'i//dur khrod na ni sbrul 'dra'i shing /
118a2(rgyud): yod na klu yi mchod shing yod//dur khrod de na shing yod pa//klu shring dag gi kun nas bskor//dur khrod gang ni khyi dang ni//yang na wa nI rtag tu gnas//grog mkhar ba
118a3(rgyud): yi dus kun du//za rnams snang ba yod pa dang //dgun zhing grong bri phyi rol du//phyugs ni rtag tu nyal bar byed//phag gas yang na khyi yang rung //song nas rtag tu lta ba
118a4(rgyud): dang //rkang lag dag gis 'dri bar byed//bya rog sa la 'dug nas no//rtag tu thur du lta bar byed//grog mkhar gyi ni phyogs gci bra ni//gang du bya rog mchu dag gis//
118a5(rgyud): rtag tu rko bar byed pa dang //sa ni rtag tu dud par 'thul//gang nas ni dkar por snang //dbyar zhing skam la rtsub pa dang //rtog tu yang ni dung bar 'thul//gtsang ma'i gan
118a6(rgyud): ni gang dag na//rtag tu me gtsang snang ba dang //nyi ma nub ka dag tu yang //dud pa mang por dud 'dra snang //dbyar zhing dra bas khebs 'gyur la//khye ra khor yug gas pa dang //
118a7(rgyud): rtag tu yang ni rab tu 'bar//shing drung gang na rtag 'bar dang //gal ba khri shing med pa la//dbyer zhing thog thob 'bar ba dang //rtag tu tshwa sgo gang dag ni//sa ni 'khor
118b1(rgyud): ga shr-I m+bI dag gos//khebs par snang ba yong ba dang //grang de'i dus nu dro ba dang //dro nga'i dus na grang ba dang //gzhan dag paso nam 'dros pa'o//shod ldatshul sdong dung ngan
118b2(rgyud): na//mi yi thod pa khung chen yod//a nI nad byi dzi na kA te//shing med gnas na gting med de//khang ba deg pa dgu na yang //brab Na'i ni yod pa dang //me tog med ci
118b3(rgyud): 'bras bur ldan//'bras bu la yang me tog chags//shing gang 'bras las 'bras bu 'byung //me tog las kyang me tog skyes//dkyil 'khor bzhi dang 'dra ba yi//sa ni
118b4(rgyud): rab tu 'bar ba yod//glang na yal ba gcig pu las//'bras bu 'byung gyi grazha nA las mas//lo ma med pa'i yal ba las//me tog glang nas 'byung ba yod//nyin pa
118b5(rgyud): la ma~M khum 'byung b+h+ring //sa tshan mo 'du bar 'gyur ba dang// sa rtse mal yal ga dang //rag tu 'du bar 'gyur ba yang //rdzing gi 'grem ni stongs bzang gzugs/
118b6(rgyud): shwa phyog suM nI khA lta zhing //sred med bu yid lho phyogs 'du/ts+yait+taM rdzing gi 'gram dag ni//rA saM r+m+ma s+ye sku gzugs yod pa dang //kun dka' ba'i phyogs gcig na/
118b7(rgyud): rtse ste gnod sbyin gzugs yod dang //sU nga yo ni lo ma rnams//phung mar chags shing du gu yod//ci ste zhing gi dngos dag na//klu yi gzugs pa shU la ko//yang na da
119a1(rgyud): mtshan yod dang //ci ste zhing gi dbus dag na//khron pa 'ga' zhig yod pa dang //bde byed gnas kyi stags bu ya/phyogs gcig na ni gzugs gzhan yod/
119a2(rgyud): lam gyi bzhi mdo'i shing drung na//ci ste khron pa yod pa dang //dUr ba dkar po'i phyogs bzhi nas//rtse rnams kyis kyang bskor ba dang //shing la tsi ste gzugs yod dang /
119a3(rgyud): sa la sbrang mas rtag tu ba skor//sa phyogs bzang por dbyar gyi dus//srin phyis phung po snang ba yod//rtags 'di rnams las gter rnams kyi//mtshan ma dag ni rtags
119a4(rgyud): byas te//'byung ba dag ni ngas bshad zin//de nas blugs par bya ba'i sman//gang dag gi ni rtogs 'gyur nas//rtag tu the tsom med 'gyur ba'i//blugs sman cho ga mnyan
119a5(rgyud): bar gyis//'bras can zhos sbyar ti la phye dang //kuny+dza rA yi me togA rnams//ma he'i 'o mas sbyar bar bya//sna ma'i me tog brtag par bya//ka ra bi ra'i me tog rnams//
119a6(rgyud): ma he'i 'o ma ba gcin sbyar//srin chung til dang lhan cig tu//chu yis su ni brtag par bya//kun da'i me tog blangs byas la//'o ma tson ngan dag dang sbyar//in+d+ra brig
119a7(rgyud): sha'i lo ma rnams//zho ga chu dang brtag par bya//nya lcings sa ni blangs nas kyang //chu dang lhan cig brtag par bya//kun da'i me tog ma bye ba//blangs nas 'o mis sbyar
119b1(rgyud): zor bya//an dmar po'i lo ma rnams//'o ma yis ni sbyar bar bya//a sha na ni zho dang sbyar//mkhas pas blugs sman de byas la//rang bzhin gyur par rtogs nas ni//nor yod par ni/
119b2(rgyud): bstan pa yan//gzhan dag kyang ni bshad bya ste//ma bsregs pa yi kham phor dag/'bras phye 'de gus hUMs byas la//mdzub gang rkos nas bzhag par bya//rang bzhin gzhan du/
119b3(rgyud): gyur na ni//nor rnams yod par shes par bya//yungs kar a da'i me tog rnams//gong bu dag tu brdzis nas ni//rang bzhin gyur na nor yod do//'bras rnams til dang lhan
119b4(rgyud): cog tu//zho dang sbyar te gong bur byas//khom phor kha sbyar nang bcug la//mdzub gang brkos pa'i 'og tu bzhag/rang bzhin gyur na nor yod do//rgun rmad dus su dus rnams
119b5(rgyud): ni/mar gyis bkong ste rarkos nas bzhag/zhu bar gyur na nor yod do//lha rnams sems can don gyi phyir//blugs sman dam pa'i cho ga rnams//bdag gis su ni bshad
119b6(rgyud): pa yin//sems can rnams la phan gdagras phyir//mig sman gang gis mi bskus na//sa la gter kun mthong 'gyur ba'i//mig sman rnams kyang bshad par bya//'ug pa'i
119b7(rgyud): mchi ma zags pa yis//lig bu mig ni bsgos nas kyang /lding ros dag dang lhan cig tu//blo can gyi ni mig kyang skye//ldong ros dang ni shing mngar dang //gi'u wang dang ni 'ug
120a1(rgyud): pa yi//mig rnams lhun cog sbyar byas la//blo ldan gyis ni mig kyang bsdu//ra yai gcin dang de bzhin du//byi lha yI ni gutsin+da blangs la//'ug pa'i mig dang
120a2(rgyud): lhan cig tu//dud pa bai kapra ste bsreg par byA//log bu mig dang sbyar byas la//blo ldan gyis nI mig kyang bsku//rdul bye'u rlung ni shi ba yi//khong du lig bu mig bcug
120a3(rgyud): la/dud pa bkag ste bsregs pa ni//migo sman rab tu bzang ba yin//'dzin mo'i mgo bo'i nang dag tu//lig bu mogo ni bcug nas kyang //dud pa bkag ste bsregs
120a4(rgyud): na ni//myig sman rab tu bzang ba yin//ne'u le'i mgo bo blangs nas ni//de yi nang du ldong ros gzhug/dud pa bkag ste bsregs pa ni//mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin//
120a5(rgyud): mthing ril sgo nga bya gag sgong //de bzhin sbrul mgo dro dag rnams//dud pa bkag ste bzhag pa ni//mrig sman rab tu bzang ba yin//na mA ka ri sbrul mgo dang //lig bu mig
120a6(rgyud): dang sbyar byas nas//dud pa bkag ste bsre gas pa ni//mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin//rang shi ba yi sbru li dag gi/khong du lig bu mig btsug la//ldong ros dang ni
120a7(rgyud): lhan cig tu//dud pa bkag ste bsreg par bya//mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin//na ma ska ri gi'u wang dang //'ug pa yi ni mig rnams dang //'dzin mo'i mgo dang cha rnam tha/
120b1(rgyud): dud pa bkag ste bsreg par bya//lung bong gau ni mag gnyis dang //de bzhin byi ba'i mag gnyis dang //bya rgod mgo drang lhan cig tu//dud pa bkag ste bsregs pa ni//mig sman rab
120b2(rgyud): tu bzang ba yin//spre'u yi 'jug ma dag dang ni//de bzhin 'dzin mo'i migo gnyis dang //sbrul gyi mgo dang lhan cig tu//dud pa bai kag ste bsregs pa ni//mig sman kun gyi
120b3(rgyud): mchog yin no//sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir//mig sman gyi ni sbyor ba mchog/lho rnams bdag gis bshad pa yin//mig sman rnams dang blugs sman rnams la na
120b4(rgyud): tsA ba'i snying po sbyar bar bya'o//gter gyi las thams cad ni rig sngags kyi rgyal pos bya'o//nye ba'i snying po'i las rdzog so///ngas sngar bshad pa'i pho nya ma gang
120b5(rgyud): yin pa thams cad kyi pho nya ma'i las bshad par bya'o//lha rnam rig sngags chen mo stobs chen mo stobs chen mo'i 'phrul gyi rig sngags de dag gi rig sngags kyi cho ga'i las kyang
120b6(rgyud): bshad par bya'o//de la pho nya ma thams cad kyi las ni 'di yin te/longs spyod kyi gzhi sgrub par 'dod pas zhag gsum bsnang ba byas la/'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du/
120b7(rgyud): lha bshos sna tshogs phul nas mchod pa byas te/pr-i yang kur shing gi sau me sbar lo pri yang ku dang gi'u wang dang /ri la bu stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/zhag bdun
121a1(rgyud): gyo tha mar longs spyod kyi gzhi 'thab par 'gyur ro//mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la mchod sbyin byas pa'i mchod stong blangs nas me ro bsregs na/rig sngags kyi
121a2(rgyud): snying po dang ldan par bzlas brjod byed bzhin du//'dag ma blangs la blangs pa de spyan gyi sngags bzlas brjed byad bzhin du//phug ron gyi khung du shi bar byas te/phyi ma mar
121a3(rgyud): kyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la/lha chen po'i gnas su song nas log 'dren gyi sngags kyis gtor ma'i cho ga thams cad byas la/zhag gcig bsnyeng ba byas te/ldum bu so ma'i
121a4(rgyud): 'dab ma bdun blangs pa'i steng du sol ba bzhag nas gzugs kyi lho phyogasu rig sngags bzlas brjod bya ste/dud pa 'thul ba'i bar du bzlas brjod byas la/de blangs
121a5(rgyud): nas nang par bram ze rnams dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod ston bya so+o/thig le byas na lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing tshe lo lnga brgya thub la/pho nya ma thams cad dbang du
121a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro//zas su 'o ma'i 'dag gu za zhing tshes gecig la brtsams te/tshes bdun kyi bar du rig sngags bzlas brjod byas nas zhag gcig bsnang ba byas la bka'
121a7(rgyud): bzlog ma'i gnas su song ste/'bras phye las mdung rtse gsum pa byas pa brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na yul gru thob par 'gyuraro//cho ba 'di nyid kyi sa mo mo'i gnas su
121b1(rgyud): song la mchod pa byas te dbang phyug chen po'i sngags kyi las thams cad bya'o//ma mo'i gtso bo'i mdun du 'bras phye las khur ba bkris shing ldan par byas pa/brgya stong sbyin sreg
121b2(rgyud): byas na yul gru sbyin par byed do//mar gyi ri zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/'phags pA log na rdo rje'i mdun du sna ma'i me tog kha ma bye ba pi rgyu steng sbyin sreg
121b3(rgyud): byas na pho nya ma thams cad las so cag par 'gyur ro//rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i sgrub pa'i las rnams la ni pho nya ma rnams sbyar bar bya'o//pho nya ma rnams la ni bdud rtsi thabs
121b4(rgyud): sbyor dang /dga' byed gdong sbyar bar bya'o//bdud rtsi thab sbyor la sogs pa'i gsang sngags thams cad la ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang spyan sbyar bar bya'o//yang na bcom ldan
121b5(rgyud): 'ongs mnye tshe sbyar bar bya'o//gdon no cog dbye bar 'dod no ma da na'i tsher ma dug dang khrig gi nang du bsnyugs pa brgya stong sbyin sreg byas ni 'byor bar 'gyur ro//mar gyi de zhag
121b6(rgyud): bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsrung ba byas te smin drug gi bu'i gnas su song nas/rig sngags la ni brgyad brgya bzlas pa rjed byas ni gzhan gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro//
121b7(rgyud): skyes pa dang bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod ni mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te//lha chen po'i gnas su song la gzugs lho phyogasu seng ldeng gi shing
122a1(rgyud): gis/me sbar nas yungs kar gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na skyes pa dang bud med dbang du 'gyur ro//mar gyi ngo tshwas bdun la rgyu skar sa rI la bab
122a2(rgyud): pa'i tshe/bil ba las shing brnyan bdun skyes pa blangs nas dug mi yongs kyi shing drung lan stong bzlas brjod byas te btsugs na grong khyer gyi mi thams cad gnyid log
122a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la spos kyi rengs bu blangs te/mi'i tshil gyis bsgos nas mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/lha chen po'i
122a4(rgyud): gnas su song nas mchod pa rgyas par byas la gzugs kyi lho phyogasu spos kyi 'dug gus mdung rtse gsum pa bris nas de'i steng du mi'i thod pa bzhag pa la 'dug ste/
122a5(rgyud): thod pa'i snod mi tshil gyis bkang ba'i nang du spos kyi reng bu bzhog pa las thod pa'i nang du dud pa chags par byas nas de blangs pa lag na rdo rje dang /lha chen po dang
122a6(rgyud): grogs rnams la yang skal pa byin pa te/de nas mig gnyis bskus na lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing /'dod dgur bskur ba'i gzugs can stobs po che tshe lo dgu brgya
122a7(rgyud): thub par 'gyur ro//gdon las thar par bya 'dod na a shwat+tha'i shing gis me s+thir te lan tshwa dang ske tshes lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na cho nge ston nas gtong bar 'gyur//
122b1(rgyud): dbun zla zla chungs yar gyi ngo tshwas bcu bzhi lnga zhag gcig bsrung ba b+h+yas twa/'phags pa lag na dzA d+ha'i mdun du arga'i shing gis me sbyar nas drin shu lo'i me tog brgya stod sbyin sdug
122b2(rgyud): byas na po nyi mo thams cad kyis dam pa sbyin par 'gyur ro//tshogs kyi bdag po lcagasA nA ni ne pho nya mi thams cad kyi gnyen 'debs pa dang /sgrib pa byed par ngas bskus /
122b3(rgyud): do dran par byas na pho nya ma thams cad mdun ni 'khod par 'gyur ro//nga dang lha rnams kyi snying po lta bur gyur pa/'byung po'i bdag po cho ga rgyus pa sgrub pa pho nya ma thams
122b4(rgyud): cad kyi yid dang 'thad pa tshogs kyi bdag po lcags can bshad par bya'o//na mA~M rat+na tra ya s+ya/na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na~M s+ya/ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ti s+ya/tad+ya thA/ra ba ra ba/
122b5(rgyud): d+hA ra d+ha ra/ma ra mA rA/b+hUny+dza b+hAny+dza/ha na hA naM/drA ha ha ha/pA tsa pa tsau/gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ts+tshin+dots+tshin+d+ha/b+hin+di b+hin+da/he na la ha ka badz+re NaM swehA/lcags can snying lta bur gyur pa/
122b6(rgyud): 'byung po'i bdag po'i cho ga rgyas par sgrub bo//tshogs kyi bdag po'i pho nya ma thams cad kyi yid dang 'thod pa bshud de/na mo badz+ra pA Na ye/na ma I shwa rA ya/ni mo
122b7(rgyud): nan+do ke shwa rA ya/ru lu ru l+r-i/pi la ta ma taM gi/tsa la lo ta ka/duSh+Ta sa gra ha mi nan A be sha ya swA hUM/'di ni tshigs kyi bdag bai lcags can pho nyi ma rnams kyi gzhin/
123a1(rgyud): 'debs pa dang /sgrub par byed pa thogs bya med pa'i las can no//gdon dbab pa tha~Md la ni me tog gis bya'o//las sa cog lnga yang tshun /ba bya bra la brjod nas
123a2(rgyud): las thaMd de bya'o//zhag gsum bsnyung ba byas nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dkyil 'khor bskyang nul gyis byugs te dri dang /me tog dang /bdug pa phul
123a3(rgyud): nas bai kI ka ta'i shing gis me sbar la bil ba'i yam sreg shing brgya stong sbyin sreg byas/de'i 'og tu tshogs kyi bdag po lcags can gyis mtshan mo rmi lam du bstan par
123a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro//de nas pho nya ma thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//pho nya ma rnams kyi tshe blo rdzog so////log 'dren rnams kyi rig sngags bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid snying
123a5(rgyud): po'i mchog kyang bshad par bya ste/na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/oM pi ti ta ma ti ste ha/snying po'i las rnams 'byung ste sgrub pa thams cad dang /las thams cad la las 'di nyid
123a6(rgyud): bya ste/gu gul dang ni yungs kar dang /gi'u wang shu dag ru NA dang //sugaM smel yang ni de bzhin te//sgron shing dang nI thang shing dang //tsana? dan dang ni a gA ru//a lA ya ka
123a7(rgyud): pad tra dang //ge sar 'di rnams cha bsnyams la//chu dang lhan cig brtag par bya//gang na sbyar sman 'di gnas pa//der ni 'jigs pa mi 'byung ste//chom rkun ma yin
123b1(rgyud): mtshon rnams min//sbrul rnams ma yin lha min min//lag na rdo rje'ang 'dis bskul bas//sa steng dag tu rgyal bar 'gyur//'di yis lus la bskus pa ni//log 'dren rnams las
123b2(rgyud): thar par 'gyur//sbyar sman 'di ni byas nas kyang //sgrub pa thams cad sgrub byas na//log 'dren rnams kyis mi tshugs te//lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin//log 'dren rnams
123b3(rgyud): kyang gzhan 'debs pa//sgrub pa byed par ni 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes bdu do rtsi thab sbyor bskos so//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i
123b4(rgyud): mdun du tsan dan dmar po'i khu bas 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor bri'o//de'i g.yo ga sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang thal bas bri'o//de'i log 'dren rnams la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o//
123b5(rgyud): bdud rtsi thab sbyor yang ldan brgya bzlas brjod bya'o//de nas log ni rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin tu log 'dren rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro//log 'dren rnams kyi cho ga rdzogaso//
123b6(rgyud): 'bigs pa sbyin ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis rig pa mchog las bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar mo can bshad pa gang yin pa de'i phyi ma'i las rnams ngas bshad kyis
123b7(rgyud): lha rnams nyon cig/sgrub pa thams cad la srung ba yin te/chom rkun dang /stag dang /sbrul dang /chu byin na bkra dang /ma hA kar rnams los gnas srung ba dang /mtshams
124a1(rgyud): bcad pa dang /kha bcing bar bya ba rnams yid kyis bya'o//gter blang ba ni gter gang na yod pa der song la bskyang bar byas te/dkyil 'khor bskyang nul gyis
124a2(rgyud): byugs nas bil ba'i shing gis me'i nang du yungs kar mar dang sbyar bso lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na de'i 'og tu gter ston par 'gyur te/de nas blang bar bya'o//mar gyi
124a3(rgyud): dengo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/'phags pa skyon ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du mchod pa byas nas sna ma'i me tog brgya stong len re bizlas brjod
124a4(rgyud): byas te/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi brang du bsngon la bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i tilaM gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na dngos grub grub pa'i mtshan mar
124a5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yan lag dang nying lag 'gul bar 'gyur ro//de nas grub nas yul gru 'amo/yang ni gser sbyin par 'gyur ro//zla ba gcig
124a6(rgyud): gri bar du slongaso mo'i zas za zhing rig sngags bzlas brjod byas la de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zla ba nya la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/raso ma nyams pa la tshon rtsi
124a7(rgyud): skyon med pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug ste/'dam bu mnga' rgyu'i mdog can thor tshugs byas pa/lag pa g.yon pa na pad+ma thogs pa/
124b1(rgyud): g.yas pa na sngags kyi nar bu thAbs te/brang na dpal gyi be'u yod pa/pad+ma la bzhugs par bya/g.yas phyogasu bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar can 'dam bu mnga' rgyu'i mdog dang /

124b3(rgyud): la sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du ri mo'i sku gzugs bkram ste/mchod pa rgyas par byas la lha bshos kyang rgyas par dbu'o//ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du pri
124b4(rgyud): yang ku'i phye ma brdzis pas gzugs byas te/spyan ras gzigs kyi gsang sngags snying po dang bcos pas lan+da brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya'o//de nas mjug brtul te rig
124b5(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod byas pas mtshams bcad par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das mas ni steng dang 'og bcing bar bya'o//steng dang 'og bcing ba na lho phyogasu skar mnga'
124b6(rgyud): ltung bar 'gyur te/de nas dngos grub 'grub pa'i mtshan mar shes par bya'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yang nye reg byas laM ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du ku sha'i stan la
124b7(rgyud): 'dug ste/rig sngags lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na ri mo'i gzugasu 'bul zhing saM yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro//de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/bla maM la phyag byas nas/
125a1(rgyud): rig sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du gyon du 'phags par bya'o//'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can du 'gyur zhing /dpag tshad stong gyon du 'phags shing
125a2(rgyud): rna gsang zhing mig rno ba dang /rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi song pa dang /tshe lo dgu stong thub par 'gyur ro//lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu yang bde ba cen du skye bar
125a3(rgyud): /'gyur ro//gos dkar can gyi rig sngags kyi cho ga pa gzhin 'debs shing sgrub par byed pa'i gsang sngags chen po yang ngas sbyin par bya'o//oM shrI pa NA ra bA siM nau/na
125a4(rgyud): nA mA ku Ta d+ha ra Ne swAhA/ka be ka ba ka be ki bi ri swA hA/rig sngags 'di lag na rdo rje'i mdun du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs gzhag par bya'o/
125a5(rgyud): de'i g.yon rol du ni gos dkar can bzhag par bya'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi de zla ba nya la nyin motshan du bsnyung ba byas te/dri dang me tog dang /bdug pa
125a6(rgyud): la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas/zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas na/de nas gos dkar can 'grub par 'gyur ro//gos dkar can gyi cho ga rdzogaso//
125a7(rgyud): lha rnams ngas 'phags po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi las rnams bshad zin te/gzhon nu rdo rje sde'i thogs pa med pa'i las rnams kyang bshad par bya'o//

125b2(rgyud): 'dug par 'gyur to/pho nya ma rnams kyis lha'i tshogs so cog 'gugs par 'gyur zhing de la dngos grub sbyin du 'jug ste/mngags ma thag tu yid ci sems pa 'grub par 'gyur//
125b3(rgyud): gdon rnams kyi snying gzhom par bya na/lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyis bya'o//bca'i sgal lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste/gdon la bstan na gdon gyi lus tsha bas
125b4(rgyud): 'debs par 'gyur ro//nad do tsog la sa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/byin na nad med par 'gyur ro//gzhon nu mchog gi gzhan 'debs shing sgrub par byed pa'i snying
125b5(rgyud): pa bshad zin to//drag tu bskul ba gzhan yang bshad par bya'o//na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+yaM/oM hu yu tu yu swA hA/'phags pa rdo rje sde'i snying po'o//mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la
125b6(rgyud): zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/yag na rdo rje'i mdun du rdo rje'i sde bzhag nas me tog dkar po bar+m+ma stong snying po dang sbyar te/'phags pa rdo rje sde la bsnun na den pa langags pa
125b7(rgyud): rdo rje lnga 'grub par 'gyur to//drag tu bskul ba'i snying po mchog bzlas brjod byas pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//'phags pa rdo rje sde'i cho ga rdzogaso//
126a1(rgyud): lha rnams ngas 'phabs pa rdo rje sde'i las gang dag gis myur du mdun na gnas par gyur pa rnams ba shad zin to 'gang bar dpa' bya mthu dang pa rol gnan pa
126a2(rgyud): dpag tu med pa'i rgyud phyi ma gang gis rtse bzhin du bde blag tu las rnams byed pa yang bshad par bya'o//mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsrung ba byas te
126a3(rgyud): 'phags pa lag ni rdo rje'i mdun du arga'i shring gis me sbar nas yungs kar mar dang sbyar bas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas nA//gzhon nu mchog sgrub par 'gyur te/

126a6(rgyud): zhag gsum ba sbyang ba byas te/mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lha chen po'i gnas sam/yang na kun draga'i ra ba 'am/khang stong du song nas be'u dkar po blangs te dri dang

127a1(rgyud): seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar la yum gyi gsang sngags kyis tsan dan dmar po'i yam sreg shong mar gyi nang du bstsags pa brgya stong sbyin bsreg bya'o//de nas

128b1(rgyud): ra brnams//de nas lha'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas myur du langs te/lag na rdo rje'i g.yas phyogasu 'khodang /

128b4(rgyud): thog ma rag tu ma byed ma brjod pa/na mo badz+ra pA Na ye/da ma da ma raM bA raM gI/ga gaM ga ya ga ya gA ya/tsan+d+ra ko dzI pa ya~M ta~M swA hA/gnyis pa ste bsar can brjod pa/

128b7(rgyud): yi ti swAhA/lnga pa ste tshogs chen mo lcags can brjod pa/na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/tad+ya thA/ra ba rab/dab zo/ma ra ma ra/mA ra mA ra/b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ha ni tan/

136b2(rgyud): lag nu rdo rje dang /spyan la bstod nas/rdo rje 'dzin srin mo chen mo/brtson 'grus chen mo/stobs chen mo/khyod kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug mi nus kyis/rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis
136b3(rgyud): kyang srin mo chen mo 'di la bstod par mdzod cig dang /des na dkyil 'khor du 'ong bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes lha de dag la snying rje'i sems kyis bltas
136b4(rgyud): nas srin mo nam gru la rang gi cho 'brang las bstod pa/nam gru khyod kyi cho 'brang dang //mtshan nyid dag ni bshad bya na//nor bu'i rang bzhin khyod kyi lus//rgyab ni 'jam bu chu bo'i gser
136b5(rgyud): khyod kyi gdong yang dngul yin te//lto ba'i ngos ni rdo rjes gtams//ming po mdzod dang mdzod srung ba//khyod kyi ma ni kun 'gro ma//khyod kyi pha ni rlung zhes bya//skal ldan shing rta khyod
136b6(rgyud): kyi rus//lha yul dag tu grags pa yin//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes srin mo nam gru rang gi cho 'brang la bstod nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mgo
136b7(rgyud): bos phyag 'tshal te/rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid che//chongs dang gsum la phyag 'tshal te/dbang phyug che la phyag 'tshal nas//sa 'dzin rlung rnams gang yin dang //gang dag gnod sbyin
137a1(rgyud): stobs po che//grub pa rgyu ba dro za rnams//drang srong lha dang lha minA pa//de nas 'byung po thams cad dang //'od zer can dang 'od srung dang //kun shes dang ni gnas
137a2(rgyud): 'jog dang //thub pa chen po mi sbyin bu//dbang po gtum po khyab 'jug dang //'di rnams bdag la grub sbyin shog/nom gru mo ni bshad bya na//mtshan mo nag mo 'jigs
137a3(rgyud): byed ma//gshin rje'i sring mo chen mo ste//yongs 'du'i shing la gnas pa yin//ri la khyab 'jug gtsog pu ni//bde bar nyal bar maM nyam ste//des ni bya yi gzugs
137a4(rgyud): kyis su//mtshan mo khyab 'jug skrag par byed//lha mo nag mo stobs mo ches//de mthong nas ni 'ong bar 'gyur//de nas rtsed mo byed bzhin du//byis pa gsod pa'i mgrin
137a5(rgyud): pa nas//lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas no//'jigs pa'i sgra yang 'byin par byed//rna gnyis kyang ni ma mthong ste//sems nyams pas ni de mthong nus//shin tu bred cing
137a6(rgyud): bzhin yang 'gyur//khyod ni nga la ma 'tshe bar//lha yi dga' gnas dga' bar gyis//de nas khros nas de nyid du//byis pa gsod la bsgo ba ni//lo gcig pa dang lho
137a7(rgyud): gnyis dang //lo dgu pa la ma 'jug par//bzang mo song la skye dgu 'di//rang gi las kyis bza' ba gyis//bo lang rnams la gor yang byos//wa rnams dang ni wa
137b1(rgyud): gsod dang //ri dgas la ni rI dwags nad//mi rnams la ni mi ngas byos//khyod kyi lus la dang brlag gyur//byis pa rnams ni rtse gyur cig/byis pa rnams la phan gdags phyir//ma mo rnam
137b2(rgyud): la snyems pa'i mchog/mi rnams kyang ni rims bzhin du//de ni bdag gis bshad par bya//dkyil 'khor 'di ni mthong ba la//gdon ni gang zhig ldog mi byed//gdon mang dag gis///
137b3(rgyud): de spangs nas//mun pa mi bzad gnas par 'gyur//gang gis su ni zhi 'gyur ba//'di yang lha rnams mnyan par gyis//gang na bud med srung byed pa//der ni byis pa bsrung bya ste//

186a1(rgyud): byung zhum brgyu la brtsams te/dus gsum du phub ma'i sbyin skyog ldan brgyud brgya brgya nga rgyu sbyin slebA snun zhug 'dun gyi nyan pa dngadagu 'jigs par 'gyu
186a2(rgyud): rodo/skyes pa dbang du byin par gyi ngo tshes bdun la brtsams te/'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa byas ni arge'i shing bris me sbya ral te la nag pos sbyin sreg la na
186a3(rgyud): brgyad stong byas na dbang du 'gyur ro//bud med dbang du bya na 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du 'bras yos kyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na bud med dbang du 'gyur ro//
