186a5(rgyud): mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa byas nas byang chub kyi shing gis bud shing la me sbar nas/a pA tsi ti dkar
186a6(rgyud): po'i me tog gi lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na dga' byed gdong gis dam pa byin par 'gyur ro//gdon gyis zin pa rnams pa a pa ra tsi ta'i me tog lan bdun bzlas brjod
186a7(rgyud): byas te/gdon gyi kha zas kyi nong du byin na gdon lag pa phan tshun 'ching bar byed cing kun tu rgyug te ci bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyu ro//cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud phyi ma dang bcas
186b1(rgyud): par mthong zhing ldan par de lan gdon rnams kyang 'bred byung lha rnams kyang yid dag rab 'gyur//gdon rnams kyis kyang mi 'dod cing mthong na 'byor bar 'gyur ro//lha rnams 'di dag gi sbyang
186b2(rgyud): la drag du bskul ba'i gsang sngags kyang bshad par bya'o//na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/bodz+ri badz+ri ba lo ka pA lA ya swA hA/mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhog gcig bsrung ba byas te/'phags pa
186b3(rgyud): lhag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa byas nas/lan brgyad stong sbyar sreg byas nas dga' byed gdong gis dam pa sbyin par byed do//rig sngags thams cad la yeng sgrub pa'i tshe thog ma kho nar
186b4(rgyud): snying la drag tu bskul ba'i gsang sngags kyis mar dang gu gul gyis lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas la de nas rig sngags bsgrub par bya'o//las kyi mjug tu ying yungs kar mar dang
186b5(rgyud): sbyor bas lan brgyad brgya sbyin bsreg bya'o//de nas byas na las des drag tu bskul ba'i rig sngags thams cad kyis dngos grub sbyin por byed do//de nas lha dag las 'di thos pas yid
186b6(rgyud): 'jigs shing skyed 'dar trai lag na rdo rje'i zhal du blta'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//bzod ldan dag khyod sems rtse gcig tu gyis
186b7(rgyud): la nyon cig/tso ste dam tshig 'di las 'gal bar byas te dngos grub sbyin par mi byed na ngas rdo rje kun tu 'bar bas spyi ba bzhag go//de nas rdo rje khri bas tsa ci'i sgra bton te rig sngags kyi
187a1(rgyud): rgyal po chenu po lag na rdo rje gang na ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so//bcom ldan 'das sngon gyis sems
187a2(rgyud): can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhus te tshig rgyas pa chen po rig pa mchog gi rgyud phyi ma dang bcas/gsang ba dang bcas par bshad na bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi
187a3(rgyud): don gyi phyir dang /gdon dang drag shul can me rnams la gang 'tsho ba yin pa'i godon de dag nges par bshig pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la dri bar gyis/bcom ldan 'das
187a4(rgyud): steng rje'i sems kyi gdon rnams kyi rus dang /rigs ming de dag bdag la gsungs shig/de skad ces smras nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das
187a5(rgyud): lag ni rdo rjes rdo rje khro bo la 'di skad ces smras so//bdud rtsi thab sbyor gang khyod sems can la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te/sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gdon rnams kyi rus
187a6(rgyud): dang meng ngal dris pa legaso legaso//de ngas bshud pa bzhin du nyon cig/'jig rten dag na gdon rnams ni//drag cing sbyor ba sna tshogs yid//gdon yod de dag ci 'dra ba
187a7(rgyud): go rims bzhin du bshad par bya//gdon rnams stong phrag brgyad cu ni//mi yaM 'jig rten dang na gnas//de las sa 'dir rgyu ba yi//gdon ni bco brgyad shes pa dang //gdon
187b1(rgyud): rnams 'ong bar 'dug pa dang //de bzhin mtshan ma dag dang //gas ru myu rung dbyung ba dang //gso pa thubasan tha dad dang //rigs rnams la ni gang bstan dang //gang gi rus na gang la
187b2(rgyud): /de las gzhan yang bshad bya ste//ngas bshad de ni mnyan par gyis//gzugs kyad med la dri'ang med//smre yang med cing khyed par du//mnyan du med cing bltar med de//man
187b3(rgyud): ma las shes pa bya//me long dang na chu dag las//gring ma ji ltar snang ba bzhin//de ltar de dag rtogs bya zhing //de las gdon nams shes par bye //thams cad rlung dang 'dra ba ste//
187b4(rgyud): mthong btsam gyis 'dzin par byed//mtshan me de ni tshul rnams dang //spyod pas kyang ni rtogs pa bye//gdon rnams lus la zhugs nA ni//mi las mi ma yin par byed//grub ma nga
187b5(rgyud): ni 'bros dang mdog/de bzhin par 'gyur bar byed//gdon rnams rigs bzhi yan lag bzhi//rnam pa rjeni yod shes par bya//rigs bzhi dag la spyod pa pang //mdor na de dag
187b6(rgyud): shes par de//rlung can+da gyis ni rlung can 'dzin//de dag gi ni ming dang gzugs//so song yang ni bshad bya ste//gcig ni lha gdon shes par bya//gcig ni 'byung po'i gdon yin
187b7(rgyud): sted/de bzhin gcig ni dri za nyid//gcig ni gnod sbyin gdon yin te//gcig ni srin por shes par bya//sha za'i gdon ni rnam gsum dang //klu yi gdon ni shes par bya//cha
188a1(rgyud): pa ra srin po nyid dang ni//log 'dren gdon ni shes par bya//de bzhin brjed byed gdon dag pa//gzhan nu'i gdon ni rnam bzhir shes//gcig ni smyo byed nyid yin te/
188a2(rgyud): lha min gdon ni shes par bya//de ltar gdod rnams bco brgyad de//gang gi tshe na gang rgyu dang //gang gi dus ni gang yin dang //gang gi mdog ni ci 'dra ba//de ni bdag gis bshad//
188a3(rgyud): kyi nyon//gdon rnams btso brgyad gang yin pa//dus tshigs dag tu 'dzin byed de//lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa yi//gdon rnams gso ru rung bar bshad//de las 'das par
188a4(rgyud): blabranas pa yi//gso ru rung ba ma yin no//de las gzhan yang mtshan rnams kyis//khyad par dag kyang bshad par bya//lha gdon shes par bya ba la//de ni gtor ma 'dod pa ste//
188a5(rgyud): rigs bzhi sngo sor rgyu bar byed//gtsang zhing gtsang sbra spyod pa dang //dka' thub gnod pa mthar phyin dang //tshul khrims ldan pa'i mi dag la//lha yi gdon ni 'dzin par byed//
188a6(rgyud): lha yi gdon gyis zin pa ni//shes pas legs par rtogs bya ste//dga' byar mi 'gyur 'khrug mi 'gyur//kha zas la yang mi sems la//cung zad kyang ni smrar mi byed//
188a7(rgyud): de ni gnyid kyang mi log ste//phye sa dang ni gcin dag kyang //rang dkar 'byung bar mi 'gyur la//khrus byas khrus ma byas kyang rung //dri bsung mang po'i nged ldan zhing //de yi
188b1(rgyud): /gdong ni pad+ma bzhin//legs par byas par 'gyur ba ste//gang la tshul ni 'di dag yod//de ni lha yi gdon du bshad//gang gis bde bar 'gyur ba yi//gtor ma'i cho ga 'di dag bya//me tog
188b2(rgyud): dri dang me tog phreng //mar me yang nI de la sbyin//pAd+me ut+pal pu she la rtswa//chang drang 'bras chen sbyin du gi zhug/gdugs dkar dag byed srad bu dang //de bzhin me tog phreng dkar dag
188b3(rgyud): den lha yi gnas kyang rung //lam gyi bzhi mdor sbyin par bya//gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis//gdon de myur du gting bar 'gyur//ci ste des kyang ma btang na//gang gis gdon
188b4(rgyud): btang 'gyur ba//'di ni de la sbyar bar dgyi//na ga tA ma shra shA yi//me tog rtsa ba 'bras bu dang //shun brags dang ni de bzhin du//shu dag dkar po yungs kar dang //tshogs rnams de dag
188b5(rgyud): sogs nas kyang //me ni chung ngus byas pa la//mar ni phul bzhi nang du btso//de nas de la glad par bya//de bzhin du ni snar yang glegs//mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs par 'gyur//
188b6(rgyud): snar blugs 'jibs pas gzir po dang //mar 'thungs pas kyang 'jigs 'gyur nas//gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur//ci ste des kyang ma btang na//las 'di yang ni legs par
188b7(rgyud): brtsamo//rgyal po'i blo gros ma sngags kyis//dur khrod kyi sol ba las gzugs brnyan byas la rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcings nas mdun du gzugs brnyan mtshon rnon pos bcad
189a1(rgyud): nas gdon gyis ku co bton te 'bros par 'gyur ro//ci ste de ltar byas kyang ma bros na rgyal ba'i blo gros mas lan tshwa dang ske tshe lan brgyad brgyas byas na ku co gton
189a2(rgyud): te 'bros par 'gyur//lha yi gdon gyi skabs rdzogaso////sngar bshad pa ni grong yin pa'i//'byung po'i gdon yang shes par bya//bram ze dang ni rgyal rogs la//'dzin par
189a3(rgyud): byed de de bzhin du//de ni gtor ma 'dod phyir rgyu//de yi tshul rnams de la nyon//gtsang zhing gtsad sbyar spyod pa dang //gzugs bzang ba yi mi rnams la//'byung po'i gdon ni 'dzin par byed//
189a4(rgyud): de yi tshul rnams nga las nyon//tshes grangs bcu gsum bcu bzhi'ang rung //gnyi ga'i phyogaso la 'ang de bzhin te//bcu bzhi la ni rtag pa yin//dga' sten dag dang 'dus pa
189a5(rgyud): dang /lha rnams kyi ni gnas dag dang //skabs 'di dag du gzugs bzang ba'i//mi rnams la ni 'dzin par byed//gtsang zhing gtsang sbrar spyod pa dang //dka' thub gdon pa
189a6(rgyud): mthar phyin dang //rtag tu gos dkar gyon pa dang //bsnyung ba dga' ba de bzhin no//'byung po gdon gyis zin pa yi//tshul 'di dag ni nga la nyon//sems pa dang ni dgod pa dang ///
189a7(rgyud): na mkha' la ni lta bar byed//mdog kyang na mkha' 'dre bar 'gyur//gser gyi mdog ltar mdzes pa ste//zas dang skom la dga' ba dang //lha dang bram ze mchod la dga'//
189b1(rgyud): 'byung po'i gdon gyis zir pa yi//mtshan ma yang ni de dag yin//de ni gang gis bder 'gyur ba'i//gso ba'i thabs kyang bshad par bya//til zan dang ni 'byung po'i zas//sha btsos rjen par
189b2(rgyud): bzhon te//me tog dri dang gtor ma dang //me tog phreng ba sna tshogs pa//gtong ma de dag bsdus nas ni//lho phyogasu yang sbyin par//rdo rje se skye'i sngags kyis kyang //bsregs blugs/
189b3(rgyud): gsum dang bdun pa dbul//gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis//gdon de myur du gtor bar 'gyur//ci ste des kyang ma btang ni//gong gis gdon de gting 'gyur ba'i//thabs gzhan 'di/
189b4(rgyud): ni sbyor bar bya//gnad ma la dum bi dang //b+ha la A ti ba la dang //pu sha li tsaM dang thal tIs dang //shrI ga nas sgrog pa dang //tshogs rnams de dag bsags nas ni//mar ni phul gang
189b5(rgyud): sho dag dang //ba gcin phul bzhi nang du btso//me ni chung ngus btso bar bya//de nas de dag gled par bya//de bzhin du ni snar yang blugs//mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs 'gyur
189b6(rgyud): nas//'byung po rab tu 'bros par 'gyur//ci ste des kyang ma btang na//gong gi gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i//thabs gzhi na 'di ni sbyor bar bya//rdo rje ser skya'i sngags kyis las brtsam
189b7(rgyud): te/dkyil 'khor bris nas lan tshwa dang /skye tshe'i sbyin sreg lan brgyad brgya byas na gdon gyis ku co bton te 'bros par 'gyuraro//'byung po'i gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so//
190a1(rgyud): /sngar bshad pa ni kang yin pa'o//dri za'i gdon yang shes par bya//bram ze rgyal rigs 'dzin por byed//yar gyi ngo yi tshe sna bcu gnyis//mar gyi po pang dri bzhin//
190a2(rgyud): te//dri za rtag tu rgyu ba byed//lhag ma'i dus su 'tshe mi byed//gtor ma 'dod cing zhi la dga'//gdon de dga' ba 'dod pa ste//glu la dga' zhing dga' la sred//gtsang zhing
190a3(rgyud): gtsang sbrar spyod pa dang //gzugs bzang ba yi mi dag la//dri za dag ni sten par byed//de yi tshul ni nga la nyon//klu lIn tsA nI gar byed cing //kha nas rol mo'i sgra yud 'byin//
190a4(rgyud): zas dang skom la dga' bar byed//de bzhin khrus dang phreng la dga'//rgyan dang gtom gyi tshul la dga'//chags shing dri zhim dad kyang ldang //dri za yi ni zin pa yis//mtshan
190a5(rgyud): ma rnams ni de dag yin//gong gis de ni bder 'gyur ba/gso ba'i thabs kyang bstan par bya//gtsang zhing gtsang sbrar spyod pa dang /dga' bzhin pas ni gso blar bya//
190a6(rgyud): me tog phreng dmar de bzhin te//'bras chan dmar po'ang de bzhin te//ba dan dmar po sbyin par byed//tsan dan dam rdzob nyid dag dang //sdud pa dmar po dag dang ni//de dag tha~Mng
190a7(rgyud): sbyin par bya//nad pa gos dmar bskon byas la//me tog phreng mar byug par ldan//me tog phreng mar lus bskus pa'i//dge slong bram ze bkra shis gdon//kha zas dmar po
190b1(rgyud): nas kyang //blonasu rung mo gtor ma sbyin//gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis//gdon do myur du gtang bar 'gyur//ci ste des kyang ma btang na//gang gis gdon du gtod 'gyur ba'o//
190b2(rgyud): thibs gzhan 'di ni sgyu bar bya//g+ha sa dang tsha ba gsum pa dang //si ldeng gr-I ni snyi bo da //rtsa ba lta bro gnyis kya 'jug/sgrog skye rgyu yang gzhug par bya//de nas chags
190b3(rgyud): rnams bsngags nas kyang //mang ni sbrul rtag bani dpa dang / ni ni d+hIn saM bai hUM zhing //ma~M ni chu dus ba ci ba deste// sa de la hU~M pa ste/ dzinan du ni snar yang
190b4(rgyud): blugs//mig bsdus lus byugs 'jigs par 'gyur//snar blugs 'jigs par gzor ba dang //mar 'thungs pas kyang 'jigs 'gyur nas//gdon de rab tu 'dres par 'gyur//
190b5(rgyud): ts+tsha ste des kyang ma btang nA//gang gis gdon des gtong 'gyur ba'i//thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya//dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje ma 'am/yang na bdud rtsi thub sbyor gyis
190b6(rgyud): ninim pa'i yam sreg shing dug dang khrag gi nang du bsgrags pa brgyad spyod sbyin sreg byas no//den po gdon du zhing 'bros par 'gyur te gdon rnam pa gsum pa 'di dag gang gis
190b7(rgyud): mgogs nas 'bris par 'gyur ba'i nga lon rnam pa sna tshogs kyi de zhig par bye'o//gdon bco brgyad las kyang de bzhin du gos par bya'o//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sngags ni
191a1(rgyud): phonya mo rdo rje ma'i sngags te/na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Ni s+yA ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ti s+ya/tad+ya thA dzi dzi ru ru/khu ri be khu ri/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Ta/pa la ya yata tang /badz+ra pA Na
191a2(rgyud): s+ya.a gra to ba shi/ta na ta nA/sme ra sma ra/ban+d+ha ban+na sA hA/na mo rat+ne tra yI ya/na mau badz+ra kr-i d+hA ya hu lu hu lu/tiSh+Ta tiSh+Ta/a mr-i ta kuN+Da le/kha kha khA hi kha he/
191a3(rgyud): br-in+da ban+d+ha swA hA/dri za'i gdon gyi skabs rdzogaso///sngar bshang gang yin tshangs pa yi//srin po'i gdon yang shes par bya//gtumo zhing drag la stobs po che//
191a4(rgyud): hUM la'i rmugs par dka' ba ste//yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad dang //zla ba nya la 'dzin par byed//gdon dang dka' thub ldan pa dang //tshangs par spyod la gnas pa la//tshangs pa'i
191a5(rgyud): srin po 'dzin par byed//lha la 'dran tor byed pa dang //gang zhig snying ni sdang ba dang //bram ze ma yin bram zer smra//bram ze gang dag gtsang sbra nyams//dpa' bo gang dag 'dran tar
191a6(rgyud): byid lha gnas ngag tu gar rtse zhing //tshangs par spyod las nyams gyur pa/de la tshangs pa'i srin po 'tshe//de yi tshul ni nga la nyon//gshe zhing 'gyod par byed pa dang //bar
191a7(rgyud): yang byed cing gdon par byed//bsgrags par mi 'gyur smra mi byed//lha rnams la yang mchod byed cing //bram ze mthong na mchod par byed//rdo ba dag dang shing dag dang //de bzhin
191b1(rgyud): lag pa rkang pa yis//rang ga lus la gnod par byed//tshangs pa'i srin pos zin pa ni//snyan tshig rig byed lhur len cing //nges brjod rig byed brjod par byed//bstan bcos kun la ma
191b2(rgyud): pabapaste/dri ba dag kyang 'dri bar byed//sngags 'tshang la ni brnyas par byed //dgod cing rab tu rgyug par byed//chings pa'i srin pos zin pa yi//mtshan ma yang ni de dag yin//gang gis gdon
191b3(rgyud): dri gtong 'gyur ba//de yi gtor ma be shad par bya//nas ni bre gsum bcos pa dang //de bzhin khur bA til zan dang //me tog phreng dmar 'jug pa dang //shing thog rnam pa sna tshogs drag/
191b4(rgyud): til nag nga bzhin 'bras yos dang //de bzhin zho dang 'o ma dang //gang ba'i snod dang de bzhin gdugs//de yi byug pa shu dag ste/khrus byas bsgrims te gcad byas pas//lho phyogasu ni sbyin
191b5(rgyud): par bya//gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis//gdon ni myur du gtong bar 'gyur//ce ste des kyang ma btang ni//gdon de myur du gting ba yi//thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya//nAg ta ma la/
191b6(rgyud): shri sha yi//'bras bu rtsa ba shu brags dang /de bzhin mai togI thams cad dang //pa ta li dang a sha na//bil ba'i rtsa ba gau zhug par bya//dug mo yungs kyang de bzhin te//thang shing dang ni
191b7(rgyud): bil ba dang //de bzhin tsha ba gsum po dang //rtsa ba lnga po gnyis kyang gzhug/sgrog skya dang ni phul bdun mar//ba gcin kyang ni nyi shu dang //seng ldeng shun brags ba shus pa ni//
192a1(rgyud): srang grangs nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang //'di dag thams cad bsres pa ni//me chung gis ni dal nas btso//de nas de la glad par bya//de bzhin du ni snar yang blugs//mig skyes
192a2(rgyud): lus byugs 'jigs par 'gyur//snar blugs 'jigs par gzir ba dang //mar 'thungs pas kyang 'jigs gyur nas//gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur//ci ste de nas ma bting na//
192a3(rgyud): gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i//thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya//dkyil 'khor zlum po bris nas kyang //drir ni gdon yang 'gug par bya//gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur
192a4(rgyud): ba'i//ngo lon dag ni der bya ste//rig pa'i mchog gam yang na ni//dga' byed gdong gisde ga zhom par bya//gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i//sngags gzhan gyis kyang yang
192a5(rgyud): na gzhom//tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon gyi skabs rdzogaso////sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i//srin po'i gdon yang shes par bya//gtum zhing drag la gzu lums can
192a6(rgyud): lci zhing tshugs par dka' ba ste//mar gyi nga ni zhag brgyud dang //mar gyi ngo ni bcu bzhi la//mi ni gtum zhing gzu lums can//spyi brtol can ni gang yin dang //brlang zhing
192a7(rgyud): 'thab la sred pa dang //rtag tu tshig ni rngub par smra//de la srin po sten par byed//srin pos zin pa de yi ni//mtshan ma rnams kyang shes par bya//skad cig gis ni ngu bar byed//
192b1(rgyud): yang ldan ra // na g+sa // yod pa mats+tsha na//spyod ga smra / ma gas slong/ da sngags
192b2(rgyud): //bzhin nAn zla glu yang min//mi ni kle 'u dag tu ldan//na pases la /rdzas can bral//mtshan ma rnams ni de yin+natA//glang gis gi don drug ting
192b3(rgyud): gyur te//de yi nga l-i nI bshad par bya//lce byams dang de bzhin dri//de bzhin sha btso mo rjen pa dang //bas deng sgom dang til zin rnams//smyig med khrag gis gtor ba dang //dri zhim pa
192b4(rgyud): yi me tog rnams//kha drug sna rdzo ga sgo rnams kyis sreg/de nas khrus byas gtsang 'gyur ba'i//dge slong brim ze bak+t+ra shis gdon//lho phyogs dang ni nub phyogs//gturI ma~M dadag
192b5(rgyud): sbyin par bya//gtor ma'i lus ni 'di nyid kyis//gdon de myur du ga tang bar 'gyur//tsaM ste des kyang mu btang na//gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i//thibs gzhan 'di ni bshad par
192b6(rgyud): //dug mo yungs dang sha ri sha/na ga ta ma la'i lo ma dang //rno ba 'bras bu shun lpags dang //me tog skam po rnams dang ni//pa ta li dang kra tA pi//tsha ba gsum po rnams dang ni/
192b7(rgyud): spyi ru ra yi 'bras bu dang //lang tang rtsa ba'ang gzhug par bya//sgrog skya dang ni shong kun dang //de bzhin rgya mtsho yungs kar rnams//de dag che ni minyam byas la//ragacin dang ni
193a1(rgyud): btags par bya//mar ni phul bzhi ldan pa dang //ba gcin dag ni bzhi 'gyur dang //me ni chu dus dal nas btso//de nas de la glud par bya//de bzhin du na snang
193a2(rgyud): yang blugs//mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs par 'gyur//snar blugs 'jigs pas gzir ba dang //mar 'thungs pas kyang 'jigs gyur nas//gdon do rab tu 'bros
193a3(rgyud): par 'gyur//tse ste des kyang ma btang na//gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i//thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya//sngags dang sbyin sreg sna tshogs kyis//de yi ngo lon bya ba ste//
193a4(rgyud): lha min yul du 'joms pa ltar//rdo rje mas kyang gzhom par bya//rdo rje mas ni 'jigs skrag nas//gdon de rab tu 'bros por 'gyur//srin po'i gdon gyi skabs rdzogs
193a5(rgyud): so//sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i//sha za'i gdon yang shes par bya//gtu me zhing drag la gzu lums can//lci zhing tshugs par dka' ba ste//mi rnams pa
193a6(rgyud): rgyal can dag dang //phra ma can dang brkam pa dang //bdag gi phyogs ni 'jom so byed dang //gzhan nor 'phrog pa 'dzin par byed//tshes gnyis dang ni ches gsum dang //de
193a7(rgyud): bzhin brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang //tshes gsum la ni rtag tu rgyu//sha za ye ni zin pa yi//mtshan ma dag kyang shes par bya//chos gnyis la ni gang rgyu ba//de yi tshul rnams nga
193b1(rgyud): las nyan//smyos pa yi ni mdog dang ldan//tshol dang rul pa'i dri mnam zhing //skye bo mthong na dgod par byeng //drug tu yang nAM ga shu ba dang //phyi sa'i dri dang ldan pa dang //de bzhin khrag pa
193b2(rgyud): yang mnam//gang ma shes byar sha zo yin//gnyis pa'i mtshan yang nga las nyon//lus kun yang ni 'dir ba ste//skad cig re rer rab tu rgyug/ngu zhing glu yang len par byed//skad ci
193b3(rgyud): re reng gar yang byed//khang stang dag tu sten pa dang //de bzhin skye bo 'jigs par byed//zas dang skom la dga' ba dang //de bzhin sha dang chang la dga'//sprul pa zhes bya sha za yin//
193b4(rgyud): gsum pa'i mtshon la'ang nga las nyon//nad pa dag gis migo kyang ni//na mkha' la yang lta bar byed//kha zas byin pa rnams dang ni//gnas dang gnos min rnamasu 'dor//de ni sha
193b5(rgyud): dang chang dag gis//ji ltar byas kyang chog me shes//thab khang dag tu nyal bar byed//tshul yang med cing lto tsha la//rtag tu phye ba reg par byed//bud med lam du 'gog par byed//
193b6(rgyud): shra za gzu lums can pos bya//gsum pa yang ni bshad pa yin//dA ni gang gis bder 'gyur ba'i//gso ba'i thabs kyang bshad par bya//til zan la phug sgo skya dang //til gyi
193b7(rgyud): tshigs ma nas kyi zas//zho dang sha bcos rjen pa dang //btung ba dang ni de bzhin zas//de yi gtor ma sman pas blangs//nub phyogasu ni rang bzhin sbyin//gter ma'i las ni 'di nyid
194a1(rgyud): kyis//gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur//ci ste des kyang ma btang na//gang gang gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'o//thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyin par bya//pri yang ku yi me tog
194a2(rgyud): dang //chu 'di yang ni de bzhin te//'bras bu gsum dang sgog skye'ang gzhug/shu dag dang ni shing kun dang //pha la ta dang bcas par gzhug/ka ta ba ka'ang de bzhin te//shau ri
194a3(rgyud): sha ye mye tog dang //de dag cha ni mnyam byas la//ra ga canA dang ni btags par bya//mar ni phul bzhir ldan pa dang //be gcin dag ni bzhi 'gyur na'ang //me ni chung ngus dal
194a4(rgyud): nas btso//mig kyang bskus zhing snar yong blugs//de bzhin du ni mar kyang btung //mig bskus lus byugs 'dzegs par 'gyur//snar blugs 'jigs pas gzir ba dang //
194a5(rgyud): mar 'thungs pas kyang 'jigs 'gyur nas//gdon de rab tu 'a bros par 'gyur//ce ste des kyang ma btang na//glang gis gdon de gtong gyur po'i//thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar///
194a6(rgyud): byu/sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas//dkyil 'khor du ni legs par gzhug/'jigs pa'i phyag rgya sbyin sreg las//nag mo yis ni myur du gzhom//sbyin srog las
194a7(rgyud): rjes 'jigs skrag nas//gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur//sha za'i gdon gyi skabs rdzogs////sngar po shad pa ni gang yin pa'i//klu yi gau ni ya' bshad par bya//
194b1(rgyud): gtu mi zhing stobs cho khro ba dang //drag cing sos kyang 'debs par byed//'joms par byed cing sems can 'tsho//yar ngo gnyis kyi chos lnga dang //de bzhin mar gyi chos bdun dang //dus
194b2(rgyud): tshigs kun dang gung gi che//dad pa can gyi bram ze la//klu dbang gdon ni rgyu bar byed//gdon gyis zin pa 'dar ba dang //'khor zhing sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur//ha rer yang ni lta ba dang
194b3(rgyud): mig kyang dmar bar 'gyur ba dang //lce yang 'byin par byed pa dang //yang dang yang du dbugs kyang gtong //'bras bu me tog phreng ba dga'//de bzhin 'o ma mar la dga'//rtag tu yang ni khre
194b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur//so yang 'thams par 'gyur ba ste//gang gi mtshan ma de dag ni//klu le gdon du bshad pa yin//de ni gang gi bder 'gyur ba'i//gso ba'i thabs kyang bstan par bya//rig sngags
194b5(rgyud): /'chang gi khrus byas la//gtsang zhing yid ni dge ba yis//bsgrims te gtor ma sbyin par bya//bkra shris 'bras yos bu ram dang //snum khur 'bras can bu ram sbyar//pad+ma ut+pal
194b6(rgyud): pu shel ci//de bzhin ut+pal dmar po dang //zas mchog dag ni 'o ma zho//sa nog kyang ni de bzhin te//me tog phreng mang bdug pa dang //klu yi me tog sbyin par byo//dri mar dag ni
194b7(rgyud): de bzhin te//skud pa dmar po sbyin par bya//gu gul dang ni thang shing gi/bdug pa de la sbyin par bya//byang phyogs dang ni shar phyogasu//gtor ma srod la sbyin par bya//gtor ma'i lba/
195a1(rgyud): ni 'di nyid kyis//gdon du myur du gtong bar 'gyur//ci ste des kyang ma btad na//gang gis gdon du gtong 'gyur ba'o//thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar smra/
195a2(rgyud): lig bu mig ni chu glang dang //btags nas mig bsku yang na blugs//shwe ta ba la gser phro ma dang //rgya spos dang ni yungs kar dang //nA ga ta ma la tum phyi dang //thang shing dang ni
195a3(rgyud): rnam pa bdun//tshogs rnams de dag bsogs nas ni//me ni chung ngu btso bya zhing //mar ni phul tag bzhi dag dang //ba gcin phul bzhi'i nang du btso//de nas de la glud par bya/
195a4(rgyud): de bzhin du ni snar yang blugs//mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs par 'gyur//snar blugs 'jigs pas gzir ba dang //mar 'thungs pas kyang 'jigs gyur nas//gdon de
195a5(rgyud): rab tu 'bros par 'gyur//ci ste des kyang mi btang na//gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur pa'i//thabs gzhan 'di ni sbar bar bya//gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i//sbyin
195a6(rgyud): sreg las ni sbyar bar bya//sbyin sreg lAs ni mi bzad dang //rdo rje lte bas bcom byas na//sbyin sreg las ni 'jigs gzi bas//klu yis me ni gtong byed cing /klu ni myur
195a7(rgyud): du 'bros par 'gyur//klu yi ge don gyis zin pa la//gang gis gzhan du 'gal bar byed//rig sngags 'chang dang mi dag la//brtsi ba'i phyir ni 'ong byed na//go cha brtan
195b1(rgyud): ts+tsha b+hU b+h+ri //rig pa mchog go go bgos la//mA rungs dug ni mi bzad pa//pho nyams ni nges par 'joms//lag na rdo rje rigs mchog ma//pho nya sto bas chen gang yin pa'o//
195b2(rgyud): snong pa drug ci du 'jigs bA yi//lus kyis skye bor 'jims par byed//bcom pa des na dbye byed cing //gdon ni de par bu drug par 'gyur//klu yi ga nA b+hi skabs rdzogs//
195b3(rgyud): sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i//log 'dren ga don yang shes par bya//gtum zhing drag la gzu lums can//lci zhing 'jig rten 'joms pa ste//mar gyi ngo yi tshes lnga dang /
195b4(rgyud): tshecheste grangs bcu bzhi gnam stong la//skye bo gnas dang 'gro ba la//dus kun tu ni 'chi bar byed//dri ma can dang gros ngan can//de bzhin kha zas khyis ma za//dga' bar 'gyur
195b5(rgyud): khro ba dang //bud med kyis spangs gang yin dang //chu dog bud med bltas pa dang //shing la 'jog cing bshang gci byed//'greng zhing bshang gci byed pa dang //gcer bur rgyug pa
195b6(rgyud): gang min+d+ra dang //gzhan gyi gros dang 'dres pa dang //gros kyi thams ga yab pa yi//mi rnams gang gis zin pa yi//zhum zhing ngu bar byed pa dang //nor rnams kyang ni chung za zhing //
195b7(rgyud): gzhan gyi yid du mi 'ang dang //skyes pa chung ma snyed mi 'gyur//bud med na ni khyo mi rnyed//tshong byed na yang zong dag gis//khe spogs rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing //zhing gshin dag la
196a1(rgyud): rmos btab kyang //rmos pa'i 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur//mtshan ni thams cad rdzogs pa yi//chung ma las kyang bu mi 'byung //don gzhan bya bar brtsams kyang ni//
196a2(rgyud): log pa'i blo ni gzhan du 'gyur//de dag gang la snang 'gyur pa'i//de yi gso ba'i thabs kyang bshad//khang pa mnyam zhing gsar byas la//rin chen thams cad bsogs par bya//
196a3(rgyud): bum pa bzhi yang der bzlog cing //bkra shis rnams kyang dbul bar bya//rdzas rnams dang ni 'bras rnams dang /ga pa bdun sngon pa dang //sha bcos dang ni rjen pa dang //de bzhin
196a4(rgyud): khu ba zas rnams dang //dri dang me tog dkar po dang //'bras kyi 'o thug der sbyin bya//gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis//de ni khrus kyang byed du gzhug/ba la a ti ba la dang //
196a5(rgyud): kan ta ka ri 'bri ha ti//ba tra dang ni pu shel tse//pri yang ku dang shu ti dang //phye ma'i gong bu 'di yis ni//rab tu mnyam gzhag khrus byed gzhug/rig sngags 'chang ni shar phyogs/
196a6(rgyud): lnga//nad pa nub phyogs bsten byas la//gos dkar can gyi snying po dang //ldan pa'i chus ni dbang yang bskur/de nas blo ldan yang gzhungs pas//bdud rtsi thab sbyor ldan pa yi//sbyor
196a7(rgyud): smin gyis ni lus kyang bsdu//gu gul dang ni yungs kar dang //ge'u wang shu dag ru rta dang //sug smel yang ni de bzhin te//sgron shing dang ni thang shing dang //tsani ngan dang ni oM ga
196b1(rgyud): ru//kA lo ya yi pad 'dra dang //gosar rnams ni chu bsnams la//chu dang lhan rtog btags par bya//gung na sbyar spyan 'ad gnas pa//dud ni 'dzegs pa mi 'byung ste//chom rkun ma
196b2(rgyud): yin mtshan rnams men//sbrul rnams ma yin lha min min//lag na rdo rje'ang 'dis bskus pas//sa steng dag tu rgyal bar 'gyur//'di yis lus la bskus na ni//log 'dren rnams/
196b3(rgyud): las thar bar 'gyur//sbyar smin don kun sgrub pa ni//sngar yang ngas ni bshad pa yi//log 'dren gyi gdon gyi skabs rdzogaso////sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i//brjed byed gdon//
196b4(rgyud): yang shes par bya//drag cing khri la gtum pa dang //gzu lums can de tshugs par dka'//tshes gnyis dang ni tshes bzhi dang //de bzhi ni dgu dang bcu gnyis dang //mar gyi bcu bzhi
196b5(rgyud): de bzhin te//brjer byed dag ni 'jug par 'gyur//dang po'i thun ni 'das nas kyang //lhag ma rnams la de bzhin ldang //phyi nas rlung bzhin yi dang yang //de nas yud tsam nyen zhag dang //
196b6(rgyud): de bzhin zla phyed zla dang lor//dbu ba skyug cing rgyal bar 'gyur//lus las rdul yang 'byung bar 'gyur//gdon gyis zin pa 'khor ba dang //sa la 'gyel zhing 'khor bar 'gyur//
196b7(rgyud): brjed byeng ga na gyi zin pa yi//de yi mtshan mo de dag yin//gang gis gdan de gtong 'gyur ba'i//gso ba'i thabs kyang bshad par bya//bdug pa dri dang me tog phreng //de bzhin
197a1(rgyud): bcos rngon pa dang //ti la zan dang ni 'byung po'i zas//de bzhin shug pa pu shol tse//byug pa dang ni mar yang grung //'bras bu gsum las srang gcig dang //chu ba gsum
197a2(rgyud): las srang gcig gzhug/sgog skya brgya yang gzhug par bya//yungs kar stong yang de bzhin te/nag ta ma la'i sa bon dang //bil ba'i rtsa ba de bzhin te//de dag cha ni mnyam byas
197a3(rgyud): la/ra gcin dang ni btags por bya//mar dang ba gcin bzhi 'gyur gyi//mar du yang ni gtso bar bya//mig kyang bsku zhing snar yang blugs//de bzhin mar yang btung bar bya//
197a4(rgyud): mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs par 'gyur//snar blugs 'jig pas gzir ba dang //cho ga 'di dag rnams kyis kyang //gdon de rab tu 'bros por 'gyur//ci ste des kyang ma btang na /
197a5(rgyud): gang gis gdon dri gtong gyur pa'i//thabs gzhan 'di yang bshad par bya//dkyil 'khor dris te gzhug par byas la spyan nam yang na bdud rtsi thab sbyor ram/tshogs chen
197a6(rgyud): po lcags can gyis be'i rmad ka ta'i yam sreg shing gi sbyin sreg byas na gdon de 'bros par 'gyur ro//brjed khyod kyi gdon gyi skabs rdzogaso////sngar bshad pa ni gang
197a7(rgyud): yin pa'i//skyo byed gdon yang shes par bya//drag cing go tu me la gzu lums can//lci zhing tshugs par dka' ba ste//mar gyi ngo yi zhag gnyis dang //zhag dgu la ni 'tshe byad
197b1(rgyud): /rlung dang bdakan dang zhan rgyu/d+hU byud gdonan 'jug pa 'gyur//du ma tshul na ba shad pang ///ngas pa shad na mnyan pa gyis su drugs ba tu mdzes pa yin//
197b2(rgyud): dga' zhing skye bar 'gyur//dpa' bod ni gzugs bzung drung //mi na la sred pa la//ljang po la sogs gtam dgu las//sgro byud 'dzin tetha tsam med//mtshan 'de dag gis
197b3(rgyud): pa /rdul rnams ni de D+D+h+ya k+She/zla /nga pa phyi sa du da //dwai dul tog byung la dogal//rlung bang /na ga smra pa yin/
197b4(rgyud): ga ma yang na 'greng //de la nas kyang ni dgod pa dang //gnyid kyang rgyo bar mi 'gyur la//cung zad kyi ni m+b+ha mi byed//khazas la yang dga' bi rnams//rlung mkhris pa /na gnas
197b5(rgyud): po yin//shin tu drag tu smra ba dang //myung du yang ni smra ba dang //gtam gyi tshul la dga' ba'i rnams//byang kain+de gnas la garten pa dang //gnas gsum la ni rten 'gyur la//tshul
197b6(rgyud): nu yang ni byed gyur na/de ni ga sor me shes par bya//de la spyod par bya ba med//lha rnams lag na rdo rje da'i mtshams rlung 'di ni gsor mi rung ba la yang cher gcod pa yin no//
197b7(rgyud): gden gso'i ming thos kyang mi 'dres pa de la nings rdo rje drug gis spyo shes par bya'o/smyan da gsang sngags 'i sa byang myi gang rgyabang ba rgyal ga ya
198a1(rgyud): byA t+te/dr-i kun dang no mya tog phreng //de bzhin ral mo'i spyad kun dang //'bras can dri zhim gcad ma dang //'thug 'bru chang sbyar ba'i chang /de ltar gtor ma
198a2(rgyud): rnams bsogs la//lam gyi bzhi mdor sbyin par bya//gtor ma'i las ni 'di dag gis//gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur//ci ste des kyang ma btang na//gang gis gdon
198a3(rgyud): de gtong 'gyur ba'i//thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyor bar bya//mar snying lo ni sum cu gnyis//lon pa'i mar di phul bzhi dang //ri me phul bzhi dag dang ni//sbrang rtsi phul bzhir ldan
198a4(rgyud): par bya//ba lang ko ba bsregs pa yi//phye ma phul bzhi gzhug par bya//sgog smra brgya yang gzhub par bya//srang grangs sum cu A ru ra//srang grangs nyis 'gyur tsha ba gsun
198a5(rgyud): daso ba bos ni gzhug bya ste//lhan cig phyi ma zhib mor bya//gang tshe thams cad chos gyur nas//de bzhin du ni phyir yang 'gyur//mi yi 'jig rten gnas pa yi//gdon
198a6(rgyud): thams cad ji snyed pa//rlung can dang ni mkhris pa can//bidA kan can dang 'dus pa can//gdon gyi gzugs ni thams cad kyi//sman rnams kyang ni 'di yin te//rdo rje lha yi mar
198a7(rgyud): zhes bya//gdon kun gtong bar 'gyur ba dang //gdon kun zhi bar byed pa dang /gdon kun 'jigs par byed pa ste//sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir//nga yis su ni bshad
198b1(rgyud): na//gA sh-ikA sman gyi rgyal ba yi//ming ni lo pa par dra spyod pa//de la gdon rnams da myos//glags bcu' byur na tshun ma byed//dpyor dul gyud par bya//de bzhin sngar yang
198b2(rgyud): blugs par bya//cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni//gdon de rab tu 'bris par 'gyur//ci ste des kyang ma btang na//gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i//thibs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar
198b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bris la der gzhug par bya ste/dkyil 'khor der rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'am/tshogs lcags can nam/rmugs byed kyis sbyin bsreg bya'o//lha rnams
198b4(rgyud): 'di ni lag na rdo rje'i cham rlung yin te/gsor mi rung ba rnams kyang cher gcod par byed do//gdon gang nga'i ming thos nas mi 'dres pa de la rdo rje drag po sa spyi bo bshags par bya'o//
198b5(rgyud): lha rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas ma rung rnams gnas pa bzang po rnams ngas de shad zin te//sgro byed kyi glad ni gyi skabs rdzog go//sngor bshad pa ni gang yin
198b6(rgyud): gdon//lha mA yin gdon shes par bya//gtum zhing gzu lums cha ba dang //'jig rten 'tshe bar byed pa 'i s+ho//gzi brjid can+da dang lus tshe dang //gzugs bzang yon tan ldan pa
198b7(rgyud): la//lha maM yin ni 'jug par byed//de yi mtshan ma tshul bzhin nyon//rig sngags 'chang la bsgos par byed//rag byed kyang ni skye bar byed//skem byed nga yin khyab 'jug //
199a1(rgyud): zhes ni brdzun yang smra bar byed//gdon kun gyi ni tshul dgu dang //rnam pa mang por sgyur bar byed//ngu zhing ros 'ga' sos kyang 'dzin//res 'ga' zas kyang za
199a2(rgyud): bar byed//lag pas rtsa dag blangs nas kyang //skad cig gis ni mi la 'tshe//tshig ngan dag kyang sme bar byed//shin tu yang ni dgod par byed//lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams kyi//
199a3(rgyud): mtshan ma yang ni de yin te//cho ga yang ni de bzhin du//de yi ngo lon gang dag gis//gdon de gtong bar 'gyur ba'ang bya//me tog kun dang dri dgra dang //me tog phreng ba sna tshogs
199a4(rgyud): dang //pad+ma ut+pal pu shIl tse//ut+pal dmar po 'dab ma dang //sha bcos dang ni rjen pa yin//de lon dag ni 'jam por bya//de nas rig sngags 'chang dag gis/
199a5(rgyud): gtsang sbra bya ste nub phyogs sbyin//gtor ma las ni 'di nyid kyis//gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur//ci ste des kyang ma btang na//gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i//thabs
199a6(rgyud): gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya//'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba dang //ba la a tA ba la dang //thal dres dang ni pu shel ci//rtsa ba lnga rnams bsogs nas ni//mar ni phul tag bzhi dag kyang //
199a7(rgyud): ba gcin phul bzhi nang du btso//me ni chung ngus dal nas gtso//de nas de la glud par bya//de bzhin du ni snar yang blugs//mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs par 'gyur//
199b1(rgyud): thugs 'jigs pasra ga zing ba dang //myud 'grus pasdu kyang 'jigs gyur nas//smad na du rab tu 'bras par 'gyur//tsaM sti ngas kyang ma brta na//blang gis gdun du gtad 'gyur
199b2(rgyud): ba'o//thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya//rdo rje ser skyas sbyin bsreg bya//rdo rje sgrog gis bcing bar bya//de dag sngags kyis cher yang bcad//lha ma yin gyi gdon gyi skabs rdzog so//
199b3(rgyud): de nas ngas ni sngar bshang gang //gzhon nu'i gdon pozhin shes par bya//gtum zhing khro la gzu lu mas can//'gro ba'i gnas dang mi gnas 'joms//chos gnyis dang ni bcu gcig/
199b4(rgyud): dang //mar gyi ngi yi zhag lnga dang //phal che re tshes bcu dag la rgyu//gzhon nu'i srog ni gcod pa yi//rtag tu gsum zhing rgyu bar byed//byis pa gsod cing mi srun na//rigs bzhi ldan
199b5(rgyud): zhang rtag tu rgyu//gtor ma 'dod pa'i gdon chen yin//de las gzhan pa'i gang dag gi/rigs rnams ci 'dra ba shud par gyis//nam gru bram zer shes par bya//bya ni rgyal rigs
199b6(rgyud): yin par bstan//skem byed rje'i rigs shes par bya//gzhon nu dmangs rigs shes par bya//gyen tu lta ba gang yin dang //skad cig skad cig 'khor bar byed//rims dang lung pa
199b7(rgyud): dbugs mi bde//de ni nom gru'i gdon yin no//mig phag pa ni gang yin dang //so yang 'tsho'i' bar byed pa dang //rngam pa can dang rims btab gang //de ni bya nyid yin par bstan/
200a1(rgyud): bro bur du ni ngu ba gang //rims kyis btab cing rab tu rgyuH/sdang zhing dgod par byed pa dang //de bzhin 'dar zhing bral bar byed//byis pa gang gis kha dag nas/
200a2(rgyud): dri nga ba ni 'byung ba dang //lus la rma dang 'brum bu 'byung //tsha zhing me yi mdog dang 'dra//mtshon mo dus mtshams ldang bar 'gyur//dus mtshams dag tu bab pa na//'khru
200a3(rgyud): zhing rims 'debs spyug pa dang //lus kyang sngon por gyur pa dang //gang zhig lus ni rdob par byed//rims kyis kyang ni 'tsho ba dang //nu ma shin tu sos kyang 'debs/
200a4(rgyud): lan grangs mang du ngu zhing 'dar//mig kyang dmar por gyur pa dang //mi dga' mchu yang mur bar byed//byis pa skem byed zin pa yin//lag pa dang ni rkang pa gcig
200a5(rgyud): las byas pas ni tshig kyang na//mig ni 'khor zhing lta bar byed//mig gcig kyang nu 'dzums par byed//rnag dang khrag gi dri yang mnam//smin ma ya gcig 'degs
200a6(rgyud): par byed//skem byed brjed byed gdon rnams kyi//mtshan ma dag tu bstan pa yin//gzhon nu'i gdon la gtor mi bya//legs par khrus byas gtsang mas sgrim//dbyig rnams
200a7(rgyud): da no gser rnams dang //gos kyang de la sbyin par bya//snum khung bkra shes 'bras yos dang //'bras chan dang ni zan dron dang //sha be cos dang ni rjen pa dang //chang dang til zan
200b1(rgyud): rnams dang ni//la dang 'bras can nu shas //'dus kyi'i thug yung pa kang ldan//bldang gan mug 'as//shong skam mama'o gnas dag tu//gtA ma ma mar bcas pa 'ang//snad la yang ni rmya
200b2(rgyud): ra/pa'i las na 'a byed kyis//dond sbya ba 'gyuste sa sgyu sa //klung shes na da//thAs gdun dgu ba ////
200b3(rgyud): dngor mnyog//gsar khrim ni myur ba srung //kau bid+hI/li khru ba dang //bal ga lo ma dang //sbyang ran tsam gzhug par bya//seng ldeng snyed sum// shing
200b4(rgyud): mdang thams cad dang //dri dag na ni ma d+him+b+ha b+h+yas //ragacin dang ni ba ta ga byer bya//ma ni rdul 'azhigazug pa bye//ba ga cin yang ni ban+d+ha b+hU blugs//go phywa'i phyi ma dag da ni/
200b5(rgyud): ra bar gdul pa dang //ti le ru la nas kyi lo ma yin//blugs pa'i sman ni bya ba yin//mar ni phul teg phyed kyis kyang //gong bu'i sman mchog mtsho bar bya//dus mtshams gnyis sgra
200b6(rgyud): ma//de sa sang byed du shAn/shA / sa 'am//zhes pa'i the man dam pa'i///kun nas smras pa'i mas pang //ngom da nan 'cha
200b7(rgyud): 'du gags kyang ni//gdon N+DI gros pa'i rgyu/ ste ma//dang nas de nga ga 'gyur ba//bangs gzhan 'di ni sbyang bar po//dga' byang na
201a1(rgyud): gis khrus bya zhing //gtor ma yang ni de la sbyin//yang na rig pa mchog gis bya//des ni gdon de gtong par 'gyur//gzhon nu'i gdon gyi skabs rdzogaso//
201a2(rgyud): sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'o//gnod sbyin gdon yang shes par bya//gtum zhing gzu lum che ba ste//'jig rten dag la'ang 'tshe bar byed//ngo gnyis chos ni bcu gsum//
201a3(rgyud): dang //yar gyi chos lnga dag la rgyu//bskyed mos tshal dang lha gnas su//gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang ba dang //mi rnams gzugs ni bzang ba dang //rgyan pos rtse la rab chags
201a4(rgyud): dang //bzhi mdo gang du rtse ba na//bram ze rgyal rigs rtag tu 'dzin//gnod sbyin gdon gyis zin gyur pa//de yi mtshan ma shes par bya//dri dang me tog phreng la dga'//
201a5(rgyud): zas skom la'ang de bzhin dga'//khro ba med cing mi ngu la//yang dang yang du zas kyang za//dbang yang tsha zhing nor mang la//de bzhin rtag tu sprin la dga'//rtag tu shin tu
201a6(rgyud): gtsang sgra ldan//d+ye ni gse ba'i thabs kyang bshad//zlas kun dang ni dr-i kun dang //de bzhin me tog thams cad dang //shing trog kun dang sbyar thug dang //de bzhin 'bras kyi 'o
201a7(rgyud): thug dang //she bcos dang ni rjen pa dang //til zan dang ni 'byung po'i zas//gdugs ser dang ni mchod phyir thogs//de bzhin skud pa so ra po dang //dbyig rnams deng ni gser
201b1(rgyud): dag dang //rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs rnams//tshul bzhin du ni sbyin par bya//gtor ma de dag bsogs nas kyang //byang phyogasu ni sbyin par bya//gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis//gdon
201b2(rgyud): dedamyur du gtong bar 'gyur//ci ste des kyang ma btang na//gdo gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i//thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya//gro rnams dang ni nas rnams dang //mon sran
201b3(rgyud): gre'u dang rgya sran dang //'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum//de bzhin yungs kar pri yang ku//shu dag dang ni shing kun dang //de bzhin rtsa ba lnga pa gnyis//til rnams sgog skya ldan par
201b4(rgyud): gzhug/mar ni bul bzhi nang du btso//'o ma phul bzhi sbrang rtsi bzhi//ba gcin phu la bzhi blugs par bya//ba lang ko ba bsregs pa yi//phye ma phul bzhi gzhug par bya//
201b5(rgyud): me ni chung ngus dal nas gAtse//de nas de la blugs par bya//de bzhin du ni sngar yang blugs//mig bskus lus byugs 'dzags pa dang //snar blugs 'jigs pas gzir bar
201b6(rgyud): 'gyur//cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni//gdon dA rab tu 'bros par 'gyur//ci ste des kyang ma btang na//gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i//thobs gzhan 'di yang sbyar bar bya//
201b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bris te dang bcug la sbyin sreg gi las mi bzad pas me'i nang du rig pa mchog gis gzhom par bya'o//yang na rdo rje nag mos gzhom par bya ste/des ni gdon
202a1(rgyud): 'bros par 'gyur//gnod sbyin gyi gdun gyi skabs rdzog s+ho//de las gzhan yang gdon rnams kyi//mtshan ma'i bye brag ba shad par bya//gdan rnams dag
202a2(rgyud): ni thams cad la//rigs bzhi dag ni yod par blo shad//de dag kyang ni ming gcig dang //mtshan ma gcig pu 'khrul par byed//gdon rnams gang dag gang du 'dzin//de yang bdag
202a3(rgyud): gis bshad par bya//lha dang 'byung po gnod sbyin dang //de bzhin dri za tshangs pa'i srin//gdon rnams lnga por shes pa na//bram ze rgyal rigs spyod par bshad//klu yi gdon du
202a4(rgyud): shes pa dang //srin po yi ni gdon nyid dang //gdon de gnyis su shes pa ni//rje'u rigs dmangs rigs 'tshe ba yin//lha min gdon ni rgyal rigs kyis//lhag ma'i rigs rnam
202a5(rgyud): 'che ba yin//shA za'i gdon ni dmangs ris kyis//lhag ma'i rigs rnams 'che ba yin//smyo byed dang ni log 'dren dang //byis pa'i gdon ni gang yin pa//gdon rnams 'di
202a6(rgyud): gsum shes pa ni//rigs bzhi dag la spyod par bshad//gdon gang rigs 'thun gang la spyod//de ni gso bar sme ba yi no//ci ste gdon gang 'ga' btsal zhing //gzhan la
202a7(rgyud): ston par 'gyur na ni//lag na rdo rjes bshod pa bzhin//de la gson du re ba'ang med//nyi ma nub mo snang mi byed//zla ba nyin mo snang mi byed//bstan pa de yi tshul gyis na/
202b1(rgyud): /gdon no rang gi rigs la spyod//gdon rnams bcu brgyad gang yin pa//thams cad dus tshogs rnamasu rgyu//lo grangs bcu gnyi ga tshun chad kyi/gdon rnams gso pa'i thabs pab
202b2(rgyud): de/de las 'das pa'i gdon rnams kyi//gso ba'i thabs ni yong med do//mchi ni gcig gnas dang chu yi nu//me 'gram dang ni khron pa'i drung //de bzhin ma mo rnams skye gnas/
202b3(rgyud): ba lang dbus dang rta zhon dang //glang chen zhon dang g.yul du pha ma//ri bo dang ni dur khrod dang //shing drung dang ni 'dreg mkhan khyi ma//gnas 'di dag ni thams cad du//gdon ni gang
202b4(rgyud): zhig 'jug 'gyur na//lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin//de la gasngon du re ba med//de las gzhan yang mi bzad gdon//gso ba'i thabs kyang bshad par bya//grib gnon
202b5(rgyud): gdon ni gnyis yod de//mthong ba tsam gyis 'brang bar bshad//de yi myi chen ma'adang las nyon//grib gnon gdon gnyis gang yin de//thams cad du ni 'jug par byed//gdon
202b6(rgyud): rnams dag ni thams cad kyang //grib gnon gyis ni nye bar mtshan//so gan d+hi dang ut+pal gyi//mtshan ma rnams kyang nga las nyon//de las sau gan+d+hi kai ne//gzu lums tshe
202b7(rgyud): zhing drag pa ste//chos grangs nyin zhig nges pa med//shing drung dang ni bskyed mos tshal/lam gyi bzhi mngar 'jug par byed//gdon du khus 'debs medu ba dang //rngos rnams
203a1(rgyud): kyang ni 'joms par byed//nyin mo thun cig 'das pa na//gsod par yang ni byed pa ste//sau gan d+ha kas zin 'gyur ba//de yi mtshan ma de dag yin//bdud rtsi thab
203a2(rgyud): sbyor ram dga' byed gdong gis tshul bsngags te khrus byed du bcug la bdug pas bdugs na gtong bar 'gyu ro//ut+pa la yang nga las nyon//ngu zhing dgod par byed pa dang //
203a3(rgyud): so rnams kyang ni gcig par byed//nu ma yeng ni mi shis do//rjes tshogs med par rgyu bar byed//ut+pa las ni zon gyur pa//de yi mtshan ma de dag yin//gang gis gdon
203a4(rgyud): de gtong 'gyur ba'i//gtor ma yang ni de la sbyin//'bras kyi 'o thug sbyar thug dang //lag pan 'bras can bu ram chan//sha bcos pa dang rjen pa dang //chang dang til gyi zan dag dang /

203a6(rgyud): myur du gtong bar 'gyur//tsaM ste des kyang ma btadAn//grong gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i//thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya//yungs kar shu dag shing kun dang //pi pi ling dang na
203a7(rgyud): li sham//'bras bu gsum ni tsha mnyam dang //gi ri kar ni dkar po dang //ru rta dang ni pr-i yang ku//de bzhin bca' sgo ngag dang ni//thang shing dang nai pu shel tse//nag ta ma la'i 'bras
203b1(rgyud): bu dang //tshogs rnams 'odadi dag raso blas nas no//ba gats+tshan+da dag dang btags par bya//mar gyi nang du gtso bya zhing //ba gtson bzho 'gyur blugs par bya//mig kyang bsku zhing snar yang blug
203b2(rgyud): btung bar bya zhing lus kyang byug/'di ni gdon rnams thaMd kyi//sman rnams kyi ni dam pa yin//gden sbyar sman 'di gnas pa//da ni ki ti lu ta dang //byis pa yang ni de bzhin te//de
203b3(rgyud): gis ni 'jigs pa med//cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni//gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur//ci ste des kyang ma btang na//gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i//thabs gzhan 'di na
203b4(rgyud): sbyar bar bya//bdud rtsi thab sbyor ram/dga' byed gdong dam/gos dkar can gyis dkyil 'khor du bzhug na/gdon thams cad ma rung bar 'gyuraro//so'u gan d+hi dang ut+pa la gnyi ga
203b5(rgyud): yang las gcig yin par shes par bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis/bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la dris pa/ma rung gdon las gso ba'i thabs//
203b6(rgyud): bcom ldan shes par bgyi bar 'tshal//gang la shing bu bab pa dang //gang dge dkyil 'khor spong ba dang //gos shing zhen par gyur pa dang //phyir yang ldog byed gang yin dang /
203b7(rgyud): nams kyang gtong bar mi byed la/gsang sngags dang ni rtsi sman dang //sbyin sreg las kyis gzhig pa ni//gdon rnams gzhig pa'i dam pa ste//mar btung ba yi cho ga dang //tshong//
204a1(rgyud): ci 'dra ga tor nA'i las//gsang ba yin rdo tsom dang //glang gis gnod sbyin btang 'gyur dang //sregs pa dang ni bcad pa dang //bsad cing rus pa gzhom pa dang /
204a2(rgyud): de dag cho ga rab bshad pa//de ni stobs chen bdag la gsungs//de ltar blo can che ba nyid//bdud rtsi theb sbyor gyis dris nas//lag na rdo rje skal chen gyis/'di skad kyi ni tshig
204a3(rgyud): kyang smras//bdud rtsi thab sbyor khyod kyis su//nga la gang dris bshad par bya//lha rnams 'khod pa'i nang du nyon//ma rungs pa yi gdon nyid ni//g.yo dang mi g.yo zhes bya ba//
204a4(rgyud): sems can kun la 'tshe ba yod//sbyin sreg las ni du mas kyang //g.yo dang mi g.yo'i 'bros mi 'gyur//de yi mtshan ma ngas bshad kyis//go rims bzhin du lha rnams nyon//
204a5(rgyud): dris pa yi ni don rnams kyang //rab tu yang ni skye bar byed//ngu bar byed cing rab tu khro/de ni ma rungs mtshan mar shes//'dus shing 'tshogs pa'i nang dag tu//shin tu yongs su
204a6(rgyud): srung ba gang //khang stong dab tu dga' bar byed//de ni mi rung mtshan mor shes//gang gis rtag tu phyag 'tshal dang //snyan par yang ni smra ba dang //stan dag kyang ni stobs par byed//
204a7(rgyud): de ni ma rungs mtshan mar shes//stan dag las ni sten dag la//ci ste 'pho zhing ldan par byed//de ni ma rungs mtshan mar shes//nga ni lho yin khyab 'jug pa//tshangs pa nga yin
204b1(rgyud): dbang phyug //skye dgu'i bdag po nga yin zhes//de skad kyi ni tshig smra zhing //gdon kun gyi ni tshul yang byed//gang gis gadron de gtong 'gyur ba//de yi gso ba'i thabs kyang bshad//a shwa
204b2(rgyud): g+han d+haM shu dag drong //'bras bu gsum dang pu tse she la//kan+ta ka ri b+hi ha ti//ki ri kar ni dkar po dang //nag ta mA la'i 'bras bu dang //shi rI shwe yi me tog dang //de bzhin ga so ma pa ta
204b3(rgyud): lI/pA la sha yI lo ma dang //bu tshang rdo dang ra ma nye ba//ba la a te pA la dang //bil ba arga gnyis kyi rtsa//de bzhin rna ba lnga pa gnyis//lo ni sum cu lon pa yi//mar ni snying pa gang
204b4(rgyud): yin pa'i//mar ni phul bzhi ldan par bya//'o ma phul bzhi sbrang rtsi bzhi//ba lang ko ba bsregs pa yi//phye ma phul bzhi gzhug par bya//sgog skya brgya yang gzhug par bya//srang grangs
204b5(rgyud): sum cu'i a ru rA//tsha ba gsum yang de bzhin te//de bzhin 'bru mar blug par bya//shing kun yang ni srangad gcig dang //lha ni cig phye ma zhib mor bya//gang tshe thams cad tshogs gyur na//

205a3(rgyud): gdags par bya//de ni bstan pos 'khor du gzhug/bdug pas legs par bdug bya zhing //lan grangs brgyar ni tshang bar bya//de bzhin ko ba chu dron dang //shing kun dang ni

205a6(rgyud): dred spu sen mo dang //de bzhin stag gi sen mo blang //sha l+ya ka yi 'bras bu dang //khyi dang dom gyi rtug pa dang //ba lang byi ba'i lpags pa dang //ba tu na yi rtugo pa dang //rnga mo bong

205b1(rgyud): rtags pa bya//lag na rdo rje phyag byas la//bdun bya 'dini sbyar byas te//yud tsam ngal yang gas bya 'ong //bdug pas yang dang yang du bdug/dug dang 'o mashong kun dang //de bzhin ga sha

205b4(rgyud): bskus nas ni gdon kun sal//snar blugs na yang gdon kun sel//nir gun di dang bye'u rug dang //lung tang yungs kar pi pe lI //de dag mi bzang gdon rnams kyis//zin pa la

206a1(rgyud): /dal bas ba yang byu ba ste//shu dag rnam pa'i lam+b+ha dang //bdag dang ne pu tso shel//ka pata ta yU la ma dang //sgrub sgyu sbrul lpags rngas pas bsro//'dun zhe

206b1(rgyud): zhog lnga'i dang //gas sto dag gi ldan par bya//gtsang nas drang khrud gtsang ma'o dbus//dkyil 'khor yang ni dri ba bya//rdzas bcwo sgrar bu gang yin pa//de yang legs par
206b2(rgyud): /phung d+he dang yid de bzhin du// shA ba dang med lding dede//b.ru da kyi sbyin du//ka ku d+ha pA mdza nA//khyod shing yas sreg shing rnams paste//rmyi gre zlum pa bzhed/

207a1(rgyud): to bya ba yin//'byung po'i bdag dang 'byung po yi//go cha de la bshad par bya//dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang //sa bon thams cad bkod pa yi//dkyil

207a7(rgyud): drag sna chen po mi bzad pa//chos lugs mi bzad gang yin pa//de ngadag nga yi dkyil 'khor gzhug/drag po g.yo dang mi g.yo ba//drag tu 'khrul cing sems can rnam//
207b1(rgyud): da yi dkyil 'khor nang du gzhug/de mthong sems can 'chi bar 'gyur//gdon rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor du//'thab pa drug pa der gzhug cang //shin tu tshad yang bcad par bya//rig
207b2(rgyud): pa'i mchog gam spyan gyis ni//'jig rten dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//gdon gyi dkyil 'khor rdzog so////de nas gdon skrag pa'i mtshan ma rnams dang /med par 'gyur
207b3(rgyud): ba'i ma na ma rnams blta bar bya ste/'di ni btang bar ma gyur cing //skrag pa'i mtshan mar shes par bya//lus kun yang ni 'dar ba dang //mgo bo yAr ni 'drar bar byed//dbugs
207b4(rgyud): kyi shugs kyang 'byin par byed//de ni skrag pa'i mtshan mar shes//shin tu dgod par byed pa dang //yang dang yang du khro bar byed//tshig kyang shin tu 'dzin par byed//de ni skrag pa'i
207b5(rgyud): mtshan mar shes//mthong na yang ni zhi bar 'gyur//zhi ba'i tshul gyis lte ba dang //bdug pa yang ni snom par byed//hUM zhes bya bas sdong par 'gyur//de ni sgeg pa'i mtshan mar
207b6(rgyud): shes//ngal zhing rims nad 'debs gyur pa//de ni med pa'i mtshan mar shes//smras pa rtog pa gang yin dang //tha~Md myur du 'dzin pa dang //yang na shin tu 'dar bar 'gyur//
207b7(rgyud): de ni med pa'i mtshan mar shes//gang zhig mthong na rang dbang dang //slar ni rang dgar 'gyur ba dang //mi yi tshul ni spyod gyur pa//de ni med pa'i mtshan mar shes//'jigs bzhin
208a1(rgyud): badron pa gang yin do//zhi ba'i tshul gyis lta ba dang //mi nang mtshar ldan gyur pa//de ni med pa'i mtshan mar shes//de bzhin mdun gyi mo phyogs la//dris na
208a2(rgyud): yang ni smra mi byed//rims nad byang zhing rmongs med pa//de ni med pa'i mtshan mar shes//khyod kyis dri la gang dris pa//de kun khyod la bshad par bya//bcom ldan ji ltar
208a3(rgyud): bdon 'ibros dang //mi ni 'bros tshul ci 'dra dang //gnas pa'i tshul ni ci 'dra dang //bya ba sgrub par ji ltar 'gyur//ji ltar mi 'joms mnyan por 'tshal//leg na rdo rje
208a4(rgyud): stobs chen gyis//de yi tshig de thos gyur nas//bdud rtsi thab sbyor khyod kyi su//nga la drob pa gang yin pa//gdon rnams nyan par 'gyur ba yi//las de so so ci rigs
208a5(rgyud): nyon//dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhi mdo dang //de bzhin khyim dang ba long lhas//dur khrod dang ni shing gcig drung //de ni mkhas shing 'jigs med pas//gdon dri gtong du gzhug
208a6(rgyud): par bya//thag mar cho gar bya ba ni//zhag gsum yod na zhag lnga 'am//zhage bdun bar du cung zad bsten//yang na zla ba byed kyi bar//de bzhin zhag ni nyi shu gcig/
208a7(rgyud): rig sngags stobs ni che ba dang //bdag nyid rig sngags gsang ba yi//rig sngags de bzhin shes nas ni//ce nas de ni dbang 'gyur zhing //nyan du yang ni gzhug par bya//
208b1(rgyud): phyir rang kyi ni dus mtshamasu//bab na bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis//'byung po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni//khru gsum khyu zhi mdzes pa bri//des ni the tsom med par yang //gsang ba
208b2(rgyud): bdag ni nyan par 'gyur//bdag nyid 'byor par gong 'dod pas//gsang ba yang ni 'dis bya zhing //gsang sngags 'di yis 'byung po rnams//nyan par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba//'di
208b3(rgyud): ni mkhas pas byed du gzhug/lo ni bcu gnyis dag tu yang //ma bsnyen pa la sprin mi bya//stong snyed ma byin sbyin mi bya//sdig po'i tshul can sbyin mi bya//gong gis gdon ni nyan
208b4(rgyud): par 'gyur//gong gis gsang sngags dbang 'gyur pa//phyag rgya'i cho ga nges pa yis//gsang sngags dkyil 'khor 'di yang bshad//phyag rgya tshogs dang bcas btang zhing //
208b5(rgyud): gsung ba'i phyag rgyas btang byas nas//brtags nas rtag tu 'dzin par byed//phyag rgya byas pa'i phyag rgya yi//dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsung ba 'di//gsang ba pa rnams
208b6(rgyud): gzhig pa dang //cho ga sgrub phyir bshad par bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das lag ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ngom po la gnas nas gdon nyan par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'di
208b7(rgyud): bshad de//khru gsum pa tshon sna lnga'i phye mas dbusu bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje bre'o//de nas phyag rgya dgod par bya ste//shar phyogs kyi sgo logasu ni rgyal ba zhes
209a1(rgyud): bya ba'i phyag rgya dang /rnam par rgyal ba dang /rdo rje mtshan ma dang /rdo rje'i rtags rnams dgod do//lho phyogasu ni bkra shis dang //shin tu bkra shis dang /klu lag dang /
209a2(rgyud): pad+ma'i mtshan rnams dgod do//byang phyogasu ni mche ba dang //pad+ma'i phreng ba dang /g.yung drung ris dang /mdung rtse gsum pa dgod do//nub phyogasu ni mdung thung dang /rdo rje dang /zhags
209a3(rgyud): pa dang /ral gri rnams dgod do//gdon gyi dbyug pa yang g.yon logasu bzhagago/'khor lo ni g.yas phyogasasu bzhago/de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lha bshos rnam pa sna

209a5(rgyud): gtong bar 'gyur ba'i rig sngags bklag par bya'o//de nas gdon gyis rig sngags 'chang ji skad zer ba bzhin byed par 'gyur te/song shig ces byas na 'gro ba 'gyur ro//de nas
209a6(rgyud): gdon bkol bar 'dod na gang dang gang du dgos pa de thams cad byed par 'gyuraro//lha rnams gsang ba dang /gsang chen dang /gdon nyan par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis phyag
209a7(rgyud): rgya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad ngas bshad zin to//phyag rgya rnams kyi chung zad dpe tsam du bya de ngas bshad par bya ste/rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas po chen po'i rgyud phyi ma dang

209b2(rgyud): kye rgyal po spya dang bcas pa 'di 'chad pa 'am//phyag 'tshal ba lta ci smos te/de'i mdun du gdon thams cad snying 'dir zheng myur du 'khod par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das rig pa
209b3(rgyud): mchog gi cho gri rgyas pa chen po bcom ldan 'das ma sbyin dang bcas pa gang yin pa ngas bshad zin to//snying po'i rgyal po'i las gang gis cho ga rgyas pa tha~Md 'grub par 'gyur ba 'am
209b4(rgyud): 'joms par byed pa yang ngas bshad par bya ste/snying po bcom ldan 'das ma dang bcas pa rgyud phyi ma dang ldan pa la gnas pa dang /'chang ba gang yin pa de la ni lag na rdo rjes bshad
209b5(rgyud): pa bzhin du ring po mi thogs par dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro//'joms par byed pa yang ngas bshed par bya ste/tshes grangs padam mi dgos//bsnyung ba yang bya mi dgos par///
209b6(rgyud): ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bskyang rdul gyis byugs pa/dang tsan dan dmar po las byas pa'i rdo rje bzhag nas de'i mdun du mi'i gzugs byas ste/snying po 'i rgyal po bzlas brjod

210a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro//zla ba gcig gi bar du slongs mo'i zas sam/'o ma dang phye ma'i 'dag gu za zhing mchod rten drung du snying de'i rgyam bzlas brjod byas na glang sgrub pa de la 'bras bu
210a2(rgyud): yod par 'gyuraro//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mAr gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhog gcig bsrung ba byas te/gros gtsang ma bogs nas mchod rten gyi khang bur song la dri dang /

210a4(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa reg sngags 'chang gi lag pas bzung nas/rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya'o//de nas 'phags pa lag pa sbyar
210a5(rgyud): ba'i nang nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyuraro//'od zer de yang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/rig sngags 'chang la g.yas phyogasu bskor nas mi snang bar gyur pa dang /rig sna gso
210a6(rgyud): 'chang gi mgo bo la gtsug gi nor bur 'gyur te/de mgo la 'dug pas rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar gyur te/rAg sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sid la/

210b1(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur zhing dpag tshad nyis stong du rgyun du 'phags par 'gyur ro//zla ba byed kyi bar du zasu 'om dung phyo ba'i 'dag gu la rig sngags bzlas brjod byas la de nas mar gyi zhag
210b2(rgyud): bcu bzhi la lha chen po'i gnas su spyod te//rig sngags lan brgyad stong bzlos brjod bya'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang zla ba nya le n+ya gro di'i shing gi cig 'greng gre drung du song la da'i/

212a5(rgyud): bar gsungaso//bdag gis kyang rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi don gyi phyir bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags ni ji ltar sgrub par bgyi//ji ltar ni 'jug
212a6(rgyud): par bgyi/nor sgrub pa'i las kyi dus ni glang //drag shul bya ba 'am/zhi ba 'am/rgyas pa'i las kyi dus ni grang //rig sngags ni dus gdo du sgrub par bgyi//de nas bcom

212b1(rgyud): rnams kyi don gyi phyir lha mo khyod la bshad par bya ste/rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pa zla ba byed dam/zhag nyi shu'i bar du rlig sngags bsten par bya ste/de yang dor bar bya'o//

213a6(rgyud): la/can ngan dmar po las lag na rdo rje'i gzugs byas te/dkyil 'khor bskyed nul gyis byugs nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bzhug la/dbus dar
213a7(rgyud): sa'i lha mo yang bzhag ste/lag na rdo rje dang sa'i lha mo la mchod pa byas la lha bshos rgyas par phul nas lag na rdo rje'i drung du na ba dan dmar po bzhag/sa'i lha mo'i drung du ni
213b1(rgyud): dan dkar po bzlog go/phyogs bzhir yang gos dmar mo gyon pa'i mi rnams gzhago/rig sngags 'chung gis kyang gos dmar po bgos la nges par gnas par bya ste/reg sngags bsgrub

213b3(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sa'i lha mo de lago na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi drung du bzhag//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag na rdo rje lo tsan dan dmar po'i mchod yon phul
213b4(rgyud): ba la rtsi ra kan dga'i phye ma yungs mar dang sbyar bas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o//de nas na mkha' las sa'i lha mo 'grub po zhes sgra 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de nas rika sngags 'chad//
213b5(rgyud): gis sa'i lha mo de blangs la/blangs nas phye ma zhib mor btags no phye mas gang la reg pa de las grub nas sa la gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chad thaMd la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur
213b6(rgyud): zhing rtarta rin po che thams cad dang sman thams cad mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro//sa yang de las gnas sbyin par 'gyur zhing //'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can du 'gyur te/tshe lo

214a1(rgyud): g+ho sum mdo 'am/bzhi mdo 'am/dur khrod kyi thal bas sa'i lha mo'i gzugs byas la ngo'i steng du tsAn dan dmar pos gtor bar bya ste/thal bar blangs la
214a2(rgyud): dur khrod kyi shing gis me sbar la lan brgyang stong sbyin sreg byas na zhag gsum gyi 'bros par 'gyur ro//gzer thabs kyi gdab par 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhig brgyad la rdza mkhan gyi
214a3(rgyud): 'dzem pa la gzugs byas te/mdung rtse gsum pa 'am/mau da na'i tsher ma dbul nas blangs pa'i ma da na'i tshe rare ma la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas pas btsugs na gang du
214a4(rgyud): btsugs pa der gzer bar 'gyur te/phyung na gtor bar 'gyuraro//thig le sgrub par 'dod nin/zhag gsum bsnyung bar byas pas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam zhag bcu bzhi la lame gye
214a5(rgyud): pani mdo 'am/du khrod du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs te/lha bshos rnam pa sna tshogs phul nas can dan dmar po'i chus dkyil 'khor bsang gtor
214a6(rgyud): byas la/dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu dur khrod kyi thal ba bzhag ste/rig sngags 'chang ku sha'i stan la 'dug pas thal ba lag pas mnan nas lha mo'i'o gzugs snang bar 'gyur gyi bar
214a7(rgyud): du rig sngags bzlas brjod bya'o//de nas 'grub par 'gyur te//lha thams cad la phyag byas nas/sa'i lha mo spyan drangs na der 'dug par 'gyur te/de 'dug pas bgegs rnams

221a4(rgyud): 'gyur//sgrub d+ha'i tshe yang mdun du gu gul gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byos ni/ mo yongasu gzir cing tshig bzhin du myur du'ong bar 'gyur te/sdig pa'o la sa byud

228a5(rgyud): long bu dang //chen mo steng dang zangs rnams dang /lan tshwa chu yi bcu cha rnams//til gyi thal ba'i chu dang btag/ag+ni til mor dag dang sbyar//mi thod nang du btso bar bya/
228a6(rgyud): gser mchog dag tu 'gyur pa ste//yid gnyisu ni bya ba med/sbyor ba gcig ni ngas bshad zin/sbyor ba gnyis pa de las nyon/mtshal dang dug bcas bab la dang ni mu
228a7(rgyud): bir ldan//shing thog khu bas btags te zangs ma glegs la bsku/dud pa bkag ste bsregs nas btags na gser dang 'dra//gser kha skya bo'i che brgyad cha yis sbyar ba
228b1(rgyud): nusu rnam rgyal dang drug pacas zlu ma bal li bab ltar bcas//tsan tshwa'i shing brnyan tshwa dang nA chur+ya wAn byAstsa la//mthod gsang na an+ta'i til mar+ya ldan byas na/wA yI rgyun du

228b4(rgyud): gsar pa dag ni nang du btso byas na//'dzum bu chu bo'i gser dag dang ni 'dra bar 'gyur//'tshal phye zhib mor kha lung khu bas lan bdun bsgo//shing kun sho yi khu bas kyang ni

229a3(rgyud): na byi ru bzang por 'gyuraro//cho ga da ltar byas te thang shing blugs nA ni in+d+ra nI lar 'gyuraro//nya phyis kyi phye ma blugs na ni mu tig du 'gyuraro//gzhan dag kyang kha dog ci 'dre ba'i

229b7(rgyud): khu ba'i nang du lan bdun bdun bcug na des dul bar 'gyu ro//mtshal yang mu zi'i tshe gar bstan pa bzhin du byas na dul bar 'gyuraro//ba blo ni ris kyis dkris la shing sku nya'i

230b1(rgyud): 'khong brgyad khro bzhi sbyong gi bskor ba rnams lag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du song ste phyin nas/byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras//byang chub sems dpa'

231b1(rgyud): na rdo rje 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas langs s+ho/s+t+ya phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas drus po g.yas pa'o lhungs la gtsun to/bcom ldan 'das ga napa de logasu thanan

231b3(rgyud): pa rig sngags thams cad sgrub pa dang /phur brus 'debs pa dang /gcod par bgyid pa lags te/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can thams cad la sman pa dang /sems

231b6(rgyud): so/'di ni yang dag pa'i lag so//bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi rlabs chen po lags te/thabs 'di 'ba' shig gis rig sngags thams cad sgrub par 'tsha lo//thabs

232a1(rgyud): rgyul ba byung chub sems dpa' tshun po gang gis snyoms can rnams 'grub pa'i nyo bar sgrub pa ra la sa nas shang cag gad cig/de nas rig sngags kyi rgyul

234b6(rgyud): chen po bzhi dpung dang bcas par bzhago/lha thams cad kyang ji lta ba bzhin du mtshon tsho thogs par bya'o//nang du yang klung chen po bzhi 'dab chagasu bzhag/gang ga'i bum pa ni

235a2(rgyud): par bzhag/sgo bzhir yang bum pa mgrin tshangs dang bcos pa bzhi bzhago/sgro re rer yang sgo'i skud pa mtshon cha dang bcas par bzhag/dbu su yang tshogs rnams kyi ta
235a3(rgyud): la'i tho ba gcig dang /skra'i skud pa bzhag/thog mar thig gdab pa ni rig pa mchog gis bya'o//lha thams cad bri ba ni snying pos bya'o//lha thams cad spyan drang ba ni bcom ldan 'das//
235a4(rgyud): mas bya'o//dri dang me tog dang /bdug pa dbul ba yang des bya'o//dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs byed pa gang yin pa de dag kyang snying pos sbyin bsreg bya ste/yungs kar dang zho dang
235a5(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang /mar dang ldan pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags 'chang zhag gcig bsnyung du btsug la byang chub kyi sems
235a6(rgyud): sbyin par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i stong pa mgo bir bsngags la nye ba'i snying po rnam par bzhag ste/nag mo'i sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du gzhug cing shar
235a7(rgyud): phyogs kyi sgo'i byang stod du bab pa'i lha rnams la phyag 'tshal du bcug la me tog gam/'gron bu'i phur ma 'dor du bcug na gang la bab pa de dag gi rigs yin te/
235b1(rgyud): de dag na srung ba'i rigs zhes bshad do//gsang ba dang lha thams cad kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya yang dang bstan par bya'o//gdon nyan du gzhug pa'i sbyangs nus dus bshud pa'i phyag rgya dang
235b2(rgyud): lha gang yin pa de dag kyang rig sngags 'chang rnams la bstan par bya'o//lha thams cad kyi phyag rgyu ni mdung rtsi bradum pa yi ni//lig na rdo rje'i ni rdo rje yin te rdo rje gang yin pa
235b3(rgyud): ni mdung rtse gsum pa yin la/mdung rtse gsum pa gang yin pa de yong rdo rje yin par blta bar bya'o//gsang ba 'di dag rtogs nas gsang ba pa rnams la yang mchod par bya'o//
235b4(rgyud): gsang ba'i phyag rgya lha thams cad kyi gsang chen 'di gang gis mthong ba de la ni lha thaMd yid dga' nas dngos grub sbyin par byed de/de'i las rnams la rig sngags bde blag tu
235b5(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyuraro//de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar bla ma la phyag rgyas nas/bcom ldan 'das la yon dbu'o//de'i 'og tu byang phyogasu song la de nas
235b6(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang rnams la phyag 'tshal du gzhugo/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'di sus mthong ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi bsam
235b7(rgyud): dang 'brel ba mi 'gyur te bde ba can du yang skye bar 'gyur ro//cho ga rgyas pa 'di su 'chang ba de ni lag ni rdo rje dang 'dra'o//dkyil 'khor 'di mthong na cho ga rgyas pa chen po brgyad
236a1(rgyud): bde blag tu 'grub par 'gyur ro//reg sngags kyi lha thams cad kyang rtag tu srung bar byed//rig pa mchog go cho ga rgyas pa rgyud phyi ma dang bcas pa/pha
236a2(rgyud): nyama'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa/phyag rgya'i rgyan dang bcas pa/bsang chen dang bcas pa/gang ba dang bcas pa/lag na rdo rjes bshad pa/sangs rgyas thams cad
236a3(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs la/'di thams cad mo lus par su 'chang ba de'i lus kyi spyi bor ni dpal dang ldan pa rdo rje 'dzin rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/
236a4(rgyud): so////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag ni rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyod leg so legs//
236a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang /sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa yin te/cho ga rgyas pa chen//
236a6(rgyud): blo bshad pa gang yin pa de ni log so//rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
236a7(rgyud): kyis kyang rje su gnang te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod cing bsngags pa yin no//
236b1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gang spyan gyi snying po dang bcas pa/rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po dang bcas par dran par byed dam/dus gsum du phyag 'tshal ba de dag la ni ngan 'gro lob par ltung
236b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba de dag med do//'chi ba'i tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du phyogs por 'gyur te/des na de dag lnga ngan 'go log par ltung bar 'gyur ba med do//
236b3(rgyud): sems can mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa dag kyang man re med par skye bar mi 'gyur ro//'odi ni rog sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i mthu yino//dper na nar bu rin po che gtsug phud can
236b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba mthong ma thug tu nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing gdon thams cad kyang 'byer bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di spyan dang /snying po dang bcas par dran pa
236b5(rgyud): tsam gyis las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar byed do//'di ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i rgyu dang 'thun pa yin te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzhan du gsung ba ma
236b6(rgyud): yin no//rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa 'am/'jig rten gyi sna tshogs byed par 'dod na des rig sngags kyi rgyal po btsal bar
236b7(rgyud): bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o//sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag gi lag tu ni thang ma lus par 'ong bar 'gyur ro//sems can bsod nams mo byas pa de dag gis
237a1(rgyud): lag tu ni 'ong bar mi 'gyur//rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po gang gi lag tu 'ongs par gyur pa de dag la ni lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi phyag bya ba
237a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro//de nas lha de dag snying 'dar zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag ni rdo rje la 'di
237a3(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to//lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di ni thogs pa med pa'i las yin te/las thams cad la don yod pa yin na//sems can ma rungs
237a4(rgyud): pa'i las byed pa gang yin pa de dag gis kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las sna tshogs byed nus shing lha rnams la yang 'tshe bar nus te dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing dge ba bcu'i
237a5(rgyud): las kyi lam dang ldan pa'i lha de dag la yang gnod pa byed nuso//brtul phod pa'i mi de dag la rig sngags thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba bstan par bya ste/sems can de
237a6(rgyud): dag gis de mthong na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed par 'gyur//sems can nga'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs mthong ba gang yin pa de dag gis ni don yod pa'i las kyi mcho
237a7(rgyud): gis lha thams cad dang nga la gtse bar nus//de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'od skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das lha rnams la sman pa'i slad du de bzhin
237b1(rgyud): shogs pa rnams kyi bka' rig sngags kyi rgyal po rkun po'i gas ba rig sngags thams cad kyi snying po mA ma kI'i phyag rgyas btab pa bdagu gris bshud par 'chalo//de nas reg sngags
237b2(rgyud): kye rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btegus nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i rig pa mchog gi rig saTacho ga rgyas pa chen po don yod par

237b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rig sngags thams cad kyi snying po 'di ni bdag gi rig pa mchog lags te/mnyam pa ma mchis la stobs che zhing rmed du byung ba lag so//'di ni bdag gi gang
238a1(rgyud): ba lags te/su 'di cho ga dang ldan par 'dod pa des ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar dri dang /me tog dang /bdug pa phul la/lag na rdo rje la yang me teg
238a2(rgyud): dmar po phul te/zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te byang chub kyi sems yong su bzung la bla ma la yod me chod cing yon phul nas rig sngags thams cad dang snying po dang /rig pa

238b1(rgyud): snyi po 'di ni sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la dad pa dang /'phags pa la ga na rdo rje'i rig sA lu dang par bgyid pa dang /bla ma la phan 'dags par dpyod pa de la stsal byar/

239a2(rgyud): kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' sprul to//gsang ba pa'i bdag po lha rnams la gnod kyis thong shig thong shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das rig
