262a2(rgyud): zas dran pa dag par 'gyur la/sbyar ba'i dug gis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyuraro//de ltar ma byas na sha bstan pas log 'drin rnams dang /gdon rnams ni mi bzad pa ste/tshugs
262a3(rgyud): par mi 'gyuraro//las rnams la rig pa mchog gis byas na thams cad byed par 'gyuraro//de nas gzhonu rdo rje sdes byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis la
262a4(rgyud): btugs nas 'di skad ces smra so//bcom ldan 'das ba gegs rnams dang /gdon rnams ni mi bzad pa ste/sgrib pa po rnams la rtag tu glags tsho lo//sems can sna tshogs
262a5(rgyud): dang /sgrub pa po rag sngags dang /gsang sngags brtson pa gang yin pa de dag gi cho ga nyams pa la yang gdon rnams dang rims la sogs pa'i gnod pas 'tshe bar bgyid de//
262a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de dge la phan pa'i phyir/bde blag tu 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs gang gis log 'dren rnams bsal nas bde blag tu gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /
262a7(rgyud): ji ltar da pa bzhin bde bar gnas por 'gyur ba'i gsang chen bsdus pa'i cho ga 'ba' zhig bshad par gsol/de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag ni rdo rjes gno nu rdo rje sde la
262b1(rgyud): san/kun byung nas sgyu na na /rgyung dadu slo rlung ba la na nas mdas// 'gas kun da sa nga thug
262b2(rgyud): / sgyu kyi gas da/ pa dri m+bu'i na sa da smra la dang /
262b3(rgyud): /di sa mas 'di sa hU~M / sa byung hrIng+ge byug/ rnam mye na 'i byed ba//'byung ba rnaMms kyang rlu ba byed pa /mi
262b4(rgyud): che btsun rnams 'byur bar byed pa //da yo migs pa'i las rnaMng sa byung po yong de/ bu na gyi meng du sa dang //ma dadu ni kyings rnams dang//seMm yin
262b5(rgyud): lam rnams kyang //mngon rab tu 'a shud par bya//dgegs rnams dang ni gsang du dang //'a khrel 'kho nga gzhos pA bstan pa la//sngags rnams phyog rgyur spyar na ni//myur du las
262b6(rgyud): nam sangs par byed//rgya la sogs pa pa chen rnams//snron gyi rtsal lakho nadus pa yi//sbyin mam kun la byudag gis ni//byAg rgyu dam tshig bcas pas no//phyag rkyo ga gi sa rnams pa
262b7(rgyud): byams pa y-i ni sems 'gyur//gal ba byed pa ge dod//rdo rje 'dzin ngas pad par 'gyu //stongs chen pa rol gnon pa dang //rdzu 'phru che ba'i lha //rig michog /
263a1(rgyud): //gyi g.yog 'khor du//bya ba'i phyir na bshad pa yin//rig sngags khra na po nya ma/rigs dang nye ba'i rigs kyu lha//rnal 'byor ma ni gang bstan pa//de dag phyag rgya bshad
263a2(rgyud): pa yin//rig mchog rtsa ba'i phyag rgya rnams//thog mar rab tu bstan pa yin//de ni snying po'i phyag rgya dang //nye ba'i snying po rab tu bshad//rig sngags rgyal po gnod mdzes kyi/
263a3(rgyud): phyag rgya las kun byed pa dang //rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni//bkug pa'i las la sbyor bar bya//de bzhi ni phyag rgya chen po brgyad//brtson 'grus tshe zhing gzi brjid che//rab tu gtum
263a4(rgyud): zhing las kun la//lag na rdo rje gzi mthu ldan//rgyal ba dang ni rnam par rgyal//mA mo kI dang gdong dmar dang /phreng ba 'dzin dang klu mgo can+da//rna cha gdong dang 'od zer phreng /phyag rgya chen po
263a5(rgyud): brkyad bshad pa//lag na rdo rje gzi chen gyi//yan lag kun la 'byung ba yin//bdag gis bshad pa gang yin pa'i//gdon gyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa//bco brgyad po ni brtsom
263a6(rgyud): 'brus che//me lce 'bur ba'i de dag dang //phyag rgya drug cu rtsa bzhi gang //lus kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad dang //rdo rje 'phags byed dkyil 'khor las//phyag rgya bstan pa gang yin
263a7(rgyud): dang //de dag gi ni gtso bo yi//phyag rgya mdor bshang bang yin pa//de dag gi ni tshul dang rtags//las rnams kyang ni bsten par bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das rig sngags thaMd kyi bdag
263b1(rgyud): po rig pa mchog stos dang //pha rol gnan pA gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'byung ste/mdun du lag dar lhan cig tu sbyar la sor mo phan tshun bsnol te//khu chung bcangs
263b2(rgyud): te gung mo sgreng la gzhibs la/de'i phyi rol gyis glo gnyis nas mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i dbyibasu byas na/mthe bong gnyis rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar rab tu bzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das rig
263b3(rgyud): pa mchog gi rtsal ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mthe bong gnyis spyad de bzhag pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i phyag rgya'o//spyan drang ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis
263b4(rgyud): kyi dbus bkug la gung mo gro zhabs pa'i phyi rol gyi tshigs drang por bstan par bya ste/rgyal ba'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya yin no//slar btang ba ni de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis cung zad bskyud
263b5(rgyud): bar bya ste/thugs ldan gyi yin no//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo gshebs pa'i phyi rol gyi tshigs drang por mdzub mo gdu bu ltar bkug ste bzhag pa ni snying po'i phyag rgya'o//tshigs/
263b6(rgyud): dbu mar gzhar ba ni nye ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo'i thor to mnyam du gzhobs pa ni blo gros rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las rgyab tu bsnyams te gzhar ba ni dga' byed gdong bye
263b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo phan tshun sprid de bzhag pas mthe bong gnyis mnan pa ni ral gri'i phyag rgya'o//ral gri'i phyag rgya las mdzub ma
264a1(rgyud): gnyis tshigs re re bkug ste/mthe bong gnyis kyi phyi rol du bzhag pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po rab tu grub par byed pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o//de las mdzub mo gnyis
264a2(rgyud): brkyang ba ni dbang phyug chen po'i'o//de nyid las mthe bong cung zad bkug pa ni/lha mo rtse gsum ka gdeng gri phyag rgya'o//snying po'i phyag rgya las gong mo gshibs pa'i tshigs dang po
264a3(rgyud): bkug pa ni srangs rgyus bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis btang ste tshigs re re bkug la/'og tu phan tshun sprad pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o//
264a4(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis phyi rol tu ma phrad par zung ba ni pad+ma 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o//gtum sel gyi phyag rgya yang de nyid yi no//cung zad brkyang ba na dpal chen mo'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las
264a5(rgyud): tshigs dang po'i stong du bzhag pa ni rdo rje mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya'o//tshigs re re bkug ste/mthe bong gnyis kyi phyi rol du gzhar ba ni rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya'o//sen mo gnyis la gzhang
264a6(rgyud): ba ni rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du ral gri'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs re re bkug pa ni rdzong gi 'phags ma'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mthe bong gnyis so/
264a7(rgyud): sor sbas pa ni ral pa gcig pa'i phyag rgya'o//ral pa gcig pa'i phyag rgya nyid las tshigs gcig bkug pa las gshibs pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//rdzong gi
264b1(rgyud): 'phags ma'i phyag rgya las bkug pa ni gnod sbyin thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//rtswa ba'i phyag rgya las gung gshibs yid tsam gyis bkug pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyug rgya'o//rlig su
264b2(rgyud): kyi rgyal po'i phyog rgya las mthe bong gnyis yod tsam phyir bkye ba ni 'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya'o//rgyal ba'i blo blos kyi phyag rgya lasra phye ste mthe bong sgreng ba ni rdo rje ser sgyu'i phyo/
264b3(rgyud): rgyu'o//de bzhin du rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya ni shugs ldan ma yang yin no//snying po'i phyag rgya la su mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lag ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//me tog go phyog
264b4(rgyud): rgyu yang de nyid yin no//nye ba'i snying po'i phyog rgyu las de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo de la reg po byas pa ni rdo rje khro bo mdzes pa'i phyag rgya'o//'dod pa'i rdo rngo ma'i phyag rgyu yang
264b5(rgyud): nyid yin no//mdzub mo gnyis cung zad phyo ba ni tshangs pa'i migri gi phyag rgya'o//blo gros rdo rje phyag rgya las mthe bo gnyis spras pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po yaM ge 'bru bzhi pa'i phyag
264b6(rgyud): rgya'o//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbu bzhi pa'i phyag rgya yod de nyid yino//mdzub mo cung zad phye ba ni brgyu byin+da gyi phyag rgya'i//dga' byed gdong gi yang de nyid yin no//
264b7(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis spras pa ni gtsug tor thub med kyi phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo gnyis bkug la gung mo gshibs pa'i phyi rol tshigs drang por bstan pa ni 'od zer phreng gi phyag rgya'o//
265a1(rgyud): tshigs dbu mar bstan pa ni 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis phyag rgya'o//thur du bstan pa ni phur bu gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o//ral pri'i phyag rgya lnga gshibasla ba'i rtse mo
265a2(rgyud): bkug pa ni dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mdzub mo dang sbyar ba ni nyi ma'i nam mkha'i phyag rgya'o//rab tu 'grub par byed pa'i mdzub mo'i tshigs gnyis bkugs
265a3(rgyud): pa ni rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'grub po'i phyag rgya'o//rgyal ba'i rgyud las dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya yod de nyid yin no//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni srin po'i
265a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//rtse gsum kha gdeng gi phyag rgya las mthe bos sbyar ba ni me mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gzhibs pa'i phyi rol nas gdu bu ltar dkris
265a5(rgyud): pa ni rdo rje sgrogs kyi phyag rgya'o//de ltar 'dug bzhin du bkug pa ni rdo rje gdu bu'i phyag rgya'o//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya las mdzub mo phye ste/gdu bu ltar byas la gung
265a6(rgyud): mo gshibs pa'i phyi rol gyi tshigs dang por bstan pa ni klu chen po'i phyag rgya'o//de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis mdor bsdus te rig pa mchog gi phyag rgya'i khyad par phyag rgya grangs
265a7(rgyud): med par 'byung //phyog 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar la srin lag bsnol te/nang du btsug nas mthe bong gnyis kyi drung du bzhag la de gnyis kyi bar du mthe bong gnyis ngom du gshibs te bzhag/
265b1(rgyud): dudu gau shrIbis pa'i b+h+yo ga nyi sA nus mdzub mo gnyisu rdo rje'i tshul du byas/mthe'u chung gnyis kyang gshibs te/bzhug pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o//de las mtho bong
265b2(rgyud): gnyis gshibs te bstod pa ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i yin//de nyid la sngo bud mo gshibasaM pa nas gang tsam gyis phye ba ni rdo rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgyu'o//mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs
265b3(rgyud): la gung mo gshibs pa dang lhan cig tu sbyar ba ni lag na rdo rje'i snying po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//de las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni rdo rje 'bor ba'i phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo tshogs dbu ma bkug
265b4(rgyud): la gung mo gshibs pa'i tshigs dang por bzhug pa ni blon mo bdun gyi spyi'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mthe bong gnyis gshebs la mthe'u chung ginyis gshibs pa las bsnol ba ni pho nya ma
265b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya'o//rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis ral gri phyag rgya ltar byas la srin lag gnyis kyang mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo'i glo phyogasu bstod de
265b6(rgyud): gzhar ba ni rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya'o//rtse lo srin lag gnyis snga ma kho na bzhin bzhog pa ni rdo rje khro bo chen po su ru su ru'i phyag rgya'o//de la mdzub mo'i tshigs cig bkug
265b7(rgyud): pa ni khro bo me'i phyag rgya'o//de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis mdor bsdus te rig sngags kyi rgyal po gnod mdzes kyi phyag rgya las phyag rgya grangs med par 'byung ngo //phyag 'tshal ba'i thal
266a1(rgyud): mo sbyar te srin lag dang mdzub mo gshibs pa nang du sbas la/sor mo rnams kyi bar phye dwa ni nA mkha'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las sor mo rnams gzhum pa ni 'phags
266a2(rgyud): pa de na yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba ni nA mogrin gyi phyag rgya'o//g.yas pa brkyang pa ni rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya'o//
266a3(rgyud): mA ma ki'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs gcig bkug pa ni mA ma ki spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o//brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o//khro bo rnam par mi bzang
266a4(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya yang de nyid yin no//gung mo gshibs pa las rdo rje'i tshul du bya ba ni khro ba rtse gcig ldan gyi phyag rgya'o//g.yas pa'i mdzub mo bkug pa ni rdo rje dgra sta'i phyag rgya'o//
266a5(rgyud): de nyid las mthe bong gnyis rab tu bzhag ste tshags gcig bkug la mdzub mo'i ngos la gzhar ba ni rdo rje mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mdzub mo'i thor to spong pa ni
266a6(rgyud): rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o//tshigs gnyis bkug pa ni log 'dren gyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje'i tshul du byas pa ni gtsug nas byung ba'i phyag rgya'o//mA ma kI'i phyag rgya'i mdzub mo
266a7(rgyud): gnyis phye ste/gung mo gshibs pa'i tshigs dang por bzhag la mthe bong gnyis kyang bcum pa ni rdo rje sde'i phyag rgya'o//tshigs dbu mor bzhag pa ni lag bzangs kyi phyag
266b1(rgyud): rgya'o//drung du bzhag pa ni gtsug nas 'byung gi phyag rgya'o//de gnyis gung mo gshibs pa'i rgyab tu gdu bu ltar sbyar ba ni log 'dren thams cad bcing ba'i phyag rgya'o//mA ma ki'i phyag rgya dra
266b2(rgyud): nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phye ste gung mo gshi bas pa'i bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje phyag rgya'i lho dang phyi rol nas rdo rje'i tshul du bzung /mthe bong gnyis gshibs te bstod po ni
266b3(rgyud): rdo rje lnga pa ste/bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje yi no//de bzhin du mdzub mo'i dbus bkug ste tshigs dang por bzhag pa ni chu srin ma ka ra'i phyag rgya yin no//mA ma ki'i phyag rgya nyid las
266b4(rgyud): mthe'u chung gshibs pa mthe bong gshibs bA dang /gung mo gshibs pa rnams bcum pa ni rdo rje nag mo'i phyag rgya'o//mthe'u chung dang mthe bong gshibs pa phan tshun bsnol ba
266b5(rgyud): gyen du rdo rje rtse gsum par bya ba ni mA ma ki'i snying po'i phyag rgya ste/las thams cad byed pa dang /shin tu drag po yin no//de nyid las sor mo rnams bcum pa na rdo rje 'byin ma'i phyag
266b6(rgyud): rgya'o//mthe bong gshibs po bcu ma ste bzhag pa ni rdo rje lte ba'i phyag rgya'o//mthe bong nang du sbas la mthe'u chung gshibs pa phye ba ni gdod dkar ma'i phyag rgya'o//de nas 'phags ma
266b7(rgyud): mA ma ki'i phyag rgya tha dad pa gdon thams cad 'jigs par byed po 'byung ste/g.yas rgyang tshul gyis gnas par byas la lag po g.yon pa ni rdo rje mtshan ma blta ba'i dmigs su
267a1(rgyud): gdad par bye g.yas pa sta zur phyogasu bzhags/bcom ldan 'das mA makI'i lus kun spyod pa'i phyag rgyu gzhan 'di ni gdon rnams la sogs pa dang /sna tshogs/
267a2(rgyud): pa'i bgegs la sbyar bar bya'o//de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis phyag rgya grangs med par 'byung //leg pa g.yas pa'i sor mo rnams bcangs te khu tshur tha mal par byas nas
267a3(rgyud): mdzub mo brkyang ba'i glor mthe bong gzhar ba ni rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las gung mo dang bcas par brkyang pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mthe bong
267a4(rgyud): ril nang du bcus ste/sdor mo thams cad kyis bsnun pa ni lag na rdo rje'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o//sor mo phan tshun yid tsam lhag par byas pa ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya'o//
267a5(rgyud): gung mo dang smon lag gnyis kyi bar du mthe bo'i thor te tshigs gcig tsam gyi phyi rol du byung bar byas pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o//lag pa na rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag
267a6(rgyud): rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya la/de ltar de lta bu'i tshul du phyag rgya grangs med par 'byung //snyim po bkon te gung mo gnyis lu gu rgyud kyi tshul
267a7(rgyud): du 'khyud nas sor mo lhag ma rnams bkug pa la mthe bos mnan pa ni gdang dmar gyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las snyam pa phye ste/srin lag gnyis 'khyud la mdzub mo bku
267b1(rgyud): 'i rtse mar gzhar ba ni 'od zur drong gi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mthe'u chung dang srin lag 'khyud de lag pa'i nang du bcug la phyi rol nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi thor te'i steng nas gung mo bkug
267b2(rgyud): pa'i rtse mo mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo dang sprad pa ni rna cha gdong gi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las gung mo mthe bo'i thor to la gzhar ba ni dga' byed gdong gi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las lag pa g.yon
267b3(rgyud): pa'i srin lag brkyang ba ni rdo rje sde'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las g.yas pa'i srin lag phyir bye rkyang ba ni lag bzangs kyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las snyim pa phye ste gnyis ka phan tshun 'khyud nas
267b4(rgyud): mthe'u chung gnyis srin lag dang gung mi mnan la mdzub mo gnyis kyi thor te sprad de mthe bong gnyis kyis srin lag dang gung mo mnan pa ni khro bo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las
267b5(rgyud): g.yas pa brkyang ba ni khro bo rdo rje rtse gcig ldan gyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las bzlog pa ni snying po'i phyag rgya'o//de las snyam pa phye la mthe'u chung dang srin lag dang gung mo rnams 'khyud
267b6(rgyud): nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste sprad la srin leg gnyis kyi drung du mthe bong bzhag pa ni lus dmar gyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las srin lag bsnol ba'i rtse mor mthe bong gnyis bzhag la/
267b7(rgyud): mthe'u chung dang gung mo tha mal par bkug pa ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las snyems pa phye ste sor mo thams cad kyi thor to bsnol mar phan tshun 'khyud de mthe bong dang /
268a1(rgyud): mdzub ma 'tho to s+yAd la mtho'i'u chung rang rang man+dAT+TaSh+Ta ng+gang du gzhar nga ni rdo rdo lu gur+b+ha dAkyi/phyug rgya'o//de nyid las bzlog ste bkrug pa ni rdo rje 'og phyag can gyi phyung/
268a2(rgyud): rgya'o//de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis phyag rgya grangs med pa 'byung //snyim pa bkan la mthe'u chung gi shibasr-i nas de'i rgyab nas srin lag gi shibs par bye/de gnyis kyi glu'i tsheH/
268a3(rgyud): dang por gung mo gnyis bzhag la mdzub mo gnyis so so nas bkug ste/mthe bong gnyis blo la gzhar ba ni klu mgo can gyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las gung mo dang mdzub mo
268a4(rgyud): dang /mthe bo klu mgo gdengs kA ltar dgug pa ni klu thams cad kyi snying po'i phyag rgya'o//mthe bong gnyis gi TIg tu sbyar te klu mgo'i gdengs ka ltar byas pa ni na mkha' lding gi
268a5(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//bud mo dang mdzub mo sngon du sbyar ba ni lha ma yin thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//rtsu ba'i phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug de de'i dngos gung mo gnyis
268a6(rgyud): kyi tshogs gi cig bkug ste bzhig nas mdzub mo gnyis phyi rol du rdo rje lhur brdung ba ni rdo rje yongs po chen po'i phyag rgya'o//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo dang gud mo bkug
268a7(rgyud): la de'i nang du mthe bong gzhug pa ni de nyid kyi spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o//ma jug mo brkyang pa ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya lob gung mo cung zad tsam phyed le mardzu
268b1(rgyud): mo'i tshigs dang po'i ngos la bzhag pa yang klu man can gyi phyag rgya yin no//rtsa ba'i phyag rgyu las mdzub mo'i dbus bkug la gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang po'i ngosu bzung ba 'di ni k+Sha mgo can
268b2(rgyud): phyuphyag rgya tha dad pa yin no//de nyid las mthe bi'i bar du gdu bu lhur bkug pa ni klu chen po'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du gcig tu sprad de/rtse gcig pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni 'bri ma'i phyag
268b3(rgyud): rgya'o//dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i phyag rgya yang de nyid yini//tshogs dang po gnyis bkug pa ni kha 'bar ma'i phyag rgya'o//tshigs gnyis bkug pa ni khro bo thub dka'i phyag rgya'o//rtsa ba'i
268b4(rgyud): phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang po'i phyi rol du sbyar te bzhag pa 'di ni klu mgo can gyi phyag rgya tha dad pa yino//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi khrus kyi
268b5(rgyud): cho ga yang de nyid yino//de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis phyag rgya grangs med par 'gyung//lag pa gnyis kyis srong mo phan tshun bsnol te mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis
268b6(rgyud): gzhibs pa'i thor te bkug pa ni phreng ba 'dzin gyi rtswa ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mdzub mo'i dbus bkug ste phan tshun thar te spyad pa ni rdo rje khang pa'i phyag rgyu'o//rtse ba'i phyag rgya las
268b7(rgyud): mdzub mo bkug pa ni 'di rjer gyi phreng gi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi dbus bkug la gung mo gnyis bal la bzhig/mthe bang gnyis ji stod de/rtse gcig pa'i tshul du/
269a1(rgyud): mabyas pa ni gdon thams cad skrag par bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mthe bong gnyis kyi thor to gzhibs te nang du bcug pa ni gdon thams cad bcing ba yin no//
269a2(rgyud): de gdon thams cad skrag par bya ba de nyid ni leg na rdo rje dang dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya'o//gdon bcing ba ni khro bo 'gro ba'i phyag rgya'o//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo mthe bo'i
269a3(rgyud): ther to la gzhar ba ni gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi snying po'i phyag rgya'o//de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis phyag rgya grangs med par 'byung ngo //phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo las sprin lag
269a4(rgyud): gnyis bsnol mthe bong drung du bzhag la bar du mthe bo gnyis bzhag ste/mdzub mo gnyis kyi dbus bkug nas gung mo gshibs pa'i stong du bzhag la/mthe'u chung gnyis
269a5(rgyud): gshibs pa'i 'od zer phreng ba'i phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs dbus ma bkug pa ni spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya'o//brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya
269a6(rgyud): las mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshig cig bkug la mthe bo'i ngos la gzhar ba ni rig pa mchog gi phyeg rgya tha dad pa yin no//mthe bong gnyis bkug pA ni gnod mdzes kyi phyag rgya'o//
269a7(rgyud): steng nas gdu bu ltar byas pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i phyag rgya'o//phyi rol nas dkri ba ni gdon bcing ba yin no//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo rdo rje'i tshul du gzung ba 'od zer phreng
269b1(rgyud): byag rgya gnyis pa yin no//de nyid lus mdzub mo gnyis drung nas bkrug ste/gdu bu ltar bsnol po 'di ni 'od zer phreng gi phyag rgya tha dad pa yin no//de nyid las mtho bong gnyis bkug pa
269b2(rgyud): ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mthe bong rtsi gu cig pa'i tshul du bzhig pa ni gdon bskrad par bya ba yin//de nyid logs par bsta basmai pA ni dpal ma blo gros ma'i phyag
269b3(rgyud): rtse ba'i phyag rgyu las mdzub mo gnyis dbus bkug ste mthe bong gnyis kyi steng du ral gri lhar byas pa ni khro bo ki li kI li'i phyag rgya'o//mA ma ki'i phyag rgya gzhibs pa'i tshul de nyid
269b4(rgyud): las phye ba nI rdo rje khA bo su ru su ru'i phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo gnyis ral gri wAr byas tI srin log gnyis yid tsam gyis bstod pa ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya'o//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya de nyid las
269b5(rgyud): gung mau gzhibs pa'i tshigs bkug pa ni 'phags pa mA ma ki'i phyag rgya'o//rtsa bo'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis tshigs dang por bzhag la srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mor mthe
269b6(rgyud): bo gnyis kyi thor t+no la so sngor bzhig pa ni dpal gyi rgyud kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mthe bong gnyis kyi drung du bkug ste cung zad sbyar ba ne ma tang mi ga gi phyag
269b7(rgyud): rgyu'o//mthe bong gzhings pa'i phyi rol gyi ngos la mdzub mo gnyis bzhag pa ni grub pa'i phyag rgya'o//de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis phyag rgya grangs med par 'byung //phyag 'tshal ba'i
270a1(rgyud): thal mo las mthe'u chung dang srin lag gnyis bsnol te mthe bo'i drung du bzhag la gung mo gnyis kyis mdzub mo gzhibs pa dadakras nas mthe bong gnyis nang du bcub pa
270a2(rgyud): nirna cha gdong gi phyug rgya'o//de nyid las tha mal par sbyar ba ni rna tshi gdong gi phyag rgyu gnyis pa'o//rtse ba'i phyag rgya las gshibs pa'i kha phye ba ni dga' byed gdod de phyug rgyu'i
270a3(rgyud): ser gnyis tsam gyi phye ba ni khro bo cher bzhad kyi phyag rgya'o//gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mor sbyang ba ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o//mthe bo'i tshigs bstod de klu
270a4(rgyud): mgo ltar byas pa ni skrag byed chen po'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las snyim pa'i tshul du bya sa la mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo sprad de kha sbyar ba ni spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o//mthe bong gnyis
270a5(rgyud): brkyang ba ni slar btad pa'i phyag rgya'o//mthe bong gnyis bkug pa'i thor to nang du bcug pa ni rdo rje b+hi ma gi ri ti'i phyag rgya'o//rna cha gdong gi phyag rgya gnyis pa'i las mthe bong
270a6(rgyud): gnyis spras pa ni rdo rje ser skyo'i phyag rgya'o//gzhi bas pa las song gnyis tsam gyis phye ste/mthe bong bstod pa ni gdon skrag par byed pa dang /bcing bar bya ba yi no//gzhibs
270a7(rgyud): pa'i rtse mor gung mo gnyis kyi bau ka bi ste bsdams pa ni gsug nas 'byang gi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du mdzub mo phye ste dbu su dkug nas gung mo gzhi bso pa la gzhar ba ni de
270b1(rgyud): shAn gshegs pa'i spyan gyi phyag rgya'o//gung mo sbas pa mdzub mo gnyis rtse gcig pa'i tshul du bya ba ni sgrol ma'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mdzub mo bkug pa ni khri gan+d+he n+dan gyi phyug+sa
270b2(rgyud): rgyurgya'o//cung zad bye ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o//man bong gnyis smras pa ni rdo rje rtsi gcig gi phyag rgya'o//cung zad ba rgyang ba ni rdo rje stug g+ha phyog
270b3(rgyud): mi b+h+yong ya gzhobs la mye chu yang gshigs pu n+ti rdo rje gdong gi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las phye ba rdo rje sel hUM phyug rgyu'o//glung gcig slong ba ni gtsug phud kyi phyo /
270b4(rgyud): mthe khyod gnyis sgreng du ni rdo rje ga ding gi phyug rgyu'o//de nyid las thung du bstan te mthe'u chung da na cig skyed pa ni rdo rje na mokha'i snong gi phyag rgya'o//sen miganyis spyo na na
270b5(rgyud): blo 'chol ba'i phyug rgyu'o//de ltar de lta bu'i tshul du phyag rgya grangs med pa tI byung //rna che ga dong gi phyig rgyu nyid las gung mo gnyis gzhi bas pa lo mdzub mo gnyis kyis dkris p+ta
270b6(rgyud): ni gdod dmar b+h+yo b+h+yo ba'i phyag rgyu'o//mdzub mo bai nyis rdo ji ltar byas pa ni sprin drang ba'i phyag rgyu'o//btung nas byi na du rgod de bzhag pa ni slar btang po'i phyag rgyu'o//spyan drang pa'i
270b7(rgyud): phyag rgya las mtho bang gnyis bstod de bzhag po ni gdon 'joms pa'i phyag rgya /gyi ba'i phyog rgyongs mtho'u chung ngo srin mi ge gnyis spyad de sbyang ban rdo rje tshogs kyi mdzes ma
271a1(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mthe bong gnyis sbas pa ni dbang phyug chen po'i mig gi phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa las btang bas gung mo gzhibs pa'i son mo
271a2(rgyud): gnyis kyi phyi rol nas bstan pa ni rigs gsum spyi'i phyag rgya chen po yin te rig sngags thams cad srung ba dang /dbang bskur ba thams cad dang /las thams cad dam tshig gi
271a3(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po yin no//spyan drang ba'i phyir yang sbyar bar bya'o//de las mthe'u chung bting ba ni me lce 'bar ba'i phyag rgya ste/rig sngags thams cad bcing ba dang grol bar byed pa
271a4(rgyud): yin no//de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis phyag rgya grongs med pa 'byung //rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang pa'i tshul du bzhag nas mdzub mo gcig drang por bsrang ste/lta ba'i dmig su
271a5(rgyud): gtad pa lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje mdun legasu bzhag nas sta zur gyi phyogasu bstan pa ni rgyal ba rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las dpung pa brkyang la khro bo'i lte ba byas te bsnga
271a6(rgyud): pa ni khro bo srog med kyi phyag rgya'o//de las mthe bong dang gzhibs pa ni khro ba rab tu gtum pa'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las g.yon brkyang gi tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje dbyug sngon skye
271a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//khro bo thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya snga ma las mthe bong brkyang ba ni zhabs las byung gi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje nyid bstod do bstan pa ni rdo rje pho nya ma'i tsho gas thams cad
271b1(rgyud): kyi spyi'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las snying khur rdo rje byas pa ni khro bo me gtum po'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo gsum btsam la mthe bong ngos kyi mdzu mo'i sen mo mnan te snying khru
271b2(rgyud): phyogasu bzung la lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje bskyed pa ni khro ba lha'i yan lag gi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub me btang ste/de bzhin du bzung ba ni gdon zhi bar bye ba'i phyid
271b3(rgyud): bau ha thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya yin no//de bzhin du mdzub mo dang kung mo brkyang ba ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mdzub mo cung zad bkug ste g.yon brkyang ba'i tshul du byas
271b4(rgyud): da ni spyan drang ba'i phyog rgya'o//gung mo'i rtse mo mthe bos bkang ste mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gdon 'jom sa pa'i phyag rgya'o//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis
271b5(rgyud): sa phyi rol nas bkris la g.yes brgyad pa'i tshul du d+has pa ni mi bzang ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las g.yon brkyang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba mo bzod pa'i phyag
271b6(rgyud): rgyu/phyag rgya nyid mgo bor bzhag pa ni 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya'o//rkang pa g.yas brkyang gi tshul du byas pa lag pa g.yon pa sta zur gyi phyogasu bzhag nas g.yas pa'i mas
271b7(rgyud): bong ge ngas kyis mthe'u chung dang srin lag bsngal ba mnan to/gungos sbyong la mdzub me cung zad 'i chu nopa nu ba'i phyo bu bzhag de ni bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lcags kyu ma
272a1(rgyud): rtsa ba'i byug rgya'o//de nyid las mthe bong btang ba ni lcags kyu ma'i phyag rgya tha dad pa yin no//g.yon brgyang gi tshul du byas la lag pa g.yon pas de bzhin du bya
272a2(rgyud): pa ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya nyid las rkang pa bsnyams te/sgreng ba ni sa'i lha mo'i phyag rgya'o//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya los rkang pa gnyis bskums la mdzub mo
272a3(rgyud): brkyang skye bstan pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu moma'i gdon zhi bar bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//mdun logasu mdzub mo gaucig gri dbus bkug ste bzhag la gung mo brkyang ste bstan pa ni rdo rje
272a4(rgyud): gdun gyi phyag rgya'o//g.yon pa'i sor mo gnyis kyis de bzhin du byas pa ni lha'i phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo gcig pu ni 'dzum dpal gyi phyag rgya'o//gung mo ni rdo rje mdzes
272a5(rgyud): ma'i phyag rgya'o//g.yas brkyang gi tshul du gnas la lag pa g.yin pa'i sprin mo rnams spangs te//khu tshur bcangs nas de bzhin du lhag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje brkyang ste lta ba'i
272a6(rgyud): dmig su gtad pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o//mdzub mya steng du bzhug pa ni snying po'i phyag rgya'o//gung ma yang de ltar byas pa ni nye ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya lnga/gung ma dang man+t+ra bong
272a7(rgyud): gnyis sbyar la sor mo gzhan rgyab tu bzhag pa ni rdo rje 'joms me'i yin te/phyogs po ni srung ba yin no//g.yas brkyang gi tshul gyis lag pa gi rin pa'i rdo rje g.yas pa'i dpung
272b1(rgyud): mgor bzhag la lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje bstod nas dpung pa g.yon pa rna thab su bzhag ste/blta ba'i dmigasu gtad ba ni rdo rje phag ma phyag rgya la//g.yon brkyang gi tshul gyis ldag
272b2(rgyud): pagayon pa bkran la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis bkug ste/pad+ma'i rje ba ltar byas lAM ga yas pa yang de nyid dang 'dra bar bzhag pa ni lus dmar b+hi byA gA r+b+ha'o//'bar nga
272b3(rgyud): byAbyugargyu yang de nyid yin no//snying po gang na sa 'byung ba'i phyag rgyu yang de nyid yin no//rdo rje d+h+ri gI ri tI'i phyag rgya yang de nyid yin no//g.yas brkyang gi tshul gyi log pa g.yon pa
272b4(rgyud): bkrAn te brkyang la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung so sor bskyed nas sor mo lhag ma rnams klu mgo'i gdangs ka ltar bzhag/g.yas pa yang mtshon nyid de dang 'dra bar byas la/gan
272b5(rgyud): dgongs pa ltar gru mo rna ba'i phyo su bzung ba ni klu chen po'i phyag rgya'o//khyab 'jug gi 'dug stangs kyis mtho bI'i sen mo rkang pa g.yon pa'i 'og tu sbyar te/log pa sbyangs
272b6(rgyud): dang bcas pa sbyar ba'i mthil gyis bdag cing log pa bsnol bso bzung la/pheM long gi thab su gyen+da du spar zhing lag pa bskor te bkan pas nu mo'i bar du bdeg cig bsgo
272b7(rgyud): la lag pa gnas kyi mthil logs kyi sor mo la bltas rnaMs/mig byin khang bskur te btag la~M/gluhU~M sbreng ba'i byag rgya yang bcings nas ga'in pa'i sa ri ma 'i
273a1(rgyud): chen po bstod pa byas na des lha dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /klu dang /srin po rnams dang /log 'dred rnams dang /'gram na gnas pa thams cad dang /
273a2(rgyud): tshangs pa dang /skem byed dang /dbang chen dang /drag po la sogs pa'i snying la glog 'gyu ba'i shugs 'di bab pas 'ong bar 'gyur te/mthu stobs bcom nas rdo rje'i rjesu 'thun
273a3(rgyud): dang dul zhing rdo rje la 'dud par 'gyur ro//de dag gi phyir zhi bar byas na de'i tshe phyag rgya de snying khar bkrol ba de dgra de'i modo las 'thun par bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang zhing byams
273a4(rgyud): pa'i sems dang ldan par bzlas brjod bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'byung ste/lag pa g.yon pa phyir bstan g.yos pa nang du
273a5(rgyud): bstan de gcig tu sbyar nas/lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyis g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung nas brtsams te re re nas bzung ste bkris la gru mo bsnyams nas phyag rgya snying khar bzhig
273a6(rgyud): ste mthe bong gnyis kyis so so'i smon lag mnan la lag pa gnyis phyir bstan po ni/bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud tha dad pa yino//thabs de nyid las lag pa gnyis
273a7(rgyud): dkan pa ni bcings pa'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa gnyis ka'i mdzub me dang mthe bong gdu bu ltar phen tshun spyad pa 'di ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud tha dad pa yin no//mthe bong gnyis bkyed
273b1(rgyud): po ni rdo rje sgrog gi phyag rgya'o//g.yon pa bkun pa g.yas pa khas phub ste/sor mo rnams gcig la gcig bsdams pa 'di yang rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya yin//de lam khu tshur bcang
273b2(rgyud): ste mthe bong gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje thog gi phyag rgya'o//sor mo rnams phye ste khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mnan te sgra dang bcas par brdab pa ni dgrol ba'i phyag rgyu'o//
273b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo'i sor mo bsnyams la mdzub mo gnyis so sor bkug ste/gung mo gnyis ngos la bstan pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o//phan tshun bsnol te sgom pa
273b4(rgyud): bzang la mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo gcig gis gcig bkab pa ni spyan drang ba yin no//de las bzlog pa ni slar btang bu yin no//de bzhon du log pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur byi rdo rje tho
273b5(rgyud): /ba brag pa legasu bzhag ste/stangs kyis snying la bsregs pa ni kho bo'i phyag rgya'o//yig 'bru bcu pa'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i yin no//de nyid las bstong pa ni khro bo 'gro
273b6(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'o//mthe bong bkyed pa ni gzhom pa'i phyag rgya'o//g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyis g.yon pa'i khu tshur bzung la mdzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag
273b7(rgyud): rnams brkyang ste/mdung rtse gsum pa'i dbyibs ltor byas pa ni gtsug nas byung gi phyag rgya'o//me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya yang de nyid yin//g.yon pa'i srin lag dang gung mo sbas
274a1(rgyud): pa ni gtsug nas byung gi phyag rgya tha dad pa yin no//lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang gung mo bkug pa ni mthe bos bzung la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang pan rngo
274a2(rgyud): rje 'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid mdzub mo'i thor to mthe bo'i rtse mo logasu btud pa 'di ni rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya tha dad pa ste//rdo rje rtse gcig pa yi no//
274a3(rgyud): gzhan yang namakha' lding dang dpal gyi bai'u'i dbyibs de las mthe'u chung dang srin lag gnyis kyi thor to bkug pa ni mig gi phyag rgya zhes gragaso//mthe'u chung dang srin lag
274a4(rgyud): dang gung mo rnams kyi thor to logs par bkug pa ni khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgya'o//ming med dang gung mo dang srin lag dang gung mau rnams kyi thor to logs par bkug pa ni khro
274a5(rgyud): gnyer can gyi phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung rnams sprad la/mthe bong gnyis kyi thor to gung mo dang srin lag gi mtsham su bzhag pa ni rta mgrin
274a6(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las srin lag dang gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs nang du bkug ste/mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang pa ni rus sbal gyi phyag rgya gnyis pa yino//lag pa gnyis bla
274a7(rgyud): 'og tu bstan te bsnol la sor mo rnams gcig la gcig bkris nas mthe bong dang mthe'u chung rnams sprad pa ni/rus sbal dang rdo rjes 'og gi phyag rgya'o//lag pa gnyis khu tshur
274b1(rgyud): bcangs la/gung mo brgyad ste rdo rje ltar byas nas bla yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o//sgrol ma'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi thor to nas gang tsam gyis phye ba ni
274b2(rgyud): rdo rje yangs pa'i phyag rgya'o//nas gnyis tsam gyis phye ba ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi'o//mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni kun tu yangs pa'i phyag rgya'o//de nas mdzub mo gnyis brkyang sti spyad
274b3(rgyud): panI pad+ma yangs pa'i phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo gnyis brkyong mar brjod pa ni rdo rje sa 'og gi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las gung mo gnyis kyi thor to'i tsho gas dang po gdu bu ltar bkug la/
274b4(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis kyis rtse mo sprad pa ni rdo rje dgra sta'i phyag rgya'o//g.yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba ni ral gri dang /dgra sta'i phyag rgya'o//gung mo dang sprin lag gnyis thor to bsnol te
274b5(rgyud): sbyar la/mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung brkyang ste gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar ba ni rdo rje seng+ge'i khri'i phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo dang gung mo gcig la gcigra bstan la/mtho
274b6(rgyud): bong brkyang ste sbyar nas mthe'u chung yang brkyang ste/sbyar ba ni rdo rje lcags mda'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa gnyis bsnol la mthe bongang gnyis sgreng ste sor gnyis tsam gyis phye ba ni rus
274b7(rgyud): sbal gyi phyag rgya dang /phur bu dbyung ba'i phyag rgya'o//lag po gnyis bsnol to sor mo thams cad sbyar bar bya ba ni rdo rje ra ba'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa gnyis bkan la mthe'i chung dang
275a1(rgyud): du sbyar te mdzub mo dang gung mo dang /sprin lhag rnams rgyab tu bsgrangs nas mdzub mo dang gung mo dang smon lag rnams kyis mnan to mtho bang gnyis rus sbal gyi phyag rgya bzhin/
275a2(rgyud): du byas pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya'o//srin lag nang du bkug le mthe bong gnyis kyi tshigs drang pir mun na mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang por
275a3(rgyud): sbyor nas mthe'u chung gnyis dang por sbyar ba ni mtshon cha chen po'i phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo le brtan pa ni mtshon cha mchog gi phyag rgya'o//mtshon cha chen
275a4(rgyud): bo'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi tshogs dang po'i bsrubs kyi glor gzhar ba ni mtshon cha'i shugs kyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi thor to gung
275a5(rgyud): mo'i tshogs dang po nas cung zad bkug ste gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dbu mar sbyar ba ni mtshon tshwa'i snying po yino//mtshon cha chen po de nyid las srin lag dang mthe bong ngos sgyur ba ni
275a6(rgyud): tshol ba'i mtshon cha'o//lag pa'i phyag rgya dang thab su byas pa ni dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yin te phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya dang 'dra'o//na mkha' lding gi dpal be'u'i phyag rgya
275a7(rgyud): ltar srin lag phye ste mthe bong gnyis drang por gzhibs pa yang rdo rje dbyug sngon gyi phyag rgya'o//de nyid las mthe bong gnyis kyi tshogs dang po legs par bkug ste srin lag gnyis
275b1(rgyud): kyi drung du brtan pa ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o//mda' bo che'i dbyibs ltar gung mo gnyis kyi drung du mthe bong gnyis gzhibs pa'i rtse mo bkug pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o//pad+ma'i gdan
275b2(rgyud): dbyings ltar byas te gung mi gnyis kyi thor ta spyad pa ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgyu'o//mthe'u chung dang sbyin lag gdu bu lhur bkug la de bzhon du spyod/gung mo gnyis gzhigs
275b3(rgyud): pa mnan nas gzhibs pa'i tshigs dang por mdzub mo gnyis gzhar ba ni 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma'i 'o//de nyid las mthe bong gnyis se ni mo spyad pa de la srin lag gi nyis sbyar ba ni lus las
275b4(rgyud): byung gi phyag rgya'o//thal ba'i khu tshur ni 'joms byed lnga'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa gnyis bkan te sor mo'i phyi rol du bsnol mar brgyud la mdzub mo bsrang ste the ro tor sbyar nas mthe
275b5(rgyud): bibang brkyong nas mdung rtse gsum pa'i dbyibs ltar byas pa ni lha mu'i phyag rgya'o//mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi thor te mthe bos mnan la sor mo lhag ma rnams brkyang ste/mdung
275b6(rgyud): rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa gnyis bkan te sror mo'i dbyibs lhur byas pa ni lus dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o//lag pa gnyis glang po che'i sna'i dbyibs ltar byas pa ni
275b7(rgyud): 'jigs byeng kyi phyag rgya'o//sprin ma yang bklag pa ni khro ba dbang phyug gi yon te/'di dag ni rigs kyi rgyal po bcwa brgyad kyi phyag rgya yin no//mdzub mo gnyis so so'i gung
276a1(rgyud): ma'i drung du smra/sgru ba ni las 'dren rnamasahU~M byAg na'o//lag+sa pa'i wa tshur nam mkha' ArA//khod stong smya nas de bzhin du//ma dang
276a2(rgyud): lhan cig bzhag pa ni//nyi mo pheM ni yin par bshad//g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi po rnams//g.yas pa yis ni bcum par bya//de ltar khu tshur bcad byas
276a3(rgyud): nas//mthe bong gnyis ni bskyed de sbyar//g.yon pa mthong bar byas pa ni//mig g.yon gyi ni phyag rgya yin//lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bod dang //mdzub
276a4(rgyud): mo yang ni de bzhin sbyar//so ro mo gsum po rnams kyang ni//mthe bong lhan cig sbyar bya zhing //byi li'i sder mo'i dbyibs 'dra ba//zhabs kyi snying po'i phyag
276a5(rgyud): rgyu 'di//'jig rten gsum gyi mchod pa yin//skor me dag ni bzhi po rnams//lag pa g.yon pas bcad par bya//g.yon pa'i mthe bong bskyed nas ni//
276a6(rgyud): groyas pa yang ni bstod par bya//phrag pa gnyis kyi rgyab tu ni//rtag tu 'dug par bya ba yin//sor mo yi ni mdzub mo dang //gung mo tshugs kyi bar du
276a7(rgyud): ni//mthe bong gnyis kyi tha ma'i chags//sbyar zhing legs par bzhag par bya//g.yon pa'i 'khrig ma'i phyogasu ni//g.yas pas mthe bo brtan
276b1(rgyud): b+has+yA b+hA//seMd g+han pa ng+tha m+b+ha//phyug brgya pa sa rgyun myong ba yon//b+hag r+b+ha gsus po 'ad dgon//'dul la rnams kyi spyod par gshad//'ad dag
276b2(rgyud): sa ni sgyur byas shing //shes sngags ldan par byas na no//'phrul la khor 'dra bang gang min dang /'phrul la \u0f7fmi me bzod gang //snang ba dang na mi
276b3(rgyud): da //tshe chung dang ni dkar nag rnams//thams cad kyang ni 'jigs 'gyur te//'di la spyad par mi bya'o//'khrul 'khor phyag rgya gsum pa shad pa//zer rmugs gisuM
276b4(rgyud): pa yin par bshad//de la gnyis ka'i sor maM kun//'og gi phyogs brtan bzhing//mthe bong mngon de bzhin no//gung mo gyen du sbed nas ni//gnyis ka l+yAn
276b5(rgyud): ga smrar bya ba//namakha' phyug rgyu bar+t+tan+d+ha pa ste//lha chen gyon yin par shes//bdag nyid dang ni ldan pa yin//g.yin pa'i gud mo gang yin pa//gnyis
276b6(rgyud): ka yi na bar du bzhug/lag blo gnyis ka'i se ma yi//lhag pa yang ni dgyed par byed//mAthai be gnyis kyang babyed bya ste//lha mo'i phyag rgya yin par
276b7(rgyud): bshad//mdi na phyag rgya 'di dag ni//byas na las rnams grub pa ste//bgegos rnams zhi bar 'dod pa bzhin//rab tu bsgrims te sbyar bar bya//de las
277a1(rgyud): gzhan pa rgyud kun gyi//ngan kun sgrub par byed pa yo//phyag rgya spyi'i sgrub pa'i thabs//'od dag kyang ni bshad par bya//spyan drang la
277a2(rgyud): sogs don rnams la//srung ba la sogs las rnams las//sgrub pa pos ni rims bzhin du//phyag rgya 'di dag sbyar bar bya//phyag rgya kun gyi tshi ga yi//
277a3(rgyud): btang ba dang ni dgug pa la//shin tu bzlas pa'i sgrub pa po//bgegs rnams dang ni log 'dren gyis//ring du yongs su spong bar byed//thog mar las ni thams
277a4(rgyud): cad la//bgegs kun zhi bar bya ba'i phyir//bgegs rnams kun gyi dgrar gyur pa//bdud rtsi thab sbyor bshad par bya//leg pa gnyis ka'i mthe bong gnyis
277a5(rgyud): kyis mthe'u chung gi se mo mnan la sor mo lhag ma rnams kyi bar nas gang tsam gyis phye ste//rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas la/de nyid las bsnol te dpung mgor
277a6(rgyud): bzhag nas mche ba mnan la drag tu lta zhing khur ba bus te rkang pa phral la/'greng zhing g.yas rkyang gi tshul gyis lus btud pa ni/'phags pa bdud rtsi thab
277a7(rgyud): sbyor gyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o//'di mngon sum bstan te/log 'dren rnams dang gdon gzhan rnams chings shig ces byas na bcings par 'gyur ro//lag pa
277b1(rgyud): g.yon pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de ni las kyi rdo rje zhes bya'o//g.yas pa ni dam tshig gi rdo rje yin no//snyim pa bkun la mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol ba'i bar srin lag branyas
277b2(rgyud): bzhag nas mdzub mo gnyis dbus bkug la gung mo gnyis gzhebs pa de'i tshogs dang por bstan te/mthe bong gnyis blo la gcar nas snyim pa'i thab su byas pa ni khrus
277b3(rgyud): kyi thabs te/khrus byed pa'i tshe de la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas phyag rgya'i chu mgo bor blugs na bgegs rnams las grol zhing khrus byas nas kyang 'jug
277b4(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro//de nyid las the bong gnyis bAr du bcug lo gzhin thoms cad snga ma bzhin du byas pa ni/srung ba'i phyag rgya ste/mgo ba dang lag pa
277b5(rgyud): gnyis dang snying ka dang lkog ma dag n+da war rim pa bzhin gtug par bya'o//de nyid las mdzub mo gnyi sa bkug mthe bong gnyis tshigs dang po yang nang du btud pa ni lha
277b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi spyi'i khrus kyi phyag rgya'o//srung ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis btang ste/rdo rje'i tshul du byas pa ni srung ba chen po log 'dren thams cad 'joms
277b7(rgyud): par byed pa yin te/snying khar gzhag la nyi ma gau cig bzlas pa rjod byas na/log 'dren gyis zin pa las grol bar 'gyur te/gdon thams cad la yang de
278a1(rgyud): bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//g.yon pa'i sor mo gnyis kyis mtho bong sbas to gdu bu ltar 'dug pa'i nang du mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo gnyis dang
278a2(rgyud): bkug pa'i thor to bcug la lAg paM gA yas pa sta zur phyog su rdo rjer byas te las thams cad la dri dang me tog dang bdug pa la sog pa thams cad la sbyar na bgegs
278a3(rgyud): dong bar mi 'gyuraro//rdo rje de nyid g.yon pa'i gtum mo phyogasasu gzung na gzi byin skye bar 'gyur ro//g.yon pa'i sbyin lag bsgreng ba'i ngos la mo the'u chung
278a4(rgyud): dang brang mo ba stsol ba bsten te/mdzub mos mthe'u chung gi thor te dam du gzung nas mdzub mo dang gung mo'i thor te mthe bas minan pa ni bcom ldan 'das de
278a5(rgyud): nyid kyi mche bi'i phyag rgya ste/gdon thams cad dang bge blas chen po rnams la sbyar bar bya'o//sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol la mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug/
278a6(rgyud): pa'i steng du mdzub mo tshigs gcig bkug ste/gdu bu'i thabasu spyad pa ni chu bsnol biSh+TiM phyag rgya ste/chu lnga bskor nas ci dga' bar khrus bya'o//rdo rje'i
278a7(rgyud): phyag rgya la mdzub mo bkug pa ni de nyid sbyin drang ba'i 'o//gnyis ka brkyang ba ni slar btang ba yon te/bdud rtsi thab sbyar gyi phyag rgya yino//log pa g.yon pa'i
278b1(rgyud): rdo rje gang yin pa ni khro bo chen po'i phyag rgya ste/bcings pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi skabasu bshad pa'i las grang dang gang yin pa de dang de la khrobo chen po sbyar bar bya'o//
278b2(rgyud): spyan drang ba dang /slar btang ba lo yang phyag rgya rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sngag dang sbyar bar bya'o//rigs kyi phyag rgya thams cad la yang de dgra nyid kyis sbyor bar bya'o//
278b3(rgyud): snyim pa las mthe'u chung dang srin lag phan tshun bsnol te mthe bong gnyis blo la gzhar mdzub mo glong de dbus bkug la gong mo gzhi bla pA'i tshigs dang por bzhag pa
278b4(rgyud): ni rigs gsum car gyi spyi'i mchod yon gyi phyag rgya'o//de bzhin du sor mo phrugs gsum phan tshun bsnol la mdzub mo brkyang ba'i thor to sprad nas mthe bong
278b5(rgyud): gnyis kyis glor bzhag to snyim pa'i thab su byas pa ni mai trog gi phyag brgya'o//snyim pa bkan la mthe'u chung gzhibs te/dri'i rgyab tu srin lag gzhibs te gzhar/
278b6(rgyud): de'i rgyab du gung mo gzhibs la mdzub mo gnyis logs shig tu brkyang s+ho/gzhibs nas mthe bong gnyis blo la gzhar te snyims pa'i thabasu byas pa ni bdug pa'i
278b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'o//snyim pa gzed mdzub mo gnyis cung zad bkug pa ni spyi'i lha bshos kyi phyag rgya ste nang du me tog bzhag par bya'o//lag pa g.yas pa skyabs sbyin gyi
279a1(rgyud): sgyu sa du na na rgyu d+hA rgyun du rgyun dun dang/
279a2(rgyud): blangs la gsang sngags bzlas brjod byos na dag par byas par 'gyur ro//
279a3(rgyud): lcag pa gA yasa? sgru bas sbyin gyi tshul du byas te bston la mdzu
279a4(rgyud): rje y-i//ma sa ma chu dus pa ga med kyings la na
279b1(rgyud): las thams cad la sa gzhi gsal ba dang yongs su gzung ba byas par 'gyur te rigs kyi spyi'i snying po'i phyag rgya yin no//lha rnams la bstan na yang lha rnams dga' bar byas
279b2(rgyud): pa dang /bskul bar byas par 'gyur ro//khro ba ki li kau li'i phyag rgya bcings pa la phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo las sor mo rnams sbyar ba ni mchod pa'i phyag rgya'o//
279b3(rgyud): bsnol mar sbyar ba ni phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya'o//me tog lnga sogs pa ma 'byor na yang phyag rgya bcings pas 'byor pa byas par 'gyuraro//las thams cad la yang bskrad
279b4(rgyud): br-i nI las kyi rdo rjes bya'o//sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya ni thams cad du rig sngags srung bar bya'o//sor mo phan tshun sbyar te khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gzhibs pa'i
279b5(rgyud): phyi rol tu mdzub mo rdo rje ltar byas nas mtha bong gaunyis glo la gzhar ba ni dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya'o//ngan du byas pa dag la yang srung ba chen po yin lnga nye 'khor
279b6(rgyud): du mtshams de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i bzlas brjod byas su zin kyang sus kyang rigs sngags kyi mthu nyams par byAd mri nuso//khro bo 'chol ba'i sbas pa'i phyag rgya
279b7(rgyud): la yang srung bar 'gyur te/'di dag ni sgrub pa rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya yin no//de las gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags las gang gi srab su bston pa
280a1(rgyud): lung lus ji skad 'byung ba de dag la yang las kyi phyag rgya sbyar bar bya'o//rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje'i rigs thams cad spyi'i yin zhes bcom ldan/
280a2(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis bshad do//ni ma~M rat+no tra yA ya/na mo badz+rA d+ha ra skye /nam bi d+h+r-i ga na sa s+yai/'di ni snying po yin te de bzhin du/rdo rje rigs chen de
280a3(rgyud): dang ni//rig sngags rigs ni thams cad kyi//rigs sngags blon mo bdun dag dang //rig sdigs yin lag bdun dang bcas//'dod pa'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis bshad//
280a4(rgyud): dang po 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma//rig sngags rdo rje me tog bzhin//les mchog la ni gnyis pa yin//rdzu 'phrul dang ni stobs ldan pa//rdo rje sgrog zhes bya ba dang //'og
280a5(rgyud): pag ser mo gtum mo dang //de bzhin rdo rje tshugs par dka'//rig sngags chen mo bdun de dag/nyi ma bdun dang stobs mnyam zhing //sems can tshigs kun
280a6(rgyud): mchog rnams la//hral mo sbyar te phyag kyang bya//gzhan yang ya mtshan las 'das shing //dus kyi mtha' yi me 'dre ba//rdo rje khro bo khro bo che//de la yang dang
280a7(rgyud): yang du 'dud//de bzhin rdo rje thog thog ni//'byung po rnams la thog thog bzhin//gzung dka'i rig sngags las kun byed//lho phyogs sgo ni srung ba dang //rdo rje/
280b1(rgyud): khu tshur mchog sbyin dang //gtum po chen po stobs mo che//bdag dang gzhan kun srung ba'i mchog/byang phyogs sgo ni srung ba dang //pho nya chen mo grub pa bcu/
280b2(rgyud): de bzhin de dag gi yon mo rnams//pho nya mo ni drug cu bzhi//rig sngags tshogs ni sna tshogs dang //rdo rje dbyug pa nyi ma la//rdo rje rigs kyi slob dpon gyis//
280b3(rgyud): grub pa'i rdo rje cho ga yis//snying nas kyang ni phyag byas nas//de las gzhan rnams bshad par bya//las kyi de dkyil 'khor gtso bo ni//ji bzhin du ni bris
280b4(rgyud): nas kyang //gdon gyi las rnams bsgrub par bya//gang gi ming ni smos tsam gyis//ma gracas par yang gdon rnams 'jig/dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bstan pa
280b5(rgyud): yis//ma bcos lha min 'pham pa ba zhin//'byung po kun las grol ba'i thabs//'jig rten kun tu mchog gyur gang //thams cad zhi bar byed pa yi//
280b6(rgyud): dam pa gang yin bshad par bya//gang zhig tshul bzhin dran byas shing //sgrims te mchod pa byas na ni//'byung po kun gyis mi tshugs la//'jig med
280b7(rgyud): bde bar gnas par 'gyur//'jig rten 'jig rten slob dpon 'dra//'jig rten gyi ni snang byed mchog/'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad kyis//rtag tu lha
281a1(rgyud): chen bzhin du mchod//mchog gyu ra mchog gis mchod pa nges//cho ga bzhin du rgyas par ni//gdon gyi mtshan nyid bar du yang //
281a2(rgyud): legs par rab tu bshad par bya//zla phyed yud tsam nyin mo dang //rgyud skar dag ni bzang ba la//gtsang zhing gos gtsung bgos pa dang //bstims
281a3(rgyud): nga nges par gnas pa dang //gtsang mi grogs dang ldan pa dang //gtsang mi'i lam du zhugs pa yi//yar gyi do ni ches gcig gi/chos gnyis de
281a4(rgyud): bzhin lnga yang rung //tshes drug gam ni brgyad dam bcu gsum yang na nya dag gi/nyin par yongasu bzung bar bya//bya ba dang ni bal pa//be shA de de bzhi/
281a5(rgyud): te//yang na te'u gtul yang rung //zhag phyed yongasu bzung bar bya//shwa ta me tA ba sa dang //shau ra ma tha~M a bi tsi//dza ya se'u me'i yud tsam la//
281a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa bya ba yin//bsgrims te lag na rdo rje dang //rgyal dbang la ni phyag byas nas//zhi zhing sngan chad las byas pa'o//sa phyogs
281a7(rgyud): mkhas pas 'gro bar bya//kun dga' tshong 'dus gtsug leg khang //grong dang grong khyer byang shar mtshams//de bzhin lho nub mtshams kyang rung //
281b1(rgyud): moHmA zhing mdangs dga' mdag stug+h+ra dang //chad ldan tshwa sgra myed pa dang //rdo dang g.yogs ma rus pa dang //skyon kun meng pa des mthong nas//de 'dril sa
281b2(rgyud): nas ni//rdo rje lte pra g+hu d+hen b+h+yo zhing //shar phyogs nas ni gam pa dar//ha cang mi drag rgod me bya//rig stegs gang la dad pa yis//bdag nyid de nas bsrung bar
281b3(rgyud): yan lag ga sum+bi ba~M nas dang ni//yungs dkar 'bras kyang bzhag par bya//de nas dkyil 'khor gnas dang yang //dge ltas dag kyang bal+lI bA ra b+h+yAM/
281b4(rgyud): stsogs kyis dag b+hAn+d+ha b+h+rU~M nus//thams cad legs par gtor bar g+hu/dzA l-id lci bas legs par smad//kA sha dag kyang gdud par bya//khyA ni bzhi ma
281b5(rgyud): gram brgyad//sa yi phyogs char thig kyang gdab//thig skad gsar zhing grims pa dang //ran pa dang ni mdzes pa dang //dri zhim dang nau lta na sdug/gzazla bi dang ni
281b6(rgyud): legs pa dang //thung ngu dong ni sbom lnga sogs//mA legs mi dud pa rnams med na//dri dang me tog mtshang ba yis//shes rab can gyis thig kyi nga gdab//bu dag
281b7(rgyud): cho ga shes dben pa bde//chos la mi smod bde ba yin//'tshe ba spangs pa 'jig rten bde//srog chags rnams la sdom pa dang //'ad chags bral ba 'jig rten
282a1(rgyud): blang //'dod pa rnams las 'das pa dang //nga snyam nga rgyal zhi ba dang //dul ba 'dir ni mchog tu bde//bu bdag rgyun las bzlog pa
282a2(rgyud): yi//lam bgrod zab cing blta dka' ba//mun nAg thibs pos bsgribs pa dang //'dod la chags pas rtogs mi 'gyur//das+t+ra ni dka' ba rtags byas nas//
282a3(rgyud): skye bo rgyun bzhin 'khyam pa dang //'dod pa dag gi mdud pa yis//bcings pa'i bar du bshad pa ste//'di ni lag na rdo rje yi//yid 'ang ched du brjod pa
282a4(rgyud): brgyad//ki li ki lis srung byas nas//nges par kun tu 'jigs pa med//byang phyogs yang na nub phyogasu//tshon rtsi la sogs de dag bzhig/shar
282a5(rgyud): ltas lag pa g.yon pa yis//dri dang me tog phreng bas mchod//mtshon cha bsngags shing phyogs bcings la//thig gis grA yang btsal bar bya//de ltar mnyam//
282a6(rgyud): par bkod nas ne//khang pa gru bzhi bri bar bya//ji ltar thig ni gdab pa bzhin//thig dang 'thun par bsgrubs pur bya//rig sngags rdo rje lcag kyu ma//
282a7(rgyud): ya mtshan de nyid dran par bya//nang gi khang po mnyam pa dang //grwa bzhi legs par gnas par bya//grA yi phyogs ni thams cad du//de yi tshad dang
282b1(rgyud): na pa ni//rdo rje khang gnas rdo rje mo//dbus dang thugs dbyibs lags shing //mtho shin tu tu cho ba//shA du brten te bzhag bar b+hA//rdo rje yi ni byang
282b2(rgyud): b+h+yog+sas//rdo rje rig stegs gdub cing bya//dbus dang rtse mo lags pa yi//rgyul marten+de rje mo rlung du sgreng //nub byang blar ni bzhig par bya//rdo rje sgra ni nub de 'dod/
282b3(rgyud): 'dri ni gsang ba'i sgrar bshad de//'byung po thams cad 'jigs par byed //dkyil 'khor 'dod pas sgra de yi//byang phyogs kyi ni nye 'khor dang //lho phyogs
282b4(rgyud): su ni glang bshad pa//bsnyen te legs par bzhag par bya//gur grom dag ni yid 'ong ba//rmyi sgregs khu byas sbyar ba 'am//leb rgan rtsis ni dmar byos bya//
282b5(rgyud): dang ni yid kun 'phrog byed pa//des ni ba dan byas nas kyang //shing rings dag la gdags par bya//sgo yi lho phyogs ngos yang //de dag las gzhan

282b7(rgyud): rdorje'i sgrani don grub pa//'gro deng mi 'gro 'jig rten gsum//'di dag 'joms nus gang yin pa//sgo srung gnyis kyang bzhag bya zhing //de yang rigs

283a5(rgyud): dag tu bshad par bya//'khor kun dang ni Sh+Te TIg tu//rdo rje sgrog kyang gzhag par bya//klu yi gtso byi nar rgyus bu//gzi can gnyis kyang g+hu ru bzhags/
283a6(rgyud): dade nyis bu kun podag po ste/klu kun gyi ni gnas kyang yin//bram T+wA~M lAs byu drugatsun de//'di gnyis sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan//'ad ga

283b1(rgyud): pad+man //chug bzhin du banag pa m+b+ha/nadu skyon pan dang byor//d+harmA n+da byA sh+thag+sas panan//d+ha nas rgyun rgyags rnams dang //byA ba bslab
283b2(rgyud): mi dang bas/ mi ga mi rnams ma ngas sgyun//da/shang phyogs sa dkong //danas me gi sngags /mas da dz+nyAn+ta/

284a1(rgyud): ma mo rnams dang 'jig rten ma//bdun bral grwar ni 'phags ma'i mdung //'byung ba'i tshogs kyis bskor bar bya//nub phyogs dang por
284a2(rgyud): skyem byed ni//drag mo chags rnams mang por bcas//klu dang mkha'u lding grags ma rnams//de yi 'og tu gtor ma'i gnas//tshu la li zhes bya rgya chen yang //
284a3(rgyud): dreng ni nges par bzhag par bya//de ltar de dag thams cad du//tshogs rnams thams cad bkod pa'i dbus//rdo rje dkyil 'khor nang dag tu//rdo rje dbyibs
284a4(rgyud): kyi sngags bu ni//shar nub phyogasu blta ba'i dbyibs//de yi dbyibs legs bzhag par bya//de yi nub phyogs gnasu yang //rig sngags 'chang ni
284a5(rgyud): gus gnas shing //lag ni rdo rje'i snying po ni//rab tu bsgrims te bzlas brjod bya//can dan phye ma la sogs sbas//nas dang yungs ker la sogs
284a6(rgyud): dang //yang dang ga ra re yas//lag na rdo rje thog mar bris//bdag nyid g.yon phyogs ngos la 'dug/lha m+bu lho nub mtsham su bzhag/g.yas pas

284b1(rgyud): 'dus pa chen po ma//the tshom med byar gdon par bya//de nas chos kyi rgyul buM yi//chos kyi 'khor lo mkhas pas bris//dang la dang ldan bA l+yA yi lha//sangs
284b2(rgyud): rgyas sgyu gzugs 'di n+dan bri//de nas rdo rje wAg+h+ra kyi //rig stegs gus pa su mchod cang bzlas//lha mo stobs chen de nyid dang //rdo rje ri bi br-i bI rAt+na/snying
284b3(rgyud): lag na rdo rje ni//mtshon rtsa gsum gyi bdag /tshul bzhin bri zhing rigs rnams kyi//ma ma bdun gyi bskor bur bya//pho nya ma becu dpung gi mchog/drug
284b4(rgyud): nurtsabazhes rjes 'brang dang //rig sngags tshigs ni thams cad dang //rdo rje khro bo yan chad bri/yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba dang /bskal ldan mchog
284b5(rgyud): sbyin gzugs ba zang 'dra//'jig rten kun gyi thabasu ni//dus kun du ni phyeg bye bra//lce kun rig sngags chen mo ste//gnod sbyin 'byung po klu 'jigs
284b6(rgyud): byung //gdon chen dag ni stong phrag rnams//gad+h+ri ga pus gsod par byed po ste/de yi ming ni brjid byas shing //me tog 'dug pa sa mchi byas na/
284b7(rgyud): gdan rnams bye ba stong phrag dag/'khyam par 'gyur zhing ga yo bar 'gyur//de yi dngos grub gzugs bzangs bzhin//dpal dang ldan par mngon sum gang+gA/
285a1(rgyud): thams cad don ni sgrub pa pos//'di la the tshom med lngar sgrub//sgrub pas rab dang 'bring la sogs//bshos dang bdug pa la sos

285a3(rgyud): bcas//'dir ni las kyang bye ba yin//thams cad kyang ni 'byung bar bya//sgo ma yin pa gzhan dag tu//'dir ni ce yang mi bya'o//zhe sdang gti mug rgyags
285a4(rgyud): dang myos//'dod chags mi shes dbang gis kyang //'di la 'jug dang 'byung bya san//me rnams myur du nad kyis 'debs//gdon rnams myos shing rgyags/
285a5(rgyud): pa yos//rdo rje dag la rje byed dam//rkang pas rdo rje ri mo brdzi sa//myur du dmi tshig nyams 'gyur te//de dag rdo rje 'dzin pa yis//myur du rdo rje chen pos 'dzem//
285a6(rgyud): de dag gi ni rigs rnams kyang //rdo rje'i rig sngags tshogs kyi sna hA nag/slob ston yang na dam tshig shes//gdon pang dgra gis brnyes byed nA/
285a7(rgyud): rdo rje lcags kyu'i bzlas brjod dang //sbyin sreg dag gis de yi rigs//skad cig gis ni bcom par 'gyur//gzhan yang rdo rje rigs chen las//rig sngag
285b1(rgyud): rlur gyur gang yin pa//de yang sngar ni sgrub byas la//myos la sogs pas gdon rnams bskrad//gang phyir maur yang 'grub pa'i phyir//rtag tu 'di ni nang dag tu//mchod
285b2(rgyud): pI'i tshigs ni brjod pa dang //brdeg pa la so gos las mi bya//gzhan yang nad gtang mang po dang //yi dag so 'byung po sha za dag/dkyil 'khor spong bar byed pa dag/de dag
285b3(rgyud): 'dir ni gshibs pa yi/drug po'i las la 'jug par bya//gzhig par bya ba gang yang rung //thams cad lho phyogs nang du bya//kun la me ni 'brar bar bya//bdug pa'i gnod
285b4(rgyud): ni phyi rol bzhag/lha bshes sna tshogs mdzes pa dgo//TI 'dod kun ni thams cad du//thams cad zad mi shes par bya//gdon gyi dkyil 'khor pha rol gyi//byang shar

285b6(rgyud): gdun drug rnams la gnas par bya//grong na rig sngags gdon drag pa//mthu drug glanas pa de dag ni//mo nyid kyis ni bsgrub bya zhing //'di la dbyeng bar mi bya dkyi
285b7(rgyud): 'khor de yi phyogs kun tu//'byung po'i chags su ni gnas kyang bya//gter mo dang ni bdug pa rnams//rab tu rgyas pas mi chad par bya//de nas go don ni dul ba yis//

286a3(rgyud): phyir sbyin pa mi bzad pa//gtum zhing spyod par rig pa dang //brtan mchog dga' zhing spro ba dang //snying snyoms rig sngags brtson pa yis//khros nas mthu
286a4(rgyud): ni rnams b+ha zhing //brdeg pa 'am yang na bsdig par //dul ba'i gdon ni dang ba yis//de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur//dkyil 'khor phyi nang bcas
286a5(rgyud): par yang //gtor ma'i las ni bya ba dang //khur ba dang ni gzhi bas pa dang //kha zas ci 'byor rim bzhin dbul//dam tshig ci rigs sbyin par bya//rig sngags
286a6(rgyud): 'byung po la sogs kyi//gtor ma sku ni ci snyed sbyin//gdon kun la ni mchod pa bya//bcom ldan nyid kyis bshad pa bzhin//bden par sla zhing dam tshig

286b1(rgyud): g.yan pa yis//rnam pa thams cad bstan par bya//rdo rje gom+b+ha par 'dod dang 'jig/gcig rngur yongs su sbyar ba dang //g.yon pas brngub par bya ba dang //rgyags pa//
286b2(rgyud): seng ge sgra bsgrags dang //mdzub mo bstan te hUM zhes bya//shin tu sgra yang rab tu bskyed//rdo rje rigs can skyes pa yi//slob dpon gyis ni bstan par bya//lha yi
286b3(rgyud): gdon ni thams cad kyi//rtags kyi phyag rgya tshogs bshad pa//rkyen du bab pa gang yin pa'i//so so'i phyag rgya'i tshogs 'di yin//tshangs pa'i bud lha chen mdung //

288b6(rgyud): de dag tshul dang gnas byas pa//dben pa dag tu rgyu bar byed//ri bo yid du 'ong rnams dang /rtse mo rnams dang khyim rnams dang //'bras bu me tog rgyas rnams
288b7(rgyud): dang //drang srong dag gos gnas rnams dang //dka' thub tshal dang gzhal med khang //rig byed rje su slob pa dang //me tog sna tshogs mchod ldan dang //gnas
289a1(rgyud): dung kun dga' yid 'ong dang //bya rnams skad chen 'byin pa dang //'jig rten mar mo byed kun dang //nyi ma'i gnas nA dga' byed cing //nyi ma
289a2(rgyud): lhan cig 'gro bar byed//nyi ma'i 'od dang kha dog mnyam//gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma la//de dag rtog tu rgyu bar byed//zla ba rtsa ba'i 'od zer gyi//phung po rgyas
289a3(rgyud): pi dag la gnas//rin chen kun gyis rab rgyan cing //rtse nas ngos ni lde ldi dang //phug brgya dag gis gang ba yin//lhun po ri la de dag gnas//gangs ri ri bo
289a4(rgyud): rtse mo dang //gangs kyi sul ni stong pa dang //sman kun gyis ni rgyas pa yi//gsang rnams dang ni nagra tshal dang //sma na rgyas yongasu gang ba yin//spos dang

289a7(rgyud): phung dag dang 'grog byed cing //sprin phung lhan cig dga' bar byed//rgya mtsho nang gi chu la gnas//chu yi shugs kyis rjes 'brang zhing //de dag rgya mtsho'i chu
289b1(rgyud): nga dang //lhan sdig tu rgyu bar byed//mun nag gle ni klog tshon dang //rgya mtsho yi nI sgra rnams dang //rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa la//de dag rtag tu 'khrugs
289b2(rgyud): byed//dpying blo'i 'dus lo bab pa ni//shing rnams kun la gdon de dag/khru b+h+r-i ga bung ba'i gzugs gnas//chu klung chen po'i 'gras dag ni//gling
289b3(rgyud): ma rnams dang rdzong rnams dang //chu dmar dag gis rgyas pa yi//'jing rnams na ni gnas par byed//chu rgyun yid du 'ong ba dang //rgyu rnams rab tu 'byung ba dang //
289b4(rgyud): khron pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang //ri bi dag drang chu rnams dang //sbrul gyi tshogs kyis gang bu yi//nags khung chen po dag na yang //de dge sbrul du gzugs bsgyur nas
289b5(rgyud): sbrul dang lhan cig dga' bar byed//ljon shing chen po mi bzang dang //'byung po dag ni tshogs chen dang //khang stong dang ni yul skyong dang //ba lang gnas ni ga
289b6(rgyud): bA dang //rgyal po dag gi kor khang dang //pad+ma rnams dang gzhan dag kyang //glang chen gnas ni yid 'ong dang //rta rnams kyi ni bris dag dang //gzhan yang greng
289b7(rgyud): ther rnams dang gnan//chung ngus dag na gnas par byed//tshong 'thung gnas dang khyim dang gzhan//srang dang lam dang shong rta dang //rgyu ba dag gi gnas rnam nga
290a1(rgyud): bu mo la sogs lta ba'i rnams//bskyed mos tshal snying mi bzang dang //lha yi gnas ni zhigs pa dang //bu btsa' ba yi gnas
290a2(rgyud): gzhan dang //'chi la thugs pa'i khyim dag dang //dga' ston sa dang 'dus pa dang //'dus stonas dang thal mo'i sa//g.yul gyi sa ni thams cad ni//
290a3(rgyud): gdon rnams rtag tu gnas par byed//drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gdon bshad pa//yid ltar mgyogs shing 'dod dgur 'gro/'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs
290a4(rgyud): can de//thams cad rang dag ro rtsen par byed//lha tshogs ma mo'i gdon drug bcas//tshangs pa srung bar byed pa ste//bar snang gzi 'a ni nyi ma yang /
290a5(rgyud): gdon rnams kyi ni gtso bor bshad//skem byed la sogs srin po'i bar//rdzong ldan ma dang klu gnyis dang //srin po bcu dang lha mo dang //nor bu 'gul/
290a6(rgyud): ni byar mA yin//grul bum la sogs yi dag dang //brdud byed bcas dang bsrung por bcas//mdangs 'phrog de bzhin skyo byed dang //thams cad
290a7(rgyud): gdon gyi tha mar bshad//de dag ni khyad par bzhin//dkyil 'khor mngon pa mchod byas nas//mngon par dga' bar bya ba yi//bstod pas mchod
290b1(rgyud): ba dag kyang bya//dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha//lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la//mchod pa byas te phyag kyang 'tshal//mo ste bsreg bya
290b2(rgyud): bzhes pa'i lha//'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/phyogs mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la//mchod pas byas te phyag kyang 'chi lo//gshin rje dbyug pa 'chung ba'o/
290b3(rgyud): lha//sa ye bdag po gdon gyi bdag/ngarnab sems bdag nyid gdon bcas la//mchod pa byas te phyag kyang 'tshal//bden dang bral ba legs ldan lho//srin po'i
290b4(rgyud): bdag po gdon gyi bdag/sna tshogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la//mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tsha lo//zhag pa thogs pa chu yi lha//bden pa srung ba gdon gyi bdag/
290b5(rgyud): nub phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la//mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal//rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha//tshig srung gdon gyi bdag po ste//rlung gi tshogs kyi gdon
290b6(rgyud): bcas la//mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal//gnod sbyin lag na bo can thog sa//nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste//byang phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la/
290b7(rgyud): mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal//dbang dang ldan pa 'dren po'i lha//bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/dbang ldan phyogs kyi bdon bcas la//mchod pa
291a1(rgyud): byas te phyag kyang 'tshal//'og gi klu dang che ba'i lha//rgyal po chen po glang po che//dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas la//mchod par byas
291a2(rgyud): te phyag kyang 'tshal//stong gi lha tshogs thams cad dang //zla ba nyi ma gza' tshon dang //gza' skar sgyu skar bcas pa dang //skar ma'i 'khor lo'i dkyil
291a3(rgyud): 'khor dang //rig sngags tshogs dang gsang sngags dang //de bzhin phyag rgya'i tshogs kun dang //dam tshig shes drang slob dpon dang //tshangs pa la sogs lha chen
291a4(rgyud): dang //rdo rje 'dzin pa tshe yi lha//lag ni rdo rje stobs po che//gtum po 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag/'jigs byed lag na rdo rje thogs//thams cad zhi
291a5(rgyud): bar byed pa ste//'byung po'i tshogs ni kun gyis mchod//rnam pa kun gyis 'byung po kun//dus kun du ni srung ba po//reg sngags bcas pa de dag dang //
291a6(rgyud): 'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad la//ba shosta dang dri sogs sna tshogs rnams//des ni dga' zhing dbul bar bya//dam tshig shes pa rnams dang ni
291a7(rgyud): 'byung po'i tshogs kyis bdag la bsrungs//de yi rgyas pa 'phel ba yang //bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad par gsol//sna tshogs tshig gis smra bar bya/
291b1(rgyud): zhi ba'i tshig ni yang dang yang //bdag gi bla ma 'am yang na gzhan//dam tshig shes pa gzhan gyis byas//'di ni 'byung po kun la phan phyir bshad pa ste//'byung //
291b2(rgyud): po'i tshogs kun 'dus la rtag tu mchod par bya//dkyil 'khor dag las gtor ma'i las ni rgyas pa 'di//rgyu ba dag gri ga nas dang rten gyur dpal bskyed phyir//'dir
291b3(rgyud): ni thams cad dus su phyogs rnams thams cad du//yongasu drug pa'i yid dang rnam pa thams cad kyis//thams cad zhi bar byed pa gsum du rab bshad pa//don+da rnams
291b4(rgyud): sgrub pa'i phyir ni bla mas bya ba yin//las kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogaso////kun rig sems can kun gyis mchod//rig sngags bdag po kun gyis
291b5(rgyud): rjed//mtshungs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas ni//rnam gsum nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan//mtshan med mang po mnga' ba ste//'dom gang+gA 'od chen 'chang ba dang //rig
291b6(rgyud): sngags ston pa chen po ste/mchog chen 'chang zhing sbyin byed dang //dag pa'i chos ni des gsungs pa//zhi ba'i grong khyer zhi ba'i lam//gang gis thub rnams
291b7(rgyud): shis pa dang //gzhan yang sngon gshegs gshegaso gyur dang //ya mtshan gnas ldan dge 'dun rnams//mya ngan 'das pa'i grong 'jug pa//shin tu rgyas pa de kun
292a1(rgyud): lA//yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal zhing //thub pa sangs rgyas gnyis pa ni//'phags pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu//lha dang lha min dri zar bcas//

292a3(rgyud): rje phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin rdo rje lcag kyu yum//rdo rje thog theg bzang mo dang //de nas lag na rdo rje'i mthus//ki li ki li gtum po dang //rdo rje sgrog
292a4(rgyud): gi nyi ma bzhin//blo gros rdo rje phas ma thub//'og dpag khro bo dril bu tsan//de bzhin rdo rje nag mo la//ci ste shes rab can dag gis//gzhan don grub
292a5(rgyud): par 'dod pa na//mchod cing phyag kyang byas nas ni//dkyil 'khor gzung bya legs par bshad//grub pa lag na rdo rje yi//dngos grub thams cad sgra ba
292a6(rgyud): byed cing //dngos grub thams cad rabo rdzogs pa//ji skad du ni rab bstan pa'i//dkyil 'khor ci 'bru gang yin dang //de yi yon tan sna tshogs gang //tshogs
292a7(rgyud): kyang ji ltar bstan pa dang //dkyil 'khor gyi ni dam tshig dang //cho ga dam pa grub pa dang //phan dang mi phan don rnams dang //dam tshig shes pa'i yon tan
292b1(rgyud): dang//nyams pa'i gnas n-i gang ston pa//do da gzhan yang ga mthong //de dag thams cad ldogs par bshad//lagan rdza rje'i sras garnam pa//rdordza
292b2(rgyud): phyag byas nas//TI byed med tsas gzhag gcig dang //d+he dkar dkan bzang ba la//gzu ni gas gcung rigs pa dang //bsnams shing nges par gnas
292b3(rgyud): pa dong //grags pa gcong mar ldan pa dang //gtsang ma'i las kyi rjes 'brang bas//yang gyi ngo yi tshes gcig gam//ches gnyis de bzhin lnga yang rung //ches
292b4(rgyud): drug da ni brgyad dang bcu//bcu ga sa yangan bcugasum 'am//yidan nyi d+hA //yongs su gzung ba byug ste//de dge bcom gyis gzhan ma min/
292b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gnas ni sgyings byis la//zla ba nyi yi nub mo ni//dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya//bsgrims te lag na rdo rje dang //rgyal dbang la ni phyag byas nas/
292b6(rgyud): zhi zhing sngan chad las byas pa'o//sar ni mkhas pas 'gro bar bya//tshong dus kun dka' gtsug lag khang //grong dam yang na grong khyer gyi//byang shar mtshams
292b7(rgyud): ni gang mthong ba//de yi lho nub mtshams dag tu//zla ba re re bo rtul zhugs bya//mdangs dga' 'tshal ldan gtsang me dang //chu skra rdzogasags rus pa dang /
293a1(rgyud): mtho dman skyon rnams rnam spangs pa//de 'dri'i sa dro rnyed na ni//rdo rje lcags kyu dran gyis la//shar phyogs nas ni gom par 'dor//
293a2(rgyud): ha cang mi drag dgod mi bya//de naso rig sngags gang 'dod pas//bdag nyid kyang ni bsrung bar bya//de nas dkyil 'khor gnos deng yang //dge ba'i bltas
293a3(rgyud): rnams blta bar bya//sngags kyis btab pa'i chu dag gris//thams cad legs par gtor bar bya//ba lang lci bas legs par sbyar//ku sha dag kyang gding
293a4(rgyud): bir bya//mnyam pa'i dbus kyi dkyil dag tu//dkyil 'khor byed pa 'dug nas ni//phyogs mtshams steng dang zad kar yang //kho ra khor yug blta bar
293a5(rgyud): bya//srung zhing yid dga' dri dag gis//khrus byas zhag gsum sbyang bar bya//spos ngad ldan pa'i ri bzhin du//spos kyi phyogs kun rgyas par bya//
293a6(rgyud): thag skud gser zhing rab gtsang dang //tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa dang //dri zhim reg nu 'jam pa dang //sra zhing legs par gzabs pa dang //thung dang
293a7(rgyud): sbom si gas ma legs dang //mdud pa rnams ni med pa yis//thig ni shes rab can gyis gdab//de yi tshad kyang bshad par bya//rdo rje 'dzin chen dga' nga
293b1(rgyud): /dang de'i grwa sman rdzogs gyur nas//de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor //glangs rnams kyang ni bshad par bya//lag na rdo rje'i dkyi pa 'khor chen po'i rgyu

293b3(rgyud): pa dang //'did chags bral ba 'jig rten bde//'dod chags rnams las 'dus pa dang //dbyam nga rgyal zhi ba dang //dul ba 'di ni mjug tu bde//bu dag rgyun las

294a1(rgyud): thig grangs de yi steng dag tu//thig ni snyoms par legs par bri//rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma//rmad du 'byung ba de nyid brjod/

294a6(rgyud): kyang bro//yang na de dag gcig pu yis//shes rab can gyis bri bar bya//de nas ri yi rgyal po ni//rin chen kun nas grub pa ste//nyi ma bzhin du rtag tu yang
294a7(rgyud): rang gi 'od kyis rab 'bar zhing //bang rim yong pa'i ri rab de//thog ma nyid du gzhag par bya//sngar bstan pa yi khor yug ni//gru bzhi chad du bya ba yin/
294b1(rgyud): da nyid 'ad su ram pa gsum//khru rlo tsam du bA g+h+ra//gzhan yang mthunA dad dang //sor ngan pa smra par ba //gnas pa dang na lhags rnams//mjug
294b2(rgyud): mangs dang ldan par b+ha/gzhan ni mtshams la grogs pa'i byer//mi gas pa ni bri bdakyi//du 'dod rnye nas 'o//rgyal ze bdan bral phyogasu pazhi//

297b6(rgyud): phyogasu nyi ma bri//shar phyogasu ni zla ba bzhag/kA ru na ni gling bzhir ni//phyogs mtshams dag tu bzhag par bya//lhag ma dag ni byang phyogasu//nges par yang ni dgod
297b7(rgyud): par bstan//'di dag rnams ni mdor bsdu na//khor yug gi ni khong nas dbyung //de nas rdo rje shugs kyis ni//der ni stobs chen 'gro bar bya//bang rim la ni song nas
298a1(rgyud): kyang //dang po logs par dgod par bya//rdzong gi 'phags ma don sgrub pa//dur khrod gnas na drag mo ni//bden bral phyogasu bzhag
298a2(rgyud): bya zhing //ma yang drung du bzhag par bya//phyogs kyi lha ni bye ba rnams//dbang ldan phyogs su dgod par bya//log 'dren drag po chen po yang //dkyil 'khor
298a3(rgyud): du ni legs par dgod//rlung lha'i phyogs mkha' lding bzhog/de nas dang po skying po yi//rdzong gi 'phags ma gnyis pa yang //yongasu rdzogs par bzhag par
298a4(rgyud): bya//bang rim dag ni gnyis pA la//rdo N+DI shugs kyis bsgom bya zhing //klu rigs nor bu bzhag par bya//mtha' yas bden bral phyogasu bzhag/de nas
298a5(rgyud): phyogs kyi lha nyid ni//gshin rje'i phyogs su legs par bzhug/de nas yi dgas tshogs rnams kyang //me yi phyogasu bzhag par bya//de nas cho ga shes
298a6(rgyud): pa yis//yi dgas kyi ni rigs rnams dgod//brjed byed kyi ni rigs rnams dang //nam gru dag gi rigs kyang gzhan//dbang ldan 'byung po rnams dang ni//
298a7(rgyud): 'byung po'i chang khyu rnams kyang bzhag/tshangs pa'i srin po zhes bya rnams//dkyil 'khor byang phyogs dgod par bya//phyi rol klu yi rigs rnams kyang //rlung lha'i
298b1(rgyud): su nas da//dkrol la su phyag smras//bya sa ngan slong sa rdzogs/ mas sa bam nadu na//sus pa dung na bdun pal pa//
298b2(rgyud): sha zla bzhag ste stong na yang //rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor bzhag/yi dgos kyi ni khyim+b+ha rnams kyang //gri shin rje'i phyogs su legs par dgod/
298b3(rgyud): me sI phyogasu dkyil 'khor du/stobs chen lha mya yin rnams bzhag/de nas dpal ldan 'jig rten skyong //'jig rten ches las phyir phyogs pa//yul 'khor
298b4(rgyud): srung ni dpag med pa'i//dri zar lhan cig kun tu dgod//dbang phyug chen mor bcas pa yi//dbang ldan phyogasu gnas par bya//de nas rig sngags rnams kyi
298b5(rgyud): bdag/lag na rdo rje rnal 'byor che//grogs bcas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi//rdo rje pho brang dga' bar bzhag/de nas stobs chen 'jig rten skyong //dpal ldan 'jig
298b6(rgyud): rten chos spangs pa//lagau nA rdo rje 'dzin pa yi//dbang ldan byang gi phyogasu bzhag/de bzhin lcang lo can dag tu//nor sbyin tshogs dong bcas par bri//klu
298b7(rgyud): rnams ma ni su rus//rlung lha'i phyogasu gnas par bya//de dag bu dang bcas par ni//de yi drung du dgod par bshad//mkha' lding rnam par 'dud pa'i bu//ma
299a1(rgyud): rtsal shin tu rdzogs pa'ang blan ga/de nas 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams dgod//chu lha yang no nub phyogs pazhag/gsum pa dag kyang 'das pa sa/
299a2(rgyud): bzhi pa dag gis bshad par bya//bad rim bzhi pa'i steng dag tu//rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni//nyi ma rnams ni g.yog dang btsaste//chu lho'i phyog su gan+da/
299a3(rgyud): pAr bya//bden bral phyogasu srin rnams dgod//de yi pha rol grul bum bzhag/de nas grul bum lcags can+da yang //lho phyogasu ni bzhag par bya//ma
299a4(rgyud): yi phyogasu rlung lha bzhag/shar phyogs zla ba 'khor dang bcas//thag bzangs rigs kyang de bzhin te//de gnyis kyi ni bzhi po dag //de nas bang rim ldan
299a5(rgyud): pa lo//rdo rje shugs kyi 'gro bar bya//lha srung phyir ni bla rnams kyang //chu lha'i phyogasu dgod par bya//dbang ldan dang ni shar mtsham su//lha yi mdzod kyang bzhan
299a6(rgyud): par bya//gzhon gyis mi thub //dang ldan phyogasuM bzhag par //donas rdo rje'i drung dog tu//gnas gtsang rigs kyi lha chen bzhag/spyi'i srung ma
299a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin che//byang phyogs dge tu gnas par bya//rdo rje shugs kyi drug pa la//song nas chu lce'i phyogs dag tu//gru rgyal rgya mtsho chen po'i bu//drug
299b1(rgyud): tsong shugs dang ldan pa bzhag/der ni g.yog dang bcas par bya//gzhan dag gis ni sprul pa la//dbang byed la ni gang yin rnams//bden bral phyogasu gnas pa
299b2(rgyud): bya//tshangs ris kyi ni tshogs rnams kyang //me yi phyogasu dgod par bya//tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa yi//lha rnams shar phyogs bzhag par bya//shin tu
299b3(rgyud): mthong lha dbang ldan du//srid rtse de yi pha rol dgong //de bzhin dka' zlog byang phyogs bzhig/drug pa dag kyang 'dras pa yin//bang rim dag ni bdun pa la//
299b4(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyi rdo rje 'chang //sdod nas klu yi gtso bo ni//rgya mtsho chen po rmed byung bzhag/byung phyogs bya ba zin nas ni//grags shing bsod nams che ba yi//'phrul
299b5(rgyud): dga' ba yi lha chen rnams//gshin rje'i phyogasu gnas par bya//de nas rdo rje shar phyogs kyi//granas kyi gtso bor bzhag par bya//sum cu gsum pa'ang shar
299b6(rgyud): phyogasu//bzhag cing bdun pa yongasu dgang //lha rnams sna tshogs rgyas pa yis//ri yi dbang po dam pa yi//bdi rim dag ni yongasu rdzogs//de yi
299b7(rgyud): 'og tu bya ba bshad//ri rab steng du thams cad mkhyen//rig sngags snying po 'chang ba po//sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs mdzad pa//thar pa'i grong khyer dbang
300a1(rgyud): phyag gzhan//glang gi 'di zer de dag gis//phyogs rnams thams cad rgyas mad dang //klung gi sbrul mtshan kun gyi//mdzod rnams/
300a2(rgyud): thams cad 'byung ba dang //mtshan dang gzhan dang brtson 'grus dang //gan yang zhi bar ldan pa dang //mchog rnams mchog sbyin byed pa la//gang gis mchog
300a3(rgyud): mchog sbyin dang //thugs rje tshe drang ldan pa'i mgon//nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od dang 'dra//'od zer nyi ma bye ba yis//gang gis mun pa bsal ba dang //chos dang
300a4(rgyud): mtshan nyid rigs pa yi//yid bzhin nor bu'i thugs mnga' gang //gang gis bsgral pa grangs med par//sems can rnams ni rab tu bsrungs//rin chen
300a5(rgyud): in+d+ra nI l-I ltar//gang gi gtsug tor mdzes pa dang //nor bu yi ni rgyal po bzhin//zla mdog can gyis mdzod srung sa//gang gri bdud rtsi gtor ba'i zhal/
300a6(rgyud): pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra dang //dus mtshams gser gyis brgya ba yi//gser b+he ri lcer sku mdog mdzes//'khor lo chen po rnaM bas spyod pas//phyag
300a7(rgyud): dang zhabs ni legs spras pa//skyil mo krung ni mdzes pa yis//thub pa chen po legs par bzhugs//chos kyi chu klung chen po'i mchog/de la zhal nas
300b1(rgyud): kun tu 'bab//rmad du byung bar 'bab pa ste//bdag gis kha ni stong phrag rnams//stong snyed kyis ni brjod pa 'am//khong du chud par nus mi 'gyur//de ni rgyas par 'gongs//
300b2(rgyud): pa drang //ye shes pa mtha' bla na med//shin tu smad byung gsang bar bshad//tshig ldan gyi ni lha mo de//'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas kyis//gsung l-i rab tu gnas
300b3(rgyud): pa yin//'jig rten gsum na bdag mchog sbyin//'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa//'di ni gnas dang 'gro ba yi//'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa yin//mche ba'i
300b4(rgyud): che mchog stabs chen te//dga' zhing kun gyi tshig la gnas//gzhan gcig sangs rgyas 'dra bar med//gud na yang ni gnas ma yin//de yi bsngags pa sangs rgya pA sama?/
300b5(rgyud): lha rnams nyid kyis brjod par nus//mchog sbyin 'jig rten gsum gyi mo//nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs//mdong na 'gro ba 'di kun ni//khyod kyi rang bzhin nyid yin
300b6(rgyud): te//lha dang dri za klu dbang dang //gnod sbyin lho min tshegs bskor ba'o//rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams kyi gter//yA mtshan las kyi dkyil 'khor ni//der gtogs der ni brtson
300b7(rgyud): zhing sgo//de dang 'brel bar the tshom med//chos krung bsod nam ldan pa de//bsod na m+bir ni chen dag rmi9/lag na rje'i bsod nams kyis//las kyi rgya mtsho dag las 'byung //chu
301a1(rgyud): kru rgya mtshar 'bab pa na//skye bos brten nas 'bab par 'gyur//de bzhin chos kyi chu klung 'di//'di dag gris bston byas nas kyang //lag na
301a2(rgyud): rdo rje'i mgo bo dang //rna gnyis dang ni gsum du dbab//zer ma 'phros pas lha mo dang //dbang phyug tsho tha badz+ra phog par 'gyur//de phyir chos kyi chu klung 'di//sangs rgyas
301a3(rgyud): las ni 'byung byas la//lag na rdo rje'i mgro bor yang //rab tu dbab cing bdug par bya//bsod ni mas ldan pa'i chu klung rgya tshan de nyid las//skye bo mtha' dag gcig tu
301a4(rgyud): sems btud nyon par byeng //de nyid la ni lha rnams thams cad mngon par dga'//de nyid la ni rig sngags grub pa'i tshogs kun brten//gnas rnams gsum pa 'di ni/
301a5(rgyud): lha yi gnas yin te//rdo rje 'dzin pa nga yi dgongs pa bzhin du rdzogs//de nas dam tshig mkhyen pas dkyil 'khor rgyal po yi//gsang ba gang dang gang gsungs
301a6(rgyud): dga' rgyas bdag gis bshad//lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las gnas gsum pa rdzogaso////ri rab kyi ni
