301a7(rgyud): byang phyogs su//chos kyi klung chen 'dzin pa yi//rdo rje 'dzin chen rab gtum pa//stobs chen lag na rdo rje bzhag/de yi rkang pa g.yon pa yis//dbang phyug chen
301b1(rgyud): bo mnan par bya//g.yas pa yin+da rkang pa yis//lham bka' bzlog mnan par bya//ri yi dbang po lngangar yug dang //bang rim dag bri bar dag tu//glang chen rnam pa raN+Da
301b2(rgyud): b+h+yo dang //gnas rnams ji bzhin bzhag par bya//de nas chu klung bdun yang bzhig/lho phyog skye ni dbyibs legs pa'i//'dzam bu gling ni bzhig par bya//chu klung dang ni
301b3(rgyud): shing dang yul//sna tshogs kyis ni shin tu rgyas//de yi mngon mitshon chen po ni//'dzam bu'i shing mchog skyes pa de//'phangs du dpag tshad brgya yod do//'og log
301b4(rgyud): su ni bzhag par bya//de nas chu klung bdun yang bzhag/nags tshal yang ni bdun drag dang //yid du 'ong ba'i ri bdun dang //yul bdun dag kyang bzhag par bya//drang po
301b5(rgyud): byang nas brtsam bya zhing //lho phyig log su thur du drung //shar nas nub tu drang bya zhing //kho ra khor yug bsgrubs nas ni//rgyal ba'i gsung rab yid 'ang ba//chos kyi
301b6(rgyud): 'khor lo rjes sgrub pa//'phags pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu//snying rje'i bdeg nyid pad+ma'i mchog/dge slo de dge slong ma rnams dang //rgyal po dag gis bsten pa bzhag/
301b7(rgyud): 'dzam bu gling gi lho phyogasu//'khri shing dag kyang bri bar bya//nub phyogasu ni bi lang spyod//chu bo brgyas ni gang ba dang //yul dang skye bo stong dag dang //ba lang khyu ni stong
302a1(rgyud): /gis rgyas//de bzhin shar gyi lus 'phags kyang //shang rgyug phun bzhag par bya//yul rnam sman bzhag par bya//yul rnams dang
302a2(rgyud): nor ga gis//smyanatu rab tu rgyas par gan ste//dranas gnas pan chos sbyang /cu gnyis dag dang lhan cig tu ga ni zin zhes ni glags pa ste//sangs rgyas
302a3(rgyud): zlas ni ma n+da sram+b+ha nas//sbyin sbyinam+b+ha mr-in ts+tsha rnams/mchen du ni du seM naste//dri dang phred ba dang med pas//mchod pa skyed nga phyug kyang
302a4(rgyud): rlonas ma //thun pa ma ni byung thugs po rtag/shing thub den ltam po ste//rje gling dag gis rab tu btsun//bad+ma do/ni rje da/
302a5(rgyud): rlig stong chad par brjod pa dang //sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa'i//sems can yi mtshan de ni gnas//rgyu mtsho'o sa ni bskor ba yi//ri yi dam pa
302a6(rgyud): rirA 'aM//phyogs kyi ni byin pa rnams//kun nas nges par thezhag par ba//kA sha pa ni brgyad dag /dkrol la bar dang bar rdu rje rje//de ya~M gAD+D+h+ya/
302a7(rgyud): rnams dang tu//gser gyi gdu dag tu // rnams na // mi skye lag rten gsum//bye par nus pa gang yin pa/
302b1(rgyud): bsrungs gas kyang na par bya//de yang snrugs dang ldan b+ha 'ang //kun tu gzhal yas rgyus dAng g+ha//rdo rje zlog zlog hU~M gas ze//rdorje ng+gA byung phyogasna bzhag
302b2(rgyud): de nas der ne lha bshos rnams//rnam pa sna tshogs bkra be dang //bla med rab mdzes rgyas por bya//dri dang me tog phreng bas mchod//zhi de'i thu lu sna tshogos pa//sbrang
302b3(rgyud): rtsis byugs shing gzab pa dang //legs byas a shwa ka bar ti//de bzhin po reg nas khur dbul//ji tsam du ni rgyas pa phul//de tsam du ni 'grub par bshad//'bras
302b4(rgyud): thug tshul ka/thug pa sbyar thugs mi to//'bras can tshong ma sna tshogs pa//kha dog sna tshogs sor lder ljon//de la sogs pa gang 'dod pa//lo mA sna tshogs
302b5(rgyud): skyon med pa//yang na kham por sar pa 'am//pad+ma'i lo ma dag la bzhag/nas drang gro dang min sran gre'u//sa lu dang ni til 'bru rnams//snod sngar ngag gi nang du bzhan
302b6(rgyud): yod na gzhan du de bzhin bzhag/hwags dang kha ras gang ba dang //btung ba bsil zhing zhim pa dag/snod sar dag gi nang dag tu//bzhag nas rab tu dbul bar bya//
302b7(rgyud): nges na su lang 'tshe mi 'gyur//dga' ba'i sems kyis za 'dod la//kha zas dag kyang sbyin par bya//de nis dga' bar bya ba'i phyir//ta la'i lo ma bsil ya bo dbul/
303a1(rgyud): dri zhim pA yi dri kun gyis//dkyil 'khor la ni mchod par bya//spos kyi phye ma sna tshogs pa//mchog rnams kyis kyang de bzhin mchod//
303a2(rgyud): dzA ya mu sa nA la sogs//dri zhim thams cad sbyar bas mchod//a gu ru dang du rukashing gr-i thang mu ga ser sbyar rnams//bdug pa'i rgyur ni bsngags pa
303a3(rgyud): yin//dngos grub sgo drung 'dug par bya//yang ni nang du song nas ni//de ni byed phyo g+sas kha blta zhing //lag ni rdo rje tshul bzhin pod//shin tu bkra shris/
303a4(rgyud): tshigs bcad dang //de bzhin bde legs rdzogs pa gdon//de nas dor nau r-ig sngags ma//rdo rje lcags kyu N+yai mAM can//rdo rje'i rigs las byung ba yi//
303a5(rgyud): rig sngags bstan pa gang yin pa//des ni bdage nyid bsrung bar bya//de nas thog mar spyan drang ba//ri rab de yi rtse mor ni//'dug nas sgra chen 'don par bya//
303a6(rgyud): chos kyi chu klung spyan drang ba//dam pa 'di ni brjod par bya//bkra shes tshigs bcad brjod pa dang //chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang //'dus pa chen po'i mdo
303a7(rgyud): dang dang //'dzegs pa'i bden pa bzhi dag dang //rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de//mi nyams the tshom med pa dang //'phags pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i//seng ge'i
303b1(rgyud): spyan po mong gdon//donas rdo rje rigs kyi sum//rog sngags rdo rje lcags kyu zlas//de nas kyang ni rtse ma na//de nas rdo rje rigs rgyas kyi//rog sngags dag nog
303b2(rgyud): 'dod dang //snying po 'gro lding gtum po dang //de yi steng dang 'dod pa yi//rdo rje ma dang 'og pag can//lu buM rgyud dang gtum mo ngo //gsengar gi tum rdo rje thog drug
303b3(rgyud): /de bzhin rdo rje khyu chur ma//rdo rje thub da//'pho nyam//chen mo bcu dang drug bcu bzhi//dang po blo gas rdo rje ma//gnyis bA rdo rje dril bu mo//gsum pa
303b4(rgyud): rje nag mo dang //bin pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa//sna pa rdo rje rol pa dang //drug pa yang ni rgod bgra can//bdun pa rdo rje shugs yin te//brgyad pa rdo rje nyi ma yin/
303b5(rgyud): dgu pa rdo rje dbyug pa ste//de ni sna tshogs gzugs zhes grags//ban+d+ha ba rdo rje bden pa ste//ci dga' bar ni bzlas brjid bya//rdo rje dbyug po blta bar bya//rdorje
303b6(rgyud): bo 'jims byed dang //bung bya ba lte ba chu klung dang //rdo rje ka t+yA nA ya dang //de dge bas 'dzel dang srung ma dang /yon tan chen mo de la sogs//nges pa nyid du bzlas
303b7(rgyud): brjod bya//des ni dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur//nges par gnas pas reg sngags ni//mchog 'gyur rdo rje lhag kyu ma//'dug pa kun gyis rgyas pa yi sa/
304a1(rgyud): dkyil la dor du ni brgyad brgyar bzlas//des nA las sgrub pa yi//rig+sa sngags das ni grub par 'gyur//rog sngags glang la dga' ba dang//
304a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ni bzlas brjod bya//lag na rdo rjes po shad pa yis//rig sngags mang po de nyid ni//mchog 'dod dngos grub 'dod pa yis//ci nas skye bar mi 'gyur
304a3(rgyud): spyang//de nas rdzogs par spyan drangs shing //gsang stegs rgyas par byas nas ni//de nas dkyil 'khor 'dod pa kun+da//bzung ba yang ni bshad par bya//sang+yas
304a4(rgyud): chos dang dge 'dun dang //dkon mchog sum la gtso bor 'dzin//dod cing mnyam par gzhag pa yi//mi ni dam tshig 'dzin du bzhug/des na de la mkhas pa
304a5(rgyud): yis//bsrab bzhi lnga ni sbyin par bya//ming 'di zhes ni bya ba badrag/byin chad nam 'tsho'i bar dag tu//srog gcod log par g.yem pa dang //ku dang brdzun du
304a6(rgyud): dang //'byud de sbyor ba'i rgyung 'thung ba//rtag tu bdug gis spangs zhes spros//bsre'i bzhi mchog dang ldan pa de//blo gros rdo rjes bsrung bar gyi/
304a7(rgyud): 'bigs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir//byin gyis brlabs kyi cho ga 'ang bya//de nis der ni bum pa bdun//tshu na rab tu blugs nas kyang //blo gros rdo rjesas
304b1(rgyud): byangs//bdud rtsi yas ni brjod pa yin//rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag bad+d+hA na//dril bur bcas pas dran byed brjod//lag pa gnyis ka slar yang sbyar//mtho'u chung maH
304b2(rgyud): khyo sbrul bya zhing //bdud rtsi'i chu ni blugs par bya//gos gtsang bgos shing rab bsnams pa//sgro ba shig pa la du 'bod che//mi bzang rnams ni bsgo bar bya//
304b3(rgyud): 'din du 'bod chen po ste//'khrug cing sdug bsngal chen po'i gnas//'di yis khyod ni dam tshig las//nyams na myur du gdungs par 'gyur//khyod ni dam tshig
304b4(rgyud): gyur na//rkyen du 'bab par ma lus sbyini//des na khyod la mkhas pa 'di//'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal byed mi 'gyur//dam tshig spangs pa gang yin dang //dkyil
304b5(rgyud): 'khor du ni mi zhugs pa//de la dam tshig gzhan med pa//bstan bcos kyi ni gzhung lugro yin//dmyal ba yod pa 'di la ltos//nad rnams thams cad tshogs pa
304b6(rgyud): drang //'byung ba la sogs rnams kyis rgyas//khyod ni de nyid ltung bar byed//gdon mi za'i sdig pa'i las//'di la dpyang par bya ba med//rtag tu khyod kyis dam
304b7(rgyud): tshigs bsrungs//rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod pa gyos//'on dang 'byung po sha za sogs//sdig byed de dag 'jug mi 'gyur//slob dpon la ni gus par bya//
305a1(rgyud): dan rdo rje 'dzin nyid sbyin//ngan khyodaH'bras bur bzlas//khyod chu ba 'bras cu myong//don dam //lha rnams dang //ShAn
305a2(rgyud): mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur//rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di//ji ltar rtag tu mdzes po bzhin//de ltar 'dzin yon tan gyis//dam tshig nges par gnas
305a3(rgyud): par 'gyur//de nas rdo rje drungs la//log pa gson pas dril bu bzung //lagA pa gsus pa sa~M dI yi g.yas//gzung nas kyang ni spro bar bya/'a
305a4(rgyud): tu thub pa'i//sdug bsngal dag las sgril ba ste/de ji lta na n+dan ny-id dang ni//spyan cig tu ni 'jug par 'gyur//de nas gyur namanas
305a5(rgyud): khor yug las ni ban li bAr bye//log pa bting nas de la ni//dkyil 'khor thams cad bstan par bya//'khrul pa me tig gis//mdun bzhugs
305a6(rgyud): bde gshegs min chud dang //dkyil 'khor gang dang gang mthong ba//de dang dul bde bar mchod//de nas thams cad mthong nas kyang //man gyi bum par dag
305a7(rgyud): bar bye//blo can gyis ni mtshan yang gzung //dam pa gzhan yang bdag gis bshad//rdo rje snang thabs 'gro ba dang //gdam bcas par bsgyur ba dang /
305b1(rgyud): yon pas kyang ni gdab par bya//seng ge'i sgra sgrogs 'byung ba dang //mdzub mos hUM yang bsgra gas byas te//thams cad shin tu byed pa'i mchog/de nas gzhan yang rma
305b2(rgyud): shes pas//cho ga bzhin du gnod par bya//slob dpon gus par legs bya zhing //dam tshig kyang ni nges par bstan//til zin lnga sogs mon sran phre'u//bdag
305b3(rgyud): nyid kyis ni legs par bza'//lhags par bla mar gus byas dang //de la dga' bar byas nas ni//rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang //rig sngags rnams la sdug par gyur//
305b4(rgyud): de nas rig sngags tshogs rnams la//de yi rig sngags gang 'dod pa//de ni bsgrims te bklag bya zhing //dngos grub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod//de ltar slob dpon
305b5(rgyud): rgyu chen tshogs rnams dang //lha dang lha min mchog gzugs du ma yin//mthong zhing thos la 'brang bar 'gyur ba dang //rtag tu legs mchod rjesu bstan pa yin//
305b6(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs dpalnga dang ldan pa las//mnyes pa dka' zhing ma dang nyi ma las lhag pa de kho na nyid kyi mi drang dam pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa mchog tu gyur pa gang dang gang
305b7(rgyud): yin pa de dag ni dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig rab tu rtogs pas//rtag tu mthong zhing thos pa 'am//sgrub pa'i tshul dang ldan par byas ni dngos grub 'grub pa 'am/phan pa
306a1(rgyud): yang thob par 'gyur//rdo rje chen po thugs bzhin du brtag tu bdug pa dang //mai tog dang /dri dang /ltab shos rgyas par dbul zhing sbyin
306a2(rgyud): bsreg bya'o//de ltar gnas bzhi pa tshul 'dzin cing nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di ni dpal skyed cing mchog tu myur ba'i cho ga yin pas
306a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po nyid yino//lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po lag na rdo rje dbang phyug chen po gnyis kyis dam tshig bshad pa las gnas
306a4(rgyud): bzhi pa rdzog so////de nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma//rdo rje yi ni rigs kyi yum//sgrub pa yi ni don rnams kun//sgrub pa byed pa gang yin bshad//
306a5(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mash+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na yaM/ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/na mas+t+waM badz+ra d+hA ra badz+ra pA Ni badz+ra yai dz+nyA na maHsu badz+ri ya na mo badz+ra dU tI ye/na mo badz+ra shAr+t+tiH
306a6(rgyud): na mo badz+ra hri da yA ya/na mo badz+ri ku shI yau/na mo badz+ra dA shu shwA ya/ne mo badz+ra kroSh+Ta ya/na mo badz+ra bi dzA yA yA/na mo badz+re ku sha/ko ShA pA sha bi dza yA ya/na maHpra brta e
306a7(rgyud): brta/badz+ra ku shi/mau li mi li/hi li hi li/hi ro hi ri/ki ri ke r-i/A kaD+D+h+ya A kan+tha/gi rai gi ri/khi ri khi r-i/b+hi ri b+hi riki li ki li/badz+rA ku laM saM sma ra/
306b1(rgyud): ra ti ra/rA/R+R-its+tshar-I/Agats+tsha A nar+N+Na/An+ta sa m+b+ha t+tor su d+hAnad+hanAn/at+ma b+ha sas/dz+nyArbar+N+NaH b+hUr+yA/oMn+d+ran+na NA/n+ta dan drA r+thanA
306b2(rgyud): ku shA nA/twA tat+te/l-i ki l-i/cu dra ts+tshar+YatAM/ki ri NI brah+ma ba~M daM dz+nyitr-iSh+TaM nA br-i da ti mu kA'o//kukrA kASh+mi/ni yo bi man ma wAka mA ra ma Ad d+ha
306b3(rgyud): dri ma de haM tsaN+DA ba de hi ma shwak+saM ba de tri maM/saur+yA ba de hiM m+ba/ya mAM br-i dwe hi mr-i/t+yat+sat+taM bA daM h+nimA/tsi ri tsi ri/bI raM bI rI/a kras+yai/A nA yA a basmai/i hi tu rA hU~M/
306b4(rgyud): tu ru tsu ru/sarba ka lan su/dri grA d+hA ra/kI mi ki lAM/mri li mr-i m+bi/tI ri ti rI/mi li mi li/tsA ka tsa ka/kairni kaM nibi ri bai ri/shra tha ku shi sa ha sa?/mi l+ya
306b5(rgyud): b+h+r-i shUn+na drA kra shrI bAdz+nyA bA he bAdz+rA Ni br-i s+ye/ma tI mA ti/tI r-I ti re/kI ri ke ri/u kr-im+b+ha/an+ya kar maMn+ta/bA rA kA na ma na yA/ya shaM ya shi na/ku ru ku ru/ka rI k+ki
306b6(rgyud): g+h+r-i ni g+ni ni/khai ri khaM ri/bi tsi ra br-i tsa rA/kro shr-I kau shi ni/ku be ra ma kra Sh+TiklA kot+taM/la la la la/ha sI ni br-i yuM/br-i yAM kA ri/tsak+Shur mAt+ti/tsik+ShIHpra bi sha/
306b7(rgyud): sen maM ka ri/sha ya sne tsam d+hA ne/b+hI la b+d+ha maM/pA sha bar de/ ha ra/ba su bsu/saM mi sama?/hA he hai haM/!sh+tsi shi kai kaM ka la kai la/'a
307a1(rgyud): da rlun sla kA slastsa su// /!k+kim+pAk+Shatasgra/sgra na/na /sanA sku//ma ldan
307a2(rgyud): ra sA ra/kA kA/ ba /m+b+ha ya sh+na s+ya sh+len/s+yA b+h+yAM r+theSh+TakrI ng+gi ki re/m+me ti si tI/ kaM/rU pA rA ma/rI tr-i k+Shi ra b+hi ti k+Sha rbe/ma mu
307a3(rgyud): badz+ra ku shi bi raSh+kaM ku shi hA re badz+re k+Shi pa ni kA pa ne ka la shi ba ni/b+haka d+hA NaM/tsaku r-I ku shi pa naM/b+ha ra b+ha rA/sam por bi ra/ku ru ku rukau ri kA re/turA
307a4(rgyud): ru/tai ra ta ra/badz+rI ku shI ye swA hAM//ko shAM ku shI ye sUhA/ba shI ku shrI yai swA hAM//bi dza yAM ku shi yai swA hA//ke mAM ku shI ye swAt+ma//A dz+nyA yAM kra shrI ye
307a5(rgyud): hUM ba gai e// ts+tsha ye swAhA/ ste nasarbAmr-i kA dzA pA kr-its+tsha
307a6(rgyud): sarba sa twa na mA kaR+Sha Na ba shi kar N+DA ku shwe ye swA hA//rdo rje lcags rgyu nyid no//'di ltar rnam pa gzhan du yang //rdo rje rigs chen gtsam ste//'bang
307b1(rgyud): mo mchog sbyin mchog/rigs kyi yum ste rigs kyi mchog/lasna mchog kun gyi byed pa mo//bcings dang grol ba thams cad kyi//las kun la no thub med pa/
307b2(rgyud): drab pa ci 'dra de bzhin 'dra//ba raM mo ci 'dra de bzhin 'gyur//snying po dang ni mIng 'di yang //gtso bo dang ni mchog tu bshad//lagran rdo rje nyid kyang ni//skad cig
307b3(rgyud): gis ni 'dis bkug na//phyi rol rgyal po pho nya sogs//tshogs rnams lha ni ci zhig smros//lha yi rigs ni mthong ba yi//rig sngags 'chang ba de la ni//
307b4(rgyud): 'grub par mi 'gyur gang yang med//gang zhig rab tu bsgrims nas ni//yum 'di rtag tu 'chang byed pa//de la mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur//bcings
307b5(rgyud): ba dang ni grol ba la//rig sngags gsang sngags kun bdag 'gyur//nang dang phyi rol bcas pa yi//'khor dang ldan par byas na ni//gcig pu 'jig rte na gsum
307b6(rgyud): mchog dang //rnam pa gsum du 'gyur bar bshad//de dag thams cad khyad par du//stobs dang ldan par skye bos brjod//mdor na yum 'di thams cad kyi//mchog
307b7(rgyud): gi dam par bshad pa yin//de dag bsgrubs pa'i dus dang ni//tha mal dus su rtag tu yang //ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du//rig sngags 'di ni sbyar bar bya//na maHtsu ru
308a1(rgyud): klod/nAn klung /badz+ra pU ts+tshin mo bud+d+ha s+yA swAt+ma//lan tI r+m+mA \u0f7f gas/da byas pa'i spangs kAr mI phye mas gzhag par bya//nusar+d+hak+sha ru
308a2(rgyud): tsu ru pAd+hA pA Ni//nA mA~M mr-i swA hU~M//'dis rlom tog dang 'i bdug pa dngul bar bya//nAm+ba dr-i mi du m+b+ha u mA ma dusas dumo//tsun+dan+da ru swAhA/'dis bshas
308a3(rgyud): dbul lo//na mo badz+rI dzI/badz+re NI bidz+nyA Ni/han ha na/da ha da hA/ba tsa pa tsa/I taM sarba bag+h+nAn bi nI yA kaM/sa ma mA ra yaM/ha na hA na/ud s+yA
308a4(rgyud): s+yai/dz+nyA shwa ya/bid+hA sa yaM/sUHdud+b+ha tsi tu tai sh+yA ma ma/hu ru hu ru/sid+d+hash+tsa NA badz+ra pA Ni/rA dz+nyA pa yA ti swA hA//me spre la sngags 'dis shing 'am can
308a5(rgyud): yam sreg shing dam//ka ri mA la~M ka ri yi sreg shing dang sgra cha dang /lan rgyu ba gsum rnams lhan gcig tu sbyar te/sbyin sreg byasman baglegs dang
308a6(rgyud): log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad sel bar byed do//de nas de yA sgrub pa ni//rig sngags 'chang ba kun gyis mchod//sgrub po'i thabs ni gang gisu//stobs
308a7(rgyud): chan 'di ni grub pa bshad//thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gathogs//sangs rgyas 'grub byang mgon po dang //'jig rten dgu na la mtshan gas /
308b1(rgyud): 'don la byug 'tshal naste//lha rnams dang ni dri zla dang //rig sngags 'chang dang lto 'byin//shin tu ya mtshan gsang ba 'di//don kun 'grub byed mnyan par
308b2(rgyud): gyiste//gang zhig gsang ba'i rgyal po'i mchog/'di ni so sor 'chung byed pa//de la 'jog rten rnam sa cad na//bka' las 'gal par byeng pa med//ci ste sprub
308b3(rgyud): pa de nyid shes//yang na dngos grub 'dod pa yis//cho ga bzhin du kun byas ni//sgrub pa pos ni thams cad 'thob//lha 'am lha mya yin rnams dang /
308b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin yang na rig sngags 'chang //gzhan yang gang dag su yang rung //'gal bar byed pa gang yang med//sangs rgyas shA ra dwa ti'i bu//rdo rje 'dzin pa chen
308b5(rgyud): bo dang //rig sngags bdug gi bla ma la//ci ste mchog tu dang byed na//de ni kun las lhog pa dang //sems can kun gyis mchod pa dang //rtag tu dngos grub
308b6(rgyud): kun byed dang //gzhan gyi dngos grub 'jigs par nus//dus kun du ni gtsang ba dang //gsang ba thams cad 'chang byed la//rig sngags 'ching gi go 'phang
308b7(rgyud): mchog/shin tu sems par byed po yi//tsha gar ldan zhing rgyas pa btses//de ni ma lus bshad par bya//de nas lha dang lha ma yin//mi dang rig sngags
309a1(rgyud): 'chang rnams dang //'byung po'i tshogs dang klu rnams dang //gnod sbyin rnams dang srin por bcas//grwasung ba'i mchog ni mnyan pa'i
309a2(rgyud): phyir//thams cad thal mo sbyar nas 'khod//de nas tshig don rtogs pa yi//rdo rje 'dzin pas de dag la//gsal bar bya phyir tshig 'di smras//da ni dkyil
309a3(rgyud): 'khor dam pa dang //bla mi'i rigs ni sngon mthong la//rdo rje dang ni rdo rje 'dzin//rig sngags sgrub pa rtog byas nas//zla ba phyed gsum bar du ni//zla gcig
309a4(rgyud): pas ni bsgrub par bya//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rdzogs pa 'am//sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten der//rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma//rig sngags
309a5(rgyud): rigs kyi tshe gas bskor ba//cho ga bzhin du byas nas ni//yid dang 'thad pas mchod par bya//mtshams bcad pa dang phyogs bcing dang //chus ni kun nas
309a6(rgyud): bcad pa dang //thams cad du ni bsrung ba rnams//cho ga bzhin du legs par dgod//sna gsum rdo rje bkra shis dang //lcags kyu kha gdings yungs kar/
309a7(rgyud): gyis//tshul bzhin dang por mdun dag tu//rdo rje lcags kyu'i gzugasu bri//kha zas kyang ni dkar gsum gyis//cho ga bzhin byas bza' bar bya//dus gsuM
309b1(rgyud): yang nA nub bdun du//bzlas brjod mchog gi brgyad brgya bya//de nas dor ni rdo rje dang //lcags kyu 'bar ba mthong bar 'gyur//dor ni gzugs las grub pa po/
309b2(rgyud): lha yi rIg sngags 'chang bzhin 'gyur//'jig rten gsum yang snang bar byed//sa steng dag kyang 'bar ba dang //'jig rten gsum yang g.yo bar ni//bdag nyid
309b3(rgyud): kyis ni der mthong 'gyur//rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu dge/de nas de la 'grub par 'gyur//ri dgas kyis bskor gzhon nu ma'i//thad de dga' brtsen par
309b4(rgyud): 'gyur//de nas lha dang 'byung po dag/rgya mtsho na mkha' sa gnas pa//dang pa med cing ma grub rnams//de ltar dga' bar gyur nas ni//don rnams kun yang
309b5(rgyud): byed par 'gyur//de bzhin du ni ji ltar yang //kun tu dngos grub ya mtshan ya mtshan can//mkha' la de bzhin byed par 'gyur//de nas ci dga' rgyu ba dang /
309b6(rgyud): de yi dga' mgur de bzhin byed//rtse dga' mchog tu shes par bya//dri ni yun du 'tsho bar 'gyur//de ni dga' bzhin mkhra' la 'gro/lha yi'i ga sngag
309b7(rgyud): 'chang gis bskor//de ni gcig pu ci dga' bar//rdo rje 'dzin po yin bzhin du//lhag par dga' ba'i gnas rnams//rig sngags 'chang bas bskor ba
310a1(rgyud): 'gyur//de ni na da ku ber bzhin//dga' bar gang yang rtse bar 'gyur//dus min par ni shing rnams dang //me tog tshal dang 'bras
310a2(rgyud): bu'i tshal//khang bzangs yid du 'ong ba rnams//thams cad kyang ni sprul par byed//'on kyang 'di ni mdo tsam ste//'dir ni de la bshad mi bya//rdo rje lcags
310a3(rgyud): kya grub na ni//tshig tu brjod pa thams cad grub//las kyi dam pa 'di nyid kyis//thams cad kyang ni 'grub par bshad//dam tshig tshul bzhin mthong
310a4(rgyud): nos ni//dam tshig dag lnga mkhas pa yis//sangs rgyas rig sngags rdo rje 'dzin//bla ma tshul bzhin mchod par bya//bsgrims te mchod pa byas na ni//lha
310a5(rgyud): bshos dag kyang tshul bzhin dbul//de nus 'dod pa kun sbyin pa//rdo rje lcags kyu rig sngags gdon//lha bshos de yi cho ga dang //me tog bdug
310a6(rgyud): pas mchod byas nas//sgrub pa bos ni ci nus kyis//dus gsum bzlas brjod byas ni ni//nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas kyang //gdon gyi lus rnams
310a7(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur//des na gdon ni stong phrag rnams//dga' mgur yang ni gzhig par nus//yang na g.yul ngori mi bzad 'dzag/gdon dag gi ni dkyil
310b1(rgyud): du//myur du gdon no 'bebs pa dang //de bzhon gzhog dang busad pa dang //btsongs dang bajog dang gzir ba dang //kucoM 'don du 'jug sang rlung /
310b2(rgyud): grong khyer dang ni gnas rnams dang //skyes pa'i mni hUM nga//rnye sngags nges pa zla shAd pa 'dis//thams cad kyang ni byung bar 'gyur//babs pa de /
310b3(rgyud): thams cad kyang //po bde dag kyang len du gzhug/de bzhin gar gyi cho ga rnams//yid 'di ma mtshan byed du gzhug/dgug dang rmi lo mchog dang //de bzhin
310b4(rgyud): lcags stsog+sa gzhom pa dang //rgyu la nga'i blo byed dag na ni//rtsod pa dag la sa lhag par d+ha li//gzugs dang ste po chen ldan pa y-i//rlig sngags rdo rje lcags
310b5(rgyud): klung gi snying 'tshul bzhin to//de yi don kun 'grug par 'byung//sgrib pa ma yang na bung re da ma//klu 'am skye med dka' ba med//der ni kun tu
310b6(rgyud): ladon rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//rgyal po dang ni blon pa dang //blon pa chen po mngon ni 'dren//zhag bdun yangan lnga yi bar//brgya rtse brgyad
310b7(rgyud): bzlas dbang du 'gyur//gang zhig 'chi bar bya 'dod na//de las gzugs de der bris la//mig pas mnan la bzlas bid+hi bye//gdon drang klu mi gadzin
311a1(rgyud): yang rung //'byung po 'byung po'i gdon dang ni//khur ni rdo rje gzir byas na//zhag bdun gyis ni brlag par 'gyur//byin mo dang ni mr-i rnam
311a2(rgyud): kyang //zhag sum gyis ni brlag par 'gyur//dbang du bya bar 'dod na ni//der yang nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas//brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod byas na ni/
311a3(rgyud): bu dang bu mo chung ma dang //khyim thab dang ni nor 'jog dang //khyim dang gzhan pa glang chen rta//ma he dang ni grong yang rung //zhag bdun gyis nai myur bar 'thob/
311a4(rgyud): gzhan b+h+yas rig sngags rog kun dang /gdun rnams kyang ni brlag par 'gyur//khye'u dag dang ni bu mo rnams//nad kyis kyang ni ma rung 'gyur//ro bsregasol
311a5(rgyud): ba'i ri mo yis//dgra yi gzugs ni der bris la//de yi steng du 'dug nas ni//gong du gzhom par 'dod pa der//gzir bar byas te zhag bdun du//bzlas
311a6(rgyud): brjod dang ni sbyin bsreg bya//de ltar byas ni gzir bar 'gyur//ci ste bu mo thob 'dod na//nges ni zhag bdun bya bar bstan//zhag bdun 'bum du bzlas na ni//
311a7(rgyud): bu mo'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur//rig sngags 'chang ba bdag nyid kyis//khros nas bzlas brjod byas na ni//grong khyer dag ni 'bar ba dang //gser du
311b1(rgyud): de bzhin 'jig pa dang //gdan dag gis ni 'debs par 'gyur//gang las rgyal 'dod dmag gi nang//'dug nas kyang ni bzlas brjod bya//grong khyer dbus 'dug
311b2(rgyud): bzlas na ni//nad kyi grong khyer dkrug par 'gyur//grong gi dbus 'dug bzlas na ni//grong mi nad kyis dkrugs par 'gyur//dgon par 'dug nas bzlas na ni//gdug/
311b3(rgyud): pa kun las thar par 'gyur//de nas yid ni zhi ba yis//zhi ba'i rig sngags brjod par bya//zhi phyir rig sngags brjod na ni//thams cad du ni zhi bar 'gyur//bsad
311b4(rgyud): phyir rig sngags bzlas na ni//phan tshun du yang gsod par 'gyur//'thab du gzung phyir rig sngags bzlas//'thab mo mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur//shing skam phyir ni/
311b5(rgyud): chu la bzlas//zla ba gcig gis yo ma 'byung //kun dga' ra ba yid 'ong yang //zla ba gcig gis bshig par 'gyur//ci ste nyi mA rangs par bzlas//chu dang
311b6(rgyud): zas dang drag chos dang //'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyang //de ma thag tu bsgyur bar byed//gzhan gyis gzhon dang de bzhin du//shing rta'i gzhon pa 'joms par
311b7(rgyud): byed//ci ste chu klung chen po yi//'gram du song nas bzlas brjod byas//las rnams gang dang gang 'dod dang //gang gang cho ga ji bzhin gang //de bzhin che ga
312a1(rgyud): gtar ma dang //bzlas brjod sbyin sreg gcang byas na//des na don rnams thams cad kyang //byed 'gyur de la the tshom med//rtag tu
312a2(rgyud): bden sgra bslab la dga'//dngos grub mchog chen thams cad ldan//'byung po sgrub par 'dod na ni//zhag sum sbyang byos myur gyi ngo //bcu bzhi la ni gtar
312a3(rgyud): ma sbyin//zla ba drug gam zla ba phyed//shing drung yang na dgon per gnas//gcig bu srung ba mchog byas la//slong mo yi ni zas kyang bza'//zla drug
312a4(rgyud): yang na zla ba gcig/lha 'phye gdon kyang gnas kyang rung //zla gcig phyug kyi lha su gnas//zho dang 'o mar mar yang bza'//sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod
312a5(rgyud): rten drung //zla gcig sna tshogs zas kyis mchong //zla ba gnyis ni dur khrod du//gter ma bdug pa gtsang sogs mchod//thang ngam mchod rten drung
312a6(rgyud): du bzes//de nas 'byung po brlag par 'gyur//der ni 'byung po dam pa gang //yang na theg mar gi de 'ongs dang //gang tshe dri la nye bar 'gyur//gang na
312a7(rgyud): gang zhig sems kyis 'dod//de tshe shin tu bstan nas ni//rdo rje lcags kyu rtag tu bzlas//de yi ming ni dris nas kyang //de nyid ming ni gzung bar bya//gcing/
312b1(rgyud): pus dkyil 'khor byas na ni//rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu'i tshogs//dri la sogs pas logs mchod nas//des ni 'byung po de dag dgugs/de yis ming brjod
312b2(rgyud): 'byung po rnams//dga' nas der ni 'dres par 'gyur//de nas des ni legs pas mchod//gzhan yang 'ongs nas mchod par bya//ming ni legs par brjod
312b3(rgyud): bya zhing //skrag byed ming la rten nas ni//'byung po sgrub tu grub 'gyur na//mi ni 'grub par 'gyur ba yin//de nas de la 'byung po rnams//kun nas nye bar
312b4(rgyud): 'khor bar 'gyur//rgyal po'i zham 'bring 'thun byed bzhin//las kun yang ni byed par 'gyur//de ni rgyal po'i dmigs rnams la//rgyal po chen pos byas
312b5(rgyud): pa bzhin//stobs tshon 'byung po'i sde dag la//bka' ni kun tu stsol bar byed//sa stengs kun tu rtse byed cing //'byung po'i bdag po kun gyis mchod/
312b6(rgyud): 'byung po dag ni mthul ba yis//kha zas la sogs thams cad za//grong ni gang la rgyal 'dod cing //yang na phan par 'dod kyang rung //sgrub phyir yang
312b7(rgyud): na gzhig pa'i phyir//der ni 'byung po rnams kyang gtong //des ni ming gang ma bkug pa'o//'byung po 'am 'byung po'i tshogs kyang rung //de yi lis mchog
313a1(rgyud): 'dod na ni//de yis ming yang smos par bya//ming ni smos pa de yis ni//snyams pa med pa'i 'byung po yang //bkug pa med par myur du ni//bka' ban//
313a2(rgyud): byed par 'gyur ba bstan//dri ni mi yi 'khor dag tu//sgyu 'phrul du ma byed par 'gyur//lhag par 'byung po'i 'khor dag tu spyod pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur//srogs
313a3(rgyud): tshogs mi la sogs rnams kyi//srog la dbang bar des 'gyur ro//'byor par bya ba'i phyir yang rung //yang na lus ni gzhag phyir des//ming gis bkug pa'i
313a4(rgyud): 'byung po la//dga' bzhin bgra brkyang smre bar bya//ming la sogs pa 'di dag gis//sna ni shin tu che ba dang //shin tu ring por byos shig ces//bsgo na de
313a5(rgyud): bibazhin byed par 'gyur//de bzhin rkang lag bzhin mdog bsgyur//ring ba dang ni skam pa dang //ma rung bar ni byos shig ces//bsgo na de tshe de bzhin byed//
313a6(rgyud): bzhin rnam pa mang po dang //shin tu 'jigs pa sna tshogs rnams//de bzhin bzhi byed sna tshogs kyis//'byung po sgrub pa rtse bar 'gyur//mi 'dod na yang
313a7(rgyud): mi rnams dang //'byung po mang pos mthong mi 'gyur//rig sngags 'chad chen bzhin du 'gyur//gang zhig rig sngags rtog tu bzlos//lha la yang ni phyag
313b1(rgyud): 'tshal zhing //rtag tu 'byung ba rnams la yang //kha zas ci 'dod sbyin byeng por//de ni lhag par bad 'gyur zhing //tshe yang lhag par bskul par thub//'byung
313b2(rgyud): mang po'i rgyal po'i mchog/gtso bor yang ni 'gyur ba dang //lha yi rgyal po 'dra ba yang //rkyen du bab par bshad pa yin//rdo rje lcags kyu ma yi sgrub pa
313b3(rgyud): rdzogs so//rdo rje lcags kyu'i rigs la ni//rig sdigs don kun grub byed pa// mo mchog 'gror grags pa 'di//sems can rnams kyis bstan/
313b4(rgyud): par bshad//zla ba drug gis 'grub 'gyur te//tshig gis don kun byed par bstan//rtsi sman thams cad blangs nas ni//srang gcig nges par bzhag par bya//
313b5(rgyud): na mo rat+na \u0f7fmA ste/na maM badz+ra pI Ni s+yai/ba ti ba ra ti/ku shwe sam+p+ra no man /e ta ra tAM/ba tAM/ye so tsa b+hU tA/at+taMH/rU pa tI ai s+thi ma swA hA/
313b6(rgyud): gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten drung //dus gsum bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bya//gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod pa yis//lha bshos me tog bdug pa dang /
313b7(rgyud): de bzhin mtshan me mar mi dang //mchod po ci nus ci dga' bya//mtsha mos gcad phyogs ba cing srung ba rnams//rtag tu
314a1(rgyud): lcags kyus bya//de ltar rtag tu brtson pa la//de ni zla ba drug gis 'grub//de nas 'dod chags la sogs dang //sman chen
314a2(rgyud): mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur//nad dang sman kun ston paM dang //gtam brgyud thams cad smra bar 'gyur//sgrub pa po la legs nyes rnams//tshig
314a3(rgyud): gis ston cing smra bar byed//gsang sngags de'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ras ma nyams pa la tshon rtsi sbyin med pas bcom ldan 'das dang lag na rdo rje'i
314a4(rgyud): sku gzugs bris te/lha mo yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dud par byas nas/yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te/za su 'o ma dang phye'i 'di
314a5(rgyud): gu za zhing dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan re re bzlas brjod byas pas lag na rdo rje la bsnun par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das dang lag na
314a6(rgyud): rdo rje la mchod pa yang rtag tu byas te/mjug tu zhag gsum sbyang bar byas nas/zla ba nye'i nub mo brgyad stong gis snun la ci 'byor pas
314a7(rgyud): mchod na 'grub par 'gyur te/don thams cad ston par byed do//gzhan yang tshes bcu gnyis nas brtsamra to/nyi'i bar ro du gtsang zhing nges pa dang
314b1(rgyud): ldan par byas te/rus la bcom ldan 'das dang /gAnA rdo rje dang /sku myo dang /sgrub pa pa rnams dge bstan la 'dir bajug ste/sku gdung dang ldan pa
314b2(rgyud): mched rnon gyi drung du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sbyar mchod pa byas nes sde mya'i m-i ti blo brgyad ba rgya la la ni brgyad brgya stegs kyis btab nas phung po ldir bcad de/den
314b3(rgyud): las cha gcig bcom ldan 'das la dbul por bya'o//lhag mo rnams ni phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba de dag las khwa gcig
314b4(rgyud): blangs te ras dkar po'i nang du phur nas snga su bcug ste nyal bar bya'o//'o ma dang phye'i 'dag gu dang zas dkar po za zhing me tog dkar po dang /dri dkar po phul na zla
314b5(rgyud): be nya la 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas gang gi nyin par yang rung ste/cho ga de bzhin du sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgyas lan rgyud brgya ba zlas snod byas te/mchod pa byas la/lhag
314b6(rgyud): ma yang de bzhin du gtor nas nyal na rmi lam du ston par byed do//cho ga gsum pa nI maM long lnga bsgrub bur bya'o//mchog 'gro ma'i rig sngags kyi cho ga rdzogs
314b7(rgyud): na mo rat+na tA ya s+yai/na ma sh+tsaN+Da/badz+ra pra Ni s+yai/ma hA li k+She sanA pa ti s+yai/e ts+yai hi badz+ra dAr+t+ti/i daM bA ha na/ma nu smA re shrI g+h+raM ma ne tsa ba la li ta ga te/ma hA/
315a1(rgyud): yak+ShA saM nA pa ti badz+ra pA NI/hi hi ti hi h+ye hI/he hi/hwe ku ru he ku ru/ku ku ku ku/ku badz+nyA pA N+De/sa ra sa ra/bI ri b+hA raM/
315a2(rgyud): he hi ha hi hI hI/ku ku b+hA kri ku b+h+rUM/badz+ra pA N+yai swA hA//'di ni snying po spyan drang pa'o//de la 'di ni lAgA nI rdo rje'i snying po yin no//sad+d+ha tra a pa ra dzI tAM/sa
315a3(rgyud): tra a pra ti ha taM/sarba traM ur+tha sA d+ha nana?/au dza ste dzo grA mA NAM/sa rU pa mu pa daR+sha naM/ki li ke li/mo ku la shab+hA ru taM badz+re tu ta ka ra kr-i t+yu ka
315a4(rgyud): ran ra Ne dza naM/ad b+hU na sid+d+haM pa re maM sid+d+hi/ba tsa laM !/pi traM/ba kaM saM ka ra ka ra ti kai shAM tI ka raM/buSh+Ti ka raM/sA bA naM ba dr-i dairAM/tsa ra da
315a5(rgyud): sar+b+ba kar+m+ma ar+tha sA d+ha kaM A kiR+Sha NaM/badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/bo la lA pa naM/badz+ra pA NI s+ya/ha sa pa naM/badz+ra pa Ni s+ye/pa ra ma hr-i da ya/i daM badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/badz+ra
315a6(rgyud): pA Ni ra ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti rA dzA pa ya ti badz+re Na/ha na tiM/da ha ti/pa tsa ti ts+tshin+na ti/ts+tshin+da ti/bi dra ba ya ti/A lo ka bi lo kaM ka ro tI/hi li ni/li mi l-i/au
315a7(rgyud): u ho u b+hA badz+rI prA NI/d+ha ru d+hu ru/saM bi badz+dzi b+hAny+dza ye duSh+TAn/he na \u0f7fnAM/da ha da t+ta/\u0f7fpaH/dz+r-ih+na gr-ih+na/dr-i ts+yai ka ra he ha la ha lA ya swA hA/
315b1(rgyud): tsu lu hu lA ya/swAt+mA//d+hA l-i hi lI yo s+yA rtA//ka la ku lA ya swAhA//ku lu ku lA yo sA hA//kA l-i k+Shi la yaM swA hA//ki li ki lA ya sUH//dA ya mA nA sma ra bAdz+dza/
315b2(rgyud): bA Nau/ma hA yany+dza sAM nA pa ti sa ma ye br-i tAM brAh+Na s+yA ti hu tI d+hU pa pA shwe grAn+d+ha ma s+yai ne ra sA me tu trA su mu yaM bya tI kra maM mA da ma/sa ma yau br-i shud+d+he/ti yI hi raM ni i laM/
315b3(rgyud): ku ru kun+du pA de shak+taM smin+ne me ha ra ba rA hi ri li/ni li badz+ra pAN+Di/ti li ti listAM/ba shI ma nu bar+t+ta hr-i ri Ni/ni ri Ni sa maM yA nu brta hi ri mi ri i b+h+r-i hA ya ni/satwAM dz+dza
315b4(rgyud): pA Ni ma ma he/sAM ya mu pa tiSh+Tha swA hUM//'di ni de'i bdug pa'i sngag so//lai he li hi bi li tu u b+h+yo/u b+hA/hu ru hu/b+hAn+ta b+hUny+dza ba sh+ye me ka ra hAM di snehA/
315b5(rgyud): lcag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal bcas/rtse mo can zhes bya ba yi//snying po 'di ni 'jig rten grags//de ni 'dod dgur sgrub pa yi//gang zhig dngami grub mchog 'dod cing /
315b6(rgyud): 'di spyi sgrub ba'i don shes pa//des ni rdo rje sgrub+hA pa'i mchog/ya mchen 'di ni bslab par bya//de nas rim pa ji bzhid du//bdag gis legs par bshad parabya/
315b7(rgyud): dam pa'i don gyi rjes 'thun pa//thub le spyi bos phyag 'tshal ba//gser ro ma ra gan zangs la sogs//yang ne ts+tshin dmar po las//rdo rje rtse mo brgyad pa'i//
316a1(rgyud): yang na rtse mo bzhi par bya//saur gsum yang na drug gam brgyad//yang na sor ni bcu gnyis pa//zur brgyad shin tu rdzogs pa 'am//
316a2(rgyud): yang na zur ni drug du bya//de nas dgon pa 'am rang gi khyim//gtsang zhing mnyam pa'i sa phyogasu//ba lang lci bas dkyil 'khor byug/sku gdung mchog dga'
316a3(rgyud): gtsang ma yis//de yi steng du dri zhim pa'i//spos kyi dkyil 'khor byug par bya//yungs kar phul thag bzhi rnams kyang //dbus dag du ni bzhag par bya//
316a4(rgyud): de yi steng du rdo rje de//dri dang me tog phreng bas rgyun//rtag tu yang ni dus gsum du//mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bya//tsam pa ka dang tsam pa kA'i//
316a5(rgyud): me tog sna mo'i me tog rnams//yod du 'ong bos sangs rgyas dang //rdo rje 'dzin pa nges par mchod//du rus sko dang a ga ru//bdug pa'i mchog
316a6(rgyud): ni rtag tu sreg/sku gzug cho ga bzhin bris la//cho ga 'di ni bya ba ste//sangs rgyas gser gyi kha dge 'dra//sangs rgyas zad na gnas pa yi//
316a7(rgyud): lag ni rdo rje gdon phyogs bri//rgyal po bzhin du brgyan bya zhing //ha cing dmar bar mi bya ste//sku gzugs nub phyog log su bstan//shes rab can gyis
316b1(rgyud): cho ga 'di//bya ste de ni rim bzhin bshod//dang po yang ni chos gtsog brtsams//nges par gnas shing gtsang ba yis//khrus ni ba lang lci ba dang //ba gcin
316b2(rgyud): bcags pas dus gsum bya//mdun du rtag tu gos phrugs ni//bdug pas rab tu bdugs pa bgo/tsam pa ka dang tsam ka yi//me tog rnams kyis rtag tu
316b3(rgyud): mchod//sna tshogs dr-i dang me tog phreng //mdzes shing yid du 'ongs pas mchod//lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod bya//du rus ka dang a ga ruM//
316b4(rgyud): sreg cing mar mi gnyis kyang dbul//rtag tu 'chi bar mi bya ste//de bzhin mar gyi mer me gzhan//nyin gcig bzhin du bsgred par bya//de tshe'o ma'i 'deg pa
316b5(rgyud): rnams//za zhing mnyam par gzhag pa dang //gso sbyong yon lag brgyad ldan pas//tshes ni bcu gnyis bar du yang //rtag tu ku shi'i mal stan 'dug
316b6(rgyud): dI nas zhag gsum sbyang byas nas//zla ba nye mchog bzhin//dpe med pa yi mchod pa bya//der ni chen rtsi sna gsum gyis//grong khyer dag kyang byi bar bya//gru
316b7(rgyud): ngani rnam pa sgo bro ci zhor ldan//phyogs cha legs par bcad bya zhing //mnyam byas de yi nang dag tu//lha shos dkar po dpe ming dbul//phyi rol du yang smra
317a1(rgyud): tshogs pa//ci 'dod thams cad bzhag par bya//de nas ku sha'i stan 'dug cing //srus byas cho ga shes pa dris//rdo rje 'bar bar gyur gyi
317a2(rgyud): bar//a ga ru dang du ru ka/sreg cing dga' bzhin bzlas brjod bya//nyi ma las lhag de yaM gzi//rdo rje de ni phigaso par blangs//cis kyang mi 'jigs mkha' la
317a3(rgyud): 'gro/rig sngags grub pa'i stobs dang ldan//rig sngags bdag po thams cad dang //lag na rdo rje reg skyes pa'i//rig sngags tshogs ni kun gyi mchog/
317a4(rgyud): don mang dag le brten bye zhing //rnam bye mang du ci zhig smos//lcag na rdo rje mnyam 'gyur te//'di la the tsam ci yang med//de nas dga' ba ma yin pa'i
317a5(rgyud): las de dag kyang 'dir bya ste//de dag gi ni mdor bstan pa//snying po bsdus pa bshad par bya//gang zhig mi yI gtso bo 'am//blon po dbang du bya 'dod des//
317a6(rgyud): de yi sgrub pa gang yin pa//'di yang rab tu bshad par bya//zhag bdun gtsang mar byas nas ni//nas kyi zas ni dus su bza'//de nas seng lding me bsangs
317a7(rgyud): la//yam sreg shing dang sbrang rtsi zho//mar blangs brgyad brgya tshang bar ni//dus gsum du yang sbyin bsreg bya//dus kyi lhag ma rtag tu bzlas//lan gsu
317b1(rgyud): khrus byas nges par gnas//dbang du bya 'dod gang yin pa//de dang yang ni phrad par bya//de yi ming ni smos pas kyang //de ni bran bzhin dbang du 'gyur//
317b2(rgyud): me ni gong zhig bran mor 'dod//des ni nor gyi tshad bsams la//de yi sgrub mchog 'di bya zhing //lan gsum khrus bya bil ba yi//bdug pa mar dang ldan pa sreg
317b3(rgyud): de nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun//der ni ba lang lci ba'i mer//sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i//sbyin sreg mnyam par gzhag pas bya//yang na be li ba'i sbyin
317b4(rgyud): sreg ni//mar dang yungs kar ldan pa 'am//yungs kar ma rare dang ldan pa'ang rung //yang na ma ldan bal ba 'am//mAr dang yungs dkar ldan pa yi//
317b5(rgyud): sbrang rtsi bzang po bi laM bar ldan//yang na re re spyi ni sreg mchog/seng ldeng yam sreg shing bzang gis//dus gsum du ni rnam gsum byas//phye drang ba gcin
317b6(rgyud): 'di gu dang //phye dang 'o me'i 'de gu 'ang rung //dus gsum bza' zhing yang na ni//mi smra mi bza' rig sngags bzlas//yang na sbyin sreg yid kyis bya//
317b7(rgyud): gtsang zhing brtson por gnas pa des//nor ni yid la gang 'dod pa//zhag bdun gyis ni thob par 'gyur//zla phyid yang na bzla ba gcig/yang na zabo phyed
318a1(rgyud): /gsus gyis//rnam+b+ha pa kurbA m+b+hi thabs rnams kyi//'dod pa thams cangs lus sbyin//mdun gdon gyi spyanams da//sbyi
318a2(rgyud): srog bzlas brjod brtson pa dang //gtsang zhing dam tshig mkhas pA y-is/tham+b+ha sI cang rab tu 'grub par 'gyur//rtsed mo can gyi snying pa rdzogas+ho/
318a3(rgyud): de nas gtum po'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya'o//nu maHtsi li tsI ri NI.i li ku ru had ti prA sid+d+ha b+ha ga to smi ku ru me ha ba raM ki lI bi li/hi ri Ni su
318a4(rgyud): ru ku ru/swa ma ya ma nu brta hri da ya na s+yA hU~M//snying po dran par byed pa'i tshig 'di dag gang du brjod pa der da gi' bar gyur nasa? las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro//
318a5(rgyud): na miHkI li kI lA ya swA hA//ma hA kI li kI la ya s+t+waM hA//kro d+hi kI li kI la ya swA hA//tsaN+De kI li kI la ya swA hA/de ba ti kI li kI la ya sA hU~M//badz+ri kI li kI
318a6(rgyud): la ya swA hUM/badz+ra d+hA d+h+r-i ye swA hA//badz+ra mo ten+d+rA ya s+t+waM hUM/bad+d+ha sta~M b+hA ya swAhA//badz+ra pra baM d+hA nA ya swA hA//I hi sti badz+ra/e hi su sti badz+raM/e hU~M pra ti re
318a7(rgyud): badz+ra//ai hi a pra tai ta h+Na dz+nyAM/e hi a mo g+hu dz+dzi/ai hi shaM b+h+r-in la po dz+dza/ma hA yak+ShaM sinA daM tAM/badz+ra pA Ni/mr-in mu naM mu ne/ri ma te/ma hA ma ti/
318b1(rgyud): su ma ti/o hI pa nI ti li/o haM di li bi ra tA ma ti to ni ra ti ti/ku la ti li/shi li/tsa ra di mau tAM ku tsid tha mar ti/su pu ru pu ru/khu khu ti/khu khu to khu da li ti li ti ri/
318b2(rgyud): oM hi sh+tsi g+h+raM badz+ra prA NI/mA hA yak+Sha swe nA pA tI/i daM gran+d+ha mA l+le/a nu le pa na maHpra tIr+m+ma ku tI ku ti ku ti swA hA//ku de bai ra~M bi ri ti swAhA/bri tI mr-i ku ti lA smA hA/
318b3(rgyud): a rA li sai ra shi li/tsi ri li sa ri lI gi ri ni/barma li hr-i ni sI lI ti/pur+N+Na kur+N+Na/sharba durba tu kUd+ha/mud+d+ha/nArba bArba pra wa ra mA ha hA/e hi e hai/shI g+h+r-i badz+ra pA Ni/
318b4(rgyud): h+ye hwe hI hAM he/tu ru tu ru/la hUM la hUM swA hA//sma rA hA na mi ti ri ti/di rI rI tI li pu swA hA//ku khu lu tu ku ka ti lu ti li ri swA hA//e hi tI ma hA yak+Sha se nI pe ti hi ri/
318b5(rgyud): ti li bi ti/ri li gi ni/ni ra dzi n+yu be rI dza yan+du ri kIn+ta rang+ga tsu ru tsu ru/tsi ri ti swAhA//nar+tha sharba bA ba ku ku lu/khu khu ti ru ta ru/smi ri tam/pre ti dzI ya swA hA//
318b6(rgyud): lug na rdo rje gtum rab gtum//nga yi snying po gnyis pa ni gtum zhing rab gtum las yin te/ming yang gtum po zhes par grags//gtum po rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/
318b7(rgyud): snying po gtum po 'di dag ni//nyes pa zhes ni bya ba bstan//las rnams la ni zla phyed de//dam pa rnams kyi las kun mchog/gdon la sogs pa'i sems can dang //
319a1(rgyud): 'gugs pa'i mchog la sogs pa dang //srung ba la sogs dpe med pa//'di yi lus ni stong rnams dang //cho ga chen po brgyad rnams
319a2(rgyud): kyang //lha gnas mthong bar nges par ni//bzlas brjod sbyin sreg rnams kyis bya//la la gang zhig rdo rje 'dzin//mngon sum mthong bar 'dod na ni//nga yi
319a3(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs 'di dag/spyan 'dren mchog 'di de yis bya//dus gsum pa lang lci bas bskus//las kyang dag cing sems dag dang //rdo rje 'dzin
319a4(rgyud): la gus pa dang //rkang lag lo sogs bkrus nas kyang //dgon pa 'am rang gi khyim yang rung //gtsang ma'i phyogasu mchod rten nam//sku gzugs
319a5(rgyud): yang na sku gdung gi/mdun du rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/mi ni gtsang sbrar spyod po yis//bdug pa me tog la sogs pa//mchog dang khyad par
319a6(rgyud): 'phags pa yI//dus gsum rtag tu mchod par bya//de la rab spro de la gos//srog kyang de la bstan byas nas//lag na rdo rje gzugs kyang rung //ji
319a7(rgyud): skad bstan bzhin ri mor bri//dri dang phreng ba byug pa yis//rtag tu de la mchod par bya//mar dang ldan pas dus su bza'//sbrang rtsi'o thug bza' bar bya//ri mo'i//
319b1(rgyud): sku gzugs nub phyogs bstan//rtag tu shar phyogs kha blta 'dug/mar gyi mar me mi 'chi bas//nyin par mchod pa legs par bya//cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed dam/
319b2(rgyud): yar gyi ngo yi tshos brgyad la//brtsams te brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya//yang na nyin re dus gsum du//lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod bya//thang chu yang ni bsreg
319b3(rgyud): par bya//dang zhing rtse gcig sems kyis ni//srung ba'i mchog byas bzlas brjod bya//zla ba phyed ni lon nas kyang //des ni zhag gsum bsnyung ba byas/mchod
319b4(rgyud): pa l-i sogs kun rgyas shing //shin tu mang por byas nas kyang //'dod pa yid la bzhag bye zhing //de nas gus pa mchog gi su//oM ni tshig stong bzlas
319b5(rgyud): brjod bya//de nas rdo rje can yang mthong //de la mchod sbyin btso bo de//dam pa'i mchog ni sbyin par byed//sgrub pa'i cho gas spyan drangs nas//mchod sbyin
319b6(rgyud): mchog la ci 'dod smos//tshig gis gang dang gang brjod pa'i//sgrub pa'i dam pa thob par 'gyur//de yi slar gtang cho ga de//rnam pa thams cad bshad par
319b7(rgyud): bya//des ni phyag dang mchod pa dang //mchod yon me tog la sogs dbul//'dod pa'i rig sngags lan gcig brjod//de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa 'gro//na maH
320a1(rgyud): ho l-i hu wAn//l-I hu la a ha ha ha hoha//sa pra to gar+b+ha tu b+ha ga b+h+yo bAdz+nyA pAN+Ti rad+ha su kho tsu lu tsu lu s+thAn+tu//'di na gcig gam gsum
320a2(rgyud): du brjod//lnga 'am bdun na ma nyi shu gcig/brgya'am yang na brgyang brgya'am//la ni snying tshi ga bzhin du //'byung ba'i gnas sam+ba gzhan dag
320a3(rgyud): tu//rdo rje dang ni lha yi mdun//dri kun gyi ni sbyor ba dang //bcing dang grol la bzlas brjod bya//dgug dang slar btang thams cad dang //bcing dang grol ba
320a4(rgyud): thams cad la//de ni len cig brjod pa ste//sanA rdo rje 'dzin pa 'gro/'di ni rnang me ston pa yin//sgrub dang sgrar btang ba yang yin//'di gnyis
320a5(rgyud): pa ni khyad par du//dbye bar bya ba mang po yod//gang gis rtag tu gtsang byas la//lo gcig bar du dus ga sum du//bzlas brjod rnam pa gsum byas
320a6(rgyud): na//de yis bde bar 'dod po 'thob//gang zhig zla drug sgrib byed cing //bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gci ga b+h+rid//leg ste byas dri ni mkha' li rgyu//'grong
320a7(rgyud): rang phyug sa nyid du 'gyur//gang zhig zu gsum bas byed//yang na yid kyis sbyin srog las//byes na chag 'do dag gis//de da yang
320b1(rgyud): par 'gyur//zla ba phyed gsum za gcig zos//des ni dngos grub tha ma 'am//'bring dang khyad par 'phags pa thob//khyim gyi don rnams grub byed cing //
320b2(rgyud): nad rnams kyang ni sel bar byed//don rnams ji skad bshad pa bzhin//de dag thams cad rab tu 'grub//zla ba gcig tu bzlas brjod byed//'o thug sbrang rtsi mar
320b3(rgyud): bcas bza'//dus gsum brgyad brgya bzlas pas ni//gsum brjod mkha' lnga 'gro bar 'gyur//legs par ma byas den la sogs//don rnams thams cad
320b4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur//bcing dang dgrol ba thams cad dam//sgrub pa 'am gzhig pa bcad par byed//zla phyed nas kyi kha zas zlos//gdon gyi las rnams
320b5(rgyud): byed par nus//ba gcin nas kyi kha zas zos//don rnams thams cad 'grub par nus//zhag bdun du ni dusde gsum du//de bzhin brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas//
320b6(rgyud): dbang du bya dang bcings la sogs//gsang bar yang ni nus par 'gyur//gang zhig zhag lngar zas mi za//nyin cig bzhin du bzlas brjod byed//des na mo rnams
320b7(rgyud): gzhig pa 'am//dgrol dang dbang du bya bar nus//zhag gsum bar du dus gsum du//gang zhig sbyin sreg rnam gsum byed//lhag ma'i dus su khros nas
321a1(rgyud): bzlas//des ni gzhan yang gzhig par nus//drug pA yi ni las byed na//zhag gcig sbyang byas dur khrod du//khrag gi sbyin
321a2(rgyud): sreg byas na ni//des ni gdon dang mi rnams gzhag/de dag bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir//dang por zhag gsum sbyangabyas nas//mar gyi ngo ni bcu bzhi
321a3(rgyud): la//sum brgya lnga bcu gtsang mas bzlas//sngar bstan 'di dag byas na nI//de nas nges par gnyis ka sa kyang //tshig gis gang dang gang smras
321a4(rgyud): pa//bas pa'i las ni byed par 'gyur//de ltar rtsed mi ldan pa yi//dkyil 'khor snying po mchog kyang bshad//'gro lding snying po gsum pa yang //cho gra
321a5(rgyud): ngag dang bcas par ni//las kyi dam pa thams cad dang //de bzhin 'bying dang tha ma la//rdo rje rdzogs par khru gang sring//rtse gsum yongasu dag pa'i
321a6(rgyud): mchog/yang na rtse drug dam pa ni//de kun gyis ni bri bar bya//gus mchod rdo rje rig sngags kyis//rdo rje de ni spyan yang drang //me tog dam pi mu nyams
321a7(rgyud): bya//lag pa g.yon thogs legs par mchod//lag ni bdug thogs pus me btsugs des ni rig sngags 'di yod bzlas//na mo re ri gr-I br-I//tsir
321b1(rgyud): br-i nau/tra pa ru Ni/badz+rA ma ya/tu pi ta ye badz+ra pa ni ma hA bA hA yA swA hA//bris pa de ni lag g.yon thogs//mchod gnas kyang ni mchod par bya//bya ba
321b2(rgyud): zin nas slar btang phyir//mchod gnas slar ni btang bar bya//gtum po dang rtse mo can gyi sgrub pa rdzogs so////'gro lding gi snying po bshad
321b3(rgyud): bar bya ste/gleng bzhi ni mnyan du yod pa'o//de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste//bla bos phrag pa gcig
321b4(rgyud): tu gzir nas dul ba mchog gis gnas shing bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin sngar 'dug ste/dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug nas mgo bo btud cing thal mo
321b5(rgyud): rab tu sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang //skye bo mang po la bde ba'i
321b6(rgyud): slad du bdag nyid kyi snying po 'jig rten dag la bshad lag so//bdag gri snying po ni 'di lags te bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag nyid kyi snying po 'dis bdag
321b7(rgyud): bkug na de'i bad du bdag myur du mchi bar 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das ci ste bdag nyid kyi snying po 'dis bdag bkug pa la ma mchis na 'jig rten pa la dgra
322a1(rgyud): bcom pa gsod pa 'am/dge 'dun gyi dbyen pa pyod pa gang lags pa de dag go skyo gan su mchi bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de ng+ga/
322a2(rgyud): na zhag gcig smyung bar bgyis pas bdag bkug na de las bcom ldan 'das kyi slar btang bar gsol/de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das yid tsam
322a3(rgyud): 'dzum pa mdzad de//lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lag na rdo rje legaso legs so//khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la khas blangs pas//
322a4(rgyud): khyod la nga mnyes kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod song la dad pa dang ldan pa yi chad par ma byed cig/de lta mod kyi nga yang khyod kyi snying po nyan par
322a5(rgyud): ni 'dod do//de skad ces bka'o stsal nas//gnod sbyin gyi sngo'i bdag po chen po lag ni rdo rjes gdong cung zad tsam phab nas 'dzem bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la
322a6(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag lA gA sren du gsol//tad+ya thA/e hi sti ra badz+ra/e hrI su staM ra badz+ra/e hi ma t+ye badz+ra/
322a7(rgyud): a pra ti ha ta badz+ra/e hi i ma ka badz+ra/e hi shI gaM nI la be ga badz+ra/be ga badz+ra/ma hA badz+ra/badz+ra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti mu ne mu nai//a nai ri
322b1(rgyud): /a nA~M rIm tam+b+hat+mA m+b+ha two s+yAm+b+ha t+to/ad+hin+thik+Sha~M/d+hur ti mad l-i r-i to//dzo ra t+to kul ta shaM lo sh+lo ba li tom to bu tshod ta ma ra t+to ts+tshad+d+hamAr+yA t+na/du ru rma
322b2(rgyud): Shur+g+ha ti wu'u ti shwe/bar+d+ha d+hAd+d+hi m+me daM b+h+r-iHprA m+ba nr-i bA nad/prAd+d+hi/uHy+m+R+YuM At+ma ud+g+hal+li smA tAM// ro ti sAH/rtse te
322b3(rgyud): ti hai ti swA hA//na maM badz+ra pA NaM s+yai/oM paM li mA l-i zi l+r-i nabA ra ma la na na ma/lI pi rba mo ti pu rni garba shar+thA nAt+ta/tur+tha u
322b4(rgyud): pud+d+hAnad+g+ha ts+tshar+b+ba shur+d+ha ma ma dz+ra mA re l-i swA hA//e h+ye shI g+h+raM badz+ra pA Ni he he he hi/tu ri hU~M ra la hUM la hUM swAt+ma//s+pha ra tan+ti~M ke ran+ta/tidz+nyAM taM ma~M ti rit+na mi
322b5(rgyud): mi di ti tI li/ri ri re/khu khu lu khu khu tI lA hu~M nai ri ti i hi tA naM//ma hA suk+Sha se nA pa ti li r-i li ri li r+ra/bo sau rI ri ki ri ti s+thi ra ma hA s+phA ri u dzu ri/
322b6(rgyud): ge tsu ru tsu ru ti swA hA//tar+b+ha b+hAr+tha mar+tha khu khu la khu ti li/tu ru tu ru s+pha ra tAM pra tI dz+nye swA hA//'gro lding zhes bya'i snying po 'di//'jig rten gsum grags 'jig
322b7(rgyud): rten gyi//rab kyi mchog gi gtso ba ste/lag na rdo rje gsum pa yin//'jig rten gsum mchog deHbos kyang //'di las 'gal bar byed mi nus//'jig
323a1(rgyud): rten gsum mchog 'jig rten gsum dbang //tshangs pa la sogs snying po bar//de yi sgrub pa nyid do//de m+bi lus rnams rgyas
323a2(rgyud): bu yang //rtsed mo can dang gsum po bzhin//'di yang de ltar bya bar bya//sgrub pa'i mdo tsam bshad bya na//gtso ma'i mis ni gtsang ma'i phyogs//
323a3(rgyud): rI dang phreng ba byugs pa rnams//mchod dang khyad par 'phags pa yis//mchod rten yang na sku gzugs rnams//sku gdung ldan pa mchod par bya//rdo rje
323a4(rgyud): bris pa leg sA mchod nas//ri ma'i sku gzugs nub phyogs bstan//yar gyi ches brgyad brtsams byas la//sbrang rtsi'o thug marare dang bcas/
323a5(rgyud): dus gsum za zhing rig sngags bzlas//chang chu bzang po bsreg par bya//lci ba sogs pa legs pararo bkru/dgu pas shar phyogs bltas te 'dug/
323a6(rgyud): shin tu mnyam bzhag dus gsum du//lhun grangs brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya//de nas yid du 'ong ba yi//mchod pa las bzhin mjug tu bya/
323a7(rgyud): zla ba phyed ni 'das nas kyang //nye yi nub mo sbyin yang drong //l+le yi gnas ni mthong ba des//cho ga mchog gis bsrung bar bya//brgya rtsa brgyad
323b1(rgyud): ni brjod byas na//de nas rdo rje can yang mthong //de nas gzhan yang stong gi phyeng //ci ste gus byas 'dun pas mchod//rdo rje 'dzin chen mngon sum du//mthong 'gyur de la the tsom
323b2(rgyud): med//mchod sbyin mchog gi gtso bo des//de la dam pa sbyin par 'gyur//yang na 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid//'dod pa gzhan lta ci zhig smos//ji skad bshad pa'i che ga dang //
323b3(rgyud): ji skad bshad pa'i slar btang dang //ji skad bshad pa'i las rnams kyang //mjug tu lo gas par bya ba yin//'gro lding gi cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogaso//
323b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo//chos la phyag 'tshal lo//dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo//gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshe lo//gleng gzhi ni
323b5(rgyud): mnyan du yod pa ni ste/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rje sau bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/spyi
323b6(rgyud): byor thal mo sbyar te dul ba mchog gi gnas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skye bo mang po la sman pa'i slad du/bdag
323b7(rgyud): nyid kyi snying po 'jig rten dag la bshad legs te/bdag gi snying po ni 'di lagaso//gang gis snying po 'dis bdag bkug na de yi thad du bdag myur du mchi bar 'tsholo//
324a1(rgyud): ci ste bdag snying po 'dis bkug pa las ma mchis na 'jig rten la la mtsham ma ma ba bgyid cing dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa gang lags pa
324a2(rgyud): de dag gi skye gan su mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de bas na zhag gcig sbyang bar bgyis pas bdag bkug ni de la sna bcom ldan 'das kyis
324a3(rgyud): slar pa ta du gsol//lag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsol nas//bcom ldan pa 'das kyis yid tsam 'dzum pa mdzad de 'di skad ces bka' sprul to//
324a4(rgyud): leg na rdo rje legaso legaso//khyod kyis 'jig rten drag la khas blangs pas khyod la nga mnyes kyis//gnod sbyin gyi sde'i badrag po khyod song la dad pa dang
324a5(rgyud): ldan pa yi chad pa ma byed cig/de lho mod kyi ngo yang khyod kyi snying po nyan par ni 'dod do//de skad ces bka' stsal to//gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag
324a6(rgyud): ni rdo rjes gdong yid tsam phab nas 'dzem bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag gi snying po cho ga dang bac+doMs pa gesan du gsol//'di
324a7(rgyud): sgrub par 'tshal zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod par dga' bas yar gyi ngo tshis gcig la brtsams te za su 'o ma dang phye'i 'di gu 'tshal te/dus gsum du
324b1(rgyud): ba lang bi lci bsna khrus babyas la//gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nus bdug pa skyeg cing sku gdung dang ldan pa'o mchod rten nam/sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchung/
324b2(rgyud): pa rgyas par bgyis la snying po brjod par bgyi ste/gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi thog mar bdag nyid srung bar bgyi'o//na mo rat+na tr-i yaM s+yai/na mo bidz+rI pAM
324b3(rgyud): s+yA/ma hA yak+Sha se n+yAM pA ti s+yAshrI mu etA traM b+ha/badz+ra pA NaM ma tI shrI be m+b+ha nA ya/a n+yo n+ye d+d+ha oM sha nir na ma/sarba gr-i h+Na duSh+TA a pa ra te shu rak+Sha ya
324b4(rgyud): ma nash+tsa a b+ha yi kA ri hi hI badz+ra pA Ni hi hi he ha hi/hi ri ku ku bu/hi ri ku pi se ra su be ri tsi ri badz+ra pA Ni du ra dan tA nAn/da maM kaM da ma dA ma swA hA/
324b5(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas lag pa la btags na sems can thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyuraro//na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ma hA yA/
324b6(rgyud): k+Sha s+yai nA pa ti s+ye/e hi badz+ra pA Ni/ad mA ba ha na mu nu s+pha ru ma hA s+thi ru badz+dza/I hI su sti ru bradz+dza/e hi na na bI badz+dza/e hi A pra ti ha ta budz+dza/ai hI
324b7(rgyud): shI ma na tsa pa lo ga ti ma hA yak+Sha si nA pa ti/badz+ra pAN+Di haMhi hi he he hi he hi hihi hi haM haM/kutu ku tu ku tu ku tu badz+ra pA Ne e he/hi hau haM/hi hihi/
325a1(rgyud): ATA/hi hai/hI hi hi hi hi hi hi hAM/badz+ra pA NaM ku ku bu ku ku bu/ku b+hu ka? b+h+ya/ku ku b+h+ya/badz+ra pA NaM/sa ra sA ra/e bA rI/e ba ri/
325a2(rgyud): e bai re/e bai ri/ha ra ni li/a ba ha ya mi tAM/ma ma hi sa ma yi no pa tiSh+Tha swA hA//ldan+da brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i thang chu'i bdug pas
325a3(rgyud): spyan drang bar bgyi'o//nA mo rat+na tra ya s+yA/nu mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ma hA yak+Sha sa nI pAM/tI s+ya hi ri hi ri ni/badz+ra pA Ni/pra ti gr-ih+Na/A hUM tau/puSh+paM d+hA
325a4(rgyud): baM gaM d+haM mA l+ye ma/mA traM/si me yau b+ha d+hi sh+ye ti swA hA/bcom ldan 'das dmA tshig bigyi ba dang /de dag gi me tog dbul ba lags te/me tog rnams
325a5(rgyud): ci nas kyang sku gzugs kyi dbu la bab par gyen du gtor bar bgyi ste/bar du ra'i yam sreg shing brgyad brgya sbrang rtsi dang mar gyi nang du skyugs pas sbyin
325a6(rgyud): sreg bgyi 'o//na mo rat+na tA ya s+ya/na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ma hA yak+Sha se nA pA tI s+ya/mu ne mu ne mu nAM mu ne mu na mu ne/ri ma ti mratI ma tri ma tri ma
325a7(rgyud): hA ma ti su ma ti/sma ra sa mi yi badz+ra pA Ni e ran ti li sU ti pa te/puHb+hi li kau ti/tsi r-i la ti ti ko ra la hi ta/ti li si ri ba la ti/bi da phu tsit+ta/
325b1(rgyud): du rba du na//sun smyan rlan / m+b+ha sman po dun smraH/ sa na/
325b2(rgyud): / ts+tshom sa m-i n+ti b+h+rU~M/yin pa na ni/ b-i g+hur+Neb+h+rU~M sh-inas rten na zar+m+mab+h+yaHb+hUd+hAh+ma
325b3(rgyud): te//pa ri kau ri dze sa ridza//tsun tu ru/tAM s+yAhA/nashArba d+har+tha ste/tA nu tsur+YA/
325b4(rgyud): trA~M mai kA~M sa pa sU hA//badz+ra d+h+we re sa swA t+ma/baidz+re b+he sa sne hU~M//badz+ra pAN+DA ye swAt+ma//nye la ma la ni ma/oM tsu d+h+ye s+'uD+ha/su ru su nus kyi spyan ma
326a1(rgyud): b+h+yaHswA hA//bcom ldan 'das snying po 'di ni las thams cad bgyid pa lags te/don thams cad la gzhan gyis mi thub cing don mchis pa dang /
326a2(rgyud): zhi ba dang /zhi bar bgyi ba dang /dgra 'joms shing gzhan gyis mi tshugs par lags te/thang chu dang sra rtsi'i pog dang /pog dkar po dang /a ga ru'i bdug pa
326a3(rgyud): sreg cing brjod par bgyi'o//phyag 'tshal ba ni snga ma nyid de/ha ri ha ri Ni/badz+ra pA Ni/muM tsad+b+ha/hA sa na swA hA/khi ri kha ra zhes smos pa dgod par 'gyur ro//
326a4(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/nA mo hi li mu li li mu badz+ra pA Ni tsu ru tsu ru/dzal+la dzal+la sA hA/bdug pa de dag nyid shu dag drang sbyar bar bgyi'o//na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/hi li ha ri/
326a5(rgyud): badz+ra pA NaM ba ti s+yasid+d+ha b+hag te s+thi swA hA/ba dan dmar pa phyar te dbul bar bgyi'o//lag na rdo rje'i snying po 'di ni sems can thams cad laM bde ba'i phyir las
326a6(rgyud): thams cad byed pa yin//lag na rdo rje'i snying po rdzogaso////sngar bshad blon po 'bar ba gang //de dag kun gyi mchog gyur pa//'dod pa yi ni rdo rje
326a7(rgyud): ma//'bar ba de ni bshang par bya//dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//lag na rdo rje dang /'dod pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal//gleng gzhi ni mnyan//
326b1(rgyud): du yod pa'o//de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig sngags kyi blon so zhes bgyi ba de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
326b2(rgyud): sngar bdag gis bshad par 'tshal na/dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang dade na dang dede snyen ma rnams sman par 'gyur ba dang //rtsed mo dang /las thams cad bgyi do pa dang /
326b3(rgyud): las thams cad sgrub pa'i slad du bzhi stsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dod pa'i dbang phyug nga'i nyan thos dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge
326b4(rgyud): bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma 'dod chags dang ldan pa dag yod de/de drag gi bar du gcod par 'gyur gyis thong shig/de ltar 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis lan gsum gyi bar
326b5(rgyud): du bcom ldan 'das la gra sol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong dag/dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma 'dod chags dang ldan
326b6(rgyud): pa mchis pa de dag la rig sngags kyi rtsed mor 'gyur na/bdag gi de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi su gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtag tu zhab 'bring na
326b7(rgyud): 'dug cing g.yon phyogs na gnas pa gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la gzig so//de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'dral bltas nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad
327a1(rgyud): ces smras so//'dod pa'i dbang phyug skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir rig sngags de shad cig shod cig
327a2(rgyud): de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug dga' zhing mgu la yi rang sa te/rab tu dga' nas dka' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/de'i tshe rig sngags 'di bshad//sbyad ya
327a3(rgyud): the ngan i ta yo pa pa ti/sam+ba ti/b+ha ya ni/tsi li ta ni tsa/yo ta na d+harma ma bi dza ni tI pra baM tu nAM/a ti kr-i naM tam bai ma de ba nA me se na tre sarba sad+d+he tsa yo gi nI/
327a4(rgyud): ye na sa t+ye na/b+hA ga bun/shAsta lo ke a nu ta tA ra/a te na sa t+ya bA tsa ne/na i ya ma bid tsa sa mu dza sa ma y+ya bi dA/khi ne khi ni/ku DA la mu khu ki
327a5(rgyud): swA hA//ku ti dza ri ku tiM dza ye/taM bu le/suM de/kuM pe ba ste/prI se a ga ste the ga ni ni pa ka sid+d+ha karma bi nA shra ni ya ya karma ma hA sa ni/pra yuk+taM na pa/
327a6(rgyud): na yid/kri tAM ma ya/in+d+ra gA ni/mi tre Na/tsi te ta ro ri sha bA/tsa tur+t+ti sha nA su kr-i tang kun du/rUr+N+Na yaM go ba di ye te/su hri da de/stAM hr-i da yan
327a7(rgyud): sham+ba sh+tsa hri da ya bai d+ye shwe na/dzam+b+ha ni stam+b+ha na mo hanaHkari shA ti/tsau n+da pa~M bor shaM rje/bi ti dr-i yuk+ta mU la karma su pa ta su re dzI na tse baM sarbe ma don ka
327b1(rgyud): ra yad/a ka ud ta na ta/do na rau bA ra bi nAM sha no sarba karma ri bi d+ha de ma ra dat+ta/pA sho spyad de/badz+ra pA Ni/ma te gau rA/bing+ga ra dzA a nut+ta ram/au dza ma b+hU
327b2(rgyud): ya swA hA/stamA b+ha ya swA hA/mo ha ya swA hA/mA l+yA ya swA hA/yA mAM ya swA hA/ya ma ma mA yA swA hA/badz+ra ya swA nA~M/ma hA badz+ri ya swA hA/badz+ra d+h+r-i rA
327b3(rgyud): ya swA hA/badz+ra pA Ni ye swA hA/badz+ra hastA ya swA hA/badz+ro gra hastaM ya sA hA/badz+ro da Na DA ya swA hA/badz+ro gra dA Na DA ya swA hA/bi shra pa Na ye sta hA/na ma kA maM
327b4(rgyud): shwa ra badz+ra pA Na ye swA hA//rig snga pa/'dod pa'i rdo rje ma//'di ni rlung gri shugs zhes bya//'dod pa'i khams ni kun gyi mchog/rig sngags rgyal/
327b5(rgyud): bla na meng //'dod pa'i khams gnas ci yang rung //'dod pa 'am 'dod pa zhig par rung //rab tu bsgrubs na de dag ni//don du mi sgrub gang yang med//
327b6(rgyud): las kyi dam pa ji bzhin dang //khyad par dang ni sgrub pa'i mcheg/de nyid thog mar bshad par bya//rang byung la ni phyag byas nas//sangs rgyas byung //
327b7(rgyud): chub shing drung du//shar phyogs blta zhing 'dug par bya//kar ni ka ra'i me tog dang //de ni bco ma'i gser mdog 'dra//sangs rgyas kyi na go
328a1(rgyud): legasu//rigs mchog rab sbyin shes gnyen can//'dod pa'i dbang phyug rma bya yi//mgrin pa bzhin du sngo bar bri//spangs rgyas kyi ni
328a2(rgyud): g.yon logs su//mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen ni//sprin dmar mdog 'dra 'od dang bcas//dpal mchog pad+mar bzhugs par bri//de nas mar gyi brgyad la bar+Na/
328a3(rgyud): nas kyi zas bza' dus sum cu//dus gsum du ni bisgom bya zhing //cho ga 'di ni rtag tu bya//me tog dkar po sngon po dang //dmar po dang ni rnam pa gsuM
328a4(rgyud): blangs te gnas der zhugs nas ni//cho ga bzhin du mchod par bya//der ni lnga bcu gicig bzlas pas//tshe se grangs bcu gnyis bar du yang //dkar po
328a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bsnun par bya//sngon pos 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la//pad+ma dmar po la sogs pas//lag na rdo rje bsnun pas kyang //zhag gsum khrus byas
328a6(rgyud): gso sbyong ldan///bco lnga yi ni gtsang ma yis//lha bshos sna tshogs kun tu dgram//du rus ka dang e ge ru//sangs rgyas kyi ni bdug mchog
328a7(rgyud): sreg/thang chu'i snod ni tha dad bzhag/lag na rdo rje gu gul dbul//sangs rgyas rig sngags rdo rje 'dzi ni//slob dpon la ni gus mchod bya//de nas sems
328b1(rgyud): ni bsdud nus kyang //mchod pa dag ni rgyas par bya//bden pa bzhi ni ston pa pos//me tog dkar po bcom ldan la//bzhi brgya 'am brgyad brgya dam pa yis//
328b2(rgyud): bzlas shing bzlas shing bsnun par bya//sngo bri'i nang na mdog sngon mchog/sum brgyas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la//dmar ba'i nang na mdog dmar mchog/sum
328b3(rgyud): brgyas rdo rje 'dzin la snun//srung ba la ni khri lAm du//zla gcig brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya//sgrub pa thog ma tha mar yang //skud pa nag pos bcing bar
328b4(rgyud): bya//ba ti bi d+ha rak+Sha d+ha re rak+Sha sha/ma hA d+ha ni rak+Sha/tra thA ga ta sa ha dzA ta rak+Sha/puSh+pa ke tu rak+Sha/a pa ta rak+Sha swA hA//rtsa bA'i skud pa gtsang byas nas//
328b5(rgyud): sgrub pa de ltar srung byas la//mtshams gcad pa ni 'dis byas na//mchims bcang kun gyis mchog tu 'gyur//d+ha nI ka ni d+ha ne ke ni sarba swA mi ban d+ha
328b6(rgyud): ni swA hA//mtshams bcad kyi ni me 'di yang //brgyad brgya bzlas snyam yang nA ni//de bzhin mtshon skud sna tshogs kyis//gnas rnams kun tu
328b7(rgyud): bskor bar bya//dngos grub sgrub cing nor 'dod pas//dngos grub ltas ni blta ba'i phyir//rig sngags rgyal dbang grub rnams kyi//sgrub pa'i cho ga ni bzlas
329a1(rgyud): brjod bya//a gau de sA d+ha ya a mau b+he sA d+ha ya//sa ba le sA d+ha yA ud swa de sa t+ya go prad+d+ho u ba sha ne sa d+ha ya swA hA//de nas rig sbubs/
329a2(rgyud): sgrub pa na//mtshan ma dag ni rtogs par bya//sku gdung ldan pa'i sku gzugs de//nyi ma bzhin du 'bar bar 'gyur//dad dang mchod pa'i nyes pa dang //
329a3(rgyud): rig sngags nyams pa'i nyes pa yis//ci ste der ni me grub na//yar gyi ngo la'ang bsgrub par bya//dad dang mchod dang cho ga yis//de bzhin rdzogs
329a4(rgyud): par brtsam par bya//dus gsum gtsang sbra rdzogs bya zhing //nas kyi kha zas dus su bzla//bzlos brjod 'dun pas mtshan ma gsum//ma byung bar du
329a5(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya//sangs rgyas zhal nas yin du rnyil//yang na mthon ka chen po 'byung //'dod pa'i dbang phyug kha nas kyang //bzang po dkyil 'khor
329a6(rgyud): steng du lhung //lag na rdo rje'i kha nas kyang /phun su tshogs pa'i dbyig rnams 'byung //yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba yi//nor bu legs sdug mgro la gdags//
329a7(rgyud): 'dod na g.yas pa'i khrig mar yang //cho ga bzhin du gdags par bya//sa dang na mkha' snang byed cing //'khor los bsgyur ba gzhan bzhin 'gyur//
329b1(rgyud): nor bu'i mthus ni 'jigs byed cing //rig sngags grub mthus stobs tshon 'gyur//des ni mun par 'jigs byed cing //rgya mtsho chen por 'jigs pa med//'ad
329b2(rgyud): pa dag la mchod par 'gyur//rig sngags mchog bsgrubs skyabs kyi mchog/de yang rin chen spyod kun rdzi//nang na tshugs par nus pa med//mu stegs
329b3(rgyud): rnams kyis kun rig bzhin//ji ltar dbang phyug 'dod la sbyong //'dod pa lhag ma de bzhin du//rig pa'i rgyal po mchog sgrub ste//'dod la mngon du spyod par
329b4(rgyud): 'gyur//ci ste dad cing gus pa dang //lag ni rdo rje chog shes//de yang rdo rje 'dzin bzhin du//'jig rten gsum ni 'jigs med rgyu//dbyig
329b5(rgyud): rnams dang ni dong rtse dag/'phags pa la las bsgrubs na yang //gnyis ga des bsgrubs 'jigs pa med//bde can dag dang ldan pa dang //nag mo che
329b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa des//mngon du yid bzhin nor bu 'chang //grong khyer rgyal po bzhin du 'thob//bya ba mang las brten pa dang //rnam pa mang po sna tshogs pa//
329b7(rgyud): mang po 'di dag ci smos te//mdo tsam 'di ni mnyan par gyis//'dod pa yis ni rdo rje ma//'di ni las kun sgrubs pa ste//blon po rnams kyi dam pa'i mchog/
330a1(rgyud): du/smya nams ldan las dran 'angag spyod la 'dod pa yis// m+b+ha zla ba mchog da sman+ta snang //b+hA 'don dan
330a2(rgyud): grub pa yi//'dod pa'i rdo rje ma nyid sgrub//rtag tu rung dgar bde ba sbyin//reng dgar 'gro ba'i bzhi yang yin//rang dgar rtse zhing spyod pa yang /
330a3(rgyud): 'chung ba la stsogs rang dger 'gyur//'di ni spro blo'i ngang can la//nams kyang rgyab kyi phyogs mi 'gyur//sgrub pa de yang 'joms mi byed//'bras
330a4(rgyud): bu med par mi 'gyur la//bgegs kyang byed par mi 'gyuraro//dkyil 'khor lngas ni nya mos gyur dang //dam tshigs drag kyang spangs pa dang //sangs
330a5(rgyud): rgyus rdo rje 'dzin mchog sogs//ma dang rnams la 'grub mi 'gyur//de phyir dkon mchog gsum po dang //de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa dang //rig
330a6(rgyud): sdigs reng gi bla ma la//gus byas mchod cing bsgrub par bya//sgrub pa dgoni ma byas kyang //rtsa ba'i rig sngags stobs ldan pa//lces rnams
330a7(rgyud): steng dag 'grub bying pa//gang yin de dag shes pa'i rgyus//kri kaM ma la kaM ye shing //yam sreg shing ni bai rtsa brgyad//gtsang ma'i phyogasu mi
330b1(rgyud): s+phar te//cho ga dgra ni rgyas par bya//zhag bdun bar du dus gsum du//de bzhin bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bya//mar bcus 'o thug sbrang rtsir ldan//me mchog
330b2(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas na ni//'dis ni rgyal po 'am yang ni ni//'khor los sgyur ba'ang dbang gyur na//rgyal srid dag la phan pa yi//rgyal po 'khor lta ci zhig smos///
330b3(rgyud): lan tshwa lus ni gzugs byas nas//rkang pa nas brtsams sbyin sreg bya//cho ga des ni bud med dang //skyes pa dbang du 'gugs par 'gyur//
330b4(rgyud): bu mo yi ni gzugs byas nas//rkang pa nas brtsams sbyin sreg bya//cho ga de nas bud med rnams//dbang du bya ba bstan pa yin//lo ma'i sbrang ma'i dpung byas
330b5(rgyud): nas//yungs kar me tog bsregs pa yis//de bzhin zhag bdun dus gsum du//rab tu bsgrims te mchod par bya//de ni yungs dkar me tog gis//
330b6(rgyud): zhag bdun bar du bsgrubs na ni//lan+da bdun bzlas pa sgrub 'gyur te/lo mi'i sbrang ma 'pho bar 'gyur//go cha dag ni mchog dang ni//de bzhin man+ta ka blangs nas/
330b7(rgyud): bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bzlas bya zhing //theg mar logs par mchod byas nas//gang gi ming ni brjod pa de//skad cig gis ni dbang du 'gyur//de bzhin
331a1(rgyud): /chog byas nas nA//nan ta ka ni phyi nas blangs//u b+hA ru dang can dan dang //ma rub ka rlon pa blang //dril stsogs pa d+ma dag gang /
331a2(rgyud): khyAs byas skye ba thams cad dog//thog mar mchud pa la sogs pa//byed cing byed cing zhag bdun du//dus kA sum brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya//phyi nas
331a3(rgyud): mkhaso bas khrus kyang bya//mar gyi don bcu bzhi la//bzlas brjod ba rtsa brgyadabyas ni//rgyal pos de la mchod par bya//bo nga yi
331a4(rgyud): yang //byang phyogs lta zhing brko bar bya//de nas de yi shun phrags ni//myur gyi nga yi bcwo bzhi la//bye mar byas nas bzlas brjod byas//de bzhin brgyad
331a5(rgyud): bad+ma bzlas nas ni//phur mAr byas sto bcang brgyaH//bud mede la ni der btar na//de ma thag tu dbang du 'gyur//thams cad dbye bor bya ba ni//nim tho'i
331a6(rgyud): yal gi bskyeb bya zhing //'di dong 'di gnyis rtsod gyur cig/ces bya chog bsrung ba yin//de lasmra b+h+r-ir zlas dam b+hA ni//gros sngags 'dis ni 'acu
331a7(rgyud): bar bya//dril sogs pas snying nas mchod//bzlas brjod brgyad brgya byas na ni//byad snrums dkrol ba'i mchog yin te//ci dga' bar ni brtsam
331b1(rgyud): //nab sman du du na// yod gas slod la nga nga/ na ma nan dang//ra 'byu san ma dang //nan nga
331b2(rgyud): 'bru dang ras pa la d+hI//sa bene de dag sbyin sreg bya//'di nas gzhan du chenamo//song shig med gyur cig/ces ni mi yang brjod byis na//'gro 'gyur 'di la
331b3(rgyud): tsom med//de la sa slar na gso bo dang //bzhag par byas na ldan bdun du//de la srung ba mchog byas na//gan su dga' bar byed par 'gyur//byA ta la
331b4(rgyud): yi lo ma dang //bil ba 'dzam bu a mra dang /skyu ru ra la sogs pa yis//skel chung de ni khrus byas na//skal dang ldan par byed pa'i mchog/gos 'dod pa
331b5(rgyud): shI'i me tog rnams//sbyin sreg byas na phreM rnams thog//hI ranA ne mu li kr-i rnams//sbyin sreg byas na dbyig rnams 'phel//gser 'dod pas ni su bi rba/
331b6(rgyud): tshul bzhin sbyin sreg byas na 'thob//gser sgrib pa ye nang na ni//cho ga 'di ni mchog tu bshad//'dod pa'i rdo rje ma'i cho ga rdzogaso///
331b7(rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'ag bag con//gnad sbyin rnams kyi snying pa ste//'phrog ma zhes kyang rab brags pa//'bar ba de ni bshang bar bya//dkon mchog sum la phyag
332a1(rgyud): 'tshal lo//gnod sbyin sde'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gsum po la phyag 'tsha'o//gnod sbyin thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//lngas
332a2(rgyud): rte na la phyag 'tshal lo//gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma'i rdo rje'i 'og pa ga can rigs thams cad dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo//de nas gnod sbyin thams cad kyi
332a3(rgyud): snying po brjod par byas//byed kun nga la nyon cig/mthong na don yod zhi ba dang //gsum mchog blta na mi bzang dang //'byung po thams cad rab zhi byed//
332a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje stobs po che//nor gyi bdag po rnams thos bu//gnod sbyin kun gyi mnga' bdag rje//gnod sbyin gang dag ri la gnas//sa ti ri dang ri
332a5(rgyud): po che//zho gdong dang ni gdong rgyas dang //'dod pa'i don sbyin gnodo sbyin gang //mtshon cha 'thab cha sno tshogs can//stobs ldan rdzu 'phrul chen
332a6(rgyud): po dang //rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba dang //pad+ma dkar drang dgra bajoms dang //rgyan phreng rgyas dang rgyan phreng che//bdud rtsi snying rje grong gnod sbyin chen po
332a7(rgyud): lngas rtsen dang //gnod sbyin na la ku be ra//nor bu'i sul can gnod sbyin gang //nor bu bzang zhes grags pa dang //rdzogs ldan dang ni rdzogs
332b1(rgyud): bzang dang //rab tu bzang dang bzang po nyid//bdag gi snying pos bkug pus na//de dag thams cad 'dir bya shegs shing //ma smyos gnod sbyin de dag dang //
332b2(rgyud): bdag gi don grub de dag dang //rtag tu dge dang phan byed dang //gnod sbyin gdan ni skye ma byed dang //gnod sbyin mo ni 'phrog ma mo//bu mo ngas khyod ni
332b3(rgyud): 'dir shog cig/gzugs chen ldan zhing stobs che ba'i//bu de dag kyang 'drar shog shing /khyod ni rtag tu gnod sbyin dang //bu yi 'khor dang lhan cig
332b4(rgyud): tu//lag na rdo rjes rab bskul bas//las rnams thams cad sgrub par gyis//dgra'i phyogs dang mdza' bo'i phyogros//de bzhin rgyal po sa gang dang //
332b5(rgyud): nags dang brag khrod rdzong rnams dang //g.yul du rgyal bar bya ba dang //rgyas pa yi ni las rnams dang //rtsod pa dang ni 'thab pa dang //srung ba'i las
332b6(rgyud): dang dbang sgrub dang //bag ma dag ni len pa la//lag ni rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin//rdo rje dbyug sogs lhan cig tu//dam pa 'chang ba'i 'og phag
332b7(rgyud): mas//don rnams thams cad sbyar te gyis//s+yAd ya the dan a ma le/bi ma lai ni rma le/maM ge l+ye sa hi te/ha na ha na/sa ra sa ra/A shA ne be ga nA ma
333a1(rgyud): /d+hA rAd+hat+ta/dwedad+hA hA/yak+Sha t+ta hU~M sar+b+ba \u0f88\u0f90k+Shan+d+ha shrAr+b+he b+hA sma badz+ra tu /sur+m+mAts+tsha swa d+ham+bAr+m+ma
333a2(rgyud): d+hA thAg k+Shar+b+ha sr-ismra sa/ mi b+h+r-ing+gesmai m+be /
333a3(rgyud): me b+ha br-i tu ba la ba la ban+d+ho b+hU b+hU mi ma ti d+hI tI d+hI ta man+to b+hA ba ni a ma le maM gAM l+ye/mA re hi taM bi maM l+ye/nA she ha taM maM grA l+ye/ma re ha ta baM ma l+yA
333a4(rgyud): na shaM hi taM dai ta karma dan+to hi dan+ta le g+hu pA sha ni prA she hri taM/sarba rA dzA dA ra bi ra dzA ni a pa rA dzi te/sarba yak+Sha hr-i da ya brta ni/a pra yA mi bA bi/
333a5(rgyud): tsA a nu swa ra sa ra sarba yak+Sha hr-i da ya ni a bi ba pi tsa so ni so na/sa ra sa re/sa ma ya ma nu smA ra/a yI na/ya na saM tsa lA ni/sarba yak+Sha
333a6(rgyud): hI da yA ni/ha na ha na//de he da hA/pa tsa pa tsa/b+hany+dza d+hAny+dza/b+ha na b+ha na/mu ru mu ru/tu ru tu ru/b+hA bA b+hU ba/rat+na rak+Sha mAM karma d+hA ti ma ma
333a7(rgyud): ker+m+ma/pra bi sha/sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/sarba aR+tha sA d+ha maM me sA d+ha yaM/i don ce maM/kAr+yaM ku ru swA hA//rig sngags rdo rje 'ag bgo can/
333b1(rgyud): gnod sbyin kun gyi snying po ste/'phrog ma zhes kyang rab grags pa//shos ldan de ni bshad pa yin//dkyil 'khor gyi ni las mthong dang //dkyil 'khor

333b3(rgyud): gsum bsrung byas la//gtsang mas gtsang mi'i sa phyogasu//gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor rab gsal bri//yang na zhag gi ngo gnyis las//gang

333b5(rgyud): yang na chos kyi dkyil 'khor bri//de yo g.yon phyogs rig sngags kyi/stobs 'chang lagro na rdo rje bri//sang+yas kyi ni g.yas logasu//nor gyi dbang phyug gnod sbyin bcas/
333b6(rgyud): de dag mdun du 'phrog ma ni//'og pag rig sngags sna cho ge sde mchog/de yi rig sngags tshogs kun ni//g.yas phyog sa dros su gnas par bya/
333b7(rgyud): rgyal po che na po yul 'khor srung //dri za mchog gi dpung gi bskor//shar phyogs sgor ni rab gnas shing //nub phyogasu ni blta bar bya//rgyal
334a1(rgyud): bo chen po 'phags skyes po//grul bum mchog gi dpung gis bskor//b+h+yo phyogs sgo yi nang na gnas//lce phyogs nas ni byang ngu lta//rgyal
334a2(rgyud): po chen po mig mi bzang //klu dag dang nin mkha' lding //mchog rnams kyi ni mdun du 'dug/nub phyogs nas ni shar du lta//rgyal po chen po ku be ra//gnod sbyin
334a3(rgyud): mchog gi dpung gis bskor//byang phyogs kyi ni sgo na gnas//lho phyogs logasu blta bar bya//kho ra khor yug thams cad nas//gdon rnams brgyad brgyas
334a4(rgyud): bskor bar bya//me rnams kyang ni shin tu dgod//bshos rnams kun tu dgram par bya//de nas gnod sbyin gtor ma yang //shwa bcas dkyilnga 'khor nong
334a5(rgyud): du da gram//mar me la sogs dri rnams dang //me tog 'bras bu kun gyis bskor//de ltar byas na rig sngags che//rgyal mo yi nI dam pa 'di//bzlas
334a6(rgyud): brjod byed na bshos rnams dang //bdug pa dri la sogs pa dbul//bzlas brjod bsnyen pa grangs med par//bzlas brjod bya zhing kun nas mchod//
334a7(rgyud): bdug pa thams cad nang du sreg/bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bkra shis pa//mkhas pas sngon du byas nas ni//de nyid srung ba'i mchog yino//de nyid rab tu
334b1(rgyud): sgrub pa yin//phyogs bcings pa yang de nyid do//de nas 'di yi bzlas brjod rnams//ngargya rtsa brgyad ni 'das pa nas//sgrub pa'i 'phrog ma 'gul ba dang //
334b2(rgyud): sa gzhi dag kyang g.yo bar 'gyur//gnod sbyin rnam pa sna tshogs dag/kun nas der ni snang bar 'gyur//g.yo zhing sgra 'byin blta bar byed//rab tu 'du
334b3(rgyud): zhing 'phungs pa dang //'jigs pa'i gzugs rnams mthong 'gyur zhing //gzugaso cog ni du mar ston//de ni de yis 'jigs mi bya//sangs rgyas kyi
334b4(rgyud): ni drung dag tu//rig sngags tshogs ni bzlas brjod bya//rig sngags rgyal po rab 'bar ba//rdo rje 'og pag rnams bsgrubs pa//de tshe bdag nyid 'ong
334b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur//de mthong de ni sde dang bcas//mkha' la rgyu ba'i mchog tu 'gyur//gzhon nu la sogs gnod sbyin gyi//tshogs mchog kun gyis de la
334b6(rgyud): mchod//gnod sbyin bzhin du'ang rgyu ba dang //ji bzhi na stobs dang ldan par rgyu//de srid du ni mkha' la 'gro/yang na tshe dpag med par gnas//dkyil
