335a2(rgyud): sbyin sreg+sa dang //mchod pa kun dang mnyam gzhag dang //rtag tu mchod pa dga' ba yis//don rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya//rdo rje 'og pag
335a3(rgyud): con gyi cho ga rdzog so///de nas sngags 'chang kun gyis mchod//lag na rdo rje'i sras gtum pa/rdo rje'i sde ni stobs po che
335a4(rgyud): mthong na ngan yid zhib po//gtum po rdo rje 'dzin dga' ba//'bar ba chen po mchod sbyin mchog/don kun grub byed bshad par bya//na mo rat+na tra yA
335a5(rgyud): s+ya/na mo mA hA satwa s+ya/satwe satwa s+yai/a ti ba la s+ya/a pra mo ya ba la s+ya/badz+re saM nA ya s+ya/badz+ra kA ma da s+yo//tu ru tu ru/badz+ra saM nA ya swA hA/
335a6(rgyud): ku ru ku ru ma hA se nA ya swA hA/phu ru hu ru/sarba satwa/pU dzi tA ya s+t+waM hA/su ru su ru/sAt+sa kA mA ta yo swA hA/mu ru mu ru/mu hA buM ru ShA
335a7(rgyud): ya swA hA/ma hA swe nA pa te yai/sarba karma drA ya swA hA/sarba dza ye dza yi/dA ya swA hA/sarba sid d+hi sid b+ha dA ye swA hA/sarba dA na dA ni n+ya br-i dA laM swe hA
335b1(rgyud): badz+re sau nA ya swA hA/ya pra mo yA ku nA ya swA hA/sarba pa ti satwa pU dzI tA ya swA hA/bla tI gr-ih+Na mA~M rak+Sha mA~M sArba kA ma da/sarba kA ma ma mr-i pU rA ya swA hA//'di sde chog
335b2(rgyud): bshad par bya//ngas bshad de ni mnyen par bgyis//cho ga bzhin du rdo rje sde/ri mo'i gzugs ni rgyas byas nas//bdug pa'i mchid pas mchod bya zhing //
335b3(rgyud): bsgrims te rtag tu bzlas brjod bya//sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten nam//gang na sku gdung yod pa der ci nus kyis ni rab bsgrims te//sngar ni bsnyen pa 'di dag
335b4(rgyud): bya/de nas zla phyed yang na gcig/yang nu zhag ni bdun yang rung //dus gsum khrus byas dkar gsum bza'//mnyam bzhag rtag tu bzlas brjod bya//gso
335b5(rgyud): sbyong yan lage brgyad ldan pas//nas kyi kha zas dus gsum bza'//shin tu mnyam bzhag dus gsum du//brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzlas brjod bya//der ni
335b6(rgyud): mar gyi mar me gnyis//ma shi bar ni bzhag par bya//phyi nang bzhag pa'i smyung ba bya//zla ba nya la rab bsgrims te /bza' dang btung ba mang po yis//
335b7(rgyud): lha bshos mnyam par gzhag pas dbul//cho ga dam pas bsrungs bya zhi //cho ga brtan pa des byas nas//rdo rje sde ni stobs po che//lan grangs brgya
336a1(rgyud): /stong bzlas brjod bya//de nas stobs chen rdo rje sra//de la yang ni 'grub 'gyur to//yid la ci dang ci 'dod pa'i//don rnams thams
336a2(rgyud): cad byed par 'gyur//nod kun yang ni sel byed cing //'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed//yungs dkar nas dang lan tshwa dang //shu ti dang ni nye'u shing dang /
336a3(rgyud): pri ying ku dang shu dag rnams//mnyam par gzhag pas zhag bdun du//seng ldeng 'dag ma dung med la//de yi ming smos sbyin sreg bya//zhag bdun bar du
336a4(rgyud): lan gcig ni dus gsum du ni brgya rtsa brgyad//sbyin sreg rab tu legs byas na//bskul chung gros kyang 'grub par 'gyur//tshul 'dis sbyin sreg byas na ni//
336a5(rgyud): sems can kun kyang 'khrug par 'gyur//don gong yid la gzhag nas ni//stobs chen 'di ni sgrub byas na//de yi las de byed 'gyur te//'di la dpyad
336a6(rgyud): par bya ba med//cho ga gzhan yang rtag tu yid la lan gsum bzlas brjod byas tAM/srung ba yang lan gsum bzlas brjod byas nas/gang 'dod pa de bslang

336b1(rgyud): gsum la//mchod rten gyis drung du bsor mo'i lci ba las gnod sbyin gyi gzugs byas la/sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba phyogs bzhir spyan drangs nas//gnod sbyin
336b2(rgyud): gyi gi tor ma dang //tsan+d+ra dan dka/ra~M ba~M dang //ka ra bai ra dmar po dang //rnam pa sna tshogs gzhin dag gis kyang sku gzugs mchod par byas la/gu gul dang /

336b6(rgyud): sen+na pau ta ye tho bA dzar dwe ye/ma hA sa twA ya A na ni dA nA ya ma hA NI NaM ya sa saMrbaM/bo d+hi sa nA/pra ba ra NAM pra bA ra/yi me tra bar+d+ha ya ba rishwA sa

337a1(rgyud): hu ru hU ru/badz+ra swen+tA ya s+yA hA/ma hA sen+na ya swA hA/sarba krA ma drA ya swA hA/sarba su kha drA ya sA hA/sarba ar+tha sA d+han+ta ya sAH/

337a6(rgyud): dpung rgyan dang /tsed bAn dang /rgyan sna tshogs kyi brgyan pa pad+ma rtsa ba dmar po'i steng na 'dug ste/lag pa g.yon pa na pad+ma sgreng ste 'dzin//lag
337a7(rgyud): pa g.yas pa dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du 'dug pa bri//de'i steng du 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o//'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba'o//chos thang
337b1(rgyud): no dag med pa'o//mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes rtogs pra brjod pa rnams bri bar bya'o//de nas yar gyi ngo chos gcig la brtsam nong bsgrubs par bya s+ho/

339b1(rgyud): de yi gzhi la bzhag nas ni//lan grangs brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya//bsdams shing legs par bstan byas nas//rdo rje sde la rab bsgrims te/dri la sogs pas legs

342a1(rgyud): du khrus byed cing dus gsum du mchod pa rgyas pa byas nas lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas la de nyid du rtswa dur pa'i stan gyi steng du nyal bar/

342b6(rgyud): br-i D+ha badz+ra s+ya/na mas+thi ra badz+ra d+ha ra s+ya/sarba bo d+hi satwA yai/b+hU ta ga Na da ma ka s+ya/ma hU yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/badz+ra pA Ni ma hArA yA mi/dA ma yA mi

343a1(rgyud): bad+d+ha bad+hAm+bAr+t+ti sUp+l-i yA ya tim+ma k+to p+tA smA yA maM/tad+ya thA/dam+ba dAH/dah+ma da hA/b+hur+N+Na g+hAr+t+ta/tar+Na shar+m+ma shar+m+ma/b+hUr+N+Na nad+b+ha
343a2(rgyud): shrA ma sAn+ta nan+ta/nar+d+ha bar+d+ha dzin+ma yI oM ra li/ma dA li/khi rI khI na ha na ha na/da ma da ma saM mo hA ya a mu kaM mr-i ba sham+b+hi ya su /gsod sdug/
343a3(rgyud): mchog 'od gtum pa ste//lag nA rdo rje'i grogasu bshad//dbyug 'dra stobs dang ldan pa ste//gdon la sogs pa 'dul ba'i mchog/de ni dbang cheni
343a4(rgyud): dga' ba ste//rdo rje 'dzin gyi grogs po yin//lus kun yang ni byed pa s+t+wa~M//rdo rje dbyug pa rab dbyug bzhin//de nas lag na rdo rje yi//
343a5(rgyud): bo nyams ni blo gros bzang //tshig sna bcu 'bar ba'i rig+na sngags kyi//tshogs kun gyise mu tshud ba shUd bai rA bya//na mo rat+na trA ya s+yA/ni pa sh+tsa

357b4(rgyud): grub chen po yin//de nas nor sgrub pa 'byung ste/tsan dan dmar po las blo gros rdo rje ma'i gzugs rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan la/de'i lag pa g.yas

364b7(rgyud): bskor ba'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das gang na bder song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/de'i cha tshad du brjod pa 'di/

365b2(rgyud): cad kyis brjod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//go nad sbyin thams cad kyis phyag byas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//'byung pos brjod pa khyod la

366b1(rgyud): /dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'khor gyi nang nas langs te/bcom ldan 'das gang nu ba de ldogasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

366b5(rgyud): rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bshad pa ni/khyod gtum pa yin//bsten par bka' ba yin//shin tu thub par dka' ba yin/
366b6(rgyud): 'phags pa'i tshul med pa yin te/lag na rdo rje khyed kyi sngo rlig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa che rU po bshad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gsang
366b7(rgyud): ba med par las mi byed do//lag na rdo rje de bas na rdo rje'i rig 'di dang /rig po mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bde brag tu 'grub par
367a1(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir khyod kyi ming brgyad pa gsang ba gsang sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa gang thos na mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ba
367a2(rgyud): dang lag na rdo rje khyod kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byed par 'gyur ba dang /log 'dren bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
367a3(rgyud): phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi rnams kyang bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba dang /gang thos na tshangs par ma spyad pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ba dang /thub par ma byas

373a5(rgyud): po dang /mig ma bzang dang /ldeg na be can dang /bden bral dang /me'i lha dang /rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang /dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas po tshags
373a6(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor can dang /sred med kyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa dang /byin pa po dang /phreng ba can dang /lcags can dang /tsheg sde
373a7(rgyud): kyi bdag po chen po dang /sprin ta la dang /log 'dren dbang po bgegs logs 'dren gyi g.yog du ma can dngashing gseb kyi lha drug cu dang /sring mo ba
373b1(rgyud): ming po dang bcas pa dang /ma bdun dang /rdo rje lcags kyu can dang /rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang /rdo rdza tsa nya mo drug r+b+ha rtsa bzhi dang /rdordza'i b+h+yo dang /lag bzung dang /
373b2(rgyud): btsug gis 'gre rdo rje'i rigs kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang /de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang /
373b3(rgyud): mu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /'byung po dang /yi dgas dang //sha zi dang //
373b4(rgyud): skye byed dang /brjod byed dang /sgrub pa dang /sbrul 'dzin bcas dang /gnon po tshwa med dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams dang /lha'i bu nyi ma dang /lha'i bu zla ba
373b5(rgyud): dang /dus tshigs kyi lha dang /nub ka'i lha dang /dus kyi lha thams cad dang /gnas si lha thams cad dang yang thabs gcig gi/de ltar yang bcom ldan
373b6(rgyud): 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni shin tu yongasu mthar phyin/bsod nams dang /ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongasu
373b7(rgyud): rdzogs/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /byang chub chen po dang /pha rol tu phyin pa dang /so brnyes pas ni shin tu yongs su bzung /skyes bu chen po'i
374a1(rgyud): mtshan dbyung ba sam na sa sa ni s+thA n+yAn/da rgyad glang po spyad cu ts+tsha myang ga dang chug thams cad rnam pa
374a2(rgyud): spyi gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong //bdud kyi tshor ma thams cad ni dkrugaso//de kho na nyid mkhyen pa nyid ni rim par thug su chude/

374b1(rgyud): ni mdzes shing rin po che rdo rje'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng de'i khri lA ni bzhugs te/gdan rin po che dang /rdo rje'i pad+ma'i seng po'i khrir ram tsam rdo rje dang /rin po che dang
374b2(rgyud): mu tig drung ldan pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sil sil sgra 'byung ba/rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i stegs bu lA rtsi ba legs par brten pA/rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i

374b5(rgyud): thur mas rgyan pa'i gdugs yu bas bstod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas grib mar bsgribs shing bi skyabs pa/dpag bsam gyi shing du mas mdzes par byas

374b7(rgyud): nya bo ltar 'jig rten kun gyis mthong na dga' ba/dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis yang dag por rgyas par chos ston te
375a1(rgyud): tshangs par spyod pa/thog mar dge bA/bar du dge ba/thu mar dge ba/don bzang po//tshig 'bru babang po/ma 'dres pa/yongasu rjog pa/yong su dag pa/
375a2(rgyud): dkar ba yang dag par ston to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
375a3(rgyud): gyi dra ba chen po byung ste/'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas gsal bar byas par gyur to//gang ga'i klung gi
375a4(rgyud): bye ma ji snyed pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des gsal bar snang bar gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bci
375a5(rgyud): ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag kyang seng ge'i khri du ma bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang rnams na chos ston to//nyan thos chen po
375a6(rgyud): de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa dag dang thabs gcigo/dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyan dang /dge bsnyen ma dang /
375a7(rgyud): lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams dang yang thabs gcig
375b1(rgyud): de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston to//de dag thams cad kyang kun tu snang ngo //skad cig de la sen

375b4(rgyud): gnas dang /yi dgas kyi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyis ming yang mi grags par gyur to//'jig rten gyi bar gang dag mun pa mun nag

375b7(rgyud): tshim par gyur nas kun tu bltas pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ste de dag gis gser gyi mchod sdong
376a1(rgyud): ltar dpal gyis 'brang zhing rang gi brazi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa de mthong nas de nyid la skyabasu dong ngo //skyabasu dong ma thag tu de dag thams
376a2(rgyud): cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du bdag son pa snyam du sheso//snang ba des bdud kyi bya mi thams cad kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab
376a3(rgyud): tu 'bar kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur par kun tu snang ngo //bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag kyang skad cig de la nyam thag pa'i sgrar ngu zhing skrag nas
376a4(rgyud): byer ro//bdud sdig can yang bzhin bzang po d+hi rnyi por gyur cing lus rdul nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa/grogs po dge bdud kyi khyim tha~Md
376a5(rgyud): kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang /dge sbyong go'u ta ma ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtseg pa na chos bstan
376a6(rgyud): pa 'di la ltos/des bdag cag phung ngo //tho btsam so//phyogs gang na gnasu gtol med do//longs la dge sbyong go'u ta ma de'i gni du dong ste bdud kyi
376a7(rgyud): yul 'di thal bar byas par ma gyur gyi bar du gzho mo//de skad ces smras pa dang /bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis rje bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes
376b1(rgyud): sgras na/rang sh+log+sa du da s+yA/pa na madz+nyAnan m+b+ha tshog sa na/sus na rdzags pa/ nga/rgyun tshogs sa/tshag sa 'ad pa
376b2(rgyud): 'jig su rung ba/bzhin mi sdug par bsgyur ba/mig dang /bzhin dang /sgra kun tu'i'abar zhing rab tu 'bar ba dag skad cig de nyid la gcig tu 'dus nas bdud
376b3(rgyud): sdig can gal ba der dong ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smra so//bzhengs bzhengs thogs mar bzhud la ji tsam du dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan thos dang

376b5(rgyud): bar deng nyid du phye mar brlago/rnam par gzhom mo//de nas bdud sdig can dga' zhing mgu ste/shin tu dga' bos spu'i khung bu khyab nas skad cig de nyid la bdud

377b4(rgyud): rdo rje bdud sdig can 'di 'khor gyi khyams 'di nas skyong la stan la zhog ste/rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ti nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul par byin gyis

377'a1(rgyud): dang ldan pa/rang tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ston pa la ma gus pa dang /de bzhin pashegs pa'i chos nyidakhang

377'b7(rgyud): btang nas//khyod kyi srog chags rnams kyang bsrungs//lus can kun gyis ma thob pa'i'o//ye shes khyod kyis brnyes gyur nas//grol te 'jig rten rnams
378a1(rgyud): kyang grol//kye ma khyod ni rtswa lag bzang //mgon po khyod kyi'ang zer gyi//dra bas 'jig rten khams khyab ste/mya ngan 'das las lhag pa

378a3(rgyud): nor bu lam mer ma gyur to//de nas gsang ba po'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas

379a4(rgyud): thub pa zhes bya ba/mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na ri rab kyi steng na chos ston te/bcom ldan 'das des bdud sdig can zhag pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings te/

379a7(rgyud): ngag 'di ni rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/de'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabaso//
379b1(rgyud): de skad ces bka' stsal te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis gnang nas/rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyis
379b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul bI
379b3(rgyud): cho 'phrul bsam gyis me khyab pas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'i'adar lhag nas/bcom ldan 'das dri bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
379b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /gsang ba pa'i badrag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i sprin dang /gredugs kyi sprin dang /rgyan phreng gi sprin dang /dbu rgyan gyi sbyin gyi
379b5(rgyud): sprin dang /me tog gi sprin dang /na bza' sprin chen pas mchod pa chen po byas nas/na mkha'i dkyil na 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan
379b6(rgyud): bdun bskor ba byas te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje 'i stan la bcug nas/bcom ldan 'das la lo gresu lta zhing bcom ldan 'das lnga
379b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas rang rang gi rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan de dag la 'khod par gyur to//de'i tshe shar phyogs legs na 'jig

404a3(rgyud): gnyen gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la dga' ba dang /mchod pa'i phyir phuli te/tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstongs
404a4(rgyud): 'jog rten dag la dbang byed dbang gis 'byor gyur pa//stobs bcu'i skyes rab mchog ldan khyod la rten nas su//byang chub phyir ni chags bral dri med
404a5(rgyud): byang chub sems//sems can bde sgrub gtor dang 'dra ba bdag gis thob//bdag mige gau ti mug mun pas dri can dri med gyur//srid pa'i 'dod chags
404a6(rgyud): rab tu zhi zhing spros dang bral//mya nga na 'das pa'i drang po'i lam ni bdag la bstan//sems dmyal mi bzad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur//sdig
404a7(rgyud): bral 'jig rten mgon la skyab su ma song ba//kye ma dman pa yun ring ji lta ba slu sa shig gu/de ring thub dbang sras po rnams la bsod nams dang
404b1(rgyud): dang dang snying rdo ting 'dzin ci nA m+b+ha drAmachar gyur//sa ma dag gcig prA sangs rgyas myur du grub par shog/gtsug pus 'gro bam+b+ha lus mya ngan bzla bAr bya//stong pa
404b2(rgyud): gzhan ni kun tu rgyu tshe bdag gri yid//rang phan 'jug dang dge ga shes bral por mi gyur cig/de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshog su bcad
404b3(rgyud): pa 'di dag gos gsang ba pi'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mngon par bstod nas cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag ni rdo rjes khro bo chen
404b4(rgyud): ba rdo rje khro ba de dag la 'di skad ces smraso//rigs kyi bu dag sdang ba dang /don dang /bgegs dang /log 'dren de dag thams cad grang gis sems
404b5(rgyud): can thams cad la rnam par rnam pa rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang /bgegs me byed pa dang /dkon mchog gsum la skyab su 'gro bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs
404b6(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig 'dzin du chug sheg/rigs kyi bu dag 'di dag la mi 'jigs pa yang byin cig/de sems can thams cad kyi don dang /phran pa dang /bde ba dang //

405a1(rgyud): /pa log so zhes tu chog la mngon par dga' nas yang lnga dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkhang

405b1(rgyud): del sogs pa gang dag gsang sngags sgrub bam/klog pa de dag la bgogs 'byung blar mo bya thung 'tsho bar mo byA ste/thub pa dang rdosu 'thun par stobs ston par/

405b3(rgyud): pa dang /dug bsad pa dang /rig sngags 'grub par sbyin par bya'o//sbrang rtsi dang /tshigs ma dang /sgog pa dang /ki'u dang /gtor ma dang

405b6(rgyud): lung ci sprul pa de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//dong slan chad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang //chos dang /dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o//sems can thang

406a4(rgyud): nas khyed kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di bstan pa dang /bdud sdig can yang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa da /gzhan yang sdang ba gdon dang /
406a5(rgyud): 'byung ba dang /bgegs dang /log 'dren thams cad dam tshig la bi ked cing byang chub kyi sems 'dzin du 'drug pa'i ting 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes /

406a7(rgyud): 'don med dang yi ge dang /sgra skad kyis rtogs par bya ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang ming ngam/gzugs sam/dbyibs sam/gnas sa ma/
406b1(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pa 'am/g.yongs pa yang rung ste/ting 'dzin ces bya ba'i chos de gang yang med do//gad+ma la ming med pa dang /gzugs med pa dang /dpyong
406b2(rgyud): med pa dang /gnas med pa dang /mnyam par gzhag pa med pa dang /g.yeng ba med pa 'di btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting 'dzin 'di'i ming ni zhes bya zhes dri la ji snyam

406b5(rgyud): gis stong /zhan yang gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis ste/gany+tsi ga s+t+ya kits+tsha'i bdag nyid kyis steng ste/yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu brtags pa'i phyir ro//

406b7(rgyud): byed pa yin no//don de brjod pa na yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong /gang du yang mi 'gro med kyi/gzhan gyi dbang la rten pa'i phyir yi ger btag pa yang yod do//
407a1(rgyud): yongasu btagus pa yin pa'i phyir btags pa yang stong pa'o//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang nyid stong pa'o//rgyu
407a2(rgyud): dang rkyen las byung ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang stong pa'o//glo bur du rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyis stong ngo //de lo
407a3(rgyud): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo //rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa gang yin pa de mtshan nyid med pa'o//mtshan nyid med pa lnga yin pa de/
407a4(rgyud): bzhin nyid//de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dri ma nor ba de bzhin nyid do//ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid//gzham yin pa de bzhin nyid gang

407a6(rgyud): mthong ngo //lhag mthong gang yin pa de zhi gnas so//zhi gnas gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'o//rnam par thar pa gang yin pa de dbu ma'i lam yin no//
407a7(rgyud): dbu ma'i laM bA yin pa de la mtha' gcig med/mtha' gnyis mdo/gzung ba med/'dzin pa po med/'dzin pa med/chad pa med/rtog pa med/sbyang mad

407b7(rgyud): ste/'di la nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba yang med na/'jig rten pa'i mu stegs can dang //phas kyi rgol ba thams cad lta

408a5(rgyud): sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid med pa yin na de la ji ltar skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
408a6(rgyud): dang ldan zhing de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bstan cing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku legs par rgyan/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum rnar
408a7(rgyud): gzhag par lta/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/gsang ba pa'i bdag
408b1(rgyud): po lag na rdo rje ste smras pa/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob kyi brda'i tshi ga go/brgyun ce sna bya/
408b2(rgyud): ni smos pa'i yi gre dang sgra'o//dpe byad bzang po zhes bya ba de ni sgyu ma dang /rmi lam gyi/ngo bo nyid mtshan nyid dri//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
408b3(rgyud): byang chub ces bya ba de ni na mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid//sku gsum rnam par ga zhag pa zhes bya ba ni tshogs gnyis kyis sprul pa'i mtshan nyid do//btsun pa sha
408b4(rgyud): radwa ti'i bu yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi'i gsang bri'i yul te/de la sku gsang ba zhes bya ba de ni bsod nams chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa'i mtshan nyid//bsod

411a1(rgyud): stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /phyi rI'i myatha stong pa nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa

411a3(rgyud): tshogs 'di gnyis ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang /shes pa dang /shes bya mtha' dag dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag
411a4(rgyud): par rtags par byed pa ste/btsuni pra shwa ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba dag gis mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o//rgya tshar rnam par dbye/

411a6(rgyud): ba bzhin du gsung gi gsang ba yang de bzhin no//thugs kyi gsang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa da //so so'i rnam pa dang /kha dog drung

411b3(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i bsam pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa dang dri/mos pa dang /blo gros dang /blo dang /rtogs

427b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro//des klu la sogs po thams cad kun tu rab tu 'bar bA 'gyuraro//klu mi bgrungs pa rnams phung bar 'gyur ro//'dum par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan
428a1(rgyud): 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du

428a7(rgyud): badz+ra la mA li ni phaT/phaT phaT phaT swA hA/bcom ldan 'das kyis klu thams cad dang /klu mi bgrungs pa thams cad ma rungs par byed pa'i rig pa
428b1(rgyud): 'di shod ma thag tu klu dang thu chen po thams cad klad pa na bar gyur/lus rul ta lus rnag shing dri mi zhom par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtug

429a7(rgyud): de nas de'i 'og tu tshe gur bya ba las thams cad byed pa dge bar bya ba rjod par bya'o//lo tog la gnod par byed na/de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas zhing gi dbus
429b1(rgyud): sam khang sted dam/gnas mthon por dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas pa la phyogs bzhir bum pa bkang ba bzhi bzhag/me tog sil mas btsal dkram ste bzhag
429b2(rgyud): gzugs 'khyil pa bdun bya'o//'bras las byas pa'i 'khyil pa bdun byas to//gzugs re re zhing yang gzugs nyi shu rtsa re bya'o//'bras dang 'o thug bsres pa dang /
429b3(rgyud): zhozhezhodang /'o ma bzhag par bgyi'o//phyogs bzhir dril bu bzhag par bya'o//pad+ma lta bung zan gyi gtor ma snga ma bzhin bzhag par bya'o//dkyil 'khor gyis dbus su bus
429b4(rgyud): pa chen po bzhag ste ba las byung ba lnga dang /'o ma dang chus dgang ngo //yungs kar dang 'bras yo saM blug par bya'o//sdugs ljon drug cur yongasu bzlas par bya'o//
429b5(rgyud): seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi dang /lcags kyi phur bu gcig bya ste/thams cad ser brgyad kyi tshal du bya'o//ba se re skya'i lci ba 'am/bag phye las byis pa'i klu'i

430b5(rgyud): chags kyi rnam pa dag kyang phur bu ma byung gi bar du nam yang mi 'byung ngo //phur bu ma byung gi bar klu'i nyes pa rnam pa sna tshogs mi 'byung zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi
430b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro//bde ba dang /lo legs pa dang /po tog dang /me tog dang //'bras bu thams cad yongs su 'grub par 'gyuraro//ro zhim pa dang 'jams par

434b7(rgyud): ba'i bskal pa 'byung ste/'di ni srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar mod pa'i sems can dmyal ba mnar mang ba la thug pa'i bar dag las gang tshig par mi 'gyur ba cung zad/

435a4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer byung nas/'od zer des klu'i khyim thams cad snang bar byos nas kyang slar log ste spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub par
435a5(rgyud): gyer to//de nas klu'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor ba zhes bya bas glu thams cad bsdus nas 'di skad ces smras so//kye klu dang klu chen po dag
435a6(rgyud): ci'i phyir 'od zer byung zhing rkyen gang gis 'jig rten du byung /de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya me chos bsams na/bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus 'od
435a7(rgyud): zer byung bar mthong //de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der ding ste lcags nas
435b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'od zer rab tu dkye ba'i rgyu gang lags/rkyen gang lags//'od zer rab tu
435b2(rgyud): ste khang pa thams cad snang bar bgyi ste/slar log par byed pa'i rgyu gang lagra/rkyen gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kye klu'i bdag po dag
435b3(rgyud): srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po 'gags pas 'gag par 'gyur ba'o//de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rdzing bu char gyi rgyun gyi chus

436a4(rgyud): par gyur na/bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i sngags kyi tshig bshad du gsol/gang gis slad ma'i tshe slad mi'i dus na sdug

443b1(rgyud): 'dzin stong lhags te/bcom ldan 'das ni nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/mu tigu dmar po tha dad pa mang pos brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/khyang pa
443b2(rgyud): brtsegs pa ni zham ring chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan pas bzhugs te/bcom ldan 'das ni 'od zer
443b3(rgyud): sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis sku ni shin tu brgyan/gser gyi mchod sdong ltar ni 'bar/nyi ma ltar ni snang /mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad
443b4(rgyud): bzang po brgyad cu mnga' ba/'od 'dom grang bas ni sku legs par rgyan/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni shin tu rnam par dag cing shin tu dri ma dang skyon mod pa'i
443b5(rgyud): 'od ni gsal/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor chen po 'dus par mkhyen nas sku la 'od zer sna tshogs phyung ste/'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu kun tu
443b6(rgyud): khyab par mdzad do//de nas tshangs pa dang /khyab 'jug dang /dbang phyug chen pos de bzhini gshegs pa'i 'od zer la bltas nas 'dzam bu'i gling na klu mi
443b7(rgyud): bsrungs pas sad dang /ser ba dang /rlung dang /ser sbyin pha ba ste/me tog dang /'bras bu thams cad dang /lo tog thams cad dang /shing dang rwa dang
444a1(rgyud): shing gel pa dang /sman dang /nags tshal dang /sman gyi bar bsregs te ma rungs par byas nas/yal ga yang 'jom
444a2(rgyud): bu'i gling na med par byas na/de na sems cin de dag sdug bsngal chen bros gi zir cing nyam thegs pa'i skad byung ba thos so//de nas tshangs pa dang
444a3(rgyud): khyab 'jug dang /dbang phyug chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhibs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad tsas gsol to//bcom ldan 'das klu gnod par
444a4(rgyud): sems pa gtum po rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling rnam par bshig ste/thams cad ma rungs par bgyis nas sems can rnams sdug bsngal mi bzang pa cher po
444a5(rgyud): myong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kye lha'i dbang po dag 'di ni mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin brlabs dang
444a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zab mo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi byin gyis brlabs lnga ltos shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das na mkha' lding
444a7(rgyud): bsgyings pas rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba kun nas ma lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba can rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs//snyoms par zhugs
444b1(rgyud): thag tu sku phrag pa gnyis rab tu 'bar te/'bar ma thag tu klu thams cad kyi lus rab tu 'bar bar gyur to//de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po kun nas gdugs
444b2(rgyud): kyisgra rnam par bskor bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das tshig lagaso//bde bar ga
444b3(rgyud): pa tshig lagaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsungs par gnang nas steng du rnam par gzigs te phyogs bcu kun yang gzugs te/de bzhin
444b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bzhes te/nAm mkha' lding gri shugs chen pos kun tu 'bar ba na mkha' lding gi gi za brjid kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di
444b5(rgyud): rje su dgongs so//oM badz+ra ba ti gA ru Da be ge hU~M hUM/ri tsi sri rje hUM phaT/de nas klu mi srun pa de dag yur yur por gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das
444b6(rgyud): kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'drar yang yod ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i na mkha' lding me lce 'bar bya zhes bya ba'i snying po chen po bka'
444b7(rgyud): sbya'o pa/na mo b+ha ga ba te/shAkya mu na ye/ta thA ga tA ya/oM badz+ra dz+wa la dz+wa la/pra dzA la/ha na ha ne/sarba nA ga hr-i da yo d+hA ra NI/ha ra ha ra/sarba/

445a2(rgyud): ba shi ni ba taM/nad ba ta ya ba ta ya/sarba nA ga ba ba na ni/oM ma ta ma ta/ma hI bi tsi tra ma ni mo hu li/da ra ha ma hA ru tra be ga da ra bi tsi tra/
445a3(rgyud): A ba ra Na bi bu hu shi ta kA ya/sarba nA gA nA na/ka ra ka ra/sma ra s+pha ra/b+ho ga ru De na pa ra thA gan ban tra na shAkya mu ne pra tsa na ma nu pA la ya/

446a1(rgyud): skyong bya'o//me tog dang /'bras bu dang /nag+na chal yongs su sbyong bya'o//bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu yongs su 'grub par byed do//
446a2(rgyud): de bas bstab pa 'phel bar byed//kye klu'i bdag po dag 'di dran ma theg pa tsam gyis klu'i dkyil 'khor byed pa/bu drang chung mar bcas pa dang /blon po

446b7(rgyud): bdag po dag de'i phyir bden pa'i yi dam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rje su bsrung bar bya'o//'dzam dbu'i gleng gi sems can thams cad yongasu bskyang

451b3(rgyud): lanA'i skye bar lan gcig bzlas pa skyesan snying rdeg de la chu rgyun 'byebasate/drwa ba~M pas dri skad 'dod pa bshin rngu ru babs /

451b5(rgyud): gzhan thams ci da la yang sngags 'di thog ma kho nor lan bdun brjod de//de kun tu sbyor ba ste/brjod pa sgrub pa 'grub bo//nam mkha'
451b6(rgyud): lding chen po rdo rje shugs 'bar ba na mkha' lding gi snying po dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so//de nas di'i 'og tu rtsa ba'i snying po
451b7(rgyud): pa'i tshi ga bstan te//gzungs bton ma thag pa tsam gyis klu thams cad 'dar yid yid do//bal po se'u shing gi lcug ma dang /shing ka ri bi
452a1(rgyud): ro'i lcug mas rlung dang /sprin bzlog par bya'o//ba'i lci bas la ma ltung bas khang steng du dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi pa shin tu rnam par phye

452a4(rgyud): gtor ma dkar pos bted pa bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag/me tog sil mas gang bar gtor//pra yos dang yung kor gyis gtor ro//

452a7(rgyud): ma yin pa'i rlung dang /sprin dang /ser ba 'bebs mi nus so//me tog da /'bras bu thams cad 'tshe yang mi nus/lani 'ga' yang rtswa'i la ma

452b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//brjod ma thag tsam gyis klu thams cad gyi snying dag la gnod par 'gyuraro//gal te klu dag phyogs de ma rung bar/

453a1(rgyud): bzungs pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur//khang steng du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/me tog sil mas gang bar gtor la bdug

480a1(rgyud): phyag 'tsha'o//oM badz+ra kro d+hi ma hA tsar+N+Na/hA na da ha pa tsa mA tha br-i ki ra/bi d+hA na swa ya/bcom ldan 'dus tshur gshegs/tshur ga shogs/hA nA ha na/ha ra ha ra/
480a2(rgyud): da ha da ha/pa tso pa tsa/bi d+hA na sa ya/bi d+hA na saM yi/lha dang lha ma yin gyi bdag bros mchod pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid las skyes pa/gzi brjid chen po/su ru su ru/
480a3(rgyud): mu ru mu ru/ku ru ku ru/g+hu ru g+hu ru/kur+b+baM kur+b+ba/ma hA kur+tha/bi kurba/ku nan+ti/na Ti nA Ti/shi ni shi ni/khi ni khyA ni/kha kha/khA hi khI hi/ku ru ku ru/tu Tu tu Ta/tuT Ta tuT/
480a4(rgyud): Ta/tra Ta Ta tre Ta Ta/tu ru tu ru/'byung po'i bdag po/klu'i bdag po/lha maM yin gyi grong khyer rnam par 'joms par byed pa khra bo tshal pa stobs po che/d+ham+b+ha d+hi ma/ka re/
480a5(rgyud): ka ra/ku ru ku ru/su ru su ru/hU~M phaT/ha na ha na/hUM phaT/da ha da ha hU~M phaT/pa tsa pi tse hUM phaT/hI hUM hUM hUM/phaT phaT phaT swA hA/oM tsu lu tsu lu swAhA/oM badz+ra kro d+ha
480a6(rgyud): ma hA ba laM/sar+b+ba duSh+Tau/saM b+hA ya saM b+hA ya/mo ha ya maM hai ye/hU~M phaT/oM hA hI/sa ra sa ra/bi sa re bi si r-i/g+h+r-i ta ye g+hA te ya oM baM sa ra/san tA sa ya hUM/oM badz+ra kr-id+b+ha
480a7(rgyud): mahA ba la/ha re he re//kha kha/khA hi khA hi/nA sha ya nA sha ya hU~M phaT/hUM hUM/mA mA/mA ma phaT/oM d+haMkakr-i d+ha na/bdag la bsrungs shig bsrungs shig swAt+ma/oM
480b1(rgyud): miN+Da ba la/badz+ra d+ha ra/ka ra ka ra/ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/hU~M phaT swAhA/oM dz+wa la gra sa/u tsuSh+ma sa ga rA hU~M/rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang srung bya dang /yongasu srung ba dang /bskyab/
480b2(rgyud): ba dang /sbed par byed par 'gyur ro//lag ni rdo rjes smras pa/gang gzungs 'di 'ching ba ni/dge bar 'gyur/dug mo gnod par 'gyur/shi ba sos par byed par 'gyur/dgro
480b3(rgyud): rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/bu mang bar 'gyu ro//sa phyogs kyang 'gas par 'gyur ro//gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//las thams cad kyang nus
480b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro//gdug pas zin pa rnams la ni sbyor chus 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//dug thams cad kyang dug ma yin par byed par 'gyuraro//mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u dang /bu mo
480b5(rgyud): yang badra bar bcas par 'gyur ro//mdo sde 'di zhig gsum bcangs na rgyas par 'gyur ro//zhag bdun bcangs no zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro//de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang/
480b6(rgyud): bdag rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas bskor ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas langs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang bri pa'i bdag po lag
480b7(rgyud): na rdo rje'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po log na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so//stobs po che'i bstan pa thogs pa
481a1(rgyud): med pa dang /stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/lag na rdo rje dga' ba/lha dang /myi dang /lha ma yin dang /tshangs pa'i dbang pos phyug byas pa//gnod/
481a2(rgyud): sbyin dang /srin po dang /ro langs dang /lus srul po 'jigs par byed pa/smyo byed dang /skrod pa dang /gsod pa dang /skem byed dang /sgo glegs dang //'khrul 'khor dang /gtan/
481a3(rgyud): po dang /rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa las thams cad byed pa/dkyil 'khor gsad pa dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsha du gsol//de nas/
481a4(rgyud): thad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis 'byung po'i bdag po dbang po dag la 'byung po'i bdag po legs so//legs so zhes bya ba byi na//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje sbar te/rdo rje
481a5(rgyud): la bzhugs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs nas/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas rdo rje mi bzad pa khro ba chen po bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par
481a6(rgyud): 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang /sems can thams cad la cher snying rje ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'od zer 'bar ba'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin/
481a7(rgyud): dang /chos thams cad kyi dga' ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang /bdud thams cad kyi yul 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang /phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces
481b1(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems can thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang /chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang /chos kyi sgra
481b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang /stobs po che zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to//de nas bcom ldan 'das log na rdo rjes sdom bag can du rdo rje spar
481b3(rgyud): te/de nas rdo rje pad+ma la gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas rdo rje mi bzad pa khro bo 'chol pa lus sbrul gyi
481b4(rgyud): ska rags kyis brgyan pa dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//zhugs ma thag tu khro bo 'chol bas bgegs bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma 'dar te gzir bar
481b5(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis mthong ngo //de dag tshig nas spro zhing srog btang ste/sreg pa'i bskal pa snyam du sems shing nyams thag pa'i skad kyis ngus te//byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo
481b6(rgyud): rdorje'i gan du song nas/bcom ldan 'das yongasu bskyab du gsol/byang chub sems dpa' yongasu bskyab du gsol/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo 'tshal
481b7(rgyud): pas gzir cing myos te 'phongs nas srog la yang mi blta'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje ting 'dzin de las langs te/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor tha~Md
482a1(rgyud): pa smras pa/ts+tsho ma'o khro ba chen po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul tshe b+h+yo//mthu che'o//de dag gis 'di skad ces smraso//bcom ldan 'das de d+mo bzhin to//kye ma'o khro bo rnon po 'ong na
482a2(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul che bo//mi thu che bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag ni rdo rje seng ge'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas 'byung po'i bdag po
482a3(rgyud): khro bo 'chol ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang bcas pa smA swa pa/oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/hA n+ya da ha pa tsa ma tha bi d+hA na sa ya/dza Ti laM bo d+ha ra/u tsuSh+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT/a aM mAhA/
482a4(rgyud): swA hA/grogs po dgra gang la la zhig khro bo stobs po che'i di'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs na de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//dus ma yin par 'chi bas dus byed
482a5(rgyud): pA r-i mi 'gyur ro//de'i lus la drag po'i las dang /nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro//de la bgegs dang /mi dang /rnam par log 'dren gyis glags rnying par
482a6(rgyud): mi 'gyur//skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro//dgra thams cad med par 'gyur ro//'dir zhugs na gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//khro bo thams cad
482a7(rgyud): kyi cho ga yang lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro//'dir dbang bskur na bkra mi shis pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro//dpal gyi byin gyis
482b1(rgyud): brlabs par 'gyuraro//de nas khro bo chen po lan khrus sngar spyad par byas te/khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor byed pa/byas pa gzo bA/rgyud shes pa/gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad
482b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa/gsum la sgrubasu dong ba/byang chub kyi sems drod ldan po/byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/snying rje can du gyur pa/dkyil 'khor mthong gro dbang bskur ba/bla ma
482b3(rgyud): rnams kyi lung byin pa/gang bdud thams cad dang /sdang ba'i sems rnam par 'jigs par byed pa/rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya ba 'di 'chang ba dang /klog pa
482b4(rgyud): de bdud dang /dgro thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyu ro//gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /yi dogs dang /she za dang /lus srul po dang /mkha' gro dang /brjed byed dang /sgrub pa
482b5(rgyud): dang /sbrulnga 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa thams cad dang /'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro//dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las thar bar 'gyuraro//bsod
482b6(rgyud): pa dang bi cing ba thams cad las thar bar 'gyuraro//bcad pa thams cad lathu par 'gyu ro//rmugs byed dang /rings byed dang /rmongs byed la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa thaMd las
482b7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//klu'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur//bkra mi shes pa thams cad las thor bar 'gyu'o//sems can dbul po gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs
483a1(rgyud): 'di dus gsum du 'chang ngam/klog grama?/yid la byed dam/rje su dran par byed na/dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro//lho nyes pa
483a2(rgyud): byung ba'i tshe/stobs pa che lan bdun bklags na sprin chen po las char 'bab po//gral to char mi 'bab nA sprin gyi lha rnams kyi srog skam par 'gyuraro//klu'i rgyal po
483a3(rgyud): nag po dang /klu'i rgyal po 'khor lo dang /klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi sprin chen po las char 'bebs so//gal te char mi 'bebs
483a4(rgyud): na srog bskams par 'gyur//gong du smos pa'i cho ga bzhin du chogs kyi cha 'am/rlung gi ngogs sam/rgya mtsho'i 'gram mam/mchod rten gyi gan su//byang chub
483a5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag ne rdo rje la mchod pa chen po byas te/tsan+dan dmar po dang /ka ra bi ra'i me tog dang /pad+ma dmar po dang /a ti muk+taM ka maM

483a7(rgyud): pa de dag yul ngo thams cad du zhugs kyang pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro//sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyuraro//bkra mi shes pa thams cad las

484a1(rgyud): yod 'do dang rangs pa gtogs rnas/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'a skad rjes bka' stsa te//rog sngags kyi rgyul po stobs pa che'i mya

484a6(rgyud): 'byor 'khoranyid na 'dug par gyur pas/bcom ldan 'dis rig sngags kyi rgya bo ba stobs po rje ji ltar grazung bar bya gyi/dam pa ni ci zhig

485b5(rgyud): 'chang ba dang //klog pa dang /yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /bsti stang du byed pa dang /bla mar byed pa dang /rim gror byed pa dang /mchod par byed pa des/'das pa/
485b6(rgyud): dang /ma ngas pa dang /daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro//'das pa dang /mo 'ongs byung ba/

486a1(rgyud): shin tu zab pa'i chos bstan pa dang /cho 'phrul gyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi chos bstan pa gzung bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lag rdorje
486a2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu gang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de la sdang ba'i sems can rnams chu 'gram gyi shing ltar ma rungs par 'gyuraro//spyos dang /me tog dang /bdug

486a5(rgyud): par log 'dren thams cad 'ching ba yid la byed na sangs rgyas brgyad stong dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /drang srong chen po rnams dang /lha dang /
486a6(rgyud): klu dang /dri zar bcas pa rnams dgyes dga'o//stobs po che'i gzungs sngags 'di la dgyes pa'i dus kyi tshe/de bzhin gshegs pa shA thub pas 'di skad tsa sragat+ta stsal to//
486a7(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su mdo sde laM gus par mi byed pa de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro//gsang ba pa'i bdeg po
486b1(rgyud): lhag na rdo rje su mdo sde 'di la gus par byed pa dang /rim gro byed pa dang /mchod pa byed pa de bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//yi ge 'dri 'am/
486b2(rgyud): tshig mnyen na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyuraro//lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/thub pa'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa/shin tu phra ba/shin tu zab pa/bsam/

486b4(rgyud): bdag po lag na rdo rje sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir mdo sde 'di bshad par bya'o//sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa bsal ba dang zhi bar bya
486b5(rgyud): ba dang /rgyas par bya ba dang /dbang bskur ba dang /bkra mi shis pa thams cad las thar par bya ba dang /dpal gyi byani gyis brlab par bya ba dang /sdig pa thams
486b6(rgyud): cad byang bar bya ba dang /sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya'o//de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
486b7(rgyud): brgya stong dang bar mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba mdzad/thal mo sbyor nas legs par rab tu bshad pa le go so zla mngon par dgyes par mdzad do//
487a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sangs rgyas de dag la slar gsungs pa/bcom ldan 'das dag legs par rab tu bshad pa lenas log so//bcom ldan 'a/
487a2(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/stob po che'i gsangs pa'i chos bstan pa 'di'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes sdang ba bgegs dang /rnam par log 'dren thams cad kyi snying 'dar zhing
487a3(rgyud): 'gul bar mthong ngo //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo//gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshalo//tad+ya thA/oM ha na ha na badz+ra badz+ra/de rka da hA badz+ra/
487a4(rgyud): tsa pa tsa badz+ra/ma tha ma tha badz+ra/dz+wa la dz+ha la/su ru suM ru/mu ru mu ru/ka TaM ka Te/dza yaM bI dza ye/a dzi he/a ba ra dzI te/ma ra si nr-i pi marda ni swA hA/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
487a5(rgyud): sprul pa/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rnam par log 'dren thams cad bsdigs shig/chings shig/chings shig/rnam par chad shig/ma grub pa rnams grub par gyis shig/
487a6(rgyud): grub pa rnams dul bar gyis shig/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad 'bab par gyis shig/lha dang /klu thamasna tshur shog tshur sheg/ngas stobs po che khro bo'i mthus//
487a7(rgyud): dge bar bya'o//de nas 'jam dpa' gzho nur gyur pa stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mos g.yas pa'i lhangs btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gal ba de log
487b1(rgyud): su thal mo sbyang ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'du byed thams cad kyi mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
487b2(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig/'du byed thams cad ni dri za'i grong khyer dang 'dra'o//'du byed thams cad ni klog dang sprin dang 'dra'o/

488a2(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mtshan nyid 'di nyid mthong zhing mtshan nyid 'di shes te/spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpo' rnams ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de bzhin du tshu/

493b4(rgyud): a nu ra tsi ti/maN+Da la naM/ka pA la mA la/a b+ha ba d+ha dzA ti/hA sa ku la naM/nirma l-i/saM bu laM/sA gai ra su mai ru pa ra pa ta/ta ri ta rang+ga swa shi kha ra d+hA tu
493b5(rgyud): la p+tA ta/naM ga raM/a mo g+hA da sha A di t+ye/maN+Da la na/kaM shi/ki ran mo li d+hA raM/sha she ki ran mo li d+ha rAM/tsa lA tsi mA lwa/sa ga la/dz+yo na kri ta/a bi b+hA saM
493b6(rgyud): ku yaM/pra ma tha naM/a su ra b+ha ba na/ku la na shra naM/brAh+manA/ru dA na ma kre traM/pU dza taM/sarba bid+yA d+hA ra na ma skr-i taM/shi ra bi sid+d+ha ya sha/gan+d+ha rA ba su tsa taM/ma hA me ru/
493b7(rgyud): maNar lan/guN+Da la d+ham/war yang myos bai dAd+haH/b+hun+da ka tak+Sha ka bA suM kai/sA ga ra/ni rdo ba na ta/ga la ka d+ha 'i me kha lA li kr-i ta/ga ti d+yod hri dad/
494a1(rgyud): nad+hA nAs ga gdang rgyu zlun nan na rgyun na rmu rgyun hA na
494a2(rgyud): R+shag+sa d+ma/ ste/sgyu pa Arnas p+lud+hIH / h+ye steng+ge/dz+ra//

495b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//gu gul la lan+d+ra bdun bzlas te bsregs na slar sos par 'gyur ro//gu gul la lan bdun bzlas te gang gi ming dang bcas pa mer bcug na/gang

495b5(rgyud): zhi bar 'dod na skud pa nag po 'am 'dzag ma la lan cig bzlas pas zhi'o//gong cung zad bya ba thams cad la gu gul la lan cig bzlas pas byed par 'gyur ro//
495b6(rgyud): gar mkhan ma chog gi brtag pa las lAs mang po pa'i le'u ste dang po'o////na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo baM shra ma NA s+ya/mau hA rA dza s+ya/na ra ku

496a1(rgyud): tsal/patsapa/pay+YA d+g+ham+b+ha/ku par swAt+ma//gcig tu dpa' ba 'bar ba rnams 'dul zhing las thams cad gdon da pyod/
496a2(rgyud): ngos grub kyi las thams cad dang /bla nu med pa'i dgos pa thams cad brjod pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro//bskrad par bya bar 'dod ni seng ldeng gi nga
496a3(rgyud): bu ser brgyad pa'i tshad du byas te/lan cig yongs su bzlas nas gang gi sgor btab pa de de ma thag tu skrod par 'gyur ro//phur pa phyung na grol bur 'gyur ro//yungs

496a6(rgyud): blo drung du bta ba na zhag gsum gyi thams cad dong bcas te 'khyam par 'gyu'o//zlo ba byas na su len cog yongs bzlas nas glang gi mying bzung ste sa 'og tu tho ngas
496a7(rgyud): bajigs ni de'i lus dum bu dumazung shig par 'gyur//phyong na thar ri//du khrod du gong gi ming bzung ste bcug ni 'byung ba chen pos zin te/byung na pa bar 'bru

496b3(rgyud): du nagasu spyod par 'gyur te phyung na thAr re//thams cad dgu gul la lan cig bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyuraro//dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/tho bA lA~M lan gaN+DI ga
496b4(rgyud): tite gu gul gyis bdug cing tho ba dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag na gnod sbyin dang /'bar ba dang /'beng ba mo dang /gnod sbyin po mo rnams ngu zhing phyogs phyogasu 'bris/

497a1(rgyud): bar 'bul bar byed do//gang mkhan mchog 'di ltar byas na de ma thag tu 'chi bar 'gyur ro//ngal bso po rkang pas mnan cing gu gul kya

500b6(rgyud): po dang /stobs kyi lha dang /dga' ba'i dbang po bri bar bya'o//dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnasu sangs rgyas gcig pu dpa' br-i shAkya mi'i sang+ge'i gzugs bzhugs par bya ste/
500b7(rgyud): lag na rdo rje dang /brgya byin rnga yab thogs shing g.yab po ltar g.yas g.yon du bzhag par bya'o//byang phyogs kyi grwar gang ba'i bum pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang /dngul gyi snang brgyad bzhag
501a1(rgyud): par bya'o//nub phyogasu pog 'od ts+tsha puHlnga dang /bzhin du shAr dang /smyo phyog su yang bzhag par byaro//gtor ma gang ba bcu brgyad dang /
501a2(rgyud): gtor ma'i bum pa sam+b+ha no rtsa gnyis dang //'bru dang /'bras bu dang /me chog gi phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad dang //bam po brgya rtsa ba d+had dang /ba bang du mtshon cha che zhes
501a3(rgyud): yang bzheg par bya'o//kha zas drug n+yA \u0f7f bi ne dang /betso pa sum+ba nu dang /ba dan brgyartsabargyad dang /gser gyi snod pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbusa~M su bzhag+sa par bya//

501a6(rgyud): sbyin no//ras kyi gzugs na bi g+hi phyogasu brtan nas bzhag la snga dro lan bdun bzlas la gtor ma yang dbul bar bya'o//gung dong phyi dro dang nyi ma nub pa'i dusu rang
501a7(rgyud): de bzhin du bzlas te dbul bar bya'o//de nas gu gul dang yungs kar bsres te/gzugs kyi spyan sngar nyi shu rtsa gcig bsreg par bya'o//de nas gar mi 'on
501b1(rgyud): mchog rang nyid la blugs par gyur pa na/byis pa'i gzugs dang 'dra pad+ma'ongs napa/sangs rgyas pa phyag 'argyas to//ran pa na pa de la bya bde bar 'ongs su
501b2(rgyud): tshur shog/grub pa'i mchog spongs shig dang /ci 'dod pa khyod la sbyin no//de nas yon chab phung phul te mchog gleng bar bya'o//gang 'dod pa'i mchog de ster te/
501b3(rgyud): rig tu 'dzin pa 'am/'jig rten skyong ba 'am/'khor los bsgyur rje'am/dbang po'am/grub pa'i spyod ba'i dbang po 'am/ngal bso'am/khyod gang dang gr-Ing 'dzi /

501b5(rgyud): rasdong ros dmar po sgrub pa'am/nomatsho la gro bi 'am/mi snang byar 'gyur ba jim mig rnam par dag pa 'am/reg pa'i cho ga lta ma yon gyi tshogs phug tu
501b6(rgyud): 'jug pa'am/'dod pa'i gzugs sama?/dbang po'i spyad dam/rgyal po dbang du byed pa'am/ri dgas dang bya'i skad shes pa dang /tshe sde ma rjesu dran pa 'am/gnod
501b7(rgyud): sbyin dang /'bar ba'i gzugs kyi las 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyu ro//gsang sngags 'dis gar mngon mchog slang gshig su ga sol lo//na mo de bram
502a1(rgyud): NA sra twA ya/na ra ku pa dA yA/oM sa ra sa R+sha/na Ta na Ta Ta/gats+tsha/swab+hA bA nA ma/ya tha su o t+sA yak+ShAn dra swAhA/'di ltar sbyor ba'i me tog thang sA
502a2(rgyud): nas phul te/lan cig bzlas pas gu gul gyis bdugs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro//gnod sbyin gar mkhan mchog gi brtag pa las/dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i cha ga'i
502a3(rgyud): le'u ste bzhi pa'o////de nas sku gzugs kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ras kha tshar ma bcad pa/skra med pa khru bzhi'i tshad la kun tu gru bzhi lham
502a4(rgyud): bya b+h+yo//ga ma bag+sa gyu rnas par tsho ma mtshan gyis su thun par sna gcu mang byas te zla bar byug//dbus su gyur ma

509a7(rgyud): yang bal po se'u'i lcug ma so//ser ba 'pho bar bya ba la ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas so//sa bon bdun pa bsregs nas klus char 'bebs par byed do//gnod
509b1(rgyud): sbyin bskrad pa la yang 'bras dang tI lu bsregs pas so//chung 'tshong gi chang nyams par byed na chang gi skyo ba dang /phug ma bskyeg par bya'o//til mar gyis ni
509b2(rgyud): da du byed bar 'gyur//yid oM bzlas pa sa d+ma/'gro bar rnyed de// b+h+yo 'jug smras las ste bad+d+ha skyed par 'gyur //da ma na mdzad
509b3(rgyud): ba'i snying po bskyed pa tsam gyis 'grub po//gu gul gyis bdugs na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba ni dngos grub thams cad bla na med pa des blang ngo //
509b4(rgyud): gar mkhan ma tshig gi nye bar spyad pa dang //sngags dang phyag rgya sgrub pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ngal
509b5(rgyud): bsos po'i bu gar mkhan mchog la legs so zhes gsungs te/leg so legs so//gnod sbyin gyi dbang po khyod kyis sems can la phyin pa'i phyir bstan pa
509b6(rgyud): legs par bstan to//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha'
509b7(rgyud): lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /brgya byin dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /tshangs pa dang /khyab 'jug dang /lha chen po dang /nor bu bzang po dang

510a2(rgyud): dpon chen po gar mkhan mchog rig pa'i rgyal po spyad dang dngos grub sgrub pa klags pas thams cad 'grub pa brtag pa'i rgyal po dang po rdzogs so//
510a3(rgyud): rgyu bar gyi mkhan po d+hA na gup+tA zhes bya ba spyod mdzad chos kyi rdo rjeslob ma dngos las/rab zhi lots+tsha bsu zo ling du bsgyur ba'o////gsang

510a5(rgyud): ba byas nas/lha'i mye tog dang /rin po che du mas bcom+ba lnga ni 'das la mngon par bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das
510a6(rgyud): rnams spyi rgyal po 'di la ci'i slad du nam thos sras zhes bgyi/ci'i slad du dul bso po zhes bgyi/ci'i slad du gnas phung po zhus bgyi/ci'i slad du lus ngan dzA
510a7(rgyud): zhes bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' spel pa/gsang ba'i bdag po khyod kyis lho'i rgyal
510b1(rgyud): ming gi rnam grangs rnams gnod sbyin gyi tshogs chen po 'di dang /sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la yang dag par ston cig/ces pa de gsungs nas/de nas gsang ba'i bdag/
510b2(rgyud): po lag ni rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la lan du mar bskor ba byas nas/rdo rje snyems pa dang bcas pas/'gying zhing rang gi stan la 'dug ste/'khor 'dus pa dang /gnod sbyin
510b3(rgyud): gyi sde dpon chen po rnams le gzigs nas/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la 'di skad ces gsungaso//sde dpon yang dag shes lha'i rgyal po 'di ni rnam par
510b4(rgyud): snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs las sprul pa ste/sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji lta ba bzhin du mdzad pa'o//de nas tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis bsams pa//
510b5(rgyud): kye ma lha rnams kyi srid grub cing mi rnams kyi re ba skong ba'i phyir thabs ci yod ces bsams pa dang /lha thams cad kyi mnga' bdag ma hU~M de ba drang srong gi spyod pa la gnas
510b6(rgyud): shing dga' ba'i tshal na yod pa/lha'i bu rnams kyis drang srong chen po rnam pa mang du thos pa drang srong gi spyod pa mdzadado zhes grag so//de'i tshe na tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis
510b7(rgyud): brgya byin la bskul ste/dang lha mo drang srong la phulo//des kyang drang srong gi bka' thub bzlogo/rnam pa mang po thos pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa las//zla ba bcu na khye'u mtshan/
511a1(rgyud): dang ldan pa cig dang lha mo'i phang du brdzus te byung //ming yang srid grub ces btag s+ho//de nas tshor smyos pa dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnam
511a2(rgyud): lcang lo can gyi pho brang du phul te/sa gsum pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur//de'i tshe bAr snying la gnas pa'i lha rnams dang //yul 'khor srung dang /'phags skyes po
511a3(rgyud): dang /mig mi bzang dang /gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyis rin po che'i shing rta bkra ba phul nas bstod pa//lha dang mi'i mgon gyur lha'i lha//bau de mdzad
511a4(rgyud): srid grub rnam mang thos pa'i sraso//smon lam thugs rje'i mthu mnga' rin chen mang //rnam mang thos pa'i sras la phyag 'tshalo//zhes bstod de phyag 'tshal ba las
511a5(rgyud): rnam thos sras zhes ming du chags par gyur to//sde dpon chen po yang dag shes lha rnams ni lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams 'dod la/lha ma yin rnams ni/lha rnams kyi
511a6(rgyud): shing thog 'dod pas na de dag 'thub par byed do//de yang lha ma yin rnams la ri rab kyi khong sing na sa gzhi chen po bzhi gnas te/dang po sgra can 'dzin no//gnyis
511a7(rgyud): ba mgul phreng /gsum pa rab dgod/bzhi pa thags bzangs ris so//de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra can dpung gi tshogs chen po dang chas te/rgyal chen rigs
511b1(rgyud): bzhi'i lha rnams la brgal bar gyur to//de'i tshe na rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dul bso t+yo 'dzam bu gling lta zhing rab tu rtogs par byed do//yul 'khor srung dang /'phags skyes//
511b2(rgyud): bo dang /mig mi bzang rnams dang /'thab par byed do//de'i tshe na rnam thos sras ri rab kyi spyod pa la ngal bris pa sgra gcan gyis mthong nas gzi brjid dang dpal ma bzod//
511b3(rgyud): de'i tshe na sgra gcan gyis rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis gtor te bstod pa/lha'i nong na nor lha lha'i mchog/'gro ba'i skyabs mdzad dal bso dge ba po/ba
511b4(rgyud): gshegs spyod mdzad re ba skong mdzad pa'i/kun gyi mgon gyur ngal bso khyod phyag 'tshal//zhes bstod nas gsum gyi rgyal po ngal bso ba rgyal bar gyur cig ces
511b5(rgyud): bstod nus ring gi gnas su zhugs so//yang dag shes des na ngal bso po zhes ming du chags par gyur to//sde dpon chen po yang dgra shes de nas lha ma yin gyi
511b6(rgyud): sa gnyis pa la gnas pa mgul phreng gis sgra can la smras pa/sgra gcan khyod g.yul lase brtan pa thob bam/bde bar log gama? zhes dris pa dang /sgra gcan gyis
511b7(rgyud): smras pa/kho bo ni ngal bso po rgyal po'i gzi brjid kyis bsregs so//rnam par tshig ste bzod par dka' bo zhes smraso//de'i tshe 'gul phreng khro bas non nas sgra gcan
512a1(rgyud): la smras pa/kye sgra gcan kho bo ni stobs dang dmag go dpung khyod pas bzhi 'gyur gyis mang bas/lu'u tsug 'grogs te rgyal chen tana'i grong dang skung
512a2(rgyud): mos tshul kun dga' ra ba rnams gzhom par bya'o zhes nas dpung gi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang /sgra gcan dang bcas te 'ongs par gyur to//de'i tshe na rgyal po rna
512a3(rgyud): thos kyi bu saung+ge la zhon par gyur cing gser gyi ya lang bgos te gnas pa las rgyal po gsum dang ljang lo can rnams phyogs la thug pa'i tshe/rnam thos nyid kyi yul
512a4(rgyud): dang kun dga' ra ba la sogs pa'i gnas rnams bsrungs te/lha ma yin rnams pham par byas so//de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po mgul phreng gis/gos rin po che sna
512a5(rgyud): tshogs kyis gtor nus bstod pa/dpa' bo 'jigs med nyon mongs g.yul las rgyal//lho rnams gnas srung zil gnon seng+ge'i gdan//phongs pa sgrol mdzad ya lang rnam
512a6(rgyud): lngas brgyan//mgon po gnas srung khyed la phyag 'tshal lo//zhes bstod nas rang gi gan su zhugs par gyur to//de nas lha ma yin sa gzhi gsum la gnas
512a7(rgyud): ba'i rab dgod ces bya bas mgul phreng la smras pa/lha ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul las rgyal lam/brtan pa thob bam zhes dris pa dang /mgul grong gis smras pa/
512b1(rgyud): ma yin gyi bdag go la bcog sgra bcan dang bcas pa mngon pa kun sa bsrungs ngas ts+tshat+yA ya bam pa d+hats+tsha N+Da/dru gang gcan gan du 'dang bar byas so//
512b2(rgyud): la ba me phog pasgyur brnyis par byas so zhes smras pa dang /rab dgod kyis skyes pa/kho desa~M lnga'i dbang po'i grong khyer blta na sdug dbrog par bya'o//rgyal chen rig
512b3(rgyud): bzhi pa rnams 'bangs su bya'o zhes smras nas/rang gi yul nas dpung gi tshogs chen po stu ga catsun dang ma gul phreng dang brtsis pa snga ma bso brgya 'gyur gyis lhag
512b4(rgyud): pa ri rab kyi steng du phyin to//de'i tshe lha'i dbang po ni chos bzang na lha'i bu rnams la chos ston to//de'i rdo lha ma yin gyi bdag po gsum gyi dmag dang bcas
512b5(rgyud): pas/blta na sdug gi grong bar dang /skyed mos chalnga rnams phrogs la thugo//de'i tshe nya dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgya byin la gsol pa/lha'i dbang po mkhyen par mdza
512b6(rgyud): dugasolayin rnams kyis bsgo ni sdug pa'i grong khyer phrogs la b+h+yog zhes gsol pa dang /brgya byin gyis smras pa/m+b+hir bdag po rnams song la/byung phyugs kyi rgyu
512b7(rgyud): la bas pa la gsal pa thob kyi//des gsul las rgyal bar byed//zhes smraso//de napa nyi dbang sbom cuHgnyis kyis rgyal ba chen po khyed la l+h+wa yon gyi gdu
513a1(rgyud): las rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir lha'i dbang po 'bod dro zhes smras pa dang /de'i tshe rgyal po ngal byasau pau r-i rab gaskor gyi mdog can de'i steng du gang mdzes
513a2(rgyud): snyam pa dang /bai DUr+ya mdzes por mthong ste/bdag nyid bai DUr+ya'i lus su gnas te rta bai DUr+ya'i mdog can zhon te/gser gyi ya lad kyis rgyan te gr-i yul du 'jug
513a3(rgyud): par byed do//de'i tshe rab dgod pa la sogs pas gzi brjid ma gzod/rang 'pham par gyur nas so'i sgo de nyid nas rang gi gnas su song ngo /de'i tshe sum cu NAM/
513a4(rgyud): gsum pa'i lha rnams ngo mtshar skyes te/kye ma lus ngan pa 'di 'dra bas lha ma yin gyi g.yul las rgyal bar byaso zhes zer ro//yang dag shes rgyal tshan ros//
513a5(rgyud): bzhi'i lha rnams kyis lus kyi tshad ni rgyang grags bzhi cha'o//sum cu rtswa gsum pa'i lus kyi tshad ni rgyang grags phyed do//de ltar ngal bso bo'i lus kyis rtsa gsum
513a6(rgyud): ba'i lus kyi phyed las mi slob bo/de'i tshe nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis rin po che'i me tog du mas gtor te bstod pa/lha'i nang na rgyal po nor lha khyod//yid
513a7(rgyud): bzhin re ba kun gyi skyabs gyur pa//lus ngan pos ni lha min bye ba btul//nyon mongs g.yul las rgyal la phyag 'tshalo//zhes bstod de/rgyal po lus ngan
513b1(rgyud): po ni kho bo cag gi skyabs su gyur to//zhes brjod pas de'i phyir lus ngan po zhes so//ste dpon yang dag shes de ltar rgyal po glanas gsum mo 'di'i ming gi rnam grangs
513b2(rgyud): rnams shes par gyis shig/gnod sbyin gar mkhan mchog go brtag pa phyi ma lngas rnam thos sras ming gi rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o///
513b3(rgyud): de nas sde dpon yang dag shes//rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ni//gsong ba'i bdag la 'di skad gsol//mi rnams 'byor par 'dod pa dang //lha rnams dbul ba sem
513b4(rgyud): ba yi//de yi sgrub thabs bshad par mdzod//de skad gsol ba gsan nas ni//gsang ba'i bdag po rab bzhad de//gnod sprin bdag po dag la gsungs//legaso /
513b5(rgyud): sde dpon yang dag shes//byang chub sems dpa' rin chen myang //rnam snang dpal phreng thugs las sprul//de sgrub cho ga 'di lto ste//rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu//

513b7(rgyud): med 'od spros te//sangs rgyas byang chub sems sogs dang //nyan thos rang rgyal 'gro ba'i mgon//de rnams mdun du gsol ba las//phyag 'tshal skyabs
514a1(rgyud): 'gro la sogs bya//de nas byams sogs rjes dran to//stong pa nyid kyi ye shes no//mo g.yo las byung ba par 'dug/de nas skyon lam thugs
514a2(rgyud): yis/rta bdun steng du 'brug sgra'i dbyangs//rdo rje rtse lnga de nyid gnas//de las yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku//sku mdog ljang se dur ba'i mdog/sems
514a3(rgyud): dpa' 'dzum zhing yid kyang khro//sgrog par bcas shing rgyan dang ldan//ye shes ting nge 'dzin gyis mdzes//mdun du rdo rje gnod mdzes ni//sku mdog
514a4(rgyud): mthing nag sbrul gyis rgyan//g.yas pa rdo rje ral gri g.yon//de nas rig pa stobs bo che//khams gsum 'joms pa sku mdog dmar//rdo rje dang ni
514a5(rgyud): yab phyag/g.yas kyi phyogs su nye bar gnas//de yis g.yon gyi phyogs su ni//khro bo khams gsum bdun las rgyal//'khor lo dbyug ti dang 'brel
514a6(rgyud): dkar//rgyab tu bdud rtsi thob sbyor ni//ljang khu sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin//grwa drang glo'i phyogs rnams su//sge gri mo phreng ba gar dang glu//bdug pa me tog
514a7(rgyud): mur me rnams//khyams dang de yi grwa la'o//lcags kyu la sogs sgo yi bdag/ye shes ting 'dzin gyis mdzes//sa bin hUM las yang dag
514b1(rgyud): byung //mAn+d+ra r+m+man mA na sa sh+tsa k+Sha//s+'u s+yAm+b+ha gyur pad+mog su smras khang //yogs rtsog pa smras mangs pa'o//do yo bA ga b+h+yo samAm+b+ha dA sh+mad+d+haH/
514b2(rgyud): pa/oM bad+hAsade dag rnams kyis mchod byas das/'dus phrag gicig hU~M lis bzlas na//byang chu chen por byed ba ste//rAs kyi mig nga ma
514b3(rgyud): dang/la du sto brgyad kyis yin//rnam pa babang dung gAmed 'byu // ba den sa /ni blun rnamapa kyang ga yin pa de'i/
514b4(rgyud): rnams//dag pa 'di las 'byung bar 'gyud //de ni sbyin ker me ni tshe 'og pa pa byes pa'aM// pa'i'i skye ro//
515a1(rgyud): sde dpon chen po yang dag shes//gnas gsum pa yi rgyal po yi//sgrub pa yang dag rab bshad bya//rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su/

515a3(rgyud): dag ldan//stong pa nyid kyis brtan byas te//tshwa zer can du yang dag hUM//'od 'phros rdo rje hUM dang ldan//de gyur gsang ba'i bdag po ni//sku mdog ldang
515a4(rgyud): ster yid tsam 'khro//rdo rje dang ni ud pa la 'dzin//sangs rgyas dpag med rab 'phro ba'i//bdag nyid de ltar bsam par bya//de nas de yi mdun du ni//
515a5(rgyud): bruM las byung ba'i gzhal yas khang //kA ba brgyad khri dag dang ldan//rin chen bzhi las grub pa yi//rtse mo yang thog nor bus sbas//zur bzhi rims
515a6(rgyud): brtsegs pho brang dgu//dbus kyi sa yi cha rnams su//rdzing bu bzang pos yang dag smras//de dbus 'jigs byed seng+ge'i gdan//baM las skyes pa'i sa
515a7(rgyud): gsum bdag/lha rnams rgyal po bsam par bya//sngar gyi gtso bo'i thugs kha las//'od 'phro ye shes bkug la bstim//sku gsum ldan zhing de nyid kyi/
515b1(rgyud): gnas drug rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs//de la mchod bstod gsol bya zhing //snying po'i sngags m+b+ha nyes par bya//oM badz+rA pAr+Na hUM hUM phaT/oM bai shra pa Na ye swAhA/'dra
515b2(rgyud): 'du me yi 'khor lo bzhin//gsal ba gsum dang ldan pa yis//de nyid reg pas mchod byas ni//sa gsum mgon po rab mnyes nas//'dod pa'i don rnams sgrub
515b3(rgyud): byed cing //'bum phrag cig gis sa rnams g.yo//ri la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin rnams//bran g.yog rab tu byed pa yin//'bum phrag nyis ni gnas khang 'bar/
515b4(rgyud): bor snang gnas pa'i gnod sbyin rnams//dran gra srog rab tu byed pa yin//des ci bsgo ba'i ngag nyan byed//'bum phrag gsum gyis phyogs rnams bsreg/grags pas
515b5(rgyud): phyogs bcur rgyas par khya//'bum phrag bzhi yi bza' bzung thog/gnod sbyin lha yi bu mo rnams//bud med gzugs kyi rigs 'dzin mchod//'bum phrag lnga yi nor
515b6(rgyud): drong ldan//sa 'og gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis//nor dang 'bru'i char pa 'bab so//'bum phrag drug gis 'khor bzangs rnyed//chos la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin rnams//
515b7(rgyud): mi yi byas pa'i gzugs su ston//'bum phrag bdun gyis rigs rgyud 'phel//chos dang ldan pa'i lha rnams ni//sems can don du skye bar byed//'bum phrag
516a1(rgyud): brgyad kyis cho 'phel zhing //stobs chen sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //rje dpon chen po nyi shu brgyud//de yi rjes 'brang bar chad sepa//dgus na
516a2(rgyud): bcud len sman rnams rnyed//gnod sbyin rigs 'dzin chen po rnams//de yi stobs dang tshe 'phel phyir//sman pa'i gzugs mu yang dge gnas//bcus ni mngon//
516a3(rgyud): par shes pa 'thob//yon tan kun gyis rab tu gang //gnod sbyin gang mkhan mchog gi brtag pa phyi ma las//gdul bya'i phyag na rdo rje'i gsang sngags kyi phan yon
516a4(rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o////sde dpon chen po yang dag shes//rig pa'i cho ga zab mo 'di//bsgrim mi dgos pa las thams cad
516a5(rgyud): byed pa ste//so shing la bsngags shing gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro//rtsa dur ba'i yam shing la 'bras thug po che dang //gi'u wa nga brta dang bsregs na nair
516a6(rgyud): 'phel bar byed do//yi ge brgyad pa'i rig sngags 'di nyid gser gyi byang bu la mngon par bris te/zangs dang ga'u la sbyor ba byas la//sbrang rtsi'i nang du 'khor lo
516a7(rgyud): bcug ste/brda rgyud phyag rgya bcas pa'i snyim par bcug ste 'bum phrag bcu bzlas na dong du bstan pa'i yon tan rnams 'byung ste the tshom mo bya'o//'khor lo de'i
516b1(rgyud): sgrub pa ni gzhan yang ba mdzod du khang pa gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa tshon rtsis kha dog bsgyur ba/tsan dan dmar po'i dris khyab par byugs la/rgyar khru do pa/dpangs su
516b2(rgyud): khru gsum pa byas te/de'i dbus su bum pa lnga 'bru lngas bkang ba'i steng du bzhag la/zla ba 'ong ngo cogi tshe bcu'i nyin par mchod pa bya zhing gsol ba btab na nor gyi
516b3(rgyud): phung po 'phel bar byed de/kor mdzod kyi sgrub pa ste gter gyi phung po'o//yang snga ma'i 'khor lo de thab kyi dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du bzhag la/thab kyi
516b4(rgyud): logs bzhi dang /grwa bzhir bum pa gang ba'i gzugs bzhi dang logs bzhir ba bzhi bri bar bya ste/seng ldeng gi mes bskol nag yos pa mi zad par byed do//
516b5(rgyud): yang 'khor lo de gtsug lag khang du sbas nas gang bsgrubs pa'i gnod sbyin de mngon du 'gyuraro//yang 'khor lo de phyug po'i bang mdzo du mis ma tshor bar sbas na 'bru'i
516b6(rgyud): phung po rang gi gnas su 'pho'o//yang 'khor lo de bai tsun mo'i skyed gnas su sbas te brda rgyud kyi phyag bcas pa de pal lha mo'i mdun du gsol ba btab na/gsol/
516b7(rgyud): ba btab pa'i rigs rgyud de 'phel bar byed do//gnod sbyin ga mkhan mchog rtag phyi ma li sa yi ge brgyad pa'i las tshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o////
517a1(rgyud): sde dpon chen po yang dag shes mi rnams 'bru'i phung po sprul bar 'dod pa sa dang lha mau bsgrub par bya ste//klu'i rgyal po lcang lo can gyi pho brang byang shar na
517a2(rgyud): khang pa dam pa gser gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba na//dpalha mo bzhugs te/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling+gi rgyal mtshan gser bzang po le na mkha'
517a3(rgyud): mdzod kyi ti nge 'dzin zhus nas sbyin bdag tshin par gyur to//brum las rin po che'i khang pa mdzes pa'i dbusu pad+ma dgu'i steng du bum pa dgu bsam par bya'o//
517a4(rgyud): dbus kyi bum pa'i steng du shrI gyur pa lngas lha mo dur ba ljang ku'i mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//lag paM g.yas ni rin po ches mtshan pa'i
517a5(rgyud): pad+ma 'dzin pa/g.yon skyabs sbyin pa'i phyag rgya can no//de'i phyi rol bum pa brgyad kyi steng du//grogs mo brgyad de/de yang nor rgyun ma dang /zla shel can

524a1(rgyud): gzang na m+b+ha b+h+yas ma g+ha yas pa'i wA d+hA sbrul bcugs te/bAn+d+ham+b+ha ldan 'das gal ba dang thal mo spya ba byAs+yAte/phyug sa nas brgyang /
