524b1(rgyud): rlung bde pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das bdag b+h+yo// du dzad song su brgyang 'ong bam ldan 'angs chos ston pa grangs 'a bdag gos phyogs pa man par dadus pa dang /gang/
525a1(rgyud): nas rang gi sngags smras pa/na mo rut+na tra yA ya/na mr-i ma Ni b+hA drA ya/ma hA yak+Sha so nA ba ta ye/oM dza b+ha lu dz+ra lAn+na yA swA hA/de nasa? sngags
525a2(rgyud): kyi rgyal po 'di smras pa tsam gyis de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi snying chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams denarnam pa drug tu gi los so//de nas ji srid rmi ldog pa'i bya
525a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams dang /gnod sbyiran gyi dbang po/rnams kyis mgrin gcig gis 'di skad ces bya ba'i tshig brjod do//bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs
525a4(rgyud): po ci srid chos kyi rnam grangs sngar byung ba'i ngo mtshar rmad du nges par gyur pa ci srid chos kyi rnam grangs phan yon chen po ngo mched ba sdug bsngal ba rnams dang /skyabs med
525a5(rgyud): pa rnams dang /yongs su skyob pa med pa rnams dang /gnas med pa rnams kyi skyabs dang /gnas dang /skyobs dang /yongasu skyob pa de bcom ldan 'das bshad
525a6(rgyud): du gsol/sems can rnams kyi don dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don du lha dang mi rnams kyi phan pa dang /bde ba'i phyir snying po 'di rtag pa dang /dkyil 'khor dang /
525a7(rgyud): gsang chen dang /sems can gang gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs shing bde ba nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa
525b1(rgyud): thob pa'o//de nas yang 'khor gnod sbyin rnams dang /nyan thos tshon pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin lngas sogs pa
525b2(rgyud): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas rang ring gi stan la sra langs nas thal mo sbyar te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das lo 'di skad ces
525b3(rgyud): gsol ba btab pa/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin de rnams 'khor de rnams dang bcas pa la bka' stsal pa/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rigs kyi bu
525b4(rgyud): khyed rnams nyon cig/gnod sbyin chen po'i snying po 'di dkyil 'khor dang /phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /gsang chen shin tu ngo mtshar ba dang /shin tu slad du gyur pa
525b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /mi
525b6(rgyud): 'am ci dang /lho 'phye chen po drang /yi dgas dang /sha za dang /mi dang /mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phyag byas shing mngon par bstod pa/sems can rnams la
525b7(rgyud): kun tu ngan pa'i phyir/yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /bum pa bzang po dang /dpag bsam gyi shing ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa bzhin du don thams cad sgrub par byed
526a1(rgyud): pa de'i phyir nga'i rjes snang zhing byin gyis brlabs pa 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa'i sems can rnams zin pa'i khung ngu thos
526a2(rgyud): shing phrag pa ma 'gyur /gzhan yang dge ba'i rdzi bam bas klas pa'i sems can rnams kyis ny+dzan pA dang /'dri ba dang /'dzin pa ra/klog bcom
526a3(rgyud): yang nus par mi 'gyur ro//'on kyang sems can gang skyed pa 'di 'dzin pa dang rje su bzung bar 'gyur zhing phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag
526a4(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro//ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur ro//mthang bcom gyis nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//dbul po dang
526a5(rgyud): yid mi badre ba dang /lus kyi zug rngu 'byung bar mi 'gyur re//sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro//mkhas
526a6(rgyud): pa rnams kyi mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro//lha thams cad dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin rnams 'dus pas kyang sngags 'di 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang /phan
526a7(rgyud): yon rtogs par mi nus so//'on kyang nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu dang /gzhan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
526b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /phan yon rgyas par mthar thug pa brjod par mi nus so//gzhan la gtam tsam yang mi grag/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
526b2(rgyud): gzhan rnams dang /nyan thos rnams dang //de las gzhan pa'i rgya che ba'i lhas 'di'i yon tan ston pa dang shes pa tsam yang mi nus so//mdor na ji ltar de bzhin
526b3(rgyud): gshegs pa yon tan mthar thug pa dang ldan pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis so//'od de 'dra ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams dang
526b4(rgyud): kyi snying por gyur pa snying po'i mchog go/gdug pa rnams las gnod gnas kyis//phongs pa rnams ni gso bar byed//sems can rnams ni gnas yin zhing //
526b5(rgyud): 'gro ba rnams ni yang dgra srung //dbang po kun shes go 'bang ldan//gnod gnas rgyal bar brjod pa'o//mdor na 'di las gzhan pa yi//de bzhin gshes
526b6(rgyud): ba tha dad pa'i//de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan na zad//'di 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i gnas yongs su byas par 'gyuraro//de bzhin
526b7(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rtag tu byin gyis brlab pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dngas thob par 'gyur ro//de nas /
527a1(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gnas pa'i 'khor rnams la gzugs nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gnod pa nas la 'di skad ces pang /
527a2(rgyud): stsal to//gnod gnas kyi dbang po khyed kyi rtog pa dang /dkyil 'khor dang /phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /bsdong chen rnams sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
527a3(rgyud): kyang bstan pa yod de/rnam par gzigs dang /gtsub tor can dang /thams cad skyob dang /'khor ba 'jig dang /gsir thub dang /'od srung dang /
527a4(rgyud): da ltar shAkya thub pa ngas bshad do//de ni legs par nyon la legs par yid la zung shig/de ltar nga yis bshad kyi su lha dang mi'i phan pa dang /bde bar
527a5(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsu ba 'phelnga ba'i don du nga yis yang dag par shes so//gang gis ko sha'i grong khyer du shing khur nus 'tshong ba de'i tshe de rang la dgon pa na sdod pa'i
527a6(rgyud): dge slong zhig blud shing gri don du nga la shing slongs su 'ongs te/der ngas dgon par shing khyer te dge slong gi gan du phyin te/me sbar nas dge slong gi nid sos
527a7(rgyud): par byas te/nyi ma gcig gi bsod snyoms yang drangs so//de nas dge slong de sems yongasu mgu nas des nga la gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba dang /byang chub tu
527b1(rgyud): sems bskyed nas dkyil 'khor dang /phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /gsang ba'i rtog pa nga la byin no//ngas kyang yang dag par bsgoms nas yod do//de'i cha sngags kyi rgyal ba/
527b2(rgyud): dul byin nas de ltar de nyid bsgoms pas che de nyid las ji ltar 'phags pa gnod gnas kyi dbang po'i mtho ba'i lam du gyur to//de nas de nga la yongasu mgu nas phyag rab tu
527b3(rgyud): grol ba zhes bya bar ming btag so//der yang nga rgyal por dbang bskur bas grong khyer gyi mi rnams chos dang ldan par byas nas/de la nga rgyal por rab tu gan sa pas ngas
527b4(rgyud): sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nges par spyi ngo ci ltar don du gnyer ba rnams la skal pa dang ldan nam dus med par tha~Md la nye bar phan par rang gi khyim du
527b5(rgyud): rdzogs par byaso//de la sogs par ngas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin po yong su rdzogs par byin pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu zhug so//rims kyis ngas thams cad
527b6(rgyud): mkhyen pa yang dag par rdzog so//dbul ba tha~Md nyams par byed pa dang /sen tha~Md kyi sdug bsngal nye bar gcod pa ngas yang dag par mngon par sheso//gang yang de bzhin
527b7(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i yis shin tu rtags pa de nas kyis kyang sngon du sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bsgrubs
528a1(rgyud): pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo//de'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khyed du bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
528a2(rgyud): yum du gyur pa skyed pa/'dod pa thams cad sgrub pa'i thabs//gang zhig mthong ba tso mo gyis kyang //de ni skye ba gcig nasa~M gcig/sngon du bsazhes pa'i phas
528a3(rgyud): rnams kya //sdig pa kun las rnam par grol//de bzhin skye ba 'di la rmongs//shin tu sdig pa mi bzod byas//g+hanod sbyin dbang po gauzi brjed cha/
528a4(rgyud): glang gis mthong ba tsam gyis kyang //byang chub sems dpa' thob pa dang //sangs rgyas dang ni yang dag phrad//phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang ni//yun mi
528a5(rgyud): ring bar rab 'thob po//mthong ba tsamo gyis yon tan nI//nga yis bshad kyis khyod rang nyon//dbul ba dang ni yid mi bde//sems ni nad kyis gzir
528a6(rgyud): ba dang //gdon dang byud kyang skur ba yis//de yis 'jigs pad mi 'gyur ro//lce dang klu dang dri zla dang //lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding //de las
528a7(rgyud): gzhan yang yang mi dzad/rtag pa nyid du srung ba'o//gnod sbyin de nyid mthong tsam gyis//dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa//'di ni yon tan
528b1(rgyud): rnams 'byung //bsgrubaslu par bya byu na do smon//gang zhog dad pa spyod bzhin rtog//bustsu pas b+h+yaHgas pasna gzhan mo 'jug/'dul gus das/
528b2(rgyud): don drug //bsgrub pa sdus pa sa zhes pa mas/des ni 'byed pas gtsang /da las 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog/gnang zhing dben pa'i
528b3(rgyud): sa b+h+yo sa//shing gi 'bras bre sna tshogs bcas//pus chub tsam gyis sa sbyangs pa//ba yirnam lngas d+h+r-ig par bya//mnyam par brdung zhing bzhug par bya/
528b4(rgyud): lagro mthul stu ba'i mnyam pa l-I//wAchung+gany+tsi shra ts+tsham la ni//gnod spyod dbang po mngon pa de sngags//mai trog sna tshogs gcil du byus ma//
528b5(rgyud): bdug pas bdug pa dang //hi cang bzong po de bzhin gna'i//de bzhin dus tshod babang po la//dUkAR+sha ba~M'i phyogasnrel legs par dag/slob dpo
528b6(rgyud): legyis par rdzogs pa yis//bA ye nam lnga sa legs par sbyang //bdag nyid sngags bzlas rgyal po yis//bla du dag pa gyur pa yis//sany+dzum
528b7(rgyud): bar gzhag par 'asrung bar bya//rtang deng 'og dang phyogs pa rgyun//phyogs ni de bzhin bcing bar bya//gnod sbyin rgyam po dri ma chug/mkhas pa
529a1(rgyud): /ban+d+hartswa brgyud du bsngags//ji ltar shAd+tha sogs mngon par gtor//phyogs bcid mngon gyi rim pa bzhin//gzhon nu ma yis/
529a2(rgyud): bkal ba yi//tshon sno lnga yis skyed pa la//gur gum chu yIs byugs pa dang //phung po u dum shing la byas//shar gyi phyogs nas brtsam
529a3(rgyud): par bya//thib dab snga dro'i dus su'o//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//zur bzhi'i rI mig bzhi dang ldan//de lnga dang po'i di la du ni//de bzhin
529a4(rgyud): gshegs pa bri bar bya//rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa yi//thams cad mkhyen pa zla ba'i 'od//de ni gnod sbyin dbang po ni//mtshan nyid thams cad mtshon
529a5(rgyud): pa yi sra//sngon po sprin lta bu yi mdog/rgyan ser po yis mdzes pa dang //rkang gdub lag gdub mgul rgyun dang //rin chen sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa//
529a6(rgyud): seng ge'i gdani la rin chen dang //sna tshogs tha dad rnam par brgyan//ri mo sna tshogs rin chen 'di//'phro yid 'dra bar 'bar ba'i 'od//skyil krung phyed
529a7(rgyud): pas bzhugs pa legs par mdzes//de nyid dbus su nor bu bzang po legs par bya//rab tu 'bad pas g.yas pa'i phrag/mchog sprin sa bon yongasu bya//
529b1(rgyud): de bzhin du ni g.yon pa'i phyag//nai le rin chen dgug pa'o//sna tshogs gtor rnams stong du legs par bzhugs//de bzhin dung dang pad+ma yis//rin tshon char na 'bebs
529b2(rgyud): pa'o//mnga' bdag g.yas dang g.yon du'o//nor bu bzang po de yi phyogs//gnod sbyin bzang po dngul mdog can//mkhas pa sngar bzhin du ni dgod//spyod
529b3(rgyud): pa'i dbang po gdong dbang po//g.yas dang g.yon du bya ba'o//rnam pa kha dog 'dro ba yi//gter gyi steng du yang dag bzhugs//de yi 'og tu gnod sbyin
529b4(rgyud): mo//bdun po dag ni bri bar bya//de las gzhan du bu dgu ste//de las gzhan ni chu skyes so//rin chen lte ba nir sbyin dang //gnod mdzes dang ni gnod
529b5(rgyud): mdzes gzhan//lte mdzes dang ni lce chen po//mtshams su bum pa bzang po'o//'phar ba gnyis la dgod bya ba'i//gnod sbyin dbang po stobs po che//
529b6(rgyud): gnod gnas lu hA lu hU dang //sde mdzes dang ni zla ba'i ste//rengs pa dang ni 'dul ba dang //lce dmar dang ni gsus po che//snam bu gsum pa la bya ba//gnod
529b7(rgyud): sbyin mo ni lha mdzes ma//rgya chen ma deng dri bral na//zla mo blo gros snying po spyan//pad+ma'i snying po bzhin mdzes ma//gnod sbyin lag pa lag mangs po//sprin chen po dang
530a1(rgyud): sgra mdzes pa//gter gyi phreng ba g.yem pa mo//ljon shing phreng ba phrang ba mo//'dod pa kun gyi 'bras ster ma//yid shugs ma dang 'dod
530a2(rgyud): gzugs ma//thos ngag ma dang lha mdzes ma//rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam bshad pa//nyi shu mchog ni ster ba'o//ce ste'i rim pas rnam dgod la//ji ltar mdun
530a3(rgyud): dang phyogs ba nir dgod//dbang po la sogs dgod par bya//de nas phyi rol dra ba ste//rdo rje shauk+ti dbyug pa dang //ral gri zhags pa rgyal mtshan dang /
530a4(rgyud): 'khor lo rtse gsum mtshon cha bsnams//sngar bzhin du n-i dgod par bya//steng 'og mda' yi dri ba dang //de bzhin rdo rje 'bar ba'o//mkhas pas phyi
530a5(rgyud): rol du ni dgod//de nas spyan drang brtsam par bya//cheni rtsi lnga ni dkaro po dang //ser po dmar po sngon po nag/dbyangs kyi sngags kyis sngon bsngags te//
530a6(rgyud): phyi rol rgyal mtshan brgyad dgod bya//de bzhin phyogs rnams arga'i snod//chu ni me tog gis bkang byas//spyan drang mchog sbyin yis ni bya//sngags pas
530a7(rgyud): bye bar the tsham med//gnod sbyin mo rnams rang sngags kyis//mkhas pa yis ni spyan drang bya//lha dang lha men spyan drang bya//gnod gnas dbang po stobs
530b1(rgyud): /ma log zung shin tu d+hAk+Sha8//pad+ma ud pa la ye chogs/na glA ga sed k+She phra dang //dro dang bdug pa sgron ma dang //bshos gtsang gtod ma
530b2(rgyud): kun 'dod pas//rim pa bzhin du mchod pa ni//mkhas pa yis ni bya ba yin//ga pu dang ni gung gum rmi//yang na can dan dkar po yas//'bum
530b3(rgyud): phrag du ni sbyin bsreg bya//stong phrag brgya yi sbyin bsreg bya//nor bu bzang po'i mdun du'o//ji ltar rigs pas bzlas pA dang //sbyin sreg cho ga
530b4(rgyud): bzhin du'o//'bud po yis ni mchod pa bya//mtshams su bum pa dgod pa ni//rin tshun 'bru dang sman rnams ldan//dri yi chu yis yongs su dgang /
530b5(rgyud): nr-i ta pa la sa yI g.yogs//mgrin pa rasr-i kyis dkris pa dang //de srid bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags//rang rang gi ni sngags bzlas pa//de nyid bum pa dgod
530b6(rgyud): par bya//'di la sngags rnams 'byung ba ni//aM dzAM b+ha la dza len drA ya swA hA//gtso bo de las thams cad pa'i sngags so//ma hA yak+Sha rA dzA ya//pi nam
530b7(rgyud): te/ba na b+ha drA ya/he ma sta teN+Do yak+Sha pra tso d+ha ya d+ha di tri/gnod sbyin gyi dbyings kyi sngags oM yak+Sha ya swA hA/gnid sbyin gyi snying po'o//sder sprin drang ba dang
531a1(rgyud): gshegasu gsol ba dang /mchod pa dang /bum pa mngon par bsngags pa'i sngags te so sor sbyar bar bya'o//a na ta pad+mA ya swAhA/
531a2(rgyud): pad+ma'i gter gyi sngags so//a nan ta saM khA ya swA hA/gter gyi drung gi sngags so//dza rA ya nA be ya d+hA na u d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/dngul gyi me dog cen
531a3(rgyud): sngags so//ce ran+d+rA ya swA hA/spyod pa'i dbang po'i sngag so//mu khain+ta drA ye swA hA/dbang po gdong gi sngags so//oM d+ha ni de swA hA/gter sbyin gyi sngags
531a4(rgyud): sirdzam NI d+ha pa ya d+hi na a d+hi po te ye swA hA/rin+da chen lte ba'i sngags so//su ni get+tA/na ya a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/lte mdzes k+ti sngags so//oM suM b+ha na d+ha
531a5(rgyud): yA d+ha na a d+ha ba ta ye swAhA/gnod mdzes kyi lte ba'i sngags so//oM a su b+ha na b+haM ya d+ha na A d+hi pa ta ye swA hI/gnod mdzes lte gzhan gyi spug so/
531a6(rgyud): oM b+ha naM b+ha ya d+ha na a d+hi pi ta ye swA hA//chu'i lce bcin gyi sngags so//ni Na b+ha ya d+ha nr-i a ti pa ta ye sA tAM/s+ye sngon chan gyi sngags so//bai shra ma Na b+ha ya/
531a7(rgyud): d+ha na a d+hi pa taM ye swA hA/rnam thos sras kyi sngags so//ma hA na b+ha ya d+ha na a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/lte chen gyi sngags so//i dzaM b+ha dra gA nA ya swA hA/
531b1(rgyud): bum pa bzang po'i sngags so//hA ra dza ma b+ha ga hU~M phaT/rmugs byed kyi spagaso//ak+Sh+ma in d+ha yA sA hA/hu lu hu lu zhes bya ba'i sngagaso+o//su s+ye nA ya swA hA/sde mdzas
531b2(rgyud): kyi sngagaso//ha ra ha re tsan+d+ra se nA ye swA hA/zla ba sngo'i sngags so//dzaM b+hA lA ya swA hA/gnid gnas kyi sdig so//mat+ta ya swA hA/'dul byed kyi sngag so//rA ga dza hI ya
531b3(rgyud): swA hA/lce dmar po'i stagI so//ma hau da rA ya swA hA/gsus po che'i sngag so//bai ma la b+hi la daR+sha ni a ya ti swA hA/dri bral mo'i sngags so//b+ha sa la NA yai Ne bo
531b4(rgyud): d+ha ya swA hA/rgyal chen mo'i sngags so//tsan+d+ra su me hi su ra pu dzi te tsa ni dre can dwe/tsan+d+ra ma ti swA hA/zla 'od blo gro saM me'i sngag so//'gugs pa'i spyan can ma'i'o//
531b5(rgyud): oM tsa nI dra ba dA me swA hA/pad+ma'i snying po'i sngags so//su b+h+yAM ma nor b+he swA hA/smin mdzes mi'i sngagase//oM ba pu pra tA ya swA hA/lag pa dang lago mangs ma'i sngag so//
531b6(rgyud): li to ga te mo ti sAd/srin chen mo'i sngagaso//su ge ma laM ge sha b+hu NaM swA hA/sgra mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i sngag so//ba ni mA la ba li ni swA hA/nags kyi phreng ba ma
531b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i sngags so//u tiSh+Ta b+hu tsa l+r-i swA hA/g.yem pa mo'i sngagaso//tI mA le mA li ka la ka ha lau drA mi ki li ki li swA hA/ljon ma phreng ba ma'i sngags so//k+Sha ma
532a1(rgyud): mU la b+ha la so ni swA hA/'dod pa'i phreng ba ma'i sngags so//sar+b+ba d+ha yi b+ha sarba a ta ma no dzA ba be ga b+he de swA hA/yid kyi shugs can ma
532a2(rgyud): sngags so//kA ma bi kA ma bi kA ma mi nai swA hA/'dod pa'i gzugs can ma'i sngag so//shru ta bAka kle ka ra swAhA/thos ngag mri'i sngagaso//sr-i d+ha ra ni kA ma na
532a3(rgyud): swAhA/lha mdzes ma'i sngag so//ma hA g+he b+hA ye ka ri Ni sAhA//rdzu 'phrul chen mo'i sngag so//gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi'o//in+d+ra dre bI b+hAM pa ta yAM swAhA/de
532a4(rgyud): bo 'di snying po'o//eg+ne yA ud byA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/me lI'i snying po'o//ya me pra ti u d+hi pa to yai swA hA//gshin rje'i snying po'o//nai ri t+ye rIk+Sha sAd+d+hi/
532a5(rgyud): pA ta yai swA hA/bden bral gyi snying po'o//ma du ne ye dza la A d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/chu bdag gi snying po'o//bA ya ba an+ta rak+Sha a d+hi pA ta ye swA hA/rlung lha'i
532a6(rgyud): snying po'o//ku be rA ye d+hA na aM d+hi pa ta yai swA hA/lus ngan gyi snying po'o//i shwA nA ya b+hU taM a d+hI pa ta ye swA hA/dr-i bang ldan gyi snying po'o//Urad+hA
532a7(rgyud): /sa pa'i slong ba//a d+he biSh+Ta be swAt+ma/khyib 'jug gi slong du a ba~M baN+Da mA /rdo rje'i sbying po'o//n+ya t+ya sa nA la ky-i
532b1(rgyud): sha ka ti'i snying po'o//ma hA s+ya ma ya swA hA/dbyug pa'i skang po'o//khaD+ga bi ma la b+ha ri Ni swA hA/ral gr-i'i snying pau'o//ba ru Na ta ma a d+hi pa ta ye sAhA/
